id='poem_sentence_2_213542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213542'>天空地迥何处觅，岁计有馀心自知。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_214336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214336'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214336'>余汎观于天下兮，何者乐而谁者足忧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214336'>忧于窘窘不得兮，乐尽万物而无求。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214336'>玩声色而弊形性兮，维造化之螟蠹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214336'>将逍遥炉锤之外兮，尚何俛首而婴此细故。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214336'>百年存亡得失兮，吾既视奕棋与摴蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214336'>寒暑蚤夜极则迁兮，有满则有虚。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214336'>应龙之不拘系乎，宁与羸马帖耳而求刍。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214336'>云升雨降兮，上下有无。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214336'>入与神会兮，出与化俱。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214336'>无对于天下兮，制命在予。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214336'>贾群嚣而我静兮，岂其跨一世以求直。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214336'>乃有德人相与友兮，忘我于忘言之域。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214336'>廓宇宙以为量兮，奚自适而不通，遂风休而水释。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_214336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214336'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·外集》卷二○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_214336_comment'></div></div><br id='poem_sentence_6_214781_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>乡居备试，与黄介有诗歌往还。作品：几复读庄子戏赠。读书呈几复二首。阻水呈几复二首。漫书呈几复二首。留几复饮。再留几复。拟古乐府长相思寄黄几复。古乐府白纻四时歌。<div id='poem_213906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>几复读庄子戏赠<span class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213906'>蜩化抢榆枋，鹏化抟扶摇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213906'>大椿万岁寿，粪英不重朝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213906'>有待于无待，定非各逍遥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213906'>譬如宿舂粮，所诣岂得辽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213906'>漆园槁项翁，闻风独参寥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_213906'>物情本不齐，显者桀与尧。<div id='poem_sentence_5_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_213906'>烈风号万窍，杂然吹籁箫。<div id='poem_sentence_6_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_213906'>声随器形异，安可一律调。<div id='poem_sentence_7_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_213906'>何尝<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作当）</span>用吾私，总领使同条。<div id='poem_sentence_10_213906'>胡不弃影事，直以神理超。<div id='poem_sentence_10_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_213906'>木资不才生，雁得不才死。<div id='poem_sentence_11_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_213906'>投身死生中，未可优劣比。<div id='poem_sentence_12_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_213906'>深藏无所用，一寓不得已。<div id='poem_sentence_13_213906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_213906'>逍遥同我谁，岁暮于吾子。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214834'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214834'>韩生高才跨一世，刘项存亡翻手耳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214834'>终然不忍负沛公，颇似从容得天意。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214834'>成皋日夜望救兵，取齐自重身已轻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214834'>蹑足封王能早寤，岂恨淮阴食千户。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214834'>虽知天下有所归，独怜身与哙等齐。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214834'>蒯通狂说不足撼<span class='inlineComment2'>（翁方纲按：《精华》作不可撼。）</span>，陈豨孺子胡能为。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214834'>予尝贳酒淮阴市，韩信庙前木十围。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214834'>千年事与浮云去，想见留侯决是非。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214834'>丈夫出身佐明主，用舍行藏可<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>自知。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214834'>功名邂逅轩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>天地，万事当观失意时。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214834'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_214834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214834'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_214834_0'>⑴ 原校：《精华》作要</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_214834_0'>⑵ 原校：《精华》作掀</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214834_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淮阴侯</a><span class='authorDate'>（1066年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214759")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214759_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214759'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214759'>韩生沈鸷非悍勇，笑出胯下良自重。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214759'>滕公不斩世未知，萧相自追王始用。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214759'>成安书生自圣贤，左仁右圣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>兵在咽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214759'>万人背水亦书意，独驱市井收万全。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214759'>功成广武坐东向，人言将军真汉将。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214759'>兔死狗烹姑置之，此事已足千年垂。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214759'>君不见丞相商君用秦国，平生赵良头雪白<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214759'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_214759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214759'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_214759_0'>⑴ 原校：《精华》作义</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_214759_0'>⑵ 原注：分宁本云按㽦注载蜀本云：韩生沈鸷非悍勇，俛身跨下真自重。滕公不斩人未知，萧相自追王始用。从来儒者溺所闻，奇兵果斩成安君。功成千金购降虏，东面置坐师广武。军前定策收万全，燕齐争下如风旋。虽云晚计大疏略，此事已足垂千年。君不见秦丞相、卫公子，立法治秦薄如纸。法行投鼠不忌器，乃是天资少恩尔。白头故人一赵良，忠言过耳弃路傍。吾固知功名成败不足据，直观古人用心处。王直方立之云：元丰初，山谷过下邳淮阴庙作以示，孙莘老言其太过，无含蓄。山谷然之，遂改今诗。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214759_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214909' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214909' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214909?labeling=true' target='_blank'>颜阖<span id='poem_sentence_3_214909'>出门应使者，陇上不谋国。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214909'>心知误将命，非敢惮行役<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　返回江南，途中有诗。作品：初望淮山。新息渡淮。光山道中。<div id='poem_213700' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213700' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213848")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213848_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213848_0'>① 原注：治平四年，公是岁得官叶县。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213848'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213848'>京尘无处可轩眉，照面淮滨喜自知。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213848'>风里麦苗连地起，雨中杨树带烟垂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213848'>故林归计嗟迟暮，久客平生厌别离。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213848'>落日江南采蘋去，长歌柳恽洞庭诗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213848_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213848'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213848_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213546' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213546' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213546?labeling=true' target='_blank'>光山道中<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：治平四年赴叶县作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213546")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213546_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213546'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213546'>客子空知行路难，中田耕者自高闲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213546'>柳条莺啭清阴里，楸树蝉嘶翠带间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213546'>梦幻百年随逝水，劳歌一曲对青山。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213546'>出门捧檄羞闲友，归寿吾亲得解颜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213546_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213546'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213546_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　返回江南，有诗。作品：夷仲叔父幼子倅日。悲秋。寄傅君倚同年。赠元发弟。答德甫弟。学许氏《说文》赠诸弟。病懒。<div id='poem_214784' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214784' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214784?labeling=true' target='_blank'>悲秋<span class='inlineComment2'>（为知命弟作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214784")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214784_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214784'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214784'>有美一人兮，临清秋而太息。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214784'>伤天形之缺然兮，与有足者同堂而并席。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214784'>傥尝获罪于天兮，使而至于斯极。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214784'>夫阴凝而阳化兮，冲气饪而为和。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214784'>骈拇所以为少，枝指所以为多。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214784'>谓天任汝以道兮，曾是形畸而貌独。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214784'>天厌弃汝兮，修汝德而谓何。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214784'>中无所考此耿耿兮，独溯风而浩歌。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214784'>歌曰父耶母耶，人乎天乎。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214784'>才之为祥，固不若不才之全乎。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214784'>非天地之私兮，又非父母之愿也。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214784'>慨伏思而不得兮，梦漂漂而行远。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214784'>逆真人于轩台兮，请端策而徵衍。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214784'>遇水盈之坎坎兮，得山麓而为蹇。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214784'>虽御良而马服兮，犹往蹇而来连。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214784'>艮之初六来告休兮，艮其趾而无咎。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214784'>如风日之过河兮，人谓守水而为耗。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214784'>知水性之循环兮，曾何损益之足道。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214784'>蚿百足之狂攘兮，夔踸踔以行地。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214784'>蛇虺蔓延不自好兮，谓风蓬蓬而无似物。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214784'>怜物之无穷兮，目尚为心之仆隶。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214784'>夫精于形器之表兮，视四体百骸其在外。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214784'>予将执汝手兮，游乎浩荡之会。<div id='poem_sentence_22_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_214784'>凭天津而濯发兮，揽日月以为佩。<div id='poem_sentence_23_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_214784'>嗟不知去来之为我兮，天下莫予之为对。<div id='poem_sentence_24_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_214784'>恐路远而多岐兮，聊赠汝以指南。<div id='poem_sentence_25_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_214784'>将雍容于胜日兮，尝试为汝而妄谈<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《山谷集》卷一）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_26_214784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214742'>念君方策名，要津迈腾骧。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214742'>引车入里门，观者塞路旁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214686'>空蒙象外意，高大且闳深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214686'>闻有居覆盆，岂能逃照临。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214686'>一马统万物，八还见真心。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214686_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　赴任前滞留家乡分宁，有诗。作品：次韵赏梅。赵令许载酒见过。和答赵令同前韵。赵令答诗约携山妓见访。谢赵令载酒。清明。戏题葆真阁。戏赠南禅师。寄新茶与南禅师。赠清隐持正禅师。木之彬彬。听履霜操。邹操。渡江。流水。虎号南山。采菊。读晋史。读谢安传。四月末天气陡然如秋遂御夹衣游北沙亭观江涨。徐孺子祠堂。何造成作浩然堂陈义甚高然颇喜度世飞升筑屋饭方士愿乘六气游天地间故作浩然词二章赠之。戏赠张叔甫集句。次韵戏答彦和。渔父二首。古渔父。问渔父。早行。<div id='poem_213680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵赏梅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213680")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213680_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213680_0'>① 按：《年谱》编入熙宁元年叶县作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213680'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213680'>安知宋玉在邻墙，笑立春晴照粉光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213680'>淡薄似能知我意，幽闲元不为人芳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213680'>微风拂掠生春思，小雨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_213680", 213680, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>廉纤</span>洗暗妆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213680'>只恐浓葩<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作而）</span>委泥土，谁令<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作令谁）</span>解合返魂香。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213680'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213680_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213781' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213781' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213781?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_2_213872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213872'>异时折脚铛安稳，更种平湖十顷莲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213872'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213872_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213997' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213997' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213997?labeling=true' target='_blank'>木之彬彬</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213997")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213997_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_213997'>曹公所礼三人：孔融祢衡，阳狂嫚侮，操且疑且信，故以衡假手于黄祖，融晚乃覆巢。独杨修材慧，数解隐语，又探其不言者发之，最先得罪，虽其父公雅故，不足以贳死。嗟乎！修黄犊子，有致远材，一怒其臂，死于隆车之辙。曾不知隰子之伐木邪？田常与大夫隰子登台四望齐邑，南向而蔽于隰子之乔木。成子不言。隰子归，使人伐木，斧斤离数创则止之。相室曰：何变之亟也？曰：田子将成大事，恶人知其微。今不伐木，未深忌也；知人之所不言，其忌深矣。故曰：知微者兵在其颈，求福者褚藏其颖。虽然，隰子犹有所未立也，与百里奚策虞公而去之，岂可同年语哉！感二三子行事，作木之彬彬。</div><div id='poem_preface_213997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213997'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213997'>木之彬彬，非取异于人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213997'>可宫室则斩则伐，可笾豆则捋则撷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213997'>草之茸茸，非求显于世。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213997'>中刍牧则刈则锄，中医和则剥则枯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213997'>非以其材故耶，是非之歧，利害薰蒸。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_213997'>嗟人道之多患，彼草木尚无情。<div id='poem_sentence_5_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_213997'>吾尝观于若人矣，巧于辨人，拙于自辨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_213997'>好动乎天机，不周乎时变。<div id='poem_sentence_7_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_213997'>罪莫惨于德有心，祸莫深于心有见。<div id='poem_sentence_8_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_213997'>罪不在德，心其蟊贼，祸不在心。<div id='poem_sentence_9_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_213997'>见其髡钳之人也，皦皦自鲜，行于众污之前。<div id='poem_sentence_10_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_213997'>峣峣不让，立乎众埤之上。<div id='poem_sentence_11_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_213997'>积小不当，是以亡其大当。<div id='poem_sentence_12_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_213997'>悲夫！<div id='poem_sentence_13_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_213997'>羿注矢以当物，十尝中其七八。<div id='poem_sentence_14_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_213997'>引镆铘以自残，骇兕虎之窃发。<div id='poem_sentence_15_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_213997'>祸集于所忽，怨栖于荣名。<div id='poem_sentence_16_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_213997'>易其言则害智，用其智则害明。<div id='poem_sentence_17_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_213997'>为君子则奈何，独见晓于冥冥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_213997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213997'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·正集》卷一二。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_213997_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214366' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214366' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214366?labeling=true' target='_blank'>听履霜操</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214366")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214366_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_214366'>士有有意于问学，不得于亲，能不怨者，预听斯琴。予故为危苦之词，撼其关键，冀其动心忍性，遇变而不悔。</div><div id='poem_preface_214366_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214366'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214366'>灵宫窈窕兮寒夜永，篁竹造天兮明月下影，木叶陨霜兮秋声动。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214366'>我以岁莫起视夜兮，北山饮予斗柄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214366'>幽人拂琴而当予，曰夫子则钟期，尝试刳心而为之听。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214366'>若有人兮亦既脩，宴衽席之言兮不知其子之齐圣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214366'>嘉孝子之心终无已兮，不忍忘初之戒命。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214366'>人则不语兮弦则语，客有变容而涕洟，奄不知哀之来处。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214366'>悲乎痛哉！<div id='poem_sentence_6_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214366'>葛屦剪剪兮絺绤凉凉，衣则风兮车上霜，天云愁兮空山四野。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214366'>竭九河湔涕痕兮，忽承睫其更下。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214366'>嫠不忧其纬兮，恤楚社之不血食。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214366'>尽子职而不我爱兮，终非父母之本心。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214366'>天高地厚施莫报兮，固自有物以至今。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214366'>雉雊鸡乳兮，麋鹿解角。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214366'>天性则然兮，无有要约。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214366'>哀号中野兮，于父母又何求。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214366'>我行于野兮，不敢有履声。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214366'>恐亲心为予动兮，是以有履霜之忧。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214366'>古人之骨朽矣，匪斯今也。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214366'>蹙然如动乎其指，浩然如生乎其心也。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214366'>声音之发，钩其深也。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214366'>枯薪三尺，惟学林也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_214366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214366'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·外集》卷二○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_214366_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214390' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214390' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214390?labeling=true' target='_blank'>邹操</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214390")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214390_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_214390'>晋人以币交孔子而召之，礼际甚善。孔子将渡河，闻赵简子杀鸣犊舜华，临河而不进曰：洋洋乎，丘之不济，此命也夫！学者常以事不经见，相与献疑，以为鲁哀季桓不足与有明也，公山佛肸不足与有为也。卫以家听南子，齐以国听田常，阳货乱人，原壤之不肖，与之酬酢，雍容礼貌而弗绝也。简子杀大夫，何得罪之深欤？彼盖不知亡国之祥，莫大乎杀贤大夫。无罪而戮一民，士可以舍禄；无罪而杀一士，大夫可以命车。无罪而杀贤大夫，锄国之干也；锄国之干而不得罪于国人，国非君之有也。推此以行，其孰不剪刈？故君子见微，归在邹，作邹操。</div><div id='poem_preface_214390_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214390'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214390'>归欤怀哉，此邦不可以游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214390'>眷吾车而有柅，非河浒之无舟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214390'>政何君而莫与，君何国而莫求。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214390'>岁荏荏而老至，慨时运之不逑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214390'>洋洋乎水哉，丘之不得济也。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214390'>昊天不吊，仁者此无罪也。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214390'>揽国辟而家擅，几何而不殆也。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214390'>心病不可药，手足未有害也。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214390'>鸟覆巢于主人，凤摩天而逝也。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214390'>求所用生丧其生，吾不忍幪此虿也。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214390'>岂曰如之何，然后求诸蔡也。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214390'>已乎已乎！<div id='poem_sentence_11_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214390'>鸟兽山林，则以食也。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214390'>天下有道，丘不与易也。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214390'>归我休矣，奉帝则也。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214390'>大同至小，天地德也。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214390'>小物自私，智之贼也。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214390'>国无知兮，我非伤悲兮。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214390'>驺御委辔，四牡驰兮。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214390'>心不慊于前驱，又欲下而走兮。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214390'>中园有林，斧所相兮。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214390'>大厦峨峨，不谋匠兮。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214390'>往者不可及，来者吾犹望兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_214390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214390'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·外集》卷二○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_214390_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214786' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214786' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214786?labeling=true' target='_blank'>渡江<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年叶县作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214786")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214786_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214786'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214786'>行渡江兮吾无舟，荡荡东注兮褰裳不可以游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214786'>渔横舟兮不即渡，夐万里以在前兮无家反顾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214786'>云翳翳兮雨凄凄，不济此兮谁与归。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　返家分宁，有感于其妹死之不幸，赋《毁壁》以哀之。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='751c8b476e2448e4b850954af4bc3e81_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("751c8b476e2448e4b850954af4bc3e81");'><span id='751c8b476e2448e4b850954af4bc3e81_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>，39岁</div><div id='751c8b476e2448e4b850954af4bc3e81' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>太和任满，返家分宁，有诗。作品：过家。上冢。明叔知县和示过家上冢二篇复次韵。次韵郭明叔长歌。咏清水岩呈郭明叔并序。次韵清水岩。次韵郭明叔登县楼见思长句。宿山家效孟浩然。<div id='poem_214357' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214357' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214357?labeling=true' target='_blank'>过家</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214357")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214357_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214357'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214357'>络纬声转急，田车寒不运。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214357'>儿时手种柳，上与云雨近。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214357'>舍傍旧佣保，少换老欲尽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214357'>宰木郁苍苍，田园变<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_214357", 214357, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>畦畛</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214357'>招延屈父党，劳问走婚亲。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214357'>归来翻作客，顾影良自哂。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214357'>一生萍托水，万事雪侵鬓。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214357'>夜阑风陨霜，乾叶落成阵。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214357'>灯花何故喜，大是报书信。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214357'>亲年当喜惧，儿齿欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_214357", 214357, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>毁龀</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214357'>系船三百里，去梦无一寸。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_213928'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213928'>自公返蓬荜，税驾上丘垄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213928'>霜露此日悲，松楸千<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>年拱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213928'>养雏数毛羽，初不及承奉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213928'>康州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_213928", 213928, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>断肠猿</span>，风枝割永痛<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作风树终日痛）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213928'>少年不如人，登仕无前勇。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_213928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_213928'>称觞太夫人，鱼菜赡庖供。<div id='poem_sentence_7_213928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_214519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214519'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214519'>敝邑荷佳政，耕桑及时运。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214519'>令君平生欢，远别喜亲近。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214519'>吾友徐光禄，死战万事尽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214519'>不见东陵侯，惟见瓜连畛。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214707'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_214707_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>太和任满，返家分宁，有题诗。作品：题徐氏姑寿安君寿梅亭。寄题莹中野轩。题章和甫钓亭。<div id='poem_214896' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214896' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214896?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题徐氏姑寿安君寿梅亭<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰六年赴德平作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214896")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214896_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214896'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214896'>大雏衔枚来作亭，小雏衔实来种花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214896_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214896'>两雏反哺声查查，慈乌发白尔成家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214896_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214896'>梅梁丹青射寒日，梅英飞雪点亲发。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214896_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214896'>二雏同味如春酒，寿亲一笑宜长久。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214896_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214896'>金玉满堂空尔为，有亲举酒世上稀。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214896_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214896'>生育劬劳安可报，折梅倾酒著斑衣。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213821?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄题莹中野轩<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰六年太和作。）</span></a><span "poem_title_213821")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213821'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213821_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213821'>平生江海心犹在，退食诗书吏罢休。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213821_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213821'>□□□□□□力，必知耆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>旧想风流。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213821_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 原作书，据山谷集改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213821_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214903' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214903' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_214903'>寒潭百雷，古木千尺。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214903'>观鱼乐而相忘，听鸟啼而自得。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214889'>江湖拍天流，罗网盖稻粱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　在分宁，为萧济父作墓志铭。作品：萧济父墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>萧济父墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198019")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198019'>吾友萧济父，新淦人，讳公饷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198019_comment'></div>曾大父咏，大父汉卿，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198019_comment'></div>父中和，福州长乐令，以太常寺奉礼郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198019_comment'></div>济父事亲不遗力，居丧以毁瘠闻，友爱其弟，恩意甚异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198019_comment'></div>博学能文，少时累试礼部，在太学有声称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198019_comment'></div>熙宁中忽自废，不为举子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198019_comment'></div>元祐六年，乃以特奏名试于廷，得一命，归而殁于牖下，享年五十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198019_comment'></div>娶庐陵段氏，生六子，男曰皞、晔、麟、玕，二女为欧阳毖、郭钦正妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198019_comment'></div>初，济父既无仕进意，筑室于清江峡之埼、巴丘之上，曰休亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198019_comment'></div>閒居且二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198019_comment'></div>于书无所不观，尤好《孟子》、黄帝《素问》，啄其英华，以治气养心，遨乐于尘垢之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198019_comment'></div>推其绪馀，子弟皆兴于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198019_comment'></div>逮其欲出仕，不幸而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198019_comment'></div>与济父游者皆哀之，故商济父之得丧而为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198019_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1198019'>玉笥岑岑，阅世无疆，我以为朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198019_comment'></div>章贡合而流清，不舍昼夜，与我偕行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198019_comment'></div>仰其高追配古人，钩其深得意日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198019_comment'></div>力耕孔耘，食其新陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198019_comment'></div>其妃能桑，以奉补纫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198019_comment'></div>调护诸息，其槚其棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198019_comment'></div>各授之职，而老斲轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198019_comment'></div>傥而遇合，富贵嶪嶪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198019_comment'></div>牛羊宾客，金玉仆妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198019_comment'></div>怨塞宇宙，荣不满睫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198019_comment'></div>以此易彼，君必不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198019_comment'></div>而心为田，而智播耰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198019_comment'></div>获而自得，是曰有秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198019_comment'></div>乡曰扬名，里曰双秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198019_comment'></div>卜宅斯丘，龟筮告猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198019_comment'></div>安只乐只，无废无圮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1198019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年1月8日</a>　护母丧抵分宁，居丧期间，外甥徐俯来书存问，山谷有答书。作品：与徐师川书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年5月14日</a>　叔父黄廉殁于京师。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　居丧分宁期间，山谷从晦堂和尚游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　居丧分宁期间，与德夆书。作品：与德夆宣义书。<div id='poem_1196365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1196365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1196365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与德举宣义</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1196365")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1196365_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1196365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1196365'>叩首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1196365_comment'></div>罪逆馀生，苟活未死，扶护假道，辱地主之礼甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1196365_comment'></div>不肖之孤，哀摧感塞，虽欲称谢，无地寄言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1196365_comment'></div>别来日欲作书，以近乡里，处处宾客来吊祭，略无暇日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1196365_comment'></div>以正月八日到家，亲宾至今未閒，虽怀仰不忘，未能近笔墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1196365_comment'></div>蒙存问勤恳，大慰驰情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1196365_comment'></div>比承太守已到官，想王事不至劳勤，体力胜健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1196365_comment'></div>哀悴之馀，得还里舍，长守坟墓，未有参对之期，惟冀若时自爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1196365_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　居丧分宁期间，为叔父黄廉作行状。作品：叔父给事行状。<div id='poem_1198001' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198001' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叔父给事行状<span class='inlineComment2'>（元祐八年五月日撰）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198001")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198001_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198001'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198001'>黄氏本婺州金华人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198001_comment'></div>公高祖讳赡，当李氏时，来游江南，以策干中主，不能用，授著作佐郎，知分宁县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198001_comment'></div>解官去，游湘中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198001_comment'></div>久之，念藏器以待时，无兵革之忧，莫如分宁，遂以安舆奉二亲来居分宁，因葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198001_comment'></div>公曾大父及光禄府君，皆深沉有策谋，而隐约田间，不求闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198001_comment'></div>光禄聚书万卷，山中开两书堂，以教子孙，养四方游学者常数十百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198001_comment'></div>已而仕于中朝，多钜公显人，故大夫公十伯仲，而登科者六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198001_comment'></div>凡分宁仕家学问之原，盖皆出于黄氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198001_comment'></div>公少举进士，有声场屋间，登嘉祐六年进士第，授宣州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198001_comment'></div>治大狱亡虑百数，无不得其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198001_comment'></div>公去官，老狱吏尝窃叹息，以为狱官能尽心于治狱，不可欺以秋毫，仁厚精密，前后未见其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198001_comment'></div>移虔州会昌令，治公家如营私，视民病如在己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198001_comment'></div>会昌民健讼，善匿情成狱，户婚事多久不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198001_comment'></div>公开导教劝之，待以恩意，因钩索其曲直，久乃皆服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198001_comment'></div>其治大狱，多可传道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198001_comment'></div>盖世称仁厚吏者，徒苟欲生之，公则不然，曲折务尽其情，要使不冤然后已，故会昌民至今思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198001_comment'></div>改秘书省著作佐郎，知鄂州崇阳县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198001_comment'></div>未至，丁母夫人蓬莱县太君徐氏忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198001_comment'></div>服除，江淮发运使张颉举充勾当公事，未行，或荐公于王荆公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198001_comment'></div>荆公召至中书，问免役法，公以但知旧役法牙规对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198001_comment'></div>荆公问甚悉，曰：「能留心旧法，必能办新法矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198001_comment'></div>荐于上，遂为司农寺勾当公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198001_comment'></div>召对便殿访时事，公对曰：「陛下意在惠民，法非不良，而患在奉法之吏多非其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198001_comment'></div>朝廷立法之意则一，而四方奉法之意纷然不同，所以法行而民病，恐陛下不尽察也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198001_comment'></div>河北郡县被水，河东、河南、京东西皆旱，淮浙飞蝗蔽野，江南疫疠，恐陛下不尽知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198001_comment'></div>遂命公同司农寺丞程之才体量河北、河东灾伤赈济，道除知司农寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198001_comment'></div>公以荒政十二为科条，州县可行者以付守令，其大者或请或遂，务以济民，不专于黜不职之吏立威而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198001_comment'></div>归报使事，又言所见民间不便于改法者数条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198001_comment'></div>明日，上谓执政曰：「黄某忠厚，可使除太子中允、利州路转运判官」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198001_comment'></div>既行，就差提举秦凤等路折纳欠负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198001_comment'></div>公一听输粟，优估其值，凡折纳五十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198001_comment'></div>召为司农都丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1198001_comment'></div>异时命陕西转运司为两路，移用常苦不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1198001_comment'></div>公议两路赋入薄厚、事权重轻皆不侔，使者各为备边之计，偷自便而已，其移运籴买，势必相倾，故每告乏，请复通为一路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1198001_comment'></div>后卒如公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1198001_comment'></div>除监察御史里行，熙宁十年七月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1198001_comment'></div>公疏言：「一人之智不若十人，十人之智不若百人，此有馀不足之辨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1198001_comment'></div>成天下之务，莫急于人才，愿责两制近臣、监司、郡守，各荐所知一人，陛下因所举而任之，于其能否成败之际，亦足以知天下之大吏所以事陛下者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1198001_comment'></div>上用其言，敕内外待制以上、台谏官、三路都转运使至诸路转运判官，各举才行任升擢官一员，于是应诏者百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1198001_comment'></div>公又疏言：「势孤地寒，远迹下僚者，既得以名闻于上，愿诏中书审察其能而用之，则急才之诏不虚行于天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1198001_comment'></div>又疏言：「自五年以来，天下水旱，下户实蒙支贷倚阁之惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1198001_comment'></div>今幸岁丰，有司悉当举催。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1198001_comment'></div>久饥初稔，累给并收，是使百姓遇丰年而思歉岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1198001_comment'></div>乞定诸路举催欠负，上二等户三分收二，下三等户收半，仍饬官司听民折纳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1198001_comment'></div>又言：「都检正俞充结中人，徼幸富贵，不宜使佐具瞻之地」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1198001_comment'></div>并言：「王中正任使太重，恐为后忧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1198001_comment'></div>又面论之甚切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1198001_comment'></div>上曰：「人才盖无类，顾驾御之如何耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1198001_comment'></div>公对曰：「虽然，渐不可长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1198001_comment'></div>圣人长驾远御，故四凶在朝，不废时雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1198001_comment'></div>彼皆才器杰然过人，任使称意，为后世虑，故放殛之耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1198001_comment'></div>上曰：「且置此事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1198001_comment'></div>河决曹村，京东尤被其害，今以累卿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1198001_comment'></div>遂充京东体量安抚，公条举百馀事，大略疏张泽泺至滨州，以纾齐、郓，而济、单、曹、濮、淄、齐之间，积潦皆归其壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1198001_comment'></div>郡守、县令能救灾养民者，劳来劝诱，使即其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1198001_comment'></div>发仓廪府库，以赈不给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1198001_comment'></div>水占民居未能就业者，择高地聚居之，皆使有屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1198001_comment'></div>避水回远未能归者，遣吏移给之，皆使有粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1198001_comment'></div>所灌郡县，蠲赋弃责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1198001_comment'></div>流民所过，毋得徵算，使吏为之道地，止者赋居，行者赋粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1198001_comment'></div>忧其无田而远徙，故假官地而劝之耕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1198001_comment'></div>恐其杀牛而食之，故质私牛而予之钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1198001_comment'></div>弃男女于道者收养之，丁壮而饥者募役之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1198001_comment'></div>初，水占州县三十四，坏民田三十万顷，坏民庐舍三十八万家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1198001_comment'></div>卒事，所活饥民二十五万三千口，壮者就功而食又二万七千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1198001_comment'></div>得七十三万二千工，给当牛借种钱八万六千三百缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1198001_comment'></div>归荐士大夫，后多朝廷所收用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1198001_comment'></div>差同结绝相州狱事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1198001_comment'></div>初，相州事发于皇城，卒事十九不实，知杂御史蔡确锻鍊成狱，以此自媒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1198001_comment'></div>中丞邓温伯、御史上官均上疏论之，温伯又在经筵造膝而论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1198001_comment'></div>确耳目长具得温伯、均所言，又善伺察中人主意，即论温伯、均朋党为邪，与罪人为地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1198001_comment'></div>又任残贼吏日引诸囚，如使者虑问状，称冤者辄苦辱之，有人情所不能堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1198001_comment'></div>及上遣黄履、李舜举按状，而囚以为如前，皆引服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1198001_comment'></div>于是天子不疑确，而温伯、均皆得罪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1198001_comment'></div>均犹独上疏争之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1198001_comment'></div>公至未几，而具狱上矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1198001_comment'></div>公尝谓子弟：「吾失不极论此狱，甚愧于上官御史也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1198001_comment'></div>提举南郊事务，斟酌损益，为《南郊式》二十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1198001_comment'></div>监试国子监、开封进士，奏增损《贡举式》，进士以为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1198001_comment'></div>已事对便殿，言近岁虽以经义取人，太学诸生文章体制未能近古，大率集类章句，联属对偶，风传四方，谓之新格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1198001_comment'></div>不禁其渐，文章反陋于作诗赋时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1198001_comment'></div>乞申敕教官，稍令务本，以深学者之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1198001_comment'></div>改集贤校理，判尚书刑部，赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1198001_comment'></div>元丰三年，权发遣河东提点刑狱，兼提举义勇保甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1198001_comment'></div>明年秋，召阅泽州保甲，补官者五十八人，特改一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1198001_comment'></div>八月，麟、府军兴，兼权转运判官，又差定代州地界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1198001_comment'></div>公条具曲折为十二寨图以进，且言：「建议者以分水画界，恐地势不能尽然，启豺狼心，失中国险固」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1198001_comment'></div>其后辽人果责分水之言，包取两不耕地，据有形胜，下临雁门，父老于今以为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1198001_comment'></div>及王中正发军兴，皆用一而调二，其数皆千万计，或非所急，或非所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1198001_comment'></div>转运使陈安石计不知所出，奉行唯力，恐不办，或增调之，一道骚然，百姓朘剥至骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1198001_comment'></div>公为言：「主将非其人，其势必败事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1198001_comment'></div>乏军兴，虽罪死，斟酌事宜，使不乏而已，何忍自竭根本」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1198001_comment'></div>安石字谓公：「夷仲，安石老业，今日但保首领归，安能顾惜待制」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1198001_comment'></div>其任国家大计盖如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1198001_comment'></div>公每为中正言朝廷大体，民命重寄，赞道其所长，稍稍规之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1198001_comment'></div>初虽乐言，不以为忤，及将出界，取公钱钜万为特给，中正父子多自予，馀以差给凡在军者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1198001_comment'></div>公为言：「敛天下以奉一方，皆出于不得已，愿更为县官爱惜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1198001_comment'></div>中正始怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1198001_comment'></div>是时随军使臣员二百，多请托徼幸成事，或父子兄弟皆在行，中正已取其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1198001_comment'></div>庄公岳、赵咸将漕随军，公在塞内主续馈饷，欲部分使臣护道路，而中正所取之馀，尽随公岳、咸，无在者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1198001_comment'></div>师去界已百馀里，移文追之，皆不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1198001_comment'></div>公谓勾当公事孔文仲，当自驰往取之，夜置酒与文仲诀，文仲泣曰：「公行军，外事不可知，使臣自从军，非公责也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1198001_comment'></div>公曰：「王事当计成败，岂但塞责耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1198001_comment'></div>从十数骑，尽夜追至军，中正等皆大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1198001_comment'></div>公骂公岳、咸，取使臣五十馀复归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1198001_comment'></div>因上疏言大军必无功，未有以善其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1198001_comment'></div>乞募民入刍粟实塞下，得以补官，及一切除罪，少宽近边百姓已竭之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1198001_comment'></div>已而大军溃归，中正归罪转运司应副乖方，且言黄某不肯协心同力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1198001_comment'></div>上遣御药窦士宣簿责乖方十事，公以书对，称死罪，皆实有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1198001_comment'></div>继遣开封府司录喻陟就潞州置狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1198001_comment'></div>安石以应副漕挽，免就狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1198001_comment'></div>公独对吏月馀，但坐奏请张皇，降一官，在职如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1198001_comment'></div>师出以元丰四年冬，降官以五年三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1198001_comment'></div>是冬，以绛州王达群盗阻山，横行劫略，达张红伞以入县镇，奉诏督捕，尽十二月，悉捕斩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1198001_comment'></div>六年六月，还所降官，又以教保甲应格进一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1198001_comment'></div>诏按边州违法透漏事，至岚、石州，道遇岢岚军流民，经略司奏请，已被旨给路粮遣还本郡，而老幼二千馀口，号泣于道，拥公马首，自言昨以雨多籴贵，暂来就贱分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1198001_comment'></div>锄一夏，麦已见穟，粟已立苗，愿及分田乃归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1198001_comment'></div>公即慰谕，移岚、石州，未得发遣，立为奏入，内侍省递其言：「所问情实如此，臣不敢以忧非其职为嫌，改朝廷之成命为罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1198001_comment'></div>窃惟老小二千口不得其所，陛下必为之动心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1198001_comment'></div>闻数日，遂得报，可其请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1198001_comment'></div>十月，罢提点刑狱，为权发遣同提举保甲，视转运副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1198001_comment'></div>八年九月，诏以明年正月罢赴阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1198001_comment'></div>司马温公言，閒居往来陕洛间，闻河东民言甚美，因熟问治状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1198001_comment'></div>吕正献申公亦言，河东军兴，边民德公甚厚，顾朝廷不尽知耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1198001_comment'></div>公在河东六年，未尝乞赴阙，虽在团教场，未尝易儒服，故在陕西、河北，独不赐战袍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1198001_comment'></div>元丰末，他路保甲拥兵入县镇，贼杀官吏，群盗通行数州，独河东保甲不为犬吠之盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1198001_comment'></div>元祐初，除尚书户部郎中，治左曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1198001_comment'></div>二月，差按察成都等路茶事，兼体量邛州蒲江盐井利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1198001_comment'></div>先奏罢陆师闵所行公私甚病者，乃具奏曰：「臣奉被使旨，所至访求利害，至熟榷茶之法，实有害于川陕之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1198001_comment'></div>盖官司不原朝廷立法本意，希功幸赏，以得为多，于是禁网滋繁，百姓受敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1198001_comment'></div>陆师闵立法最虐，故取利最多，上累国体，下敛民怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1198001_comment'></div>中外臣寮所言茶事害民六科，皆有事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1198001_comment'></div>若遽论之，不若尽以予民，使园户自卖，商贾自贩，官收税引及歇驮钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1198001_comment'></div>并复熙宁以前博马之策，无交易之烦，无脚乘之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1198001_comment'></div>抉去故敝，一从私便，无复可议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1198001_comment'></div>若致详于公私之际，则先当议民，其次商贾，其次边计利害，各有所在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1198001_comment'></div>今蜀民通患币轻钱重，商旅赍携，息不偿费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1198001_comment'></div>若不捐榷茶，尽与商贾，则百货未能流通，脚乘未能猝备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1198001_comment'></div>非唯园民之货郁滞，绝其资生之路，若蕃市交易万一不继，亦足以害经久之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1198001_comment'></div>今若捐十一州之茶与商贾，仍以川峡四路及关中诸路与之为受茶之地，宜若可以尽泄川茶，以补蜀民久困；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1198001_comment'></div>而官以善价取雅州、兴元府所产，以赡熙秦诸州，酌中法以为边备，于理为可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1198001_comment'></div>于是朝廷许同转运司尽公私之便，商度立法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1198001_comment'></div>公又奏曰：「产茶之地尽在川路，卖茶之地全占陕西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1198001_comment'></div>其发至陕西六路者为纲茶，榷于川峡四路者为食茶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1198001_comment'></div>若产茶之地除去榷卖侵刻，取息太重，搜捕苛扰，差雇不和，配卖赊欠，预俵折纳，滥赏诸敝，则卖茶之地随事制宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1198001_comment'></div>其目有六：一曰路分全占陕西州县，又榷取京西之金州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1198001_comment'></div>以东南望之，疑若专利太多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1198001_comment'></div>以天下观之，阜通川陕之利以备边，而不病东南，则势均矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1198001_comment'></div>故以熙河、秦凤、泾原为禁茶旧路，以永兴、鄜延、环庆为通茶新路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1198001_comment'></div>不禁旧路，无以制蕃市；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1198001_comment'></div>不通新路，无以便民欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1198001_comment'></div>使通塞常相权，则公私可以共利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1198001_comment'></div>二曰卖茶给历，抑配及官卖末茶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1198001_comment'></div>今尽除宿敝，又禁南茶无入陕西，使川茶常不失中价，则民不知榷茶之害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1198001_comment'></div>三曰茶色不等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1198001_comment'></div>盖汉茶食嫩，蕃茶食老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1198001_comment'></div>雅州之名山，自兰州入邈川，至于于阗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1198001_comment'></div>兴元之大竹，自阶州入欧家，自河州入木波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1198001_comment'></div>洋州之西乡茶，自河州入木波，至于三耶、龙谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1198001_comment'></div>今区别茶品，以入诸路，则可以适汉蕃所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1198001_comment'></div>四曰价直腾踊，则害马价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1198001_comment'></div>今以茶马相宜，以斤对寸，高下适等矣，因宜增损，则可以制边备之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1198001_comment'></div>五曰博易夺市易之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1198001_comment'></div>污吏挠法，法不可为污吏废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1198001_comment'></div>今边市博茶，大者在马，其次金帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1198001_comment'></div>去贪者之害，乃可以通边市之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1198001_comment'></div>六曰脚乘不均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1198001_comment'></div>盖缘军兴，脚乘踊贵，故高立雇直，遂以诸场所博污滥之物，高价估折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1198001_comment'></div>今若斟酌高下，损其馀以资铺兵，则可以均力，使之任并定博马，岁额以万八千匹」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1198001_comment'></div>又奏蒲江盐事云：「邛盐旧价太高，已蒙朝廷权减斤为八十五钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1198001_comment'></div>然污杂湿恶，积敝未除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1198001_comment'></div>今欲止绝汀淋灰土及煎胆水，止用九井正水煮一色盐，用权减价为定法，专用食邛州，禁外来官盐及小井盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1198001_comment'></div>其汀淋等盐八百六十二斤，乞于正额除之，仍宽盐户旧欠，十分除二分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1198001_comment'></div>邛民数十年之病，于是悉除」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1198001_comment'></div>所奏皆即施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1198001_comment'></div>除直秘阁，权发遣都大提举成都府、利州、陕西等路茶事，兼提举买马监牧公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1198001_comment'></div>以职事入奏，落「发遣」字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1198001_comment'></div>朝论以宰府官属当得中立不倚之士为助，以公不附会朝廷，必废茶法，已而公私便之，故二年十二月，除尚书左司郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1198001_comment'></div>公语子弟：「昨按察川陕茶政，随事制宜，便于公者不苟去以为名，害于民者不苟存以为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1198001_comment'></div>论者未以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1198001_comment'></div>是岁遂代前官，领茶马事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1198001_comment'></div>前日所以绳治人者，皆身当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1198001_comment'></div>在职岁馀，法无疐阂不可行者，士大夫乃颇见信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1198001_comment'></div>故知无心以制事，利害则合而听之，在人在己，无间然矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1198001_comment'></div>初，陆师闵时，岁计茶息以一百二十万缗，掊克敛怨，无所不至，岁乃得二百万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1198001_comment'></div>及公将使事，尽除公私之病，比数年，亦得百二十万也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1198001_comment'></div>四年十月，除起居郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1198001_comment'></div>知公者贺曰：「公学问文章，宜任论思献纳，而经营四方馀十五年，从此乃得涂辙」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1198001_comment'></div>公谢曰：「王事内外一耳，岂敢有择邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1198001_comment'></div>五年六月，权中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1198001_comment'></div>九月，迁集贤殿修撰、枢密都承旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1198001_comment'></div>公言比岁累进官，无功状，固辞不敢就职，乃以修撰充陕西路都转运使，赐紫衣金鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1198001_comment'></div>陕西狃习军兴，帅府常侵渔，岁计金帛，监司为军兴时柄在帅府，欲按举则掣肘，故瘖不治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1198001_comment'></div>公痛以法绳治大府，责其逋负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1198001_comment'></div>六年十一月，除给事中，七年正月就职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1198001_comment'></div>于是数月无除拜，所駮奏法令二十馀事，皆见听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1198001_comment'></div>自诏绝夏国岁赐，边臣往往邀功生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1198001_comment'></div>间小入钞略，虽亡失过当，匿不以闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1198001_comment'></div>及幸胜，论功则上下相蒙以冒赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1198001_comment'></div>朝廷既治通远军上首虏不实当之罪，罚金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1198001_comment'></div>公駮奏不听，因复言：「今日阅实边臣功过，止用保明文字而上功状，故不以实，则无功者论赏，死事者不见哀恤，军律渐隳，何以御侮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1198001_comment'></div>纵未特行贬黜，宜自朝廷申敕法令，以惩后来」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1198001_comment'></div>五月戊子，病疽甚，卧家，求致仕，不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1198001_comment'></div>丙申，不幸捐馆舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1198001_comment'></div>知与不知，无不哀悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1198001_comment'></div>诏给赙赐有加焉，假官舍庇其诸孤，下所属调护葬事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1198001_comment'></div>娶刘氏，尚书屯田员外郎致仕涣之女，封彭城县君，先公没十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1198001_comment'></div>子男四人：曰叔豹，遂州司理参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1198001_comment'></div>曰叔向，太庙斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1198001_comment'></div>曰叔夏，举进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1198001_comment'></div>曰叔敖，封丘县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1198001_comment'></div>女三人：长适承务郎李逡，馀在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1198001_comment'></div>有文集十卷，奏议二十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1198001_comment'></div>公读书常自得意，以为学问之本，在力行所闻而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1198001_comment'></div>不惮改过自新，善用规谏之言，一言而善，终身纪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1198001_comment'></div>其于不义，小心畏避，人笑其怯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1198001_comment'></div>见义而行，胆气烈烈，无不叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1198001_comment'></div>平生忠信孝友，自以无负于上下神只。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1198001_comment'></div>张颉自江淮入奏计，与丞相吴正宪公语东南水旱，意以为病新法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1198001_comment'></div>正宪公至上前道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1198001_comment'></div>已而上参问，自东南来者皆曰无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1198001_comment'></div>有诏治语所从来，颉窘甚，召尝所与往来者计之，莫敢过颉者，召公而公至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1198001_comment'></div>颉问曰：「计将安出」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1198001_comment'></div>公曰：「士大夫岂效儿女辈语人前匿之邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1198001_comment'></div>今所对者天子大臣，尝言之，不可食；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1198001_comment'></div>未尝言，不可强服」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1198001_comment'></div>颉乃释然，用公言得罪，亦不深悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1198001_comment'></div>公天资洁清，非其义，虽饮食之物不虚受也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1198001_comment'></div>到官，必推廪给圭田与前人，然后就职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1198001_comment'></div>罢官，必亟解职，推廪给圭田以与后人，自少长行之不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1198001_comment'></div>及为大吏，廪给于法疑，必辞厚而取薄，非矫揉为之，心安而性服之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1198001_comment'></div>刘夫人没后，家事尽付诸子，未尝知有无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1198001_comment'></div>旁无妾媵，寝室萧然，惟书册而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1198001_comment'></div>举吏六百馀员，必问能否，不行请托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1198001_comment'></div>其举擿有罪，小赃污时见纵舍，至酷吏残民，必击去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1198001_comment'></div>在河东时过正平县，有民扶老妪自言：「尉疑我窃盗，笞掠我，今母子共有三足指存」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1198001_comment'></div>问尉，曰：「高士造以疑执讯此母子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1198001_comment'></div>有实，即奏罢之，曰：「不去士造，无以谢此两母子之不辜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1198001_comment'></div>屯留令司马宏，温公兄之子，右丞相范公之婿也，望公荐拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1198001_comment'></div>公察宏为吏尚奇怪，立诽谤木听民言，然及其县，吏民困于威虐，皆无完肤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1198001_comment'></div>即召宏数之曰：「不能改，且奏罢若矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1198001_comment'></div>刘昌祚知代州，役壮城卒缮官舍，一卒坠地死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1198001_comment'></div>监司会议，欲案其罪，公曰：「昌祚才器，必为名将，诸君幸缓其小过，且为诸君因行案之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1198001_comment'></div>公至代，阅昌祚吏治军政甚修，方略耳目足办边事，因作荐章，极口称道之，故事遂已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1198001_comment'></div>公之奏举人，皆此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1198001_comment'></div>诸孤将以今年九月，奉公及刘夫人之丧，合葬于分宁县双井之台平、大夫公之墓次，方求当世之君子位光显而其言立，且知公之表里者为之铭，以传信来世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1198001_comment'></div>庭坚越在衰削，哀不能文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1198001_comment'></div>公之遗事，多所散轶，追次其在者，广记备言，以待采择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1198001_comment'></div>谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1198001_comment'></div>元祐八年五月日，第九侄某状。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_249_1198001'></div><div id='poem_sentence_249_1198001_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　居丧分宁期间，赠余莘老。作品：书赠余莘老。<div id='poem_1197775' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197775' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197775?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书赠余莘老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197775")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197775_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197775'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197775'>余景中有子名曰天任，年甫六岁，成诵六经如流，挑试无一不通者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197775_comment'></div>爱其举止似孙莘老，因以莘老字之，亦与其名叶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197775_comment'></div>若其长大好学，则自当追配古人，老舅非敢期尔之浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197775_comment'></div>元祐七年中秋日，书于余氏青青轩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197775_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='bf424d5cad0148b2a766473fca7c6b19_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bf424d5cad0148b2a766473fca7c6b19");'><span id='bf424d5cad0148b2a766473fca7c6b19_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1094')">1093-1094年</a>，49-50岁</div><div id='bf424d5cad0148b2a766473fca7c6b19' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年2月1日</a>　葬母于分宁双井之台平，弟非熊同葬；陈师道为山谷母作《李夫人墓志铭》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　既葬母于双井，乃馆于墓旁，名“永思堂”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年6月28日</a>　居丧分宁期间，陈慥作书与山谷，山谷答之。作品：答陈季常书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年7月27日</a>　居丧分宁期间，除秘书丞，提点明道宫，兼国史编修官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年9月</a>　在分宁，服除，辞免编修之命。作品：服阕辞免史院编修状。<div id='poem_1195831' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195831' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195831?labeling=true' target='_blank'>服阕辞免史院编修状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195831")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195831_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195831'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195831'>去国三年，百忧所萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195831_comment'></div>志气凋零，须发半白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195831_comment'></div>勉从典礼，既见素冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195831_comment'></div>支离羸病，不任趋赴阙庭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195831_comment'></div>旧学遗忘，难以讨论史事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195831_comment'></div>陈力就列，岂容冒昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195831_comment'></div>坟土未乾，曷胜乌鸟之情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195831_comment'></div>仰瞻上天，敢陈蝼蚁之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195831_comment'></div>伏望圣慈除臣管句宫观一次，许任便居住。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195831_comment'></div>一则艺植松槚，少报母慈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195831_comment'></div>又得熙养岁年，稍堪王事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195831_comment'></div>草芥在野，犹望哀怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195831_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1195831_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，服除，仍居于母亲之墓旁；有与外甥洪刍书。作品：答洪驹父书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年9月</a>　在分宁，叔父黄廉葬于双井之台平。作品：将葬叔父给事祭文。叔父给事挽词十首。<div id='poem_1198118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将葬叔父给事祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198118")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198118_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198118'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198118'>呜呼叔父，躬行之节，足以律贪敦薄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198118_comment'></div>立朝之义，足以尊主庇民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198118_comment'></div>虽阴功隐德，润泽天下之半，于叔父之志，百未一伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198118_comment'></div>岁在壬申，天歼德人，病不能朝，牖下拖绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198118_comment'></div>启手启足，无愧明神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198118_comment'></div>皓乎其白不可淄，确乎其坚不可磷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198118_comment'></div>我欲归怨于人，与人无恶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198118_comment'></div>我欲归怨于天，天既生德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198118_comment'></div>尚有遗美，与世作则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198118_comment'></div>挽车在行，无泪续哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198118_comment'></div>松柏降霜，临穴惴栗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198118_comment'></div>我等在世，百身何赎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198118_comment'></div>终天一觞，心陨于谷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1198118_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213207' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年9月</a>　葬于双井之台平。作品：代四十五弟祭伯父给事文。<div id='poem_1198119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198119' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198119?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代四十五弟祭伯父给事文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198119")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198119_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198119'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198119'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198119_comment'></div>我少不天，从母霜露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198119_comment'></div>中岁归只，又失所怙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198119_comment'></div>幼小近市，未闻诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198119_comment'></div>不知母慈，不如鸟乌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198119_comment'></div>越在田间，瞻望千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198119_comment'></div>金玉之音，言提其耳，手足之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198119_comment'></div>饮之食之，教之诲之，维我伯父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198119_comment'></div>没身之泽，尚以荣我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198119_comment'></div>虻负丘山，几何不堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198119_comment'></div>伯父之教，终不可忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198119_comment'></div>入则在室，升则在堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198119_comment'></div>自今至于后日，束身修行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198119_comment'></div>不瘝于官，父母之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198119_comment'></div>思孝思纯，旨甘温凊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198119_comment'></div>有违斯言，天实殛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198119_comment'></div>酌酒陨心，终天一辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1198119_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年10月9日</a>　在分宁，从游者徐德郊得官于淮南，来与山谷话别，有诗赠之。作品：送徐德郊。<div id='poem_1197062' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197062' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197062?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送徐德郊</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年10月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197062")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197062_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197062'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197062'>徐德郊从予游，不独以有瓜葛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197062_comment'></div>其居乡党，父兄爱之，子弟安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197062_comment'></div>其仕于州县，有能吏之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197062_comment'></div>以草木臭味不远，故相从也密焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197062_comment'></div>今得官于淮南，访别于双井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197062_comment'></div>予数年来，病眩不能作诗，因书近所为赋以赠别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197062_comment'></div>在官者各有职，典民有亲疏，然大要简静平易，则足以使民移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197062_comment'></div>使民者以事上，夫何远之有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197062_comment'></div>六合有佳士曰崔彦直，其人不游诸公，德郊可因公事，携此文请之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197062_comment'></div>崔知德郊自双井来，当扫径相迎，它日有疑事不能决，第访之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197062_comment'></div>元祐八年十月癸丑，黄某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1197062_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年8月</a>　在分宁，作书答何颉之。作品：答何斯举书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，同肃禅师温汤，作诗。作品：癸酉八月同百丈肃禅师温汤作小诗呈九仙舜公长老。<div id='poem_214597' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214597' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，宿灵汤文室，有诗。<div id='poem_214710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
