id='poem_title_214710_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214710'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214710'>临池濯吾足，汲水濯吾缨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214710'>尘埃一谢去，神与体俱清。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214710'>月明渐映<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作隐）</span>檐东出，置枕东床夜萧瑟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214710'>更无俗物败人意，唯有清风入吾室。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214710_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214710'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214710_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，有和章嗣功诗。作品：次韵章禹直开元寺观画壁兼李德素。<div id='poem_214278' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214278' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214278?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵章禹直开元寺观画壁兼简李德素<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作苏辙诗）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214278")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214278_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214278'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214278'>丹青古藏壁，风雨饱侵食。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214278'>拂尘开藻鉴，志士泪沾臆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214278'>灵山远飞来，不可以智测。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214278'>龙神湛回向，拥卫立剑戟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214278'>依稀吴生手，旌旆略可识。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214278'>鸿濛插楼殿，毫发数动植。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214278'>广林瞻二圣，有众拱万亿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214278'>飞行凑六合，揽取著一席。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214278'>人人开生面，绝妙推心得。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214278'>李侯天机深，指点目所及。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214278'>三生石上梦，天乐鸣我侧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214278'>幽寻前日事，晦明忽复易。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214278'>章生南溟鹏，笼槛锁六翮。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214278'>能同寂寞游，浊酒聊放适。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214278'>西风叶萧萧，蟋蟀依墙壁。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214278'>家无万金产，四邻砧声急。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214278'>藜羹傲鼎食，蓝缕亦山立。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214278'>并船有歌姝，粉白眉黛黑。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214278'>期公开颜笑，醉语杂翰墨。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214278'>不须谈俗事，秖令人气塞。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214278'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_214278_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，有诗。作品：窗日。<div id='poem_213371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>窗日<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元祐八年丁母艰家居作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213371")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213371'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213371'>叹息西窗过隙驹，微阳初至日光舒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213371'>□□□长宫中线，添得思堂一卷书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213371'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，跋宋太宗御书。作品：跋太宗皇帝赐王禹偁御书。<div id='poem_1197429' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197429' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197429?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋太宗皇帝赐王禹偁御书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197429")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197429_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197429'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197429'>臣尝待罪太史氏，窥石室金匮之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197429_comment'></div>纵观先朝制作、文章翰墨，与日月并明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197429_comment'></div>如禹偁乃得身亲见之，面折廷争，显于雷霆之下，兹非其幸欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197429_comment'></div>元祐八年四月旦，洪州分宁县双井里草土臣黄某志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197429_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，为洪州分宁县藏书阁作铭文。作品：洪州分宁县藏书阁铭并序。<div id='poem_1197879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州分宁县藏书阁铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197879")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197879'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197879'>分宁县有学，所从来远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197879_comment'></div>然邑子诸生，赖学以成就者少，挟书以游四方者多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197879_comment'></div>盖在官者常曰：狱讼之不得其情，赋租之不登其时，簿书朱墨之不当其物，寇盗发而不辄得，是吾忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197879_comment'></div>若勤学养士，二千石之任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197879_comment'></div>故庙学岿然，未尝过而问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197879_comment'></div>彼盖不知，养士之源，发于县乡，为民父母，岂听狱求盗之谓哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197879_comment'></div>今吾宰延平胡君器之之为县，左规而右矩，谨名而务实，教之用经，治之用律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197879_comment'></div>其听民不怠，其牧民不繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197879_comment'></div>豪吏敛手，困穷得职，然后尽心于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197879_comment'></div>乃举其乡先生与一经之师，位之以师友，而作兴可学之民，弟子常溢百员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197879_comment'></div>器之率其僚，洁牲酒豆笾，释奠春秋，诸生升降成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197879_comment'></div>耆老叹息，则合谋曰：「群居讲学，常病无书，今令君不鄙我民，使得燕居以勤己事，甚大惠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197879_comment'></div>惟是公家力不能者，吾侪其劝成之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197879_comment'></div>于是学有职及诸生之父兄皆自劝，市书以给诸生之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197879_comment'></div>且为出入之不严，不可以保存，暴凉之不时，不可以持久，又相劝作书阁，并祭器而藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197879_comment'></div>阁成，谒诸令君，令君乃以元祐八年夏五月丁丑，释菜于先圣之庙而告成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197879_comment'></div>诸生则以告黄庭坚，而请铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197879_comment'></div>于是有问者曰：「郡有学，朝廷为之择师，教事备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197879_comment'></div>县不兴学，亦病者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197879_comment'></div>庭坚曰：「是不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197879_comment'></div>今夫浮屠之舍，非传先王之道也，而所居如林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197879_comment'></div>其堕隳不守，凡有官之君子，必左右经营，复之而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197879_comment'></div>关市之征，先王以禁利末，其开塞有权，今则徒会其入，百人之聚，有网漏一金之利，必请而张官置吏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197879_comment'></div>夫士不可一日而无学，民不可一日而无教，至于兴学聚书，则虽万室之邑，以为非职之忧者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197879_comment'></div>此可谓有为民父母之心，知发政之先后之序者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197879_comment'></div>诸生曰：「信如子之言，请并书以诏后之人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1197879_comment'></div>则序而为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1197879'>凡治有条，如机于纺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1197879_comment'></div>经经纬纬，积寸成两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1197879_comment'></div>菅蒯之手，简功于纽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1197879_comment'></div>可席可履，不能以守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1197879_comment'></div>昔此庙学，终岁蓬艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1197879_comment'></div>圣师所居，风雨无盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1197879_comment'></div>今诵圣言，皆有夏屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1197879_comment'></div>爰及方册，宇以华阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1197879_comment'></div>华阁渠渠，言行之林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1197879_comment'></div>聿求古今，自观德心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1197879_comment'></div>咨尔诸生，永怀兹道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1197879_comment'></div>勿嬉勿骜，以迪有造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1197879_comment'></div>得意自己，书不尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1197879_comment'></div>如御琴瑟，听于无弦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1197879_comment'></div>幕阜几几，吴咮楚尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1197879_comment'></div>其下修水，行六百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1197879_comment'></div>山川之灵，郁秀于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1197879_comment'></div>世得材用，我培其根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1197879_comment'></div>勒铭颂成，式告尔后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1197879_comment'></div>无或堕之，永庇俎豆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1197879_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1197879'>纽：丛刊本作「幼」，《文鉴》作「纫」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1197879_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197879'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_45_1197879_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·正集》卷二一。又见《皇朝文鉴》卷七三，《黄太史精华录》卷六。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1197879_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，作江西道院赋。<div id='poem_1195792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195792?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江西道院赋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195792")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195792_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1195792_0'>① 并序　元祐六年，丁母安康郡太君忧，归分宁。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195792'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195792'>江西之俗，士大夫多秀而文，其细民险而健，以终讼为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195792_comment'></div>由是玉石俱焚，名曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1195792", 1195792, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>珥笔</span>之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195792_comment'></div>虽有辩者，不能自解免也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195792_comment'></div>惟筠为州独不嚚于讼，故筠州太守号为「守江西道院」，然与南康、庐陵、宜春三郡，并蒙恶声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195792_comment'></div>元祐八年，武陵柳侯子宜守筠之明年也，乐其俗之美，使为政者不勤，乃新燕居之堂，榜曰「江西道院」，以鼓舞其国风，且为高安之父老雪耻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195792_comment'></div>秋九月，遣使来告成于双井永思堂，于是为之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195792_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1195792'>句吴之区，维斗所直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195792_comment'></div>半入于楚，终蚀于越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195792_comment'></div>有泰伯、虞仲、季子之风，故处士有岩穴之雍容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195792_comment'></div>有屈原、宋玉、枚乘之笔，故文章有江山之秀发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195792_comment'></div>吴越之君多好勇，故其民乐斗而轻死；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195792_comment'></div>江汉之俗多禨鬼，故其民尊巫而淫祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195792_comment'></div>虽郡异而县不同，其大略不外是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195792_comment'></div>若乃高安之城，豫章之别，虽风气之未远，亦美俗之可悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195792_comment'></div>故柳侯下车，解牛而不割；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195792_comment'></div>未尝发硎，初不折缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195792_comment'></div>则喟然叹曰：「江西道院，名不虚生」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195792_comment'></div>爰作新堂，合陈鼓笙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195792_comment'></div>有斐翰墨，宾赞令丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195792_comment'></div>作为诗歌，接民颂声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195792_comment'></div>昔也忧民之忧，今则乐民之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195792_comment'></div>怀仙伯之蜕蝉，有勿剪之乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1195792_comment'></div>制剑池之菡萏以为裳，酿丹井之清泠以为酌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1195792_comment'></div>醉而起舞，父老持足，恐使君之仙去，而鳏寡之长失职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1195792_comment'></div>吾闻风行于上而水波，此天下之至文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1195792_comment'></div>仁形于心而民服，此天下之善化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1195792_comment'></div>岂可多为令而病民慢，自设险而病民诈邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1195792_comment'></div>九转丹砂，铸铁成金；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1195792_comment'></div>两汉循吏，铸顽成仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1195792_comment'></div>我简静则民肃，我平易则民亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1195792_comment'></div>今使高安之农，养生于桁杨之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1195792_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1195792", 1195792, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>珥笔</span>教讼者传问孝之章，剺耳锁吭者深春耕之耒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1195792_comment'></div>卖私斗之刀剑以为牛，羞淫祠之樽俎以养亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1195792_comment'></div>虽承平百年，雨露渗漉，非二千石所以牧人者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1195792_comment'></div>虽然，有一于此，堂密有美枞，而未闻处士之节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1195792_comment'></div>岑蔚有于菟，而不见墨客之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1195792_comment'></div>岂其龟藏而自畀，蠖屈而不伸者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1195792_comment'></div>公试酌樽中之渌，谢山川之神，为予问之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1195792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1195792'><span class='label'>按：</span>文后原有注引庭坚《书江西道院赋后》，今别见序跋类。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1195792_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　在分宁，为黄龙清禅师晦堂像题词。作品：题黄龙清禅师晦堂赞。<div id='poem_1197518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197518?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题黄龙清禅师晦堂赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197518")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197518'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197518'>三问逆推，超元机于鹫岭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197518_comment'></div>一拳垂示，露赤体于龙峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197518_comment'></div>闻时富贵，见后贫穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197518_comment'></div>年老浩歌归去乐，从他人唤住山翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197518_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1197518'>元祐八年十二月，通城陈修己为智嵩上座写晦堂老师影，绝妙诸本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197518_comment'></div>予欲彫琢数句，庄严太空，适见西堂清公所作，全提全示，无有少剩，顺赞一句，屋下盖屋，逆赞一句，楼上安楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197518_comment'></div>不如借水献花，与一切人供养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197518_comment'></div>黄某题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197518_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年4月</a>　在分宁，普觉禅寺转轮藏作记。作品：普觉禅寺转轮藏记。<div id='poem_1197819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197819?labeling=true' target='_blank'>普觉禅寺转轮藏记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197819")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197819'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197819'>法界门中无孤单，法起则全起；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197819_comment'></div>古人陈迹无坏灭，性用则日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197819_comment'></div>惟去本之日远，不知法所从来，遂令色像峥嵘，心目流转，故说法者滥于邪师，听法者穷乎不信耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197819_comment'></div>普觉禅师楚金既作经藏，以书抵山谷道人曰：「我初住普觉，破屋数十楹耳，不知何人蚕食吾垣，地阙东北，茅塞吾道，蛇行东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197819_comment'></div>赖外护之力，皆复厥初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197819_comment'></div>我四垣平直，松竹行列，道出正南，会于四达之衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197819_comment'></div>由上漏下湿，至于风雨寒暑而不知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197819_comment'></div>由食时乞饭，至于日膳百人而不瀃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197819_comment'></div>末后以檀施之馀，建莲华转轮经藏，百工神奇，轮奂一新，化出幻没，耀人心颜，佛事庄严，自谓惬当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197819_comment'></div>然或讥谤，以谓大老翁当为十方衲子兴法之供养，安用作此机械、随俗嫭夸耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197819_comment'></div>于山谷意如何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197819_comment'></div>山谷曰：「妙德法界，不容一尘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197819_comment'></div>普贤行门，不利一法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197819_comment'></div>吾闻转轮藏者，权舆于双林大士，可谓浅深随量，巧被三根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197819_comment'></div>今使在俗处廛不知文字性相者舍所积藏，灭悭贪垢，布净信种，随此轮转，示世閒生起所因，所作饶益，被讥谤者亦知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197819_comment'></div>若乃此离垢轮圆机时示诸衲子，转者谁转，止者谁止，负荷含藏，承谁恩力，一念正真，权慧具矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197819_comment'></div>若能如是观者，即绝众生生死流，即具普贤一切行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197819_comment'></div>不如是观，虽八万四千宝目遍入五千四十八卷，字字照了，虎观水磨，竟是何物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197819_comment'></div>常坐不动道场，即此以为佛事，善知诸子回心与未回心，堪入生死与不堪入生死，根器成熟与未成熟，法之供养更于何求」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197819_comment'></div>普觉老欣然曰：「我今有六十衲子坐夏，而山谷道人为我转此法轮，省老翁无量葛藤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197819_comment'></div>幸为我书之，以告来者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197819_comment'></div>元祐九年四月丁巳，豫章黄某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1197819_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年4月</a>　除知宣州。离开分宁，赴任。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='981f17d593da4ed589216fc07ae420c3_label'><a href='javascript: -----title
涟水
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e4e6a6408a9441339a53e6101771dde9_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e4e6a6408a9441339a53e6101771dde9");'><span id='e4e6a6408a9441339a53e6101771dde9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1062')">1059-1062年</a>，15-18岁</div><div id='e4e6a6408a9441339a53e6101771dde9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　从舅父李常游学淮南涟水；曾评论王安石《明妃曲》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　淮南涟水游学，有诗。作品：溪上吟（序云：“春山鸟啼，新雨天霁，汀草怒长，竹筱交阴。黄子观渔于塘下，寻春与小桃源，从一溪童稚子畦丁三四辈，茶鼎酒瓢，渊明诗编。虽不命戒，未尝不取诸左右。临沧波，拂白石，咏渊明诗数篇，清风为我衣，好鸟为我劝饮。当其漻然,无所拘系而依依规矩准绳之间,自有佳处。乃知白莲社中人不达渊明诗意者多矣。过酒肆则饮亦无量也，然未始甚醉。盖其所寓与毕卓刘伶辈同，而自谓所得与二子异，人亦殊不能知之也。酒酣得纸，书之为《溪上吟》。”）<div id='poem_214842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214842?labeling=true' target='_blank'>溪上吟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214842")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214842'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214842'>短生无长期，聊暇<sup id='poem_sentence_1_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214842'>试为省鬼录，不饮死者多。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214842'>安能如南山，千岁保不磨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214842'>在世崇名节，飘如赴烛蛾。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214842'>及汝知悔时，万事蓬一窠。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214842'>青青陵陂麦，妍暖亦已花<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作媕娿）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214842'>长烟淡平川，轻风不为波。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214842'>无人按律吕，好鸟自和歌。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214842'>杖藜山<span class='inlineComment2'>（翁校：一本作田）</span>中归，牛羊在坡陀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214842'>本自无廊庙，正尔乐涧阿。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214842'>念昔扬子云，刻意师孟轲。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214842'>狂夫移九鼎，深巷考四科。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214842'>无疑举尔酒，定知我为何。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214842'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_214842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214842'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_214842_0'>⑴ 陈刻本、翁校本作假</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214842_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　拜见孙觉；孙觉将女许配庭坚。作品：清江引。跛奚移文。<div id='poem_214761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清江引<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：时年十七。）</span></a><span id='poem_sentence_1_214761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214761'>群儿学渔亦不恶，老妻白头从<span class='inlineComment2'>（翁校：一本作同）</span>此乐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214761'>全家醉著篷底眠，舟在寒沙夜潮落。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214761'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214761_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1198178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跛奚移文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198178")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198178'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198178'>女弟阿通归李安诗，为置婢，无所得，乃得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1198178", 1198178, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>跛奚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198178_comment'></div>蹒跚离疏，不利走趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198178_comment'></div>颡出屋檐，足达户枢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198178_comment'></div>三妪挽不来，两妪推不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198178_comment'></div>主人不悦，厨人骂怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198178_comment'></div>黄子笑之曰：「尧牵羊而舜鞭之，羊不得食，尧舜俱疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198178_comment'></div>百羊在谷，牧一童子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198178_comment'></div>草露晞而出，草露湿而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198178_comment'></div>不亡一羊，任其指撝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198178_comment'></div>故曰使人也器之，物有所不可，则亦有所宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198178_comment'></div>警夜偷者不以马，司昼漏者不以鸡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198178_comment'></div>准绳规矩，异用殊施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198178_comment'></div>天倾西北，地缺东南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198178_comment'></div>尺有所不逮，寸有所覃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198178_comment'></div>子不通之，则屦不可运土，篑不可当屦，坐而晲之，小大俱废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198178_comment'></div>子如通之，则瞽者之耳，聋者之目，绝利一源，收功十百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198178_comment'></div>事固有精于一则尽善，遍用智则无功，有所不能，乃有所大能焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198178_comment'></div>呼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1198178", 1198178, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>跛奚</span>来前，吾为若诏之：「汝能与壮士拔距乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198178_comment'></div>能与群狙争芧乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198178_comment'></div>能与八骏取路乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198178_comment'></div>能逐三窟狡兔乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198178_comment'></div>皆曰：「不能」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198178_comment'></div>曰：「是固不能，闺门之内，固无所事此，今将诏若可为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198178_comment'></div>汝无状于行，当任坐作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198178_comment'></div>不得顽痴，自令谨饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198178_comment'></div>晨入庖舍，涤鎗瀹釜，料简蔬茹，留精黜粗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198178_comment'></div>脔肉法欲方，鲙鱼法欲长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198178_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1198178", 1198178, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>起溲</span>如截肪，煮饼深注汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198178_comment'></div>和糜勿投醯，齑臼晚用姜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198178_comment'></div>葱渫不欲焦，旋菹不欲黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198178_comment'></div>饭不欲著牙，扬盆勿驻沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198178_comment'></div>进火守烓，水沃沸鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1198178_comment'></div>斟酌芗芼，生熟必告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1198178_comment'></div>姨㜮临食，爬垢撩发，染指𦧇杓，嘬胾怀骨，事无小大，尽当关白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1198178_comment'></div>食了涤器，三正三反；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1198178_comment'></div>抆拭蠲洁，寝匙覆埦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1198178_comment'></div>陶瓦髹素，视在谨数，兄弟为行，牡牝相当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1198178_comment'></div>日中事閒，浣衣漱襦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1198178_comment'></div>器秽器净，谨循其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1198178_comment'></div>素衣当白，染衣增色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1198178_comment'></div>槴郁为黄，红螺砑光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1198178_comment'></div>挼蓝杵草，茅蒐橐皂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1198178_comment'></div>浆胰粉白，无不媚好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1198178_comment'></div>燥湿处亭，熨帖坦平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1198178_comment'></div>来往之役，资他使令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1198178_comment'></div>牛羊下来，唤鸡栖桀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1198178_comment'></div>撑拒门关，闲护草窃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1198178_comment'></div>饮饭猫犬，堙塞鼠穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1198178_comment'></div>凡乌攫肉，猫触鼎，犬𦧇鎗，鼠窥甑，皆汝之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1198178_comment'></div>春蚕三卧，升簇自裹，七昼七夜，无得停火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1198178_comment'></div>纻麻藤葛，蕉任絺绤，锡疏手作，无有停时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1198178_comment'></div>紾缉偷工夫，一日得半工，一缕亦有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1198178_comment'></div>暑时蕴烝，扇凉密冰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1198178_comment'></div>薰艾出蚊，冰盘去蝇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1198178_comment'></div>果生守树，果熟守筥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1198178_comment'></div>执弓怀弹，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1198178", 1198178, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>驱吓</span>飞鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1198178_comment'></div>无得吮尝，日使残少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1198178_comment'></div>姆妪骂讥，疟痢泄呕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1198178_comment'></div>天寒置笼，衣衾毕烘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1198178_comment'></div>搔痒抑痛，炙手撋冻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1198178_comment'></div>无事倚墙，鞋履可坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1198178_comment'></div>堂上作呼，传声代诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1198178_comment'></div>截长续短，凫鹤皆忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1198178_comment'></div>持勤补拙，与巧者俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1198178_comment'></div>凡前之为，汝能之不」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1198178_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1198178", 1198178, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>跛奚</span>对曰：「我缺于足，犹全于手，如前之为，虽劳何咎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1198178_comment'></div>黄子曰：「若是，则不既有用矣乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1198178_comment'></div>皆应曰「然」，无不意满。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1198178_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　结识俞清老，并自称清风客。<br /></div>
-----end

showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197488?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋欧阳文忠公撰七叔祖主簿墓志后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197488'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197488'>叔祖梦升，学问文章，五兵纵横，制作之意，似徐陵、庾信，使同时遇合，未知孰先孰后也，然不幸得人间四十年尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197488_comment'></div>使之白发角逐于英俊之场，又未知与欧阳文忠公孰先孰后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197488_comment'></div>梦升既乖牾不逢，尝以文哭世父长善云：「高明之家，尚为鬼瞰，子之文章，岂无物憾」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197488_comment'></div>盖自道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197488_comment'></div>安世十三弟，秀而不实，使人气塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197488_comment'></div>于今孙曾特多英妙之质，力学不休，安知来者之不如今也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197488_comment'></div>绍圣元年五月，诸孙某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1197488_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年6月18日</a>　行至洪州，任命管勾亳州明道宫，并被责令开封府内居住，以便听候国史院之对证查问。<br /></div>

开封

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年春</a>　在京师，与叔父黄廉相见，有诗。作品：都下喜见八叔父。<div id='poem_214698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>都下喜见八叔父</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_214698'>冥鸿难借问，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_214698", 214698, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>江鲤</span>多沈浮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214698'>心因梦想去，迹为山川留。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214698'>叔趋丹凤阙，身向卧龙洲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214698'>邂逅入关马，同时解辔鞦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213138'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213138_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年春</a>　在京师，与王谹有诗唱和。作品：次韵稚川。次韵王稚川客舍二首。王稚川既得官都中有所盼未归予戏作林夫人钦乃歌二章与之竹枝歌本出三巴其流在湖湘耳钦乃乃湖南歌。病起次韵和稚川进叔倡酬之什。稚川约晚过进叔次前韵赠稚川并呈进叔。<div id='poem_214318' id='poem_sentence_11_214170'>必开曲突谋，满慰倾耳听。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214170'>斯文吕与张，泉下亦苏醒。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214170'>天聪四门辟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_214170", 214170, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>国势</span>九鼎定。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214170'>身得遭太平，分甘守閒冷。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214170'>何时及国门，休暇过煮茗。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214170'>烧灯留夜语，鸿雁看对影。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214170'>但恐张罗地，颇复多造请。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/213164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>访赵君举<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213164")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213164_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213164_0'>① 原注：《年谱》元丰八年腊雪，时在馆中作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213164'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213164'>朔风吹雪满都城，晓踏骅骝访玉京。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213164'>相引槽头看春酒，细流三峡夜泉声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213164_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213164'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213164_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　在汴京，为人作墓志铭。作品：王长者墓志铭。单卿夫人张氏墓志铭。董夫人墓志铭。章夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198051' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198051' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198051?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王长者墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐元年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198051")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198051_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198051'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198051'>长者海昏王氏，讳潨，字永裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198051_comment'></div>祖伦、父智，世力田，丧祭常望乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198051_comment'></div>长者天资善治生，操奇赢，长雄其乡，遂以富饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198051_comment'></div>筑馆聚书，居游士，化子弟，皆为儒生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198051_comment'></div>则以其业分任诸子，独徜徉于方外，道人云居了元、东林常总，皆摄杖屦，往游其藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198051_comment'></div>元祐丙寅正月辛卯终焉，享年六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198051_comment'></div>前此三年，自筑丘于青山之西原，松桧成列矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198051_comment'></div>去十月，过存里中亲好，相劳苦劝戒，若将远别，爰及辛卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198051_comment'></div>中外之吊哭者曰：「君盖闻道者邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198051_comment'></div>先配陈氏，继室两谢氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198051_comment'></div>七男子：楙、崇信、森、棣、权、彬、植，崇信前死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198051_comment'></div>三女子，二婿曰董毂、高友谅，其季未媒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198051_comment'></div>楙等遂以其十月某甲子，奉窀穸如初志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198051_comment'></div>楙娶李氏女，于庭坚母夫人为族兄弟，故楙因乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198051_comment'></div>太夫人曰：「汝以外家故，不可辞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198051_comment'></div>遂铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198051_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1198051'>以义力其穷，以智谢其丰，以理考其终，以文款其封。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1198051_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1198055' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198055' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198055?labeling=true' target='_blank'>单卿夫人张氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰八年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198055")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198055_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198055'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198055'>夫人张氏，出瀛州河间，徙京兆万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198055_comment'></div>考讳曜，当世汹汹，与其族卧终南山不出，名声籍籍关中，晚出仕为太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198055_comment'></div>夫人家居，事继母有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198055_comment'></div>博士为择对，以嫁平原单公，归而事严姑如事继母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198055_comment'></div>力贫为家，不以累其夫，故单公得读书登进士第，仕而显于朝，以礼终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198055_comment'></div>长姒没，夫人襁负其两儿母之，人不谓非己出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198055_comment'></div>夫人屡失子，免乳得男而姑病，夙夜药糜，不慈其子，君子以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198055_comment'></div>攻苦忍穷垂二十年，至于泰，而能用其有收恤中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198055_comment'></div>光禄捐馆舍，则以阃内付子妇，而老于堂，斋几薰炉，宴坐终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198055_comment'></div>晚乃游道人宗本法秀之间，知生死之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198055_comment'></div>寿八十四，力疾靧沐，待期而终，顾视家人，无恋嫪意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198055_comment'></div>光禄与今上同名，当以字行，曰孟阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198055_comment'></div>夫人历封安定、寿安二县、仁寿郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198055_comment'></div>三男子：烨、镕，皆通直郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198055_comment'></div>沨，宣德郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198055_comment'></div>两女子，归某郡王至言，曲阳尉席延卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198055_comment'></div>夫人终以元丰乙丑七月辛丑，葬以其十月某甲子，其兆在齐州长青县天华南管，先光禄之吉卜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198055_comment'></div>烨等以陈留李之仪状来乞铭，之仪道夫人之义甚高，且曰：「诗人所谓女士者，将在于此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198055_comment'></div>不可以不铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198055_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1198055'>夫人居室，继亲受福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198055_comment'></div>滥觞成江，单宗燕睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198055_comment'></div>承尊孝恭，抚下仁哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198055_comment'></div>使非己子，于予母怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198055_comment'></div>林回弃璧，负子逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198055_comment'></div>爱日事姑，宁绝儿乳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198055_comment'></div>朝闻夕死，士不及墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198055_comment'></div>玉珥珠襦，乃或升堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198055_comment'></div>道无情状，言得则谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198055_comment'></div>委命蝉蜕，以观无妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198055_comment'></div>女德能一，国风所嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198055_comment'></div>能人难能，夫人则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198055_comment'></div>光禄有宫，归奉涫栉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1198055_comment'></div>作为训诗，告后勿伐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1198055_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1198053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198053?labeling=true' target='_blank'>董夫人墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰八年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198053")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198053_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198053'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198053'>夫人董氏，开封人，少入梁氏，事尚书水部郎中讳如圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198053_comment'></div>实生北京留守推官、河北转运司句当公事铎，通直郎、都水监丞铸，宗室右武卫大将军、彭州刺史克艰之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198053_comment'></div>铎生八岁，水部君捐馆舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198053_comment'></div>夫人奉嫡夫人永和县君王氏，字其遗孤，襁负抱携，至于男女有家室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198053_comment'></div>二子成人，事永和如己自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198053_comment'></div>永和为夫人有数，其后持永和之丧，及其襄事春秋，皆如礼意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198053_comment'></div>慈祥而不欺，喜言人之善而好施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198053_comment'></div>享年七十有二，及见孙男女十有五人，婚宦者半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198053_comment'></div>铸之妻，同安郡主濮安懿王女也，执妇事在寝门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198053_comment'></div>其存也荣，其殁也哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198053_comment'></div>将葬，铎等以状来告曰：先夫人终以元丰八年六月辛巳，卜以七月辛酉奉时窀穸，其兆在祥符县北常之原，愿得铭以垂世传后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198053_comment'></div>考于二子之交游，以夫人诚可铭，遂为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1198053'>梁氏之棣，其鄂韡韡，虽其才良，母氏勤止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198053_comment'></div>樛木葛藟，肃雍于宫，有蕡其实，茂对本宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198053_comment'></div>淑善寿考，燕誉终始，铭石下泉，以慰孙子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1198053_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1198057' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198057' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198057?labeling=true' target='_blank'>章夫人墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198057")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198057_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198057'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198057'>夫人章氏，某县君，处士庆之女，为分宁著姓，能以豪右致学士大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198057_comment'></div>年二十四，归我伯父祖善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198057_comment'></div>祖善黄氏，以文学知名，皇祐某年进士，仕奇不逢，以大理寺丞致仕，今以奉议郎家居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198057_comment'></div>夫人为妇为妻，舅姑曰：「齐祀春秋，能不勤我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198057_comment'></div>夫曰：「凡吾得尽心宫学者，维室家之宜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198057_comment'></div>为母、为姑，子顺教诏，日就月将，妇承功绪，休其蚕织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198057_comment'></div>其为人勤敏乐易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198057_comment'></div>幼少智虑如大人，白首而血气不惰，启手足之日有善言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198057_comment'></div>享年六十有七，终以元丰壬戌九月某甲子，葬以乙丑某月某甲子，其山曰马鞍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198057_comment'></div>三男子：曰某、曰某、曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198057_comment'></div>三女子，嫁黄州判官吴卞、武昌李康年、淮南节度推官林镐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198057_comment'></div>夫人于庭坚，小功母也，太夫人曰：「吾少归汝家，姒遇我有礼，汝为好作铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198057_comment'></div>庭坚则再拜而铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198057_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1198057'>紫阳之山，硗硗其谷，水清且修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198057_comment'></div>卜宅其上游，宜尔孙子祠春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198057_comment'></div>登彼墟矣吁且乐，不洳不隙，蓺尔松柏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198057_comment'></div>无俾薪牧，千秋万岁永安宅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1198057_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年1月12日</a>　在汴京，苏轼兄弟为李公麟《憩寂图》作诗，山谷和之。作品：次韵子瞻子由题憩寂图二首。<div id='poem_213073' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213073' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213073?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵子瞻子由题憩寂图二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年1月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213073")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213073_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213073_0'>① 原无此诗，据陈刻本补。陈刻本注：任氏旧注原无此诗，但存其目尔，今以杨氏补注增入。《年谱》编于元祐三年试院后作。清冯应榴《苏文忠公诗合注》卷四七《次韵子由题憩寂图后》诗注有辨。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213073'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213073'>松寒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>风雨石骨瘦，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_213073", 213073, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>法窟</span>寂寥僧定时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213073_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213073'>李侯有句不肯吐，淡墨写出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_213073", 213073, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>无声诗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213073_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213073'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213073_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213073'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_213073_0'>⑴ 文集、山谷集作含</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213073_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_213072' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213072' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213072?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年1月12日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213072_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213072'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213072'>龙眠不似虎头痴，笔妙天机可并时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213072_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213072'>苏仙漱墨作苍石，应解种花开此诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《山谷内集诗注》卷九）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213072_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213072'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213072_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年3月19日</a>　在汴京，受司马光推荐，与范祖禹、司马康等校订《资治通鉴》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年5月</a>　在汴京，书杜甫诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年6月16日</a>　在汴京，诏山谷与孔平仲、毕仲游、廖正一、晁补之、张耒等参加学士院考试，以充馆阁，苏轼为主考官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年6月</a>　在汴京，初会张耒，张耒有诗寄之，有和诗。作品：次韵答张文潜惠寄。<div id='poem_214287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214287")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214287'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214287'>短褐不磷缁，文章近楚辞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214287'>未识想风采，别去令人思。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214287'>斯文已战胜，凯歌偃旌旂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214287'>君行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_214287", 214287, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>鱼上冰</span>，忽复燕哺儿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214287'>学省得佳士，催来费符移。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214287'>方观追金玉，如许遽言归。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214287'>南山有君子，握兰怀令姿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214287'>但应洁斋俟，勿咏无生诗。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年7月</a>　与苏轼、韩川等游京西南之西太一宫，追和王安石诗。作品：次韵韩川奉祠西太一宫四首。<div id='poem_215009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215009?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵韩川奉祠西太乙宫四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215009")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_215009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215009'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215009'>万灵未对甘泉，五福问祀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_215009", 215009, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>迎年</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215009_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215008' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215008' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215008?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215008'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215008'>白髦下金神节，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_215008", 215008, id='poem_sentence_1_215008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215008'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_215008_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215007?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年7月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_215007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215007'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215007'>紫府侍臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_215007", 215007, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>鸣玉</span>，霜台御史生风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215007'>官烛论诗未了，知秋自属梧桐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215007'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_215007_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a 原注：山谷有此诗跋云：钱穆父奉使高丽，得猩猩毛笔，甚珍之。惠予，要作诗。苏子瞻爱其柔健可人意，每过予，书案下笔不能休。此时二公俱直紫微阁，故予作二诗，前篇奉穆父，后篇奉子瞻。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213021_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_1198094'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198094'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198094_comment'></div>裕陵遗弓，天下岌岌，九鼎既安，烝民乃粒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198094_comment'></div>其功在天，其信在人，两宫孝慈，百度日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198094_comment'></div>其天伊何，天子圣文，神考之子，英祖之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198094_comment'></div>其人伊何，公来自西，民以安堵，曰我公归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198094_comment'></div>天生公德，二圣蓍龟，以民为基，守以四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198094_comment'></div>少年推锋，勿在王庭，我观缙绅，皤皤老成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198094_comment'></div>九月丙辰，鳏寡无盖，维斗西柄，有星见沬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198094_comment'></div>舆人之占，忧在国栋，公果陨倾，中外震动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198094_comment'></div>太平之基，维成未落，风雨漂摇，今则有托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198094_comment'></div>王命调护，遣车有期，平生一觞，涕泗荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198094_comment'></div>爱在斯民，信在王室，公其无憾，降享芬苾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1198094_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　在汴京，为任夫人作墓志铭。作品：任夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198064' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198064")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198064'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198064'>吾友廖明略，自安陆寓书京师，乞余铭其妻任夫人之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198064_comment'></div>其状曰：任氏归正一七年，三生子，男曰青箱、青规，女曰念二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198064_comment'></div>不幸年二十五而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198064_comment'></div>性敏慧，颇通书，柔婉孝仁，在贫而乐，先夫人爱之如己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198064_comment'></div>不幸先夫人即世，任不胜哀，阅九旬亦死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198064_comment'></div>将以元祐元年十二月癸丑从葬舅姑之墓次，愿得铭以塞悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198064_comment'></div>庭坚曰：「如是，可不铭」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198064_comment'></div>梓州郪县有任轸者，及其弟更，有声治平进士间，遂同年登第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198064_comment'></div>轸父伯传任尚书都官郎中，有人物冰鉴，见明略为童子时，曰：「此人后必以文章显」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198064_comment'></div>故以轸之女嫁明略云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198064_comment'></div>其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1198064'>委佩兮结缡，来有家兮咸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198064_comment'></div>承尊章兮相夫子，丰约有时兮百岁同死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198064_comment'></div>忽兮与朝露同晞，弃所爱兮无不之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198064_comment'></div>刻诗玄宫兮匪其对食之私，逮其成人兮告箱与规。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1198064_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年1月18日</a>　在汴京，除著作佐郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年2月8日</a>　在汴京，好友刑居实卒于随州，临终前乞山谷为作行状；山谷书其《南征赋》以示纪念。作品：书刑居实南征赋后。<div id='poem_1197134' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197134' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197134?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书邢居实南征赋后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年2月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197134")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197134_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197134'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197134'>阳夏谢师复景回，年未二十，文章绝不类少年书生语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197134_comment'></div>予尝序其遗稿云：「方行万里，出门而车轴折，可为霣涕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197134_comment'></div>今观邢惇夫诗赋，笔墨山立，自为一家，甚似吾师复也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197134_comment'></div>日者阅国马，问诸圉人，曰：「千里驹往往不及奉舆，毙于皂枥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197134_comment'></div>驽蹇千百为群，未尝求国医也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197134_comment'></div>闻之喟然，曰：吾惇夫亦足以不朽矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197134_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年3月18日</a>　在汴京，为范正民文集作跋。作品：书范子政文集后。<div id='poem_1197434' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197434' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197434?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书范子政文集后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年3月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197434")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197434_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197434'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197434'>士之学，期于没而不朽，君子之道，百世以俟圣人，故寿夭之际，未尝置言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197434_comment'></div>凫鹤之短长，物固不能齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197434_comment'></div>虽然，有连城之璧，操之甚栗，中道而毁，岂能使人无慨于心哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197434_comment'></div>范正民子政，余不及友也，于余亲友闻其人，又得其言，皆可传后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197434_comment'></div>问其所与游，则司马温公爱之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197434_comment'></div>问其为吏，则年三十试吏单父，方使者剥肤椎髓取于民以自为功，子政以岁饥，独舍单父民赋十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197434_comment'></div>虽早世，可以不朽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197434_comment'></div>或谓子政父祖皆名世，士自宜如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197434_comment'></div>应之曰：文王割烹，武王饪鼎，叔旦举而荐之，管蔡不食，谁能强之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197434_comment'></div>则子政之贤于人远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197434_comment'></div>元祐二年三月庚午，豫章黄某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1197434_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>酒舫</span>石鱼湖<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214598_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214598'></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_214598_1'>⑵ 自注：元次山《石鱼湖歌》曰：石鱼湖，似洞庭，夏水欲满君山青。疾风三日作大浪，不能废人运酒舫。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214598_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213954'>嘉若人兮甚好修，兰薰而时发兮，水刚德而用柔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213954'>有璞连城，方谟匠兮，忍其与斗筲议之。<div inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>袭自藏人已知。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214792'>贵人取去弃墙角，流落几姓知今谁。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　在汴京，作诗送刘道纯。<div id='poem_214628' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214628' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_11_214449'>峨峨触邪冠，此中有馀事。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214449'>医国妙药石，立朝极泾渭。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214449'>馀子蠹青简，走亦行幞被。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214449_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214449'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_214449_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　在汴京，作诗题刘法直诗卷。<div id='poem_214878' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214878' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214878?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题刘法直诗卷<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：《年谱》元祐间馆中作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214878")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214878_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214878'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214878'>往日刘随州，作诗惊诸公。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214878'>老兵睨前辈，欺诋阮嗣宗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214878'>才卿望长卿，岁数未三百。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214878'>岂其苗裔耶，诗句侵唐格。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214878'>慨然古人风，乃作逐客篇。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214878'>朝廷重九鼎，政欲多此贤。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214878'>虎豹九关严，漂零落閒处。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214878'>空馀三百篇<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作百篇诗）</span>，不随夜台去。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214878'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_214878_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　在汴京，为范子政文集作跋。作品：书范子政文集后。<div id='poem_1197434' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197434' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197434?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书范子政文集后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年3月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197434")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197434_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197434'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197434'>士之学，期于没而不朽，君子之道，百世以俟圣人，故寿夭之际，未尝置言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197434_comment'></div>凫鹤之短长，物固不能齐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197434_comment'></div>虽然，有连城之璧，操之甚栗，中道而毁，岂能使人无慨于心哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197434_comment'></div>范正民子政，余不及友也，于余亲友闻其人，又得其言，皆可传后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197434_comment'></div>问其所与游，则司马温公爱之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197434_comment'></div>问其为吏，则年三十试吏单父，方使者剥肤椎髓取于民以自为功，子政以岁饥，独舍单父民赋十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197434_comment'></div>虽早世，可以不朽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197434_comment'></div>或谓子政父祖皆名世，士自宜如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197434_comment'></div>应之曰：文王割烹，武王饪鼎，叔旦举而荐之，管蔡不食，谁能强之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197434_comment'></div>则子政之贤于人远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197434_comment'></div>元祐二年三月庚午，豫章黄某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1197434_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　在汴京，为刘禹作墓志铭。作品：朝奉郎通判汝州刘君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198016' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198016?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎通判汾州刘君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198016")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198016_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198016'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198016'>君讳禹，德州德平人，字希俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198016_comment'></div>年二十，举明法及第，补栾城尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198016_comment'></div>名能捕盗，奏徙稿城尉，稿城盗为不发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198016_comment'></div>调德荣主簿、兼县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198016_comment'></div>盐井淡而征不除，君为岁蠲四十万，罢官，民追送之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198016_comment'></div>又为永州军事推官、权邵州武冈县，武冈溪洞蛮蜂出，烧民积聚，郡治兵，令民入保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198016_comment'></div>君从数骑入其巢穴，晓以祸福，其酋请杀始事者二人以平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198016_comment'></div>以忧去，服除，授资州录事参军、兼司法事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198016_comment'></div>始至，将佐皆易之，见其决狱，乃大惊，郡有难辨事，辄倚君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198016_comment'></div>改大理寺丞、知北海县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198016_comment'></div>俗喜屠牛私酤，君阴籍其姓名，区处具疏壁间，民相告曰，是不可犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198016_comment'></div>迁太子中舍、知乐寿县事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198016_comment'></div>迁殿中丞，改奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198016_comment'></div>乐寿、南皮县金堤两间，使者度缮堤以障水，利南皮而害乐寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198016_comment'></div>南皮令以私书诱乐寿仕家子，得其愿状，告部使者，使者下书问抑民状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198016_comment'></div>君会民金堤，乃得南皮私书，而焚之曰：「南皮令亦欲自便其民，顾不善谋耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198016_comment'></div>当报以德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198016_comment'></div>以愿者寡，不愿者众，报使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198016_comment'></div>通判汾州，迁承议郎，恩加朝奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198016_comment'></div>察举吏曹，不忮而趋辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198016_comment'></div>汾水被堤，稍啮永利西监，君督护作暑雨中，工休乃去，以故得疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198016_comment'></div>以元祐八年七月丙辰卒，得年五十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198016_comment'></div>丧过汾市，多陨涕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198016_comment'></div>君喜读书，善射，在官、居家，长者爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198016_comment'></div>德平王英状君行事如此，英言行有物，宜可信，故纪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198016_comment'></div>君曾大父思齐，大父诚，父芝，皆力田，而芝以君赠奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198016_comment'></div>娶张氏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198016_comment'></div>继室赵氏，安德县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198016_comment'></div>男曰槃、寀、楶、棨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198016_comment'></div>女嫁苏某、张潞、郭彦佐、张绎、张颀，有季居室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198016_comment'></div>葬以元祐二年六月丁酉，兆于其县击壤乡之西源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198016_comment'></div>寀墨衰来乞铭，三反而不懈，乃予铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1198016_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1198016'>吏优于检奸，或贿或残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1198016_comment'></div>勤民惠恤，吏或舞其笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1198016_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1198016_comment'></div>君洁可以驭吏，惠可以扶弱，孰能不克，修怨以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1198016_comment'></div>勤事怠食，瘁不媮息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1198016_comment'></div>其施不遐，惟畀之啬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1198016_comment'></div>力耕者不穑，尚其子之食。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1198016'></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1198016_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/1197088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题白崖诗后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年3月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197088")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197088'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197088'>余曩作叶县尉，叶城南三百步，省禅师道场也，盖白崖老人去家得道于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197088_comment'></div>尝得白崖歌颂百馀篇，及叶城民家多见书札，钦爱其道风高秀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197088_comment'></div>元祐元年三月壬申，同刘晦叔、宋仙民、伯氏元明，观于净因臻道人所。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年6月12日</a>　在汴京，与苏轼、秦观等至兴国浴室院。作品：跋浴室院画六祖师。<div id='poem_1197257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋浴室院画六祖师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年6月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197257")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197257'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197257'>浴室院有蜀僧令宗画达摩西来六祖师，人物皆妙绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197257_comment'></div>其山川草木、毛羽衣盂诸物，画工能知之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197257_comment'></div>至于人有怀道之容，投机接物，目击而百体从之者，未易为俗人言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197257_comment'></div>此壁列于冠盖之会，而湮伏不闻者数十年，得蜀人苏子瞻乃发之，物不系于世道兴衰，亦有数如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197257_comment'></div>此寺井泉甘寒，汶师碾建溪茶常不落第二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197257_comment'></div>故人陈季常，林下士也，寓棋簟于此，苏子瞻、范子功数来从之，故余过门，必税驾焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197257_comment'></div>元祐三年鲁直题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1197257_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197257'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·正集》卷二七。又见明茅维编《苏文忠公全集》卷七一《书鲁直浴室题名后》附录，《东坡题跋》卷六。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1197257_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年8月11日</a>　在汴京，自述学书经过及经验。作品：钟离跋尾。<div id='poem_1197511' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197511' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197511?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钟离跋尾</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年8月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197511")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197511_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197511'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197511'>少时喜作草书，初不师承古人，但管中窥豹，稍稍推类为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197511_comment'></div>方事急时，便以意成，久之或不自识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197511_comment'></div>比来更自知所作韵俗，下笔不浏离，如禅家「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1197511", 1197511, "Clauses/9/Comments/2")'>黏皮带骨</span>」语，因此不复作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197511_comment'></div>时有委缣素者，颇为作正书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197511_comment'></div>正书虽不工，差循理尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197511_comment'></div>今观钟离寿州小字《千字》，妩媚而有精神，熟视皆有绳墨，因知万事皆当师古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197511_comment'></div>往时翰林侍书王著补永禅师《千字》，笔圆意足，至书家尊之，此书正当雁行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197511_comment'></div>然公序小楷尤妙，更于行间置小楷，使文质彬彬，当更胜尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197511_comment'></div>元祐三年八月甲申，门下后省书，南昌黄某。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1197511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，自编所作诗，取名“退听堂录”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，伯父黄序有诗来，山谷和之。作品：伯父祖善耆老好学于所居紫阳溪后小马鞍山为放隐斋远寄诗句意欲庭坚和之幸师友同赋率尔上呈。<div id='poem_213695' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213695' class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214326'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_214326_0'>⑴ 草书作浣花溪边筑</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_214326_0'>⑵ 原校：一作终风且霾</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_214326_0'>⑶ 草书作出。自注：《庄子》：井蛙不可以语于道。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_214326_0'>⑷ 自注：《世说》：简文入华林园，顾谓左右曰：会心处不必在远，翳然林木，不（《世说·言语》林木作林水，无不字）觉鸟兽禽鱼自来亲人。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_214326_1'>⑸ 自注：杜诗：手种桃李非无主，野老墙低还是家。又云：桃花一簇问无主。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_214326_0'>⑹ 自注：老杜云：熊儿幸无恙，骥子最怜渠。又有示宗文、宗武两诗，《宗武生日》诗注云：宗武，小字骥子。陈无己《和饶节咏周昉画李白真》诗云：君不见浣花老翁醉骑驴，熊儿捉辔骥子扶。金华仙伯哦七字，好事不复千金摸。谓此也。金华，谓山谷。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_214326_1'>⑺ 自注：《书·太甲（当作《说命》）》惟甲胄起戎，注：甲，铠；胄，兜鍪也。《汉·韩延寿传》被甲鞮鍪，注：即兜鍪也。退之诗：边封脱兜鍪。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_214326_1'>⑻ 自注：老杜《忆昔》云：老儒不用尚书郎。乐府《木兰歌》：木兰不用尚书郎。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_214326_0'>⑼ 草书作信。自注：杜诗：夕烽来不近，每日报平安。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_214326_0'>⑽ 原校：一作清扬之间（自注：《庐阜杂记》：远法师结白莲社，以书招渊明造焉，远勉以入社，陶攒眉而去。）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_214326_0'>⑾ 煎山谷集作神，千古草书作古今</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_214326_1'>⑿ 自注：东方朔《十洲记》：煮凤喙、麟角，合煎作胶，名为续弦胶。《博物志》：汉武时，西海国献胶五两，以付外库。馀半两，使者佩以自随。后从帝射于甘泉。帝弓弦断，西使乞以所馀胶续之，弦遂相著，使力士各引一头，终不相离。因名续弦胶。杜诗：麟角凤嘴世莫辨，煎胶续弦奇自见。杜牧之《读韩杜》云：杜诗韩笔愁来读，似倩麻姑痒处搔。天外凤凰谁得髓，无人解合续弦胶。</div></div></div><div 原注：山谷有此诗跋云：州南王才元舍人家，有百叶黄梅，妙绝。礼部锁院，不复得见，开院之明日，才元遣送数枝。盖是岁大雨雪，寒甚，故梅亦晚开耳。又一跋云：元祐初，锁试礼部，阻春雪，还家已三月。王才元舍人送红黄多叶梅数种，为作三诗，付王家素素歌之。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_212962_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214298' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214298' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214298?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答曹子方杂言<span id='poem_sentence_10_214298_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和曹子方杂言<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214442")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214442_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_214442_0'>① 原注：《前集》（《山谷内集诗注》卷一○）有《次韵答曹子方杂言》，此篇亦次韵也，而不言次韵，诗意略同，不应再出；又不称再和。疑是先作此篇，后复窜易，故两存耳。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214442'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214442'>正月尾，垂云如覆盂，雁作斜行书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214442'>三十六陂浸烟水，想对西江彭蠡湖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214442'>人言春色浓如酒，不见插秧吴女手。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214442'>冷卿小坞颇藏春，张侯官居柳对门。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214442'>当风横笛留三弄，烧烛围棋覆九军。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214442'>尽是向来行乐事，每见琵琶忆朝云。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214442'>只今不举蛾眉酒，红牙捍拨网蛛尘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214442'>曹侯束书丞太仆，试说相马犹可人。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214442'>照夜白，真乘黄。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214442'>冷卿智多发苍浪，牛刀发硎思一邦。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214442_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
