id='poem_sentence_2_213127_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213126?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213126'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213126'>朝士闻鸡常半途，朱门拥被不关渠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213126'>秦郎五起听三唱，残烛贪传未见书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213126'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213126_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，为苏轼、李公麟画作赋。作品：苏李画枯木道士赋。<div id='poem_1195793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苏李画枯木道士赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（元祐三年秘书省作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195793")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195793'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195793'>东坡先生佩玉而心若槁木，立朝而意在东山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195793_comment'></div>其商略终古，盖流俗不得而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195793_comment'></div>其于文事，补衮则华虫黼黻，医国则雷扁和秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195793_comment'></div>虎豹之有美，不彫而常自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195793_comment'></div>至于恢诡谲怪，滑稽于秋兔之颖，尤以酒而能神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195793_comment'></div>故其觞次滴沥，醉馀颦申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195793_comment'></div>取诸造物之炉锤，尽用文章之斧斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195793_comment'></div>寒烟淡墨，权奇轮囷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195793_comment'></div>挟风霜而不栗，听万物之皆春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195793_comment'></div>龙眠有隐君子见之，曰：「商宇宙者朝彻于一指，计楮中者心醉于九九，言其不同识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195793_comment'></div>胾鹏背而不蒂芥，烹鼠肝而腹果然，言其不同量也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195793_comment'></div>彼以睢睢盱盱，我以踽踽凉凉，则惧夫子之独立，而矢来无乡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195793_comment'></div>乃作女萝，施于木末，婆娑成阴，与世宴息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195793_comment'></div>于其槃根，作黄冠师，纳息于踵，若新沐而晞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195793_comment'></div>促阮咸以赴节，按万籁之同归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195793_comment'></div>昔阮仲容深识清浊，酒沈于陆，无一物可欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195793_comment'></div>右琴瑟而左琵琶，陶冶此族，不溷不浊，是谓竹林之曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195793_comment'></div>彼道人者，养苍竹之节以玩四时，鸣槁梧之风以召众窍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195793_comment'></div>其鼻间栩栩然，盖必有不可传之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195793_comment'></div>若予也，寄栎社以神其拙，顾白鸥之乐人深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195793_comment'></div>一行作吏，此事便废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195793_comment'></div>甘稻粱以饴老，就簪绂而成禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1195793_comment'></div>庄生曰「去国期年，见似之者而喜矣」，况予尘土之渴心。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1195793'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1195793_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，为苏轼画作赋。作品：东坡居士墨戏赋。<div id='poem_1195794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东坡居士墨戏赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195794")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195794'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195794'>东坡居士游戏于管城子、楮先生之间，作枯槎寿木、丛筱断山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195794_comment'></div>笔力跌宕于风烟无人之境，盖道人之所易，而画工之所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195794_comment'></div>如印印泥，霜枝风叶先成于胸次者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195794_comment'></div>颦申奋迅，六反震动，草书三昧之苗裔者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195794_comment'></div>金石之友质已死，而心在斲泥郢人之鼻、运斤成风之手者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195794_comment'></div>夫惟天才逸群，心法<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1195794", 1195794, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>无轨</span>，笔与心机，释冰为水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195794_comment'></div>立之南荣，视其胸中，无有畦畛，八窗玲珑者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195794_comment'></div>吾闻斯人，深入理窟，椟研囊笔，枯禅缚律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195794_comment'></div>恐此物辈，不可复得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195794_comment'></div>公其缇衣十袭，拂除蛛尘，明窗棐几，如见其人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1195794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，有白山茶赋。<div id='poem_1195795' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195795' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195795?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白山茶赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（有引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195795")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195795_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195795'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195795'>姨母文城君作《白山茶赋》，兴寄高远，盖以自况，类楚人之《橘颂》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195795_comment'></div>感之，作《后白山茶赋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195795_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1195795'>孔子曰：「岁寒然后知松柏之后彫也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195795_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1195795", 1195795, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>丽紫</span>妖红，争春而取宠，然后知白山茶之韵胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195795_comment'></div>此木产于临川之崔嵬，是为麻源第三谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195795_comment'></div>仙圣所庐，金堂琼榭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195795_comment'></div>故是花也，禀金天之正气，非木果之匹亚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195795_comment'></div>乃得骨于昆阆，非乞灵于施夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195795_comment'></div>造物之手，执丹青而无所用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195795_comment'></div>析薪之斤，虽睥眤而幸见赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195795_comment'></div>高洁皓白，清修闲暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195795_comment'></div>裴回冰雪之晨，偃蹇霜月之夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195795_comment'></div>彼细腰之子孙，与庄生之物化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195795_comment'></div>方培户以思温，故无得而陵跨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195795_comment'></div>盖将与日月争光，何苦与洛阳争价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195795_comment'></div>惟是当时而见尊，显处于瑶台玉墀之上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195795_comment'></div>是以闭藏而无闷，淡然于乾枫枯柳之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195795_comment'></div>江北则上徐、庾，江南则数鲍、谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195795_comment'></div>盖不能刻画嫦娥，藩饰姑射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195795_comment'></div>谅无地以寄言，故莫传于脍炙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195795_comment'></div>况乎见素抱朴难乎郢人，故徐熙、赵昌舐笔和铅而不敢画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195795_comment'></div>或谓山丹之皓质，足以争长而更霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1195795_comment'></div>知我如此，不几乎骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1195795_comment'></div>虽琼华明后土之祠，白莲秀远公之社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1195795_comment'></div>皆声名籍甚，俗态不舍，挟脂粉之气而蕴兰麝，与君周旋，其避三舍。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1195795_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，有墨竹赋。作品：刘明仲墨竹赋。<div id='poem_1195801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘明仲墨竹赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（元祐三年秘书省作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195801")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195801'>子刘子山川之英，骨毛粹清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195801_comment'></div>用意风尘之表，如秋高月明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195801_comment'></div>游戏翰墨，龙蛇起陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195801_comment'></div>尝其馀巧，顾作二竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195801_comment'></div>其一枝叶条达，惠风举之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195801_comment'></div>瘦地笋笴，夏篁解衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195801_comment'></div>三河少年，禀生剿刚，春服楚楚，侠游专场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195801_comment'></div>王谢子弟，生长见闻，文献不足，犹超人群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195801_comment'></div>其一折干偃蹇，斫头不屈，枝老叶硬，强项风雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195801_comment'></div>廉、蔺之骨成尘，凛凛犹有生气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195801_comment'></div>虽汲黯之不学，挫淮南之锋于千里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195801_comment'></div>子刘子陵云自许，按剑者多，故以归我，请观谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195801_comment'></div>黄庭坚曰：吾子于此，可谓能矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195801_comment'></div>犹有修篁之岁晚，枯蘖之发春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195801_comment'></div>少者骨梗，老而日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195801_comment'></div>附之以倾崖礜石，摧之以冰霜斧斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195801_comment'></div>第其曾高昭穆，至于来昆仍云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195801_comment'></div>组练十幅，烟寒雨昏，乃为能尽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195801_comment'></div>盖阳虎、有若之似夫子，市人识之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195801_comment'></div>颜回之具体，门人不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195801_comment'></div>苏子曰：世之工人，或能曲尽其形，至于其理，非高人逸才不能办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195801_comment'></div>意其在斯，故籍外论之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1195801_comment'></div>梓人不以庆赏成虡，痀偻不以万物易蜩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1195801_comment'></div>及其至也，禹之喻于水，仲尼之妙于《韶》，盖因物而不用吾私焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1195801_comment'></div>若夫燕荆南之无俗气，庖丁之解牛进技，以道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1195801_comment'></div>文湖州之得成竹于胸中，王会稽之用笔如印印泥者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1195801_comment'></div>诗云：「鹤鸣于九皋，声闻于天」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1195801_comment'></div>妙万物以成象，必其胸中洞然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1195801_comment'></div>好学者天不能掣其肘，刘子勉旃<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1195801_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1195801'>尘：原脱，据丛刊本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1195801_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1195801'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_1195801_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·外集》卷二○。又见《历代赋汇》卷一○二。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1195801_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，作赋。作品：寄老庵赋。<div id='poem_1195790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄老庵赋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195790")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195790_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1195790_0'>① 公此赋跋云：「刘贡父作庵记。庵在历阳温汤之僧舍。」元祐三年，公为秘书省，孙莘老来索此文。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195790'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195790'>生乎今兹兮，见曩之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195790_comment'></div>万物一家兮，券宇宙而无邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195790_comment'></div>橐橡可以为泽兮，鬓须苍然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195790_comment'></div>独奈何俯仰以是兮，吾独立而不陈新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195790_comment'></div>彼族庖之技痒兮，伐大觚以尝巧风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195790_comment'></div>悲郢人之宰木兮，顾无所用吾斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195790_comment'></div>浩浩汗汗兮，黄川日夜流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195790_comment'></div>吾谁疏亲兮，行天下以虚舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195790_comment'></div>无地以受人之徽纆，故超世而不避世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195790_comment'></div>槃礴于蜗牛之宫，经行于羊豕之隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195790_comment'></div>𣂏甓社以为樽兮，举海门以为胾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195790_comment'></div>觞豆于无味之味，从衲子以卒岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195790_comment'></div>傥然以寓其不得已，是谓无累之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195790_comment'></div>何用穷山幽谷为，独安往而非寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195790_comment'></div>寄吾老于簪绂，岌高位之疾颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195790_comment'></div>春秋以旅力去矣，奉腆禄而彫年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195790_comment'></div>寄吾老于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1195790", 1195790, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>孙息</span>，厌群雏之嗷嗷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195790_comment'></div>眷火宅之无安，宁执枯而俱焦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195790_comment'></div>寄吾老于友朋，未沬平生之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195790_comment'></div>人寿不能金石，忽相望于鬼伯之阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195790_comment'></div>伊汉上之庞禅，空诸有以为宅，沈货泉以弃责，聊生涯于纬竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195790_comment'></div>维衡岳之懒叟，独金玉其言音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1195790_comment'></div>踞烧木以燠寒，抆鼻涕而无寸阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1195790_comment'></div>相彼宛童，寓于柏松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1195790_comment'></div>自干青云，束缚舍翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1195790_comment'></div>主人不承泽，蝼蚁为宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1195790_comment'></div>薪者斧焉，宾主祸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1195790_comment'></div>无意以为智维此意，而夭夭申申从人以嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1195790_comment'></div>寡妇之茨，高明之榱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1195790_comment'></div>相与社而稷之，讫无累于去来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1195790_comment'></div>养生者讳盈，术窍者天门不开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1195790_comment'></div>此其是邪，非乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1195790_comment'></div>穷于外者反于家，困乎智者归愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1195790_comment'></div>伊未尝一用其智，对万世而德不孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1195790_comment'></div>若人者其在斯乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1195790_comment'></div>托轩冕而鹑居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1195790_comment'></div>无德色之可锄，殆其肆志于江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1195790_comment'></div>翁乎强为我著书，无促驾青牛之车。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1195790_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，代赵枢密作文祭韩绛。作品：代赵枢密祭韩康公文。<div id='poem_1198095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198095?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代赵枢密祭韩康公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198095")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198095_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198095'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198095'>明珠白璧不言，而出九重之渊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198095_comment'></div>天球河图不出，而为万乘之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198095_comment'></div>高阳之里，实生八韩，皆世望人，康公为冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198095_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198095_comment'></div>康公自任之重，足以镇群轻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198095_comment'></div>自致之诚，足以动万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198095_comment'></div>极文武之任以白发，行吾志则有馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198095_comment'></div>夺山林之日为衮衣，于公心其不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198095_comment'></div>闻道于耳目之表，后凋于冰雪之寒，公则有之，出处何择？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198095_comment'></div>至于正色端议，滨九死而不回；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198095_comment'></div>斋心服形，承大祭而不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198095_comment'></div>忘三公之势以下士，均万钟之禄以睦宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198095_comment'></div>人之难能，公则燕誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198095_comment'></div>而不百岁，复归本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198095_comment'></div>老成陨倾，吾则安仰？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198095_comment'></div>瞻辱门下三十馀年，棠棣交阴，芘此孤弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198095_comment'></div>学问暗浅，公借光辉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198095_comment'></div>性资重迟，公极推挽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198095_comment'></div>尊俎之色，如对于前；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198095_comment'></div>教训之音，犹在于耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198095_comment'></div>英风义气，忽成蕞尔之坏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198095_comment'></div>乾肉清觞，来哭燕居之几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198095_comment'></div>万事已矣，呜呼奈何！</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1198095_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，为净照禅师画像作跋。作品：跋净照禅师真赞。<div id='poem_1197608' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197608' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197608?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋净照禅师真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197608")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197608_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197608'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197608'>净照禅师，净因寺臻道人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197608_comment'></div>东坡则翰林苏子瞻，往岁谪官黄州，尝居江上之东坡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197608_comment'></div>龙眠盖庐江李伯时，顷与其弟德素、同郡李元中求志于龙眠山，淮南号为「龙眠三李」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197608_comment'></div>净照老人恬淡少为，作寺舍，僻在西南，人罕知之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197608_comment'></div>予尝作《真赞》云：「猛虎无齿，卧龙不吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197608_comment'></div>风林莫过，六合云阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197608_comment'></div>远山作眉红杏腮，嫁与春风不用媒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197608_comment'></div>阿婆三五少年日，也解东涂西抹来」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197608_comment'></div>人以其近俳也，笑其俳，不既其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197608_comment'></div>今既龙眠写照，东坡作偈，此话乃大行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197608_comment'></div>跋尾八公，是日不约而集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197608_comment'></div>元祐三年冬至前一日，南昌黄某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1197608_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　在汴京，为诗僧重素白兆山诗作跋。作品：题白兆山诗后。<div id='poem_1197083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题白兆山诗后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197083")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197083_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197083'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197083'>余闻士大夫尝劝白兆山僧重素即岩下作桃花庵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197083_comment'></div>素云：「桃花庵不难作，但恨无李白尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197083_comment'></div>今彦顾乃欲砻崖石刻李白诗，并欲结草其傍，以待冠盖之游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197083_comment'></div>众不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197083_comment'></div>盖安知遂无李白耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197083_comment'></div>为我多谢素师，今无白兆，尚不废椎鼓升堂，岂可臆计世无李白？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197083_comment'></div>素若有语，可并刻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197083_comment'></div>彦顾，安陆李慥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197083_comment'></div>元祐三年十二月己卯，黄庭坚书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1197083_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月4日</a>　在汴京，苏轼作《记夺鲁直墨》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月12日</a>　在汴京，弟非熊卒。作品：母寿光县君祭非熊文。非熊墓铭。<div id='poem_1198122' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198122' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198122?labeling=true' target='_blank'>母寿光县太君祭非熊文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年3月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198122")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198122_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198122'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198122'>维元祐四年，岁次己巳，三月壬申朔，十二日癸未，母寿光县太君李氏，以清酌时羞之奠，致祭于幼子二十四郎之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198122_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198122_comment'></div>康州捐馆，汝在怀抱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198122_comment'></div>从我艰厄，糊口四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198122_comment'></div>以余嫠孀，致汝婚晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198122_comment'></div>命之奇蹇，赵氏不减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198122_comment'></div>既壮而鳏，六见寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198122_comment'></div>择对龃龉，迄以无家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198122_comment'></div>予负于天，令汝暴横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198122_comment'></div>心摧肝裂，何地寄哀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198122_comment'></div>白日昭昭，弃我何适？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198122_comment'></div>维汝乳母，乳我三子，皆不中身，祸酷如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198122_comment'></div>汝念乳母，在后而单，我尚抚之，如三子存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198122_comment'></div>吾年七十，眼暗足跌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198122_comment'></div>汝归殡宫，不得临穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198122_comment'></div>拍棺一恸，泪尽唯血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198122_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1198122_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1198039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>非熊墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年3月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198039")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198039'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198039'>非熊，豫章黄氏，仲熊其名，非熊其字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198039_comment'></div>先大夫之幼子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198039_comment'></div>以至和岁乙未、月乙酉、日丙申、时辛卯，生于临菑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198039_comment'></div>先大夫以岁月日时参伍以历象，为吉祥，以为门户所寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198039_comment'></div>儿时黟黑腯肥，甚可念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198039_comment'></div>先大夫捐馆舍于康州，非熊方四岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198039_comment'></div>为其幼孤，太夫人不忍以严治之，故非熊知学最晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198039_comment'></div>然性资豪举，落笔成文，不肯为人下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198039_comment'></div>于儒生艺事，无所不学，虽不造微，要皆略能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198039_comment'></div>家贫，嫁四女弟，以故兄弟例婚晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198039_comment'></div>伯氏元明卖大夫时田，为非熊娶舒城赵氏，婚礼成而非熊不说，竟弃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198039_comment'></div>由是颇浮沈于酒中，亦自恃其命，曰：「我生，日在申，辰在卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198039_comment'></div>岁庚午，天地合，我终富贵得意婚大家」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198039_comment'></div>于是自强，屏酒不游，刻苦琢磨，欲以怪奇钩致禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198039_comment'></div>久之，宗室汝州防御使仲爰闻其家世，欲以女予之，而非熊不幸病死矣，得年三十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198039_comment'></div>有衔不袪，此日者误之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198039_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198039_comment'></div>非熊欲仕而不偶，难婚而无后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198039_comment'></div>孤先大夫之心，予兄弟执其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198039_comment'></div>无所归怨，维其不寿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1198039_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月</a>　在汴京，苏轼赴杭州，山谷作诗送之。作品：送少章从翰林苏公余杭。<div id='poem_214621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214621?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送少章从翰林苏公馀杭</a><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年1月7日</a>　在汴京，题姜太公所诵丹书。作品：题太公丹书后。<div id='poem_1197082' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197082' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197082?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题太公丹书后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年1月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197082")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197082_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197082'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197082'>右太公所诵丹书之言，故武王惕若恐惧，书以为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197082_comment'></div>于所起居服用，皆勒铭如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197082_comment'></div>余从事于俗，甚漫意，行不忌，晚而待罪太史，观礼书，得此铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197082_comment'></div>以鉴小人之影，去道远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197082_comment'></div>乃书于坐之左右，以为息黥补劓之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197082_comment'></div>晁子曰：「秦人之炙，亦吾嗜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197082_comment'></div>书以遗我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197082_comment'></div>故书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197082_comment'></div>元祐五年正月癸酉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1197082_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　在汴京，岳父孙觉逝世，作祭文。作品：祭外舅孙莘老文。<div id='poem_1198117' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198117' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198117?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭外舅孙莘老文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198117")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198117_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198117'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198117'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198117_comment'></div>万物沄沄，随川而东，金石独止，何心于逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198117_comment'></div>天地雷雨，草木争长，松柏不春，以听年往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198117_comment'></div>惟公岂弟而勇沈，足以制群轻之命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198117_comment'></div>重迟而忠厚，可以寄不御之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198117_comment'></div>若拙也，而巧于慎独之行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198117_comment'></div>若讷也，而辩于得意之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198117_comment'></div>孝友蒸蒸，内行玉雪，律贪敦薄，无有玷缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198117_comment'></div>心醉六经，仕则面墙，公为郡邑，禁止令行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198117_comment'></div>往在熙宁，弼臣造膝，诬公怀奸，不工应卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198117_comment'></div>公蹈其机，寤乃自陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198117_comment'></div>人言公枉，我则观仁，虽疾犹美，如西子颦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198117_comment'></div>元祐初政，公又大谏，不忮不侵，体国而论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198117_comment'></div>公于相士，如九方歅，遗其皮毛，论其绝尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198117_comment'></div>凡在缙绅，多自公出，辕下千里，皆载称述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198117_comment'></div>公侍母疾，结带三年，劳勤恐忧，鬓须皤然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198117_comment'></div>流落归来，公亦既病，犹望公起，典司国柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198117_comment'></div>去归淮南，公病亦侵，人物眇然，我忧其深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198117_comment'></div>二月丁酉，公择去化，厥明戊戌，公亦命驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198117_comment'></div>邦国殄瘁，诗人永怀，失二长者，我心险哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198117_comment'></div>我初知书，许以远器，馆我甥室，饮食教诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198117_comment'></div>道德文章，亲承讲画，有防有范，至今为则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198117_comment'></div>小人有亲，又有官箴，公丧不临，敛不抚衾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198117_comment'></div>溯风霣涕，亦陨我心，维当绝弦，以报知音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198117_comment'></div>平生斗酒，同此臭味，敬奠以文，其举斯觯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198117_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1198117'>枉：《豫章先生遗文》作「椎」，义更胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198117_comment'></div>椎谓质朴，《史记·周勃传》：「其椎少文如此」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1198117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1198117'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_1198117_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·别集》卷一三。又见《豫章先生遗文》卷六。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1198117_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　在汴京，作诗赠马忠玉。作品：寄忠玉提刑。<div id='poem_214727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214727?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄忠玉提刑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214727")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214727'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214727'>市骨蕲千里<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：真迹作收驵骏）</span>，量珠买娉婷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214727'>驽骀参逸驾，西子泣深屏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214727'>吾人材高秀，胸次列<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>渭泾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214727'>严能喜<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：真迹作宜）</span>剧部，持节按祥刑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214727'>萑蒲稍<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：真迹作颇）</span>衰息，郡县或空囹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214727'>读书头愈白，见士眼终<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：真迹作自）</span>青。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214727'>今时斤斧地，虚次待发硎。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214727'>早晚紫微禁<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：真迹作太微垣）</span>，占来有使星。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214727'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_214727_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214727'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_214727_0'>⑴ 原校：真迹作有山谷集作别</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214727_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　在汴京，见梅圣俞赠欧阳晦夫诗帖，有跋诗。作品：跋梅圣俞赠欧阳晦夫诗。<div id='poem_1197619' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197619' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197619?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋梅圣俞赠欧阳晦夫诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197619")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197619_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197619'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197619'>余三十年前，钦慕圣俞诗句之高妙，未及识面，而圣俞下世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197619_comment'></div>二十年前官于汝州叶县，闻欧阳君学诗于圣俞，又得赠行诗，而叶人能诵其诗，欧阳君已行，又不及识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197619_comment'></div>元祐己巳庚午，乃见欧阳君于京师，其人长鬣，眉目深沈，宜在丘壑中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197619_comment'></div>用圣俞之律，作诗数千篇，今世虽已不尚，而晦夫自信确然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197619_comment'></div>今当为掾龚州，待岁月于桂林里中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197619_comment'></div>桂林主人今甚好文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197619_comment'></div>晦夫行矣，往游幕府作嘉客，不独过家上冢为可乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197619_comment'></div>元祐五年正月二十一日，黄某题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197619_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月4日</a>　在汴京，与赵彦若、范祖禹等进《神宗实录》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月10日</a>　在汴京，晁补之在宿州舟中作诗，评黄庭坚之心性与品格。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月14日</a>　在汴京，因修史有功，诏为起居舍人，以韩川有言仍为著作佐郎。作品：辞免转官状。<div id='poem_1195828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免转官状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年3月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195828")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195828'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195828'>伏以先帝一朝大典，讫兹有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195828_comment'></div>宰司典领之功，近臣论撰之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195828_comment'></div>臣以曲学，滥与讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195828_comment'></div>以老母卧疾连年，告归之日过半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195828_comment'></div>常忧窃禄，不免罪诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195828_comment'></div>适及奏书，例沾爵赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195828_comment'></div>因人成事，义所未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195828_comment'></div>伏望圣慈，追寝误恩，所有告命，未敢祗受。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1195828_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年春</a>　在汴京，潘淳有书寄与山谷求教。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　在汴京，有数帖与王直方，指导其读书与考试。作品：与王立之承奉帖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年6月8日</a>　在汴京，《神宗实录》书成，山谷上书请以恩回授，特赠母寿光县太君为安康郡太君。作品：乞回授恩命状。<div id='poem_1195829' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195829' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195829?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞回授恩命状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年6月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195829")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195829_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195829'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195829'>昨以讨论无功，不敢祗受恩命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195829_comment'></div>准尚书省劄子，奉圣旨不许辞免者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195829_comment'></div>宠光下被，不敢终辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195829_comment'></div>窃有微诚，冒干国典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195829_comment'></div>伏念臣母寿光县太君李氏，今年七十二，垂老抱疾，幸见孝治之朝，沾及禄养；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195829_comment'></div>而臣误蒙简任，使收笔墨之勤，实出非常之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195829_comment'></div>不胜人子私情，愿以特授朝奉郎回授老母一郡封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195829_comment'></div>窃以在庭之臣，荣禄及亲者盖寡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195829_comment'></div>成书之赏，后来用例者难攀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195829_comment'></div>伏望圣慈，特赐开许。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1195829_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　在汴京，代母作祭女文。作品：母安康郡太君祭亡女陈氏十娘文。<div id='poem_1198113' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198113' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198113?labeling=true' target='_blank'>母安康郡太君祭亡女陈氏十娘文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198113")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198113_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198113'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198113'>汝嫁十年，五岁归处，姑章不呵，知我怜汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198113_comment'></div>我徂江南，三年摇摇，元丰甲子，汝兄还朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198113_comment'></div>道淮溯洛，望汝来宁，不闻车音，乃闻哭声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198113_comment'></div>汝疾何药，汝歛何服，临绝之情，不能我告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198113_comment'></div>哀怜至骨，哭泪至泉，我创如新，于今七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198113_comment'></div>乳母来归，婿亦继室，昔所抱儿，亦既结发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198113_comment'></div>惟汝面目，永隔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1198113", 1198113, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>枯木</span>，呜呼昊天，忍此荼毒！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198113_comment'></div>久于客土，勤我梦思，日月之吉，窀穸有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198113_comment'></div>我病在床，不能奋飞，寓奠千里，文不及哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198113_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1198113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1198113'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·正集》卷二九。又见傅校本《五百家播芳大全文粹》卷九九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1198113_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　在陈留净土院寓居，作品：题唐本兰亭。<div id='poem_1197502' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197502' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　在陈留净土院寓居，题蔡致君家庙堂碑。<div id='poem_1197327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197327?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题蔡致君家庙堂碑<span class='inlineComment2'>（致君名宝臣。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197327")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197327_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197327'>顷年观《庙堂碑》摹本，窃怪虞永兴名浮于实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197327_comment'></div>及见旧刻，乃知永兴得智永笔法为多，又知蔡君谟真行简札，能入永兴之室也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197327_comment'></div>元祐四年在中都，初见荣辑子雍家一本；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197327_comment'></div>绍圣元年在湖阴，又见张威福夷家一本；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197327_comment'></div>其十二月在陈留，又见蔡宝臣致君家一本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197327_comment'></div>以石本未刓缺，不以摹本补缀，则荣本第一，张本第二，蔡本第三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197327_comment'></div>亦尝于它处见数本，新旧杂揉，所谓「海图折波涛，旧绣移曲折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197327_comment'></div>天吴及紫凤，颠倒在裋褐」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197327_comment'></div>然尚有典刑，亦不可废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197327_comment'></div>陈留净土院书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1197327_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年12月27日</a>　贬涪州别驾，黔州安置。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年1月</a>　仍有宰臣章奏修《实录》不实，乞重加贬责，于是又被追夺一官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年1月</a>　离开陈留，赴黔州贬所；兄长吕大临亲送其赴贬所。<br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_2_214750'>俄有悲秋之羽虫兮，自伤时去物改，拥旧柯而孤吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214750'>四郊莽苍声断裂兮，久而不胜其叹音。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214750'>谓逝者有知兮，何喜而弃此去也。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214750'>谓逝无知兮，谁职为此梦也。<div id='poem_note_213687'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_213687_0'>⑴ 原校：分宁本云按㽦注，此诗别本多有不同，其诗云：重帘复幕夜萧萧，真感生怀不自聊。枕落梦魂飞蛱蝶，灯残风雨碎芭蕉。琼枝玉树埋黄土，衣笐妆台閟绛绡。故物尽能回白首，斯人无以永今朝。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213687_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　熙宁元年河北等地发生干旱、地震、洪水，本年灾民流向叶县，黄庭坚参加赈济、安置工作，有诗。作品：流民叹。次韵邵之才将流民过悬帛岭均田。<div id='poem_214676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>流民叹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214676'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214676'>朔方频年无好雨，五种不入虚春秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214676'>迩来后土中夜震，有似巨鳌复戴三山游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214676'>倾墙摧栋压老弱，冤声未定随洪流。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214676'>初来犹自得旷土，嗟尔后至将何怙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214676'>投胶盈掬俟河清，一箪岂能续民命。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_213884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_213884'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_213884_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1070')">1069-1070年</a>　叶县任上，有诗。作品：次韵答邵之才。饮南禅梅下戏题。次韵坦夫见惠长句。次韵裴仲谋同年。和裴仲谋雨中自石塘归。次韵裴尉过马鞍山。和仲谋夜中有感。漫书呈仲谋。登南禅寺怀裴仲谋。题苏才翁草书壁后。春近四绝句。漫尉。睡起二首。次韵春游别说道二首。寄别说道。陈说道约日送菜把。河舟晚饮呈陈说道。迎醇甫夫妇。题南寺王髯题名处。次韵任君官舍秋雨。题樊侯庙二首。送醇甫归蔡。将归叶先寄明复季常。次韵寄滑州舅氏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214658_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214658'>此时陈子乃弃我，归将索绹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>亟乘屋。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213663_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　为官时日尚少，却厌恶官场之心日增，有诗。作品：冲雪宿新寨忽忽不乐。<div id='poem_213556' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213556' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213556?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冲雪宿新寨忽忽不乐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213556")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213556_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213556'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213556'>县北县南何日了，又来新寨解征鞍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213556'>山衔斗柄三星没，雪共月明千里寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213556'>小吏有时须束带，故人颇问不休官。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213556'>江南长尽捎云竹，归及春风斩钓竿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213556'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213556_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213556'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_213556_0'>⑴ 按：本诗题下原有纂异，云眉州本及黄氏本作“一梦江南据马鞍，梦中投宿夜阑干。山衔斗柄三星没，雪共月明千里寒。俗学近知回首晚，病身全觉折腰难。江南长尽捎云竹，归及春风斩钓竿。”当系修改前的文字。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213556_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　叶县推行王安石农田水利法，改旱田为水田；山谷提出异议，对新法有所不满，有诗。作品：按田诗。<div id='poem_214582' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214582' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214582?labeling=true' target='_blank'>按田<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序（原注：熙宁四年叶县作。））</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214582")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214582_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214582'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214582'>河水积峥嵘，山雪晴索寞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214582'>幽斋怯寒威，况复出城郭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214582'>马为猬毛缩，人叹狐裘薄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214582'>淤泥虎迹交，丛社乌声乐。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214582'>桥经野烧断，崖值天风落。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214582'>泄云迷鸿濛，戴石瘦荦峃<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：音壳。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214582'>新民数十家，飘寓初栖托。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214582'>壮产无惰农，荒榛尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_214582", 214582, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>开凿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214582'>临流遣官丁，悉使呼老弱。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214582'>恩言谕官意，鄣水陂可作。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214582'>春秧百顷毬，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_13_214582'>掉头笑应侬，吾麦自不恶。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214582'>麦苗不为稻，诚恐非民瘼。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214582'>不知肉食者，何必苦改作。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214582'>我行疲鞍马，且用休羁络。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214582'>艰难相顾叹，共道折腰错。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214582'>势穷不得已，来自取束缚。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214582'>月明夜萧萧，解衣宽带索。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214582'>卧看云行天，北斗挂屋角。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214582'>析薪爨酒鼎，兴至且相酌。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214582'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_214582_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　本年终叶县任，曾赴洛阳候调官职，有诗。作品：予既不得叶遂过洛滨醉游累日。<div id='poem_213516' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213516' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213516?labeling=true' target='_blank'>予既不得叶遂过洛滨醉游累日<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：熙宁四年叶县作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213516")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213516_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213516'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213516'>瘿民见我亦悠悠，瘿木累累满道周。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213516'>飞舄已随王令化，真龙宁为叶公留。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213516'>未<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作不）</span>能洗耳箕山去，且复吹笙洛浦游。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213516'>舍故趋新归有分，令人何处欲藏舟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213516'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213516_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　叶县任上，有诗。作品：春雪呈张仲谋。次韵元礼春怀十首。再和元礼春怀十首。次韵答蒲元礼病起。送蒲元礼南归。寄季张。戏赠陈季张。赋陈季张北轩杏花。从陈季张求竹竿引水入厨。题季张竹林村。陈氏园咏竹。张仲谋家堂前酴醾委地。和答登封王晦之登楼见寄。送邓慎思归长沙觐省。寄顿二主簿时在县界首部夫凿石塘河。戏寄顿二主簿不置酒。春思。与人观俳优。同孙不愚过昆阳。和答孙不愚见赠。孙不愚引开元故事请为移春槛因而赠答。送陈氏女弟至石塘河。睡起。书睢阳事后。呈李卿。赠陈公益并序。戏答陈公益春思二首。送焦浚明。杂诗。饮韩三家醉后始知夜雨。行迈杂篇六首。去贤斋。还家呈伯氏。夏日梦伯兄寄江南。送张子列茶。谢张仲谋端午送巧作。食瓜有感。行役县西喜雨寄任公渐大夫。次韵任公渐感梅花十五韵。晓从任大夫祖行过石桥寄粹甫。雨晴过石塘河留宿赠大中供奉。戏赠潘供奉。答王晦之见寄。戏赠王晦之。送陈季常归洛。次韵时进叔二十六韵。薛乐道自南阳来入都留宿会饮作诗饯行。次韵答薛乐道。孙不愚索饮九日酒已尽戏答一篇。辱粹道兄弟寄书久不作报以长句谢不敏。陈季张有蜀芙蓉长饮客至开辄剪去作诗戏之。再赠陈季张拒霜花二首。蒲城道中寄怀伯氏。次韵伯氏谢安石塘莲花酒。次韵伯氏戏赠韩正翁菊花开时家有美酒。谢仲谋示新诗。再和答张仲谋陈纯益兄弟。送张仲谋。寄张仲谋。寄别陈氏妹。戏招饮客解酲。答阎求仁。拟君子法天运。答龙门潘秀才见寄。客自潭府来称明因寺僧作静照堂求予作。题双凫观。送陈萧县。<div id='poem_213773' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213773' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213773?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春雪呈张仲谋<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：熙宁四年叶县作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_213773'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213773'>暮雪霏霏若撒盐，须知千陇麦纤纤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213773_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214927'>心随出处乐，性与寂寞超。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214927'>安安而雅雅，不以行险徼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214927'>王良驭骥子，冉弱六辔调。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214927'>自吾与之游，忘味如闻韶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214927'>志道斯近神，庄生说承蜩。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214927'>顾恐陈子止，谁能中道要。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214927'>我求一饭饱，黄绶强折腰。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214927'>取舍不由己，悲哉马衔镳。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214927'>长啸天地閒，搔首独无聊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214927'>雅约青山云，伊人与逍遥。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214927'>有如渝此盟，白日尚昭昭。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214927'>平时多英豪，楚楚在本朝。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214927'>吾徒固长物，分当老箪瓢。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214927_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214134'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214134'>能狂直须狂，会意自不恶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214134'>蚤知筋力衰，此事属先觉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214134'>公诗应钟律，岂异赵人铎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214134'>我为折腰吏，王役政敦薄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214134'>文移乱似麻，期会急如雹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214134'>赋敛及逋逃，十九被木索。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214134'>公思当此时，清兴何由作。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214134'>前日东山归，花如萎莎落。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214134'>径欲共公狂，知命知此乐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214134'>公家胡蜀葵，虽晚尚隐约。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214134'>晴明好天气，暂对亦惬适。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214134'>妆恨朱粉轻，舞怜衫袖窄。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214134'>衣襦相补纫，天吴乱鸂鶒。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214134'>草茅多奇士，蓬荜有秀色。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214134'>西施逐人眼，称心最为得。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214134'>食鱼诚可口，何苦必鲂鲫。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214134'>清狂力能否，人生天地客。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214134'>不者尚能来，南窗理尘迹。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214134'>草玄续周书，揲策定汉历。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214134'>有意许见临，为公酤一石。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214134'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_214134_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214133' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214133?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214133'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214133'>昔人有真意，政在无美恶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214133'>微言见端绪，垂手延后觉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214133'>大声久辍响，谁继夫子铎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214133'>长笑二南閒，斯道公不薄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214133'>性怀如佩环，诗笔若陨雹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214133'>前篇戏调公，深井下短索。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214133'>子云最清净<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作静）</span>，亦动解嘲作。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214133'>光尘贵和同，玉石尚磊落。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214133'>众人开眼眠，公独寤此乐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214133'>昔在西宫游，初非朝夕约。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214133'>邂逅二三子，蛾眉能劝客。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214133'>坐嫌席閒疏，酒恨盏底窄。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214133'>骊驹我先返，看朱已成碧。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214133'>况闻公等醉，歌舞恣所索<span class='inlineComment2'>（索字重韵）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214133'>舞馀必缠头，歌罢皆举白。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214133'>清狂稍稍出，应节自不错。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214133'>譬如观俳优，谁能不一噱。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214133'>何为苦解纷，乃似自立敌。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214133'>人生忽远行，车马无归迹。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214133'>黄粱一炊顷，梦尽百年历。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214133'>弃置勿重陈，虚心待三益。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214133_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214133'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_214133_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214655' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214655' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214655?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送焦浚明<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：熙宁四年叶县作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214655")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214655_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214655'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214655'>西瞻岷山兮东望峨眉，锦江清且涟漪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214655'>地灵山秀诞豪杰，来入中州振羽仪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214655'>相如傲万物，子云穷一经。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214655'>黄金卖赋聘私室，白头大夫不公卿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214655'>穷阎卜肆閒，十步一豪英。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214655'>竟无人识李仲元，不可屈致严君平。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214655'>四君德音闭黄壤，只今垄头松柏声。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214655'>我住叶公城，常如井底坐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214655'>不谓焦夫子，闻风肯来过。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214655'>焦子初见我，如兰生幽林。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214655'>春风为披拂，始得香满襟。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214655'>中怀坦夷眉宇静，外慕淡薄天机深。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214655'>花开鸟啼昼寂寂，酒阑烛明夜沈沈。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214655'>人皆扶牵烂漫醉，子更把书求本心。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214655'>二年与灯火，琢子之玉鍊我金。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214655'>焦夫子，我以陋邦无人把书策，邂逅逢君得三益。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214655'>胡为弃我忽远行，手捧嘉阳从事檄。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214655'>焦夫子，君起为我舞，我其为君歌。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214655'>君方跨马涉远道，湖外地少山川多。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214655'>霜秋摇落天日远，西风翻翻水惊波。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214655'>一筵谈笑遂相失，两地离愁各奈何。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214655'>焦夫子，酒行君定起。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214655'>此杯须百分，少别遂万里。<div id='poem_sentence_22_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_214655'>归寻所种树，应已数千尺。<div id='poem_sentence_23_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_214655'>试照嘉阳水，君发犹未白。<div id='poem_sentence_24_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_214655'>古人不朽事，所愿更勉力。<div id='poem_sentence_25_214655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214717'>叔子从天东，忽与同姓别。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214717'>引襟满眼泪，回首寸心折。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214717'>母氏孝且慈，爱养数毛发。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214717'>诸儿恩至均，如指孰可龁。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214717'>我开<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作闻）</span>贤女传，须己为汝说。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214717'>男儿何有哉，今壮而善耋。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214717'>逢时秉钧轴，邂逅把旄钺。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214717'>富贵多祸忧，朋党相媒糵。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214717'>等之彀中游，巧者未如拙。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214717'>勿以贫贱故，事人不尽节。<div id='poem_sentence_22_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_214717'>母仪尊圣善，妇道尚曲折。<div id='poem_sentence_23_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_214717'>葛生晚萋萋，絺绤代裘褐。<div id='poem_sentence_24_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_214717'>女工既有馀，枕簟清烦暍。<div id='poem_sentence_25_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_214717'>谁言淮蔡远，曾不以日月。<div id='poem_sentence_26_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_214717'>皇皇太史笔，期汝书英烈。<div id='poem_sentence_29_214717_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213027'>高阳社里如相访，不用闲携恶客来<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_note_213027'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_213027_0'>⑴ 自注：不饮者为恶客，见《元次山集》。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213027_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答阎求仁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span "poem_title_214802")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214802_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_214802_0'>① 按：《年谱》编入熙宁四年叶县作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214802'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214802'>暮天携手步河梁，把酒淹留斜日光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214802'>生当有别各异方，古人嗟此乐难当。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214802'>大梁嬉游少年场，春风花枝啭鹂黄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214802'>节物谢徂岁渠央，来自江南登君堂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214802'>秋气欲动闻寒螀，会几何日今别长。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214802'>与子观化言两忘，浩歌放船入莽苍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214802'>绿藻刺眼红蕖香，湖月夜飞衣袂凉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214802'>相从宴坐歌胡床，赠言锦绣邀报章。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214802'>君心温良志则刚，不能牛下学歌商。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214802'>欲谢世纷自翱翔，果行此策无乃良。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214802'>昔人所学浩渺茫，海涵地负无抵当。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214802'>弃捐其人及秕糠，帝王之功一豪芒。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214802'>既趋世故自遐遑<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作边，据山谷集改）</span>，何异臧谷俱亡羊。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214802'>以生随之中道伤，止吾已知终必亡。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214802'>我亦闻之未能行，慨今无策可伏藏。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214802'>身随衣食叶南阳，脱身自当及康强。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214802_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214802'>不待齿疏发苍浪，优游濠上如惠庄，论交莫逆与子相。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_214375'>提提无近功，成岁乃可知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214375'>明窥秋毫端，耳察穴蚁争。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214375'>群材极为力，阴拱收视听。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214375'>细人趋眼前，翻手覆手閒。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 按：《年谱》编入熙宁四年叶县作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214643'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214643'>欲留君以陈遵投辖之饮，不如送君以陶令无弦之琴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214643'>酒嫌别后风吹醒，琴为无弦方见心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214643'>去夏雨馀清夜醉，黄鹂不觉报春深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214643'>花枝柳色竞鲜好，乃是前日枯朽林。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214643'>人生用舍四时可，壮士憔悴非独今。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214643'>大夫黄绶领垂素，二十馀年走尘土。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214643'>盈车载书遣儿读，不悔早为文墨误。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214643'>治声翕然先向东，古萧子国今万户。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214643'>德性忠纯吏不欺，闺门孝友民所慕。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214643'>麦陇童儿怜雉乳，冰天穷子兼襦裤。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214643'>愔愔琴意如温风，乃知不必徽弦具。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214643'>明月清河佳可游，官仓縻我不得去。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214643'>白露为霜水一篙，秋香莲荡浮轻舠。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214643'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_214643_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　叶县任上，有诗赠答孔武仲。作品：和答孔常父见寄。<div id='poem_213841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213841?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答和孔常父见寄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213841")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_content_213841'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213841'>孔氏文章冠古今，君家兄弟况南金。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213841'>为官落魄人谁问，从骑雍容独见寻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213841'>旅馆别时无宿酒，邮筒开处得新吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213841'>黄山依旧寒相对，岂有愁思附七林<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213841'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213841'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_213841_0'>⑴ 自注：傅子集古今事号《七林》，来诗云黄公山下官悰冷，应有新吟续七哀。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213841_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　叶县任上，有诗。作品：戏咏江南土风。十月十五早饭清都观逍遥堂。伤歌行四首。弈棋二首呈任公渐。谢晓纯送衲袜。思贤。雪中连日行役戏书简同僚。宿黄山。送苏太祝归石城。雪后登南禅茅亭简张仲谋二首。寄张仲谋次韵。次韵奉和仲谟夜话唐史。张仲谟送河鲤未至戏督以诗。答张仲谟泛舟之诗。戏书效乐天。余成诗。观崇德君墨竹歌。听崇德君鼓琴。酌姨母崇德君寿酒。致政王殿丞逍遥亭。送杜子卿归西淮。新寨饯南归客。郭明父作西斋于颍尾请予赋诗二首。呈王明复陈季张。过平舆怀李子先时在并州。即席。舟子并序。晓起临汝。离汝寄张子。劝交代张和父酒。<div id='poem_213565' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213565' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213565?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戏咏江南土风</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213565")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213565_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213565'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213565'>十月江南未得霜，高林残水下寒塘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213565'>饭香<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_213565", 213565, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>猎户</span>分熊白，酒熟渔家擘蟹黄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213565'>橘摘金苞随驿使，禾舂玉粒送官仓。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213565'>踏歌夜结田神社，游女多随陌上郎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213565'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213565_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_212886' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_212886' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/212886?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十月十五早饭清都观逍遥堂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", id='poem_sentence_8_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214689'>天之苍苍非正色，道真微妙安可得。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment2'>（原误作文）</span>人春秋诚未高，视听聪明齿牙牢。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214689'>所为淳拙有深越，持置酷似巨山陶。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214689'>平生刚直折不得，目送飞鸿向宾客。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214689'>早束衣冠林底眠，非关暮年俗眼白。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214689'>种田百亩初为酒，买地一区今有宅。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214689'>家人岁计不婴心，两儿长不能措画。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214689'>迩来信己不问天，万事逍遥只眼前。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214689'>何必读书始晓事，此翁暗合庄生意。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214840'>夜寒置酒送归客，长歌燕雁灯前落。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214840'>故园无书已十月，目极千里云水隔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214840'>客方有行乃未已，归且经予江上宅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214840'>比邻诸老应相问，为道于今不如昔。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214840'>新知翻手覆手閒，故人江南与江北。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214840'>有时日高天气清，炙背南轩把书策。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214840'>辞家上马不反顾，谈笑据鞍似无敌。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214840'>春<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作早）</span>晚归来踯躅间，为公置酒临江阁。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214674'>清风荡初日，乔木啭幽韵。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214355' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214355?labeling=true' target='_blank'>过百里大夫冢<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：熙宁四年叶县作。）</span></a><span
