-----title
大名
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ccead7f21c1843869f160ab5547f020d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ccead7f21c1843869f160ab5547f020d");'><span id='ccead7f21c1843869f160ab5547f020d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1079')">1072-1079年</a>，28-35岁</div><div id='ccead7f21c1843869f160ab5547f020d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　参加四京学官考试，名列优等，除北京国子监教授。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　教授北京国子监，有文。作品：论语断篇。孟子断篇。庄子内篇论。<div id='poem_1197685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197685?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论语断篇</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197685")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197685_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197685'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197685'>《论语》一书，孔子之门人亲受圣言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197685_comment'></div>虽经秦事，编简断缺，然而文章条理，可疑者少，由汉以来，师承不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197685_comment'></div>比诸传记，最有依据，可以考六经之同异，證诸子之是非，学者所当尽心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197685_comment'></div>夫趋名者于朝，趋利者于市，观义理者于其会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197685_comment'></div>《论语》者，义理之会也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197685_comment'></div>凡学者之于孔氏，有如问仁，有如问孝、问政、问君子者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197685_comment'></div>所问非有更端，而所对每不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197685_comment'></div>盖圣人之于教人，善尽其材，视其学术之弊，性习之偏，息黥补劓之功深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197685_comment'></div>古之言者，天下殊涂而同归，百虑而一致，学者傥不善于领会，恐于义理终不近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197685_comment'></div>近世学士大夫，知好此书者已众，然宿学者尽心，故多自得；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197685_comment'></div>晚学者因人，故多不尽心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197685_comment'></div>不尽其心，故使章分句解，晓析诂训，不能心通性达，终无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197685_comment'></div>荀卿曰：「善学者通伦类」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197685_comment'></div>盖闻一而知一，此晚学者之病也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197685_comment'></div>闻一以知二，固可以谓之善学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197685_comment'></div>由此以进，智可至于闻一知十；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197685_comment'></div>由此以进，智可至于一以贯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197685_comment'></div>一以贯之，圣人之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197685_comment'></div>由学者之门地，至圣人之奥室，其涂虽长大，然亦不过事事反求诸己，忠信笃实，不敢自欺，所行不敢后其所闻，所言不敢过其所行，每鞭其后，积自得之功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197685_comment'></div>夫不仕无义也，子使漆雕开仕，对「吾斯之未能信」，而孔子说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197685_comment'></div>盖漆雕开在圣人之门，闻义虽甚高，至于反身以自诚，则未能笃信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197685_comment'></div>其心未能笃信，则事至而不能无惑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197685_comment'></div>以不能无惑之心，适事而欲应变曲当，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197685_comment'></div>此漆雕开所以不愿仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197685_comment'></div>先王制礼，行道之人，皆有三年之爱于其父母，而宰予欲于期祥之中食稻衣锦，引天下至薄之行，自以为安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197685_comment'></div>渐渍孝弟之说不为不久，岂其无所忌惮，吐不仁之言至于如此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1197685_comment'></div>盖若宰予者，其先受之质薄，自其至诚内观，实见三年为哀已忘，而强勉为之者，将欲加厚其质，而不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1197685_comment'></div>故不敢少自隐匿，方求孔子之至言，以洗雪其邪心，以穷受薄之地，不暇恤人之议己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1197685_comment'></div>岂其不仁者欲见于一时之言，而近仁者将载于终身之行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1197685_comment'></div>古之学者所自得于内，而不恤其外，凡如此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1197685_comment'></div>此所以有讲有学，有朋友切磨，以相发明，非为文章可传后世，辩论可屈众人而发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1197685_comment'></div>其所闻于师，与自得于心者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1197685_comment'></div>方其学于师也，不敢听以耳，而听之以心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1197685_comment'></div>于其反诸身也，不敢求诸外，而求之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1197685_comment'></div>故乐与诸君讲学，以求养心寡过之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1197685_comment'></div>士勇之不作久矣，同与诸君勉之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1197685_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1197686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197686?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孟子断篇</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197686")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197686_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197686'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197686'>由孔子以来，求其是非趋舍，与孔子合者，唯孟子一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197686_comment'></div>孟子，圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197686_comment'></div>荀卿著书，号为祖述孔氏，而诋訾孟子，以为略法三王，而不知其统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197686_comment'></div>盖荀卿见孟子道性善，言必称尧舜，义不见诸侯，其迹与孔子不合，故云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197686_comment'></div>曾不知前圣、后圣，所谓若合符节者，要于归洁其身者观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197686_comment'></div>孟子论孔子去鲁，不知者以为为肉，其知者以为为无礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197686_comment'></div>乃若孔子，则欲以微罪行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197686_comment'></div>以微罪行，此圣人之忠厚，非孟子不足以知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197686_comment'></div>学者欲知孟子，率以是观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197686_comment'></div>其智不足以知孟子，安能知孔子？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197686_comment'></div>然则荀卿所谓知孔子者，特未可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197686_comment'></div>圣人无名，而淳于髡以名实求孟子，固不足以知之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197686_comment'></div>荀卿曾未能远过淳于髡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197686_comment'></div>扬子云曰：「孟子勇于义，而果于德，知言之要，知德之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197686_comment'></div>非苟知之，亦允蹈之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197686_comment'></div>言虽不多，以子云之言行反覆考之，足以发子云之知言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197686_comment'></div>司马迁号称博极群书，至而论伊尹、百里奚，皆不信孟子，此所以得罪于子云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197686_comment'></div>由孔子以来，力学者多矣，而才有扬雄，来者岂可不勉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197686_comment'></div>方将讲明养心治性之理，与诸君共学之，惟勉思古人所以任己者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1197686_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1197687' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197687' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197687?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庄子内篇论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197687")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197687_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197687'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197687'>庄周内书七篇，法度甚严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197687_comment'></div>彼鹍鹏之大，鸠鴳之细，均为有累于物而不能逍遥，唯体道者乃能逍遥耳，故作《逍遥游》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197687_comment'></div>物之不齐，物之情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197687_comment'></div>大块噫气，万窍殊声，吾是以见万物之情状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197687_comment'></div>俗学者心窥券外之有，企尚而思齐，道之不著，论不明也，故作《齐物论》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197687_comment'></div>生生之厚动而之死地，立于羿之彀中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197687_comment'></div>其中也，因论以为命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197687_comment'></div>其不中也，因论以为智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197687_comment'></div>养生者谢养生，而养其生之主，几乎无死地矣，故作《养生主》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197687_comment'></div>上下四方，古者谓之宇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197687_comment'></div>往来不穷，古者谓之宙，以宇观人间，以宙观世，而我无所依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197687_comment'></div>彼推也故去，挽也故来，以德业与彼有者，而我常以不材，故作《人间世》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197687_comment'></div>有德者之验如印印泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197687_comment'></div>射至百步，力也，射中百步，巧也，箭锋相直，岂巧力之谓哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197687_comment'></div>子得其母，不取于人而自信，故作《德充符》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197687_comment'></div>族则有宗，物则有师，可以为众父者，不可以为众父父，故作《大宗师》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197687_comment'></div>尧舜出而应帝，汤武出而应王，彼求我以是，与我此名，彼俗学者因以尘埃秕糠，据见四子，故作《应帝王》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197687_comment'></div>二十六篇者，解剥斯文尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197687_comment'></div>由庄周以来，未见赏音者，晚得向秀、郭象，陷庄周为齐物之书，涽涽以至今，悲夫！</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1197687_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　苏轼在湖州孙觉处见到黄庭坚诗，耸然异之，以为山谷必轻外物而自重者。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　教授北京国子监，有诗。作品：次韵景珍酴醾。以金沙酴醾送公寿。寄怀公寿。道中寄公寿。道中寄景珍兼简庾元镇。景珍太傅见示旧唱和蒲萄诗因而次韵。宋景瞻分题汴上行。<div id='poem_213674' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213674' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213674?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵景珍酴醾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213988?labeling=true' target='_blank'>六月闵雨<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：熙宁七年北京作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_213988_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213988'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213988'>汤帝咨嗟惩六事，汉庭灾异劾三公。<div "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>鬓颜</span>飒然凋。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214504'>道德千古事，斯文非一朝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214504'>往者我不及，后生多见超。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214504'>吾党二三子，士林耸孤标。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214504'>小谢抱周易，忘言独参寥。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214504'>崔郎楚左史，二典考舜尧。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214504'>安知摴蒱局，临关败三枭。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214504'>问之忧菽水，心虑极无聊。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214504'>古来有亲养，回也乐一瓢。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214504'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_214504_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　任北京学官，酬赠王迥。作品：次韵子高即事。次韵谢子高读渊明传。<div id='poem_213579' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213579' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_213579_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213579'>青云自致屠龙学，白首同归种树书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213579_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214304_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214304'>袖中正有南风手，谁为听之谁为传。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214304_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　任北京学官，与王纯亮有诗唱和。作品：奉和王世弼寄上七兄先生用其韵。<div id='poem_214480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和王世弼寄上七兄先生用其韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_214480'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214480'>宫槐弄黄黄，莲叶绿婉婉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214480'>时同二三友，竹轩凉夏晚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214480'>驾言都城南，以望征车返。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214480'>何知苦淹回，及此秋景短。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214480'>愁思令人瘦，举目道路远。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214480'>西风脱一叶，荐士闻乡选。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214480'>简书催渡河，宾客不得展。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214480'>亲忧对萱丛，妇病废巾盥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214480'>言趋厌次城，鞭马倦长阪。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214480'>异乡怀节物，不共斟酒盏。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214480'>纷争一日事，声实溷端窾。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_214480'>小材渠<span class='inlineComment2'>（影元本作时）</span>困我，持斲问轮扁<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：复用此一韵，事异似不害。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_35_214480_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_214480'>斋馀佛饭香，茶沸甘露满。<div id='poem_sentence_42_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_214480'>岂闻任方物，包贡遗羽簳。<div id='poem_sentence_71_214480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_72_214480'>招车必翘翘，前席思謇謇。<div id='poem_title_214404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214404'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214404'>一年中秋最明月，也照贫家门户来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214404'>清光适从人意满，壶觞政为诗社开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214404'>秋空高明万物静，此时乃见天地性。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214404'>广文官舍非吏曹，况得数子发嘉兴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214404'>千古风流有诗在，百忧坐忘知酒圣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214404'>王甥俊气横九州，樽前为予商声讴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214404'>离宫殿阁碍飞鸟，霸业池台连秃鹙。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214404'>我于人閒触事懒，身世江湖一白鸥。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214404'>空馀诗酒兴不浅，尚能呻吟卧糟邱。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214404'>偶然青衫五斗米，夺去黄柑千户侯。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214404'>江山于人端有助，君不见至今宋玉传悲秋。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214404'>期君异时明月夜，把酒岳阳黄鹤楼。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214404'></div><div 原注：文伯字去华，公之婿李楶德素之子，虽纳婿在后，而公与龙眠李氏为素交。按：《年谱》编入熙宁八年北京作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213735'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213735'>团扇如明月，动摇微风兴。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夜观蜀志<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：熙宁八年北京作。）</span></a><span id='poem_214354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观道二篇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span id='poem_title_214354_0'>① 按：《年谱》编入熙宁八年北京作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214354'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214354'>圣人用仁心，恻伤路傍儿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214354'>虎狼舐吻血，自哺胃与肌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214354'>同在天地閒，六凿相识知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214354'>父母临万物，大道甚坦夷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214354'>百年修不善，一日许知非。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214354'>虎狼有悛心，还与圣人齐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214354'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_214354_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214353?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214353'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214353'>廉蔺向千载，凛凛若生者。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214353'>曹李虽无恙，如沈九泉下。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214353'>短长略百年，共是过隙马。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214353'>事来磨其锋，意气要倾泻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214353'>风云灭须臾，草木但春夏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214353'>唯此一物灵，不可藉外假。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214353'>誉髦天下才，西伯本心化。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214353'>君无诮斯文，可以观大雅。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214353'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_214353_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西禅听戴道士弹琴<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：熙宁八年北京作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214340")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214340'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214340'>灵宫苍烟荫老柏，风吹霜空月生魄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214340'>群鸟得巢寒夜静，市井收声虚室白。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214340'>少年抱琴为予来，乃是天台桃源未归客。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214340'>危冠匡坐如无傍，弄弦铿铿灯烛光。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214340'>谁言伯牙绝弦钟期死，泰山峨峨水汤汤。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214340'>春天百鸟语撩乱，风荡杨花无畔岸。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214340'>微阴愁猿抱山木，玄冬孤鸿度云汉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214340'>斧斤丁丁空谷樵，幽泉落涧夜萧萧。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214340'>十二峰前巫峡雨，七八月后钱塘潮。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214340'>孝子流离在中野，羁臣归来哭亡社。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214340'>空床思妇感蟏蛸，暮年遗老依桑柘。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214340'>人言此曲不堪听，我怜酷解写人情。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214340'>悲歌浩叹弦欲断，翻作恬淡雍容声。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214340'>五弦横坐岩廊静，薰风南天厚民性。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214340'>人言帝力何有哉，凤凰麒麟舞虞咏。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214340'>我思五代如探汤，真人指挥定四方。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214340'>昭陵仁心及虫蚁，百蛮九译觇天光。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214340'>极知功高乐未称，谁能持此献乐正。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214340'>贱臣疏远安敢言，且欲空江寒滩静。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214340'>渔艇幽人知我心悠哉，更作严陵在钓台。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214340_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214340'>吾知之矣师且止，安得长竿入手来。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　留任北京学官，有诗赠文彦博。作品：二月丁卯喜雨吴体为北门留守文潞公作。<div id='poem_213506' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213506' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213506?labeling=true' target='_blank'>二月丁卯喜雨吴体为北门留守文潞公作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213506")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213506_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213506'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213506'>乘舆斋祭甘泉宫，遣使骏奔河岳中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，润物无声春有功。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213506'>三十馀年霖雨手，淹留河外作时丰。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李右司以诗送梅花至潞公予虽不接右司想见其人用老杜和元次山诗例次韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213176")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213176'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213176'>凡花俗草败人意，晚见琼蕤不恨迟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213176'>江左风流尚如此，春功终到岁寒枝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>　留任北京学官，有题诗。作品：题文潞公黄河议后。<div id='poem_213437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题文潞公黄河议后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213437")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213437'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213437'>澶渊不作渡河梁，由是中原府库疮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213437'>白首丹心一元老，归来高枕梦河隍<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作湟）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213437'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　留任北京学官，女儿黄睦出生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　留任北京学官，友人王肱卒，作墓志铭。作品：王力道墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198020' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198020' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198020?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王力道墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198020")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198020_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198020'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198020'>吾友力道，讳肱，王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198020_comment'></div>盖琅琊临沂诸王，在齐不远迁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198020_comment'></div>其世家序列，史官文献相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198020_comment'></div>有讳某者，于其乡有德，没而其配崔夫人与门人子弟诔其行曰「恭睦先生」，是为君考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198020_comment'></div>庭坚童子时，与力道游，是时恭睦先生尚无恙，得入拜崔夫人于堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198020_comment'></div>以两孺子同学问相爱，故两家亲亦相爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198020_comment'></div>力道长予二岁，而少成独立，无儿子气，食饮卧起，与书史笔墨俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198020_comment'></div>后七年，比岁以乡举士俱集京师，甲辰、丁未岁相从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198020_comment'></div>力道此时律身甚严，而与人极恺悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198020_comment'></div>于书无不观，而尤喜《易》、《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198020_comment'></div>文章初不经意，睥睨左右，下笔娓娓不休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198020_comment'></div>熙宁癸酉，邂逅夜语于西平客舍，谨厚而文，甄叙人物有理致，予知其在困而不掩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198020_comment'></div>又二年，客自齐来，乃言力道与往时大异，沈浮闾井间，得酒不择处所，遇屠贩如衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198020_comment'></div>爱之者以为似毕茂世、光孟祖之为人，而力道自言与二子异，人亦无以命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198020_comment'></div>或谓力道穷不偶怼，故自放于酒中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198020_comment'></div>吾以为力道智及此，殆不尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198020_comment'></div>如是三年，终以酒死，得年三十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198020_comment'></div>无子，有遗文未辑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198020_comment'></div>夫人张氏犹尸其祭，既祥，张氏又卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198020_comment'></div>于是崔夫人七十馀岁矣，哭之甚哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198020_comment'></div>力道之兄抚州军事推官，将举恭睦之丧兆于临朐之龙泉，而葬力道于其域，谋曰：「知吾弟者，莫若吾友临川晏叔原几道、豫章黄鲁直庭坚，将请叔原叙其文，而属鲁直铭其墓」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198020_comment'></div>则以状来，庭坚其可不铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198020_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1198020'>呜呼力道，壮长如其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198020_comment'></div>慈孝弟友，材则多有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198020_comment'></div>培德以自厚，不昌其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198020_comment'></div>壮士溺于酒，万世同流，今也何咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198020_comment'></div>我图作铭，或慰其母兄，维金石之寿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1198020_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，曾至邓州，与谢师厚有诗唱和。作品：和师厚接花。和师厚栽竹。和韵师厚萱草。和韵师厚雨中昼寝忆江南饼曲酒。和师厚郊居示里中诸君。和答师厚黄连桥坏大木亦为秋雹所碎之作。<div id='poem_214411' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_6_214450'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_214450_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，曾至邓州，由邓返回北京时，路过邺王台，与赠朱贶诗。作品：送朱贶中允宰宋城。<div id='poem_214630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送朱贶中允宰宋城<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰元年北京作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214630")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214630'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214630'>邺王台边春一空，但有雪飞杨柳风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214630'>我从南阳解归橐，重帘复幕坐学宫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214630'>酒材苦责公酿薄，欲经醉乡无路通。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214630'>奈何当此意绪恶，僚友决去如飞鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214630'>朱侯官居邺城下，不脱辔衔秣征马。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214630'>绿槐阴阴门对街，唯我知君少闲暇。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214630'>新从天上拜书回，去效割鸡宋之野。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214630'>宋城万家有和气，明府岂弟心倾写。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214630'>愧君乞言极忠厚，安得琼瑶赠盈把。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214630'>古来为县有盛名，不过<sup class='reference id='poem_sentence_12_214630'>岂如规摹跨三代，首听官师困鳏寡。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214630'>簿书期会<sup class='reference id='poem_sentence_14_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214630'>权衡此心坐堂奥，草木遂生虫蚁化。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 原作遛，据山谷集改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_214630_0'>⑵ 山谷集作期会簿书</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214630_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，有诗。作品：和外舅夙兴三首。次韵谢外舅病不能拜复官夏雨眠起之什。次韵外舅谢师厚病间十首。次韵奉送公定。和外舅夙兴三首。和公定河朔漫成八首。次韵谢公定王世弼赠答二绝句。次韵公定世弼登北都东楼四首。和谢公定征南谣。<div id='poem_213729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和外舅夙兴三首<span class='inlineComment2'>（寓大云寺作）</span><span id='poem_title_214209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214209?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214209'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214209'>民生自煎熬，煮豆以萁爨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214209'>居然忘本根，光阴不供玩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214209'>藏山夜半失，乌合归星散。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214209'>因病见不生，达人果大观。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214209'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214209_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214208?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214208'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214208'>开田种白玉，饱牛事耕犁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214208'>雨露非无泽，得秋常苦迟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214208'>猛虎擅文章，斑斑被诸儿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214208'>长松抱劲节，惟有岁寒知。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214208'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214208_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214207' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214207?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214207_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214207'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214207'>谢公莳兰苕，真意付此物。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214207_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214207'>惠然风肯来，香为一披拂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214207_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214207'>遥知醉吟姿，黾勉向朱绂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214207_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214207'>支筇橘柚黄，僧屋对像佛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214207_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214207'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214207_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214206?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214206'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214206'>身病心轻安，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_214206", 214206, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>道肥</span>体癯瘦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214206'>好怀当告谁，四墙枣红皱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214206'>负暄不可献，扪虱坐清昼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214206'>端有真富贵，千秋万年后<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《山谷外集诗注》卷三）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214206_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214206'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214206_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214246' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214246' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214246?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵奉送公定<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214246")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214246_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_214246_0'>① 原注：谢师厚二子，愔字公静，悰字公定。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214246'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214246'>去年君渡河，枣下实离离。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214246'>今年君渡河，剥枣咏豳诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214246'>直缘恩义重，不惮鞍马疲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214246'>诗书半行李，道路费岁时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214246'>亲交叹存亡<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作殁）</span>，学问访阙遗。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214246'>我多后时悔，君亦见事迟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214246'>即此有真意，定非儿女知。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214246'>虚名无用处，北斗与南箕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214246'>燕赵游侠子，长安轻薄儿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214246'>狂掉三寸舌，躐登九级墀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214246'>覆手云雨翻，立谈光阴移。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214246'>歃血盟父子，指天出肝脾。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214246'>从来国器重，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_214246", 214246, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>见谓</span>骨相奇。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214246'>筑岩发梦寐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_214246", 214246, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>猎渭</span>非熊螭。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214246'>百工改绳墨，一世擅文词。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214246'>全人脰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_214246", 214246, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>肩肩</span>，瓮盎妩且宜。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214246'>大槐阴黄庭，女萝绵络之。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214246'>昭阳两兄弟，还自妒蛾眉。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214246'>工颦又宜笑，百辈来茹咨。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214246'>班姬轻鸿毛，更合众口吹。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214246'>引绳痛排拫<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：音痕。）</span>，蒙蔽枉成帷。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214246'>惟恐出己上，杀之如弈棋。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214246'>尘埃百年琴，绝弦为钟期。<div id='poem_sentence_22_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_214246'>落落虎豹文，义难管中窥。<div id='poem_sentence_23_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_214246'>至今扬子云，不与俗谐嬉。<div id='poem_sentence_24_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_214246'>岁晚草玄经，覃思写天维。<div id='poem_sentence_25_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_214246'>脱身天禄阁，危于剑头炊。<div id='poem_sentence_26_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_214246'>卧闻策董贤，闭门甘忍饥。<div id='poem_sentence_27_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_214246'>五侯盛宾客，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_214246", 214246, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>驺辔</span>交横驰。<div id='poem_sentence_28_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_214246'>时通问字人，得酒未曾辞。<div id='poem_sentence_29_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_214246'>近者君家翁，天与脱絷鞿。<div id='poem_sentence_30_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_214246'>已为冥冥鸿，矰缴尚安施。<div id='poem_sentence_31_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_214246'>养兰寻僧圃，爱竹到水湄。<div id='poem_sentence_32_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_214246'>北阙免朝请，西都分保釐。<div id='poem_sentence_33_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_214246'>文章九鼎重，富贵一黍累。<div id='poem_sentence_34_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_214246'>赵良请<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作欲）</span>灌园，但为商君嗤。<div id='poem_sentence_35_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_214246'>弃甲尚文过，兕多牛有皮。<div id='poem_sentence_36_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_214246'>出仕书掣肘，归来菊荒篱。<div id='poem_sentence_37_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_214246'>不为五斗折，自无三径资。<div id='poem_sentence_38_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_214246'>胜箭洗蹀血，归鞍悬月支。<div id='poem_sentence_39_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_214246'>斯人万户侯，造物付炉锤。<div id='poem_sentence_40_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_214246'>我观史臣篇，疏略记糟醨。<div id='poem_sentence_41_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_214246'>譬如官池蛙，谁能问公私。<div id='poem_sentence_42_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_214246'>君怀明月珠，簸弄沧海涯。<div id='poem_sentence_43_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_214246'>深房佩芳兰，固是王所姬。<div id='poem_sentence_44_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_214246'>南贡尚包橘，汉滨莫大随。<div id='poem_sentence_45_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_214246'>每来促<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作捉）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_214246", 214246, "Clauses/92/Comments/1")'>谈麈</span>，风生庭竹枝。<div id='poem_sentence_46_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_214246'>肮脏得家法，伊优不能为。<div id='poem_sentence_47_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_214246'>但听呼摴蒱，便足解人颐。<div id='poem_sentence_48_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_214246'>功成在漏刻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_214246", 214246, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>颖利</span>处囊锥。<div id='poem_sentence_49_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_214246'>失势落坑阱，寒窀如愁鸱。<div id='poem_sentence_50_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_214246'>得马折足祸，亡羊多歧悲。<div id='poem_sentence_51_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_214246'>屡敌因心计，伏兵几面欺。<div id='poem_sentence_52_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_214246'>长戈仰关来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_214246", 214246, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>吐款</span>受羁縻。<div id='poem_sentence_53_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_214246'>万事只如此，毕竟谁成亏。<div id='poem_sentence_54_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_214246'>爱君方寸间，醇朴乃器师。<div id='poem_sentence_55_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_214246'>安得摆俗缠，东冈并锄犁。<div id='poem_sentence_56_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_214246'>由来在阴鹤，不必振羽仪。<div id='poem_sentence_57_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_214246'>送行倾车盖，载酒满鸱夷。<div id='poem_sentence_58_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_214246'>天高木叶下<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作落叶）</span>，潦退河流卑。<div id='poem_sentence_59_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_214246'>屯云搴六幕，新月吐半规。<div id='poem_sentence_60_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_214246'>人生会面难，取醉听狂痴。<div id='poem_sentence_61_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_214246'>语阱发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_214246", 214246, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>欺笑</span>，诗锋犯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_214246", 214246, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>嘲讥</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_62_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_214246'>悬知履霜来，少别为不怡。<div id='poem_sentence_63_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_214246'>天津媚河汉，阙角挂秋霓。<div id='poem_sentence_64_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_214246'>中有鬼与神，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_214246", 214246, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>赤舌</span>弄阴机。<div id='poem_sentence_65_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_214246'>夜光但十袭，出怀即瑕疵。<div id='poem_sentence_66_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_214246'>去去善逆旅，冻醪约重持。<div id='poem_sentence_67_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_214246'>山药倒藤架，红梨带寒曦。<div id='poem_sentence_68_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_214246'>坐须骑奴还，淹留岁恐期。<div id='poem_sentence_69_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_214246'>无为出门念，牵衣婴孺啼。<div id='poem_sentence_70_214246_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_214246'>短韵愿成诵，时时寄相思。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和谢公定河朔漫成八首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", id='poem_sentence_0_213231'>急雨长风溢两河，欣然河伯顺风歌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213231'>行观东海方存<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>少，不以黄流更自多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213231'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213231'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_213231_0'>⑴ 影元本、山谷集、陈刻本作寸</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213231_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_213230' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213230' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213230?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，奔波各地，有诗。作品：奉和慎思寺丞太康传舍相逢并寄扶沟程太丞尉氏孙著作二十韵。<div id='poem_214481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214481' class='poemTitle class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214481")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214481_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214481'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214481'>扶亭大夫伯淳父，平生执鞭所欣慕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214481'>蚤年学问多东南，形阻江山想神遇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214481'>阮籍台边有一人，爱叹非为婚姻故。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214481'>民言令君明且清，玉壶寒冰不受污。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214481'>我从王事驱传马，落日东走骇麇兔。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214481'>问知邻境欲过之，简书有程严寸步。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214481'>胸怀作恶无处说，天气昏昏月含雾。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214481'>邓侯诗成锦绣段，浣花屑玉邀我赋。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214481'>不似灞桥风雪中，半臂骑驴得佳句。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，有诗。作品：海棠花。秋决明。同世弼作寄伯氏在济南兼呈六舅祠部学士。伯氏到济南寄诗颇言太守居有湖山之胜同韵和。平原宴坐二首。用明发不寐有怀二人为韵寄李秉彝德叟。次韵寄李六弟济南郡城桥亭之诗。醇道得蛤蜊复索舜泉舜泉已酌尽官酒不堪不敢送。<div id='poem_214112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同世弼韵作寄伯氏在济南兼呈六舅祠部<span ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214172")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214172'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214172'>老农年饥望人腹，想见四溟森雨足。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214172'>林回投璧负婴儿，岂闻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>烹儿翁不哭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214172'>未论万户无炊烟，蛛丝蜗涎经杼轴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214172'>使君闵雪无肉味，煮饼青蒿下盐菽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214172'>岂云剪爪宜侵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>肌，霜不杀草仍故绿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214172'>幽灵奰赑西山雾，牲肥酒香神未渎。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214172'>得微往从董父餐，宁当罪系葛陂渊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214172'>卜择祠官齐博士，暴露致告苍崖颠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214172'>请天行泽不汲汲，尔亦枯鱼过河泣。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214172'>生鹅斩颈血未乾，风马云车坐相及。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214172'>百里旌旗洒玉花，使君义动<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>龙蛇蛰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214172'>老农欢喜有春事，呼儿饭牛理蓑笠。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214172'>博士勿叹从公疲，明年麦饭滑流匙<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《山谷外集诗注》卷四）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214172'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_214172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214172'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_214172_0'>⑴ 原作闻岂，据影元本、山谷集、陈刻本乙</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_214172_0'>⑵ 原作剪，据山谷集改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_214172_0'>⑶ 原作重，据影元本、山谷集、陈刻本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214172_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，有诗。作品：薄薄酒二章。竹轩咏雪呈外舅谢师厚并调李彦深。<div id='poem_214912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>薄薄酒二章<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214912")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214912'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214912'>薄酒可与忘忧，丑妇可与白头。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214912'>徐行不必驷马，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_214912", 214912, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>称身</span>不必狐裘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214912'>无祸不必受福，甘餐不必食肉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214912'>富贵于我如浮云，小者谴诃<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>大戮辱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214912'>一身畏首复畏尾，门多宾客饱僮仆。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214912'>美物必甚恶，厚味生五兵。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214912'>匹夫怀璧死，百鬼瞰高明。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214912'>丑妇千秋万岁同室，万金良药不如无疾。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214912'>薄酒一谈一笑胜茶，万里封侯不如还家。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214912'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_214912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214912'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_214912_0'>⑴ 原校：山谷写本作谴何，俗本误耳</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214912_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214911?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span id='poem_content_214911'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214911'>薄酒终胜饮茶，丑妇不是无家。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214911'>醇醪养牛等刀锯，深山大泽生龙蛇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214911'>秦时东陵千户食，何如青门五色瓜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214911'>传呼鼓吹拥部曲，何如春雨一池蛙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214911'>性刚太傅促和药，何如羊裘钓烟沙。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214911'>绮席象床雕玉枕，重门夜鼓不停挝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214911'>何如一身无四壁，满船明月卧芦花。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214911'>吾闻食人之肉，可随以鞭朴之戮。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214911'>乘人之车，可加以鈇钺之诛。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214911'>不如薄酒醉眠牛背上，丑妇自能搔背痒。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214911'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_214911_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>竹轩咏雪呈外舅谢师厚并调李彦深</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214321")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214321'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214321'>破腊春未融，土膏寒不发。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214321'>数声鸣条风，一夜洒窗雪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214321'>开轩万物晓，落势良未歇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214321'>铿铿青琅玕，阅此岁凛冽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214321'>摧埋头抢地，意气终自洁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214321'>君子谓此君，全身斯明哲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214321'>屋头维女贞，额<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>色少泽悦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214321'>稍能窥藩篱，亦有固穷节。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214321'>佳兴冉冉生，门外无车辙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214321'>写之朱丝弦，清坐待明月。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，有诗赠李彦深。作品：戏赠彦深。赠李彦深。<div id='poem_214158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戏赠彦深<span class='inlineComment2'>（李原字彦深，厚之弟，居南阳）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214158")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214158'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214158'>李髯家徒立四壁，未尝一饭能留客。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214158'>春寒茅屋交相风，倚墙扪虱读书策。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214158'>老妻甘贫能养姑，宁剪髻鬟不典书。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214158'>大儿得餐不索鱼，小儿得裈不索襦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214158'>庾郎鲑菜二十七，太常斋日三百馀。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214158'>上丁分膰一饱饭，藏神梦诉羊蹴蔬。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214158'>世传寒士有<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_7_214158'>冥冥主张审如此，附郭小圃宜勤锄。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214158'>葱秧青青<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_214158", 214158, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>葵甲</span>绿，早韭晚菘羹糁熟。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214158'>充虚解战赖汤饼，芼以蓱齑与甘菊。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214158'>几日怜<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作邻）</span>槐已著花，一心咒笋莫成竹。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214158'>群儿笑髯穷百巧，我谓胜人饭重肉。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214158'>群儿笑髯不若人，我独爱髯无事贫。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214158'>君不见猛虎即人厌麋鹿，人还寝皮食其肉。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214158'>濡需终与豕俱焦，饫肥择甘果非福。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214158'>虫蚁无知不足惊，横目之民万物灵。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214158'>请食熊蹯楚千乘，立死山壁汉公卿。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214158'>李髯作人有佳处，李髯作诗有佳句。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214158'>虽无厚禄故人书，门外犹多长者车。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214158'>我读扬雄逐贫赋，斯人用意未全疏。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214158_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214158'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_214158_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214925' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214925' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214925?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠李彦深<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰元年北京作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214925")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214925_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214925'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214925'>琼枝虽疗渴，萱草忘人忧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214925'>李君气萧萧，翠竹摇清秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214925'>步竹来过门，日色在帘钩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214925'>开云睹白雉，临水对虚舟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214925'>言少常造极，色夷似无求。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214925'>醉尉厅索寞，寒泉沃茶瓯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214925'>四坐愁水厄，井瓶犹屡投。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214925'>斮锡碎玉札，閒荐当众羞。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214925'>微物不足贵，且延君少留。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214925'>行役阻相见，心如旆悠悠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214925'>春鱼出清涔，社酒欲胜篘。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214925'>时来得晤语，呼客尽更筹。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214925'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_214925_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　留任北京学官，有诗。作品：观王熙叔唐本草书歌。拟古杂言。古豪侠行赠魏邻几。拘士笑三方。赋未见君子忧心靡乐八韵寄李师载。江南。公益尝茶。和答郭监簿咏雪。次韵张秘校喜雪三首。次韵寅庵四首。次韵七兄青阳驿西阻水见寄。<div id='poem_214341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观王熙叔唐本草书歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214341")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214341'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214341'>少时草圣学钟王，意气欲齐韦与张。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214341'>家藏古本数十百，千奇万怪常搜索。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214341'>今得君家一卷书，始觉辛勤总无益。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214341'>移灯近前拭眼看，精神高秀非人力。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214341'>北风古树折巅崖，苍烟寒藤挂绝壁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214341'>主人知是希世奇，但见姓氏无标题。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214341'>自非高闲怀素不能此，何必更辨当年<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作是）</span>谁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214374'>烟雨昏，行不乱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214374'>日昳<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>晡，下平湖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214374'>新妇见雁怀征夫，上堂曳袑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>裾，四拜启阿姑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214374'>人言雁寄书，审能寄书无。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214374'>阿姑语新妇，古来无此事，今安得此语。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214374'>新妇祝雁好自去，勿学水中恋涔鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214374'>寄汝尺素上有书，塞北春寒用当襦。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214374'>寄书与阿谁，我家苏校尉，海上牧羊儿。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214374'>为言妾能事君母，勿负汉恩作降虏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_214374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214374'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_214374_0'>⑴ 原注：音迭，日昃也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_214374_0'>⑵ 山谷集作裙。原注：韶上声，衣襟也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_214374_0'>⑶ 原校：一作下堂劳苦雁，上堂问阿姑</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214374_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214044' target='_blank'>次韵七兄青阳驿西阻水见寄<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰元年北京作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a
