class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214169'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214169'>挽船逆牵九牛尾，寸步关梁论万里。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214169'>淮山终日只对面，与船低昂如角抵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214169'>水工爬涉未曾去，远者盈寻近盈咫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214169'>长堤夜射千丈潭，疾雷不及先掩耳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214169'>吾人犹困坎井泥，何算鲑虾著尘滓。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214169'>我家诗翁坐长歌，险阻艰难实经履。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214169'>稍寻牛豕畦疃行，始得村落鱼菜市。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214169'>风榆雨柳愁杀人，日西月东若流水。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214169'>忽然槌鼓催发船，入门驩甚折屐齿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214169'>道逢耦耕试借问，往往见谓知津矣。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214169'>十年奔走营晓炊，家居暖席能得几。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214169'>此行干蛊维叔父，攻苦食辛等醇醴。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214169'>官筒之诗邺城下，孝友恳恻见表里。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214169'>强哦竹閒惜寡和，如以罢兵取坚垒。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214169'>何当车马城南来，寿亲一樽开宴喜。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214169'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_214169_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　留任北京学官，与苏轼有书信往来。作品：与苏子瞻书。<div id='poem_1195945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195945?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与苏子瞻书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195945")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195945_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195945'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195945'>某再拜启：春寒，伏惟知府祠部学士尊体动止万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195945_comment'></div>顷自卫州试举人归，于郑掾处得赐教，不以污下难于奖拔，接引开纳，勤勤恳恳，俯伛而忘其臂之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195945_comment'></div>强驽马于千里，不敢自绝，勉奉鞭勒，至于不胜任而后已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195945_comment'></div>和诗词气高妙，无以为谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195945_comment'></div>往闻执事岂弟之声，今食其实，独恨未有亲近之幸耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195945_comment'></div>去九月到家，老儿病脚气，初甚惊人，会得善医诊视，今十去九矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195945_comment'></div>又苦寒嗽，未能良愈，坐此不通书阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195945_comment'></div>仰惟大雅函容，有以裁其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195945_comment'></div>黄楼之作，名不虚生，浅短岂敢下笔？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195945_comment'></div>愿见记刻，淹熟规摹，当勉为公赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195945_comment'></div>子由尚在闲处，识者所恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195945_comment'></div>伯氏往得接欢，极叹其沈冥而游刃于世故，以为古人不过如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195945_comment'></div>想数得安问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195945_comment'></div>外舅谢师厚，外砥砺而中坦夷，士大夫间少见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195945_comment'></div>暮年无所用心，更属全功于诗，益高古可爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195945_comment'></div>数有酬和，冗未办录上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195945_comment'></div>冬春愆雪，麦根无泽，伏惟长民者未能忘忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195945_comment'></div>数舍阻于参侍，不胜驰情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195945_comment'></div>伏祈动静调护利物，坐进此道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195945_comment'></div>谨奉状，不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1195945_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年9月</a>　北京留守司至山谷处核验元年二月苏轼写寄山谷之书信及诗文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年11月</a>　任北京学官，有文。作品：冀州养正堂记。<div id='poem_1197791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冀州养正堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197791")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197791'>冀州古信都，有汉为安平侯国，地当河漳之间一都会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197791_comment'></div>民习懻忮，任侠自武，四方游手之民，囊橐其间，不事本业，其淫俗犹班班见于载籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197791_comment'></div>无名山大川以为要关，其地四战之国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197791_comment'></div>自中原有事于兵革，此邦未尝不与焉，故其民空匮憔悴，甚于他州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197791_comment'></div>我圣人抚有四海，天下属安，丁壮耕桑，老弱不任事，百有馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197791_comment'></div>而民未知休息生养之利，岁一艰食，可望以恩义者，不能相救，盖其地产瘠卤，人不根著故尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197791_comment'></div>于今为州，在国北门，坚壁重兵，楼橹险壮，外夷宾客朝贺有期会所由出入，故守者常用士大夫之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197791_comment'></div>元丰元年十一月，诏用扶风鲁侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197791_comment'></div>鲁侯忠信岂弟，不鄙其州，拊循鳏寡，动用礼法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197791_comment'></div>民奋于田，士兴于学，乃遑暇于燕息之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197791_comment'></div>太守居故有便堂，权舆于都水蓝昌言仲谟，而鲁侯为筑屋四旁，与堂周旋，风雨寒暑，有所迁就，而堂事告备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197791_comment'></div>鲁侯隐几以休诗书，酌酒以御宾客，巾履徜徉木阴鸟语之中，思所以为邦之本，而有得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197791_comment'></div>谓其堂曰「养正」，是在《易》之《颐》「贞吉，观颐，自求口实」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197791_comment'></div>齐王之子，亦人子也，居富贵之养，而气体与人殊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197791_comment'></div>况能自求其心，居天下之广居，则其所养宜何如！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197791_comment'></div>呼于垤泽之门者，非宋君也，而声似之，以其居相似也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197791_comment'></div>其居与古人相似，而病不及古人，吾则不信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197791_comment'></div>夫惟不言不笑不取，是非物之情，飘风暴雨，天地不能持久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197791_comment'></div>未同而言，胁肩谄笑，苟可以得车，所治每下而不耻者，吾不知也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197791_comment'></div>至于时然后言，乐然后笑，义然后取，彼其中必有以信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197791_comment'></div>《诗》云：「鼓钟于宫，声闻于外」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197791_comment'></div>夫事其事而小大得情，语默当物，斋心服形于宫庭屋漏之间，而民气和于耕桑陇亩之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197791_comment'></div>彼其于性命之情，必有不蕲于规矩准绳而正者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197791_comment'></div>嘉鲁侯之不鄙其州，知律民者在己，得己者在心，其居民上，不以一日忘所以养源者，故极言其致遗鲁侯，镵石壁间，使信都之士师鲁侯之好学以成其材，其民知鲁侯之用心而劝其事，又使来者得鉴观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197791_comment'></div>鲁侯名有开，字元翰，简肃公之子，能世其家者也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197791_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1197791'>我圣人：丛刊本「我」字空，「圣人」作「真人」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1197791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197791'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_1197791_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·正集》卷一六。又见《圣宋文选》卷三一，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷一三六，《苏门六君子文粹》卷三九。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1197791_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年12月26日</a>　留任北京学官。因与苏轼有诗往来，受“乌台诗案”牵连，坐罚铜二十斤。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　本年学官任满，改任著作佐郎，因受苏轼案牵连，知吉州太和县。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　任北京学官，诗中有“有器可深川，吾未之学也”之句，成为日后反对新法、日后被贬的证据之一。作品：同尧民游灵源庙料献臣置酒用马陵二字赋诗。<div id='poem_214115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同尧民游灵源庙廖献臣置酒用马陵二字赋诗二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214115")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214115'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214115'>灵源庙前木，我昔见拱把。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214115'>七年身屡到，郁郁荫檐瓦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214115'>春风响马衔，并辔客萧洒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214115'>更愿少尹贤，置酒意倾写。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214115'>斋堂有佳处，花柳轻娅姹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214115'>莲塘想旧叶，稻畦识枯苴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214115'>开关抚洪河，黄流极天泻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214115'>忆昔武皇来，系璧沈白马。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214115'>从官亲土石，襁负至鳏寡。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214115'>空馀瓠子诗，哀怨逼骚雅。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214115'>白圭自圣禹，今谁定真假。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214115'>晁子发谠言，圣功谅难亚。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214115'>排河著地中，势必千里下。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214115'>移民就宽閒，何地不耕稼。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214115'>此论似太高，吾亦茫取舍。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214115'>有器可深川，吾未之学也。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214115'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_214115_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214114' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214114' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214114?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214114_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214114'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214114'>洪河壮观游，太府佳友朋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214114'>春色挽我出，东风如引绳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214114'>昏昏版筑气，王事始繁兴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214114'>大堤如连山，小堤如冈陵。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214114'>增卑更培薄，万杵何登登。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214114'>忆昨河失道，平原鱼可罾。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214114'>田莱人未复，疮大国方惩。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214114'>忽念耒耜閒，为民保丘塍。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214114'>百县伐鼛出，夜半废曲肱。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214114'>吾侪愧禄廪，游衍事鞍乘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214114'>晁子汉公孙，新去司马丞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214114'>出干大农部，才术见嗟称。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214114'>我坐广文舍，七年读书灯。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214114'>结发入场屋，肯谓河难凭。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214114'>尔来触事短，痴甚霜前蝇。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214114'>世味极淡薄，不了人爱憎。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214114'>惟得一卮酒，尚能别淄渑。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214114'>所以对樽俎，未曾闻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>斗升。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214114'>酌我良已多，狂言恐侵陵。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214114'>暮云吞落日，归鸟求其朋<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集注：复用前韵。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214114'>冷官仆马瘦，及门鼓腾腾。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214114'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214114'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_214114_0'>⑴ 影元本、陈刻本作问</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214114_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　任北京学官，有诗寄李子先。作品：以同心之言其臭如兰为韵寄李子先。<div id='poem_213974' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213974' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213974?labeling=true' target='_blank'>以同心之言其臭如兰为韵寄李子先<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213974")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213974'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213974'>往日三语掾，解道将无同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213974_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213974'>我观李校书，超迈有古风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213974_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213974'>谈道屡入微，闭门长蒿蓬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213974_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213974'>谁能赏远韵，太守似安丰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213974_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213974'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213974_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213972' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213972' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213972?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213972'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213972'>流水鸣无意，白云出无心。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213972'>水得平淡处，渺渺不厌深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213972'>云行不能雨，还归碧山岑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213972'>斯人似云水，廊庙等山林。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213972'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213972_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213518?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213518'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213518'>俗士得失重，舍龟观朵颐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213518_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213518'>六经成市道，驵侩以为师。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213518_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213971' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213971?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213971'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213971'>正以此易彼，高车择<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>朱门。<div 山谷集、陈刻本、翁校本作宅</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213971_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_213970' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213970' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213970?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213970_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213970'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213970'>携手力<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作日）</span>不足，七年坐乖离。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213970'>愁思不能眠，起视夜何其。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213970'>残月挂破镜，寒星满天垂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213970'>明明故人心，维斗终不移。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213970'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213970_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213969' id='poem_sentence_1_213969_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213969'>欲从钟鼎食，复恐忧患构。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213969_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213519'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213519'>客从济南来，遗我故人书。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", 原注：据《东坡集》，乃熙宁七年冬《除夜病中赠段屯田》，时在密州。山谷和章乃元丰初。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214001'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214001'>公才如洪河，灌注天下半。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214001'>风日未尝撄，昼夜圣所叹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214001'>名世二十年，穷无歌舞玩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214001'>入宫又见妒，徒友飞鸟散。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214001'>一饱事难谐，五车书作伴。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214001'>风雨暗楼台，鸡鸣自昏旦。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214001'>虽非锦绣赠，欲报青玉案。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214001'>文似离骚经，诗窥关雎乱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214001'>贱生恨学晚，曾未奉巾盥。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214001'>昨蒙双鲤鱼，远托郑人缓。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214001'>风义薄秋天，神明还旧贯。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214001'>更磨荐祢墨，推挽起疲懦。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214001'>忽忽未嗣音，微阳归候炭。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214001'>仁风从东来，拭目望斋馆。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214001'>鸟声日日春，柳色弄晴暖。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214001'>漫有酒盈樽，何因见此粲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214000'>朝四与暮三，适为狙公玩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214000'>投壶得赐金，侏儒馀饱暖。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214002'>诚求活国医，何忍弃和缓。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　任北京学官，有诗。作品：次韵答尧民。<div id='poem_214285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答尧民</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214285")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214285_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214285'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214285'>君闻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>苏公诗，疾读思过半。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214285'>譬如闻韶耳，三月忘味叹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214285'>我诗岂其朋，组丽等俳玩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214285'>不闻南风弦，同调广陵散。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214285'>鹤鸣九天上，肯作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_214285", 214285, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>家鸡</span>伴。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214285'>晁子但爱我，品藻私月旦。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214285'>官閒乐相从，梨栗供杯案。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214285'>门静鸟雀嬉，花深蜂蝶乱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214285'>忽蒙加礼貌，斋戒事搢盥。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214285'>问大心更小，意督词反缓。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214285'>君材于用多，舞选弓矢贯。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214285'>聪明回自照，胜己果非懦。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214285'>我如相绘事，素质施<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_214285", 214285, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>朽炭</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214285'>古来得道人，非独大庭馆。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　任北京学官，游西山，有诗。作品：过西山。<div id='poem_213166' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213166' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_213166'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213166'>新春木叶未蒙笼，西望天涯几日通。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213166_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　任北京学官，春游有诗。<div id='poem_214585' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214585' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214585?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春游</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214585")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214585_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214585'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214585'>终日桃李蹊，春风不相识。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214585'>同我二三子，承我作意力。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214585'>把酒忘味著，看花了香寂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214585'>晴云散长空，旷荡无限隔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214585'>身为胡蝶梦，本自不渔色。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214585'>春虫劝人归，今我诚是客。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214585'>归来翻故纸，书尾见麟获。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214585'>文字非我名，聊取二三策。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214585'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_214585_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　任北京学官，有诗。作品：次韵感春五首。圣东将寓于卫行乞食于齐有可怜之色再次韵感春五首赠之。次韵盖郎中率郭郎中休官二首。次韵郭右曹。次韵伯氏寄赠盖郎中喜学老杜之诗。盖郎中惠诗有二强攻一老不战而胜之嘲次韵解之。和吕秘丞。送杨瓘雁门省亲二首。次韵答张沙河。送张沙河游齐鲁诸邦。和张沙河招饮。同尧民游灵庙廖献臣置酒用马陵二字赋诗。八音歌赠晁尧民往常与尧民论出处之致未竞故终言之。八音歌赠晁尧民。三月壬申同尧民希孝观净名寺经藏得弘明集中沈炯同耿肩吾诸人游明庆寺诗次韵奉呈二公。赠希孝。饮城南即事。见二十弟倡和花字漫兴五首。希仲招饮李都尉北园。梨花。次韵师厚五月十六日视田悼彦深。次韵晁补之廖正—赠答诗。再次韵呈廖明略。走答明略适尧民来相约奉谒故篇末及上。再答明略二首。次韵廖明略陪吴明府白云亭宴集。次韵吴可权题余干县白云亭。次韵无咎阁常携琴入村。定交诗效鲍明远体呈晁无咎。赠无咎。二十八宿歌赠别无咎。答李康文。送彭南阳。和早秋雨中书怀呈张邓州。和舍弟中秋月。直舍寄陈子惠。林为之送笔戏赠。再和答为止。赠赵言。杂诗四首。九日对菊有怀粹老在河上四首。次韵题粹老客亭诗后。粹老家隔帘听琵琶。呈马粹老范德孺。赠谢敞王博谕。赠张仲谋。乞猫。谢周文之送猫儿。讲武台南有感。曹村道中。临河道中。谢张泰伯惠黄雀鲊。赠答晁次膺。夜闻邻舟崔家儿歌。重答。鸿沟。裴晋公书堂。子产庙。杨朴墓。次韵孔四著作北行滹沱。和范廉。和陈君仪读杨太真外传五首。读曹公传。杂诗。绝句。卫南。酒。书扇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214053'>春风鸣布谷，天道似劝分。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214053'>持饥望路人，谁能颜色温。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214053'>笑忆枯鱼说，诙谐老漆园。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214053'>湘累不得禄，哀怨写荃荪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214053'>千年涧谷松，惭愧雨露恩。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214053'>思为万乘器，顾掩斧凿痕。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214053_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214053'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_214053_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214050' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214050' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_9_214288'>使公系腰印如斗，驷马高盖驱骎骎。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214288'>亲朋改观婢仆敬，成都男子宁异今。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214288'>又言屋底甚悬磬，儿婚女嫁取千金。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214288'>古来圣贤多不饱，谁能独无父母心。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214288'>众雏堕地各有命，强为百草忧春霖。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214288'>艾封人子暗目睫，与王同床悔沾襟。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214288'>陇鸟入笼左右啄，终日思归碧山岑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214288'>一生能几开口笑，何忍更遣百虑侵。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214288'>忽投雄篇写逸兴，仰占乾文动奎参。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214288'>自陈使酒尝骂坐，惜予不与朋盍簪。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214288'>君材蜀锦三千丈，要在刀尺成衣衾。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214288'>南朝例有风流癖，楚地俗多词赋淫。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214288'>屈原离骚岂不好，只今漂骨沧江浔。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214288'>正令夷甫开三窟，猎以我道皆成禽。<div id='poem_sentence_22_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_214288'>温恭忠厚神所劳，于鱼得计岂厌深。<div id='poem_sentence_23_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_214288'>丈夫身在要勉力，岂有吾子终陆沈。<div id='poem_sentence_24_214288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_214288'>鄙人相士盖多矣，勿作蔡泽笑噤吟。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214638' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214638?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送张沙河游齐鲁诸邦</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214638")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214638_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214638'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214638'>张侯去沙河，三食邺下麦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214638'>笔力望晁董，颇遗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>俗眼白。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214638'>平生学经纶，胸中负奇画。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214638'>未论功活人，饱饭不常得。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214638'>妻寒尚宾敬，儿饿犹笔墨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214638'>侧闻共伯城，鱼稻颇宜客。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214638'>又持尘生甑，欲往立四壁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214638'>平生贷米家，十辈来簿责。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214638'>囊无孔方兄，面有在陈色。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214638'>守株伺投兔，岁晚将何获。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214638'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_214638", 214638, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>广道</span>无人行，春风转沙石。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214638'>栖栖马如狗，去谒东侯伯。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214638'>布衣未可量，苍髯身八尺。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214638'>鱼乾要斗水，士困易为德。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214638'>譬之举大木，人借一臂力。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214638'>诸公感意气，岂待故相识。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214638'>吾穷乏祖饯，折柳当马策。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 影元本、山谷集、陈刻本作遭</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214638_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_213734' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213734' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213734?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和张沙河招饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213734")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213734_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213734'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213734'>张侯耕稼不逢年，过午未炊儿女煎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213734_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213734'>腹里虽盈五车读，囊中能有几钱穿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213734_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213734'>况闻缊素尚黄葛，可怕雪花铺白毡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213734_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213734'>谁料<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_213734", 213734, id='poem_sentence_4_213734_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214115?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214115'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214115'>灵源庙前木，我昔见拱把。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214115'>七年身屡到，郁郁荫檐瓦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214115'>春风响马衔，并辔客萧洒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214115'>更愿少尹贤，置酒意倾写。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214115'>斋堂有佳处，花柳轻娅姹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214115'>莲塘想旧叶，稻畦识枯苴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214115'>开关抚洪河，黄流极天泻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214115'>有器可深川，吾未之学也。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_214114_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214114'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214114'>洪河壮观游，太府佳友朋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214114'>春色挽我出，东风如引绳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214114'>增卑更培薄，万杵何登登。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214114'>忽念耒耜閒，为民保丘塍。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214114_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_213905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213905?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八音歌赠晁尧民<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", 往长与尧民论出处之致未竟，故终言之</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213905'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213905'>金生寒沙中，见别会有时。<div id='poem_title_213904_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213904'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213904'>金荷酌美酒，夫子莫留残。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213904'>石有补天材，虎豹守九关。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/213509?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三月壬申同尧民希孝观净名寺经藏得弘明集中沈炯同庾肩吾诸人游明庆寺诗次韵奉呈二公<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213509")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213509_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213509_0'>① 鹫岭三层塔，庵园一讲堂。驯鸟逐饭磬，狎兽绕禅床。摘菊山无酒，燃松夜有香。幸得同高胜，于此莹心王。（原注：元丰二年北京作。按：题下注各本都舛误，今据《广弘明集》卷三○沈烱诗。）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213509'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213509'>秘藏开新译，天花雨旧堂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213509'>證经多宝塔，寝疾净名床。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213509'>鸟语杂歌颂，蛛丝凝<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作疑）</span>篆香。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213509'>同游得赵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>李，谈道过何王。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214395_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214395'>著作文章名誉早，不愧汉庭御史祖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214395_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214093'>学如云梦吞八九，文如壮士开黄间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214093'>十年呻吟江湖上，青枫白鸥付心赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214093'>未减北郭汉先生，五府交书不到城<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：汉汝南廖扶。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214093'>相者举肥骥空老，山中无人桂自荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214093'>君既不能如钟世美，匦函上书动天子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214093'>且向华阴郡下作参军，要令公怒令公喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214093'>君不见晁家乐府可管弦，惜无倾城为一弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214093'>从军补掾百僚底，九关虎豹何由攀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214093'>男儿身健事未定，且莫著书藏名山。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214093_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214093'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_214093_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214385' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214385?labeling=true' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214385'>君不见生不愿为牛后，宁为鸡口。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214385'>吾闻向来得道人，终古不忒如<span id='poem_sentence_2_214385'>希价咸阳诸少年，可推令往挽令还。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214385'>俗学风波能自拔，我识廖侯眉宇间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214385'>省庭无人与争长，主司得之如受赏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214385'>东家一笑市尽倾，略无下蔡与阳城。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214385'>生珠之水砂砾润，生玉之山草木荣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214385'>观君词章亦如此，谅知躬行有君子。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214385'>更约探囊阅旧文，蛛丝灯花助我喜。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214385'>贤乐堂前竹影斑，好鸟自语莫令弹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214385'>北邻著作相劳苦，整驾谒子邀同攀。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214385'>应烦下榻煮茶药，坐待月轮衔屋山。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214385'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_214385_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214104' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214104' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214104?labeling=true' id='poem_content_214104'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214104'>挟策读书计糊口，故人南箕与北斗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214104'>江南江北万重山，千里寄书声不还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214104'>当时朱弦写心曲，果在高山深<span id='poem_sentence_3_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214104'>廖侯文字得我惊，五岳纵横守严城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214104'>万夫之下不称屈，定知名满四海非真荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214104'>富于春秋已如此，他日卜邻长儿子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214104'>一丘各自有林泉，扶将白头亲燕喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214104'>秋风日暮衣裳单，深巷落叶已如弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214104'>数来会面复能几，六龙去人不可攀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214104'>短歌溷公更一和，聊乞淮南作小山。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214104'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_214104_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_214103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214103'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214103'>廖侯言如不出口，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_214103", 214103, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>铨量</span>古今胆如斗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214103'>度越崔张与二班，古风萧萧笔追还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214103'>前日辞家来射策，声名藉甚诸公间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214103'>华阴白云锁千嶂，胜日一谈谁能赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214103'>君不见曩时子产识然明，知音郁郁闭佳城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214103'>勿以匣中之明月，计较粪上之朝荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214103'>我去丘园十年矣，种桑可蚕犊生子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214103'>使年七十今中半，安能朝四暮三浪忧喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214103'>据席谈经只强颜，不安<span class='inlineComment2'>（翁校本作守）</span>时论取讥弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214103'>爱君草木同臭味，颇似瓜葛相依攀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214103'>我有仙方煮白石，何时期君蓝田山。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214103'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_214103_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214319")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_214319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214319'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214319'>江静明花竹，山空响管弦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214319'>风生学士麈，云绕令君筵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214319'>百越馀生聚，三吴远接连。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214319'>叶县飞来舄，壶公谪处天。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214319'>酌时多<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>暴谑，舞短更成妍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214319'>唯我孤登览，观诗未究宣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214319_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214319'>空馀五字赏，文<span class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214218'>永怀刘随州，因榜白云句。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214218'>遗老不能谈，岁月<span id='poem_sentence_3_214218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214218'>吴侯七闽英，宰县有真趣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214190")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214190_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214190'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214190'>士寒饿，古犹今，向来亦有子桑琴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214190'>倚楹啸歌非寓淫，伯牙山高水深深，万世丘垄一知音。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214190'>阎君七弦抱幽独，晁子为之梁父吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214190'>天寒络纬悲向壁，秋高风露声入林。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214190'>冷丝枯木拂珠网，十指乃能写人心。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214190'>村村击鼓如鸣鼍，豆田见角谷成螺。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214190'>阎夫子，勿谓知人难，使琴抑怨久不和。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214489?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定交诗二首效鲍明远体呈晁无咎<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214489")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214489_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214489'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214489'>建酉金为政，摇落草木衰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214489'>除瓜陇亩净，邵平无米炊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214489'>满家色藜藿，诗书不赒饥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214489'>平生晁公子，正用此时来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214489'>定交无一物，秋月以为期。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214489'>执持荆山璧，要我雕琢之。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214489'>破斧不能柯，况乃玉无疵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214489'>危冠论百揆，备乐奏四时。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214489'>成功彼有命，用舍君自知。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214489'>收身渺江湖，岁晚白鸟嬉。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214489'>开径蒲苇中，倚锄望君归。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214489'>闭塞乃非道，不才当尔为。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214489'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_214489_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214490' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214490' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214490?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214490'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214490'>建鼓求亡子，原非入耳歌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214490'>除去绿绮尘，水深山峨峨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214490'>满堂悦秦声，君独用此何。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214490'>平分感秋节，空阔湛金波。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214490'>定夜百虫息，高论听悬河。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214490'>执揽北斗柄，斟酌四时和。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214490'>破屋仰见星，得子喜且多。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214490'>危柱无安弦，野水自盈科。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214490'>成道在礼乐，成山在丘阿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214490'>收此桑榆景，相从寄琢磨。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214490'>开怀溟海阔，百怪出蛟鼍。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214490'>闭藏愿自爱，惊人取谴诃。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214523'>蚤年学屠龙，适用固疏阔。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214523'>广文困齑盐，烹茶对秋月。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214523'>略无人问字，况有客投辖。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214523'>文章寄呻吟，讲授费颊舌。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214523_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214523'>閒无用心处，雌黄到笔墨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214931'>学书不成不学剑，心术妙解通神明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214931_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214931'>医如俯身拾地芥，相如仰面观天星。<div gray;'>▪</span>到达泗州，为僧伽塔作文。作品：发愿文。<div id='poem_1198137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198137?labeling=true' target='_blank'>发愿文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198137'>菩萨师子王，白净法为身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198137_comment'></div>胜义空谷中，奋迅及哮吼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198137_comment'></div>念弓明利箭，被以慈哀甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198137_comment'></div>忍力不动摇，直破魔王军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198137_comment'></div>三昧常娱乐，甘露为美食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198137_comment'></div>解脱味为浆，游戏于三乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198137_comment'></div>住一切种智，转无上法轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198137_comment'></div>我今称扬，称性实语，以身语意，筹量观察，如实忏悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198137_comment'></div>我从昔来，因痴有爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198137_comment'></div>饮酒食肉，增长爱渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198137_comment'></div>入邪见林，不得解脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198137_comment'></div>今者对佛，发大誓愿：愿从今日，尽未来世，不复淫欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198137_comment'></div>愿从今日，尽未来世，不复饮酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198137_comment'></div>愿从今日，尽未来世，不复食肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198137_comment'></div>设复淫欲，当堕地狱，住火坑中，经无量劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198137_comment'></div>一切众生，为淫乱故，应受苦报，我皆代受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198137_comment'></div>设复饮酒，当堕地狱，饮洋铜汁，经无量劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198137_comment'></div>一切众生，为酒颠倒故，应受苦报，我皆代受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198137_comment'></div>设复食肉，当堕地狱，吞热铁丸，经无量劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198137_comment'></div>一切众生，为杀生故，应受苦报，我皆代受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198137_comment'></div>愿我以此，尽未来际，忍可誓愿，根尘清净，具足十忍，不由他教，入一切智，随顺如来，于无尽众生界中，现作佛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198137_comment'></div>恭惟十身洞彻，万德庄严，于刹刹尘尘，为我作證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198137_comment'></div>设经歌逻罗身，忘失本愿，唯垂加护，开我迷云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198137_comment'></div>稽首如空，等一痛切。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1198137_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>到达泗州，有诗寄赠泗州太守。作品：寄刘泗州。<div id='poem_213341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213341' 淮安

-----title
扬州

id='poem_sentence_0_1197648_comment'></div>席上问申公红药开早晚，因戒一牙吏走向土庙探花，还报云：花蓓初大如指面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197648_comment'></div>归而作小诗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197648_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1e91c90a76a04898b7557ee65ee2478c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1e91c90a76a04898b7557ee65ee2478c");'><span id='1e91c90a76a04898b7557ee65ee2478c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>，47岁</div><div id='1e91c90a76a04898b7557ee65ee2478c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年9月</a>　护母丧归分宁，途径扬州，晁补之有祭文。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
仪征

class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213908?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十月十三日泊舟白沙江口<span class='inlineComment2'>（真州，唐永正县之白沙镇也）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年10月13日）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213908_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213908'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213908'>岸江倚帆樯，已专北风权。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213908'>飞霜挟月下，百笮直如弦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 芜湖

href='/Writing/214338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>行行重行行赠别李之仪<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰三年改官太和作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214338")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214338'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214338'>行行重行行，我有千里适。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214338'>亲交爱此别，劝我善眠食。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214338'>惟君好怀抱，高义动颜色。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214338'>赠子青琅玕，结以永弗谖。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214338'>拭目仰盛德，洗心承妙言。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214338'>子道甚易行，易行乃难忘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214338'>虚名织女星，不能成文章。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214338'>微君好古学，尚谁发予狂。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214338'>事亲见不足，择友知无方。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214338'>大圣急先务，君其爱颓光。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214338'>外将周物情，中不敦己道。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214338'>以客从主人，辨之苦不早。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214338'>行身居言前，悟理在意表。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214338'>苟能领斯会，大自足诸小。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214338'>勿念一朝患，勿忘终身忧。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214338'>忠诚照屋漏，万物将自求。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214338'>此道不予欺，实吾闻之丘。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214338'>群居行小慧，宴笑奉樽俎。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214338'>益友来在门，疏拙不见取。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214338'>谁不闻此风，去君鸿鹄举。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214338_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214338'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_214338_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c5f2897433794409be294b4827078d61_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c5f2897433794409be294b4827078d61");'><span id='c5f2897433794409be294b4827078d61_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>，50岁</div><div id='c5f2897433794409be294b4827078d61' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年10月</a>　离开芜湖，由黄大临陪同前往开封府。<br /></div>
-----end

铜陵

-----title
贵池
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='232b62e9a942441cb5202255df08d860_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("232b62e9a942441cb5202255df08d860");'><span id='232b62e9a942441cb5202255df08d860_link' style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径贵池，有诗。作品：池口风雨留三日。贵池。大雷口阻风。庚寅乙未犹泊大雷口。乙未移舟出口。<div id='poem_213686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_213686'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213686'>孤城三日风吹雨，小市人家只菜蔬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213686'>水远山长双属玉，身閒心苦一舂锄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213686'>翁从旁舍来收网，我适临渊不羡鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213686'>俛仰之间已陈迹，暮窗归了读残书。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213686'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213686_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214615' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214615' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214615?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贵池<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214615")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214615_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_214615_0'>① 池人祀昭明为郭西九郎，时新覆大舟，水死者十二人，以为神之威也</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214615'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214615'>横云初抹漆，烂漫南纪黑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214615'>不见九华峰，如与亲友隔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214615'>忆当秋景明，九老对几席。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214615'>何曾闭篷窗，卧听寒雨滴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214615'>不食贵池鱼，喜寻昭明宅。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214615'>笔砚鼠行尘，芝菌生铜鬲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214615'>思成佳句梦，贻我锦数尺。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214615'>属者浪吞舟，风雹更附益。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214615'>老翁哭妇儿，相将难再得。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214615'>存亡如日月，薄蚀行道失。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214615'>流俗暗本源，谓神吐其食。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214615'>神理傥有私，丘祷久以默。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213936")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213936'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213936'>号橹下沧江，避风大雷口。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213936'>天与水模糊，不复知地厚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213936'>黄芦麋鹿场，此地广千肘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 东流

id='poem_title_214007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214007'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214007'>前日发大雷，真成<span class='link' -----title
潜山

<div class='label1' id='b7e61c3395ee4558bcf74e1c45957b5c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b7e61c3395ee4558bcf74e1c45957b5c");'><span id='b7e61c3395ee4558bcf74e1c45957b5c_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　舟次皖溪口，遇张庖民，为其隐居地“灵龟泉”题诗。作品：灵龟泉上。<div id='poem_214382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灵龟泉上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214382'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214382'>大灵寿日月，化石皖公陂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214382'>偶无斧斤寻，不作宰上碑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214382'>倾首若有谓，指泉来自西。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214382'>风流裴通直<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作裴髯喜幽事）</span>，商略从我嬉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214382'>舅弟妙学古<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：舅弟，李德叟。）</span>，亦复古须眉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214382'>卿家北海公，笔法可等夷。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214382'>为我书斯文，要与斗牛垂。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214382'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_214382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214382'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_214382_0'>⑴ 以上二句山谷集作舅弟李德叟，妙学古须眉</div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_214378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214378'>纸摹石镂见彷佛，曾未得似君家藏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　离开潜山，有诗赠李德叟。作品：发舒州向皖口道中作寄李德叟。<div id='poem_214033' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214033' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_9_214033_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214033'>遥知浦口晴，诸峰见明雪<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作松雪）</span>。<div -----title
星子（彭泽）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='93f012e881a44978b174b5fba0888f31_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("93f012e881a44978b174b5fba0888f31");'><span id='93f012e881a44978b174b5fba0888f31_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>，36岁</div><div id='93f012e881a44978b174b5fba0888f31' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径南康军，游落星寺，有诗。作品：题落星寺四首。<div id='poem_214906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题落星寺四首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214906")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_214906_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_214906_0'>① 原注：山谷真迹前二首题云《题落星寺》，第三首题云《题落星寺岚漪轩》，第四首题云《往与道纯醉卧岚漪轩夜半取烛题壁间》。又有蜀本石刻前一首题云《落星寺僧请题诗》，而首句作“游空天象有霣坠”，又“昼吟”作“书倚”，“江撼床”作“波撼床”，“蜜房”作“蜂房”，“牖户”作“户牖”，“青云梯几级”作“虚空更几级”，“瘦藤”作“一藤”。而第四首石刻题作《醉书落星寺壁时与刘道纯同饮二僧在焉》。四诗非同时作，后人类聚于此，故诗语有重复，不可指其岁月。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214906'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214906'>星官游空何时落，著地亦化为宝坊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214906'>诗人昼吟山入座，醉客夜愕江撼床。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214906'>蜜房各自开牖户，蚁穴或梦封侯王。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214906'>不知青云梯几级，更借瘦藤寻上方。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214906'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214906_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214905' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_214905_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214905'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214905'>岩岩匡俗先生庐，其下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_214905", 214905, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>宫亭</span>水所都。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214905'>北辰九关隔云雨，南极一星在江湖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214905'>相黏蚝山作居室，窍凿混沌无完肤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213480'>北风吹倒落星寺，吾与伯伦俱醉眠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213480_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213480'>螟蛉蜾蠃但痴坐，夜寒南北斗垂天<sup class='reference id='poem_note_213480_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径南康军，游玉京轩，有诗。<div id='poem_214064' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214064' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214064?labeling=true' target='_blank'>玉京轩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214064")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214064_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_214064_0'>① 玉京山在炉峰下，落星寺僧开轩对之（原注：按纂异，蜀本云：“苍山其下白玉京，广成安期来访道。紫云黄雾锁玄关，雷驱不祥电挥扫。上有千年来归之白鹤，下有万世不凋之瑶草。野僧云卧对开轩，炉香霏霏日杲杲。稻田衲子非黄冠，一钵安巢若飞鸟。莫见仙人乞玉泉，问取紫霄耶舍老。”又山谷有真迹，跋语云：“将旦起坐，复得长句，匆匆就竹舆，不暇写。岁行一周，道纯已凋落，为之陨涕。故书遗超上人，可刻石于吾二人醉处。他日有与予友及道纯好事者，尚徘徊碑侧。元祐六年大寒，黄庭坚书。”）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214064'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214064'>苍山其下白玉京，五城十二楼，郁仪结邻常杲杲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214064'>紫云黄雾锁玄关，雷驱不祥电挥扫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214064'>上有千年来归之白鹤，下有万世<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>不凋之瑶草。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214064'>野僧云卧对开轩，一钵安巢若飞鸟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214064'>北风卷沙过夜窗，枕底鲸波撼蓬岛。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214064'>个中即是地行仙，但使心閒自难老。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_214064_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214064'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_214064_0'>⑴ 影元本、陈刻本作岁</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214064_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径南康军，为寿圣观道士黄至明“快轩”题集句诗。作品：寿圣观道士黄至明开小隐轩太守徐公为题曰快轩庭坚集句咏之。<div id='poem_214370' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214370' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214370?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿圣观道士黄至明开小隐轩太守徐公为题曰快轩庭坚集句咏之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214370")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214370_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214370'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214370'>金华牧羊儿，一粒粟中藏世界。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214370'>使君从南来，清风明月不用一钱买。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214370'>鸬鹚杓，鹦鹉杯，一杯一杯复一杯，玉山自倒非人推。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214370'>庐山秀出南斗傍，登高送远形神开。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214370'>银河倒挂三石梁，砯崖转石万壑雷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214370'>吟诗作赋北窗里，安得青天化作一张纸。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214370_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214370'>有长鲸白齿若雪山，我愿因之寄千里。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_214370_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径南康军，祭拜刘凝之。作品：祭刘凝之文。拜刘凝之画像。过致政屯田刘公隐庐。<div id='poem_1198103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭刘凝之文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198103")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198103'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198103'>呜呼公乎，智谋足以御困，刚毅足以行可，独清足以轨物，自胜足以立我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198103_comment'></div>兀者造而归全，谅无地以栖祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198103_comment'></div>方燕及于来仍，阅门户之嵯峨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198103_comment'></div>忽厌俗而去仙，违白日而蜕卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198103_comment'></div>亡吾党之一鉴，哀楚望之倾陊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198103_comment'></div>伊曩时之倦游，实肮脏而坎坷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198103_comment'></div>遂投劾于颍尾，置嫔息于寒饿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198103_comment'></div>来胥疏于江湖，讫有屋于舂簸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198103_comment'></div>执盈虚以化物，取众弃而致夥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198103_comment'></div>间江疃之有秋，上橘柚之岁课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198103_comment'></div>开亭观之百楹，孳绿竹之万个。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198103_comment'></div>裹馀刃而不试，故优裕于菑播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198103_comment'></div>据几杖以彷徉，乐知识之来过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198103_comment'></div>味庞公之幽禅，观有物于石火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198103_comment'></div>岁三会于涒滩，讫初志其不挫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198103_comment'></div>维欧阳之文章，发高唱而无和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198103_comment'></div>配公名而成三，何巧舌之能破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198103_comment'></div>齿发疏而恋嫪，坐衰气而不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198103_comment'></div>载铭旌而来归，遗稚子以危货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198103_comment'></div>彼闻公之清风，亦何面以承唾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198103_comment'></div>初不肖之及门，辈诸孙之孩懦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198103_comment'></div>公慈祥而岂弟，获闻教而侍坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198103_comment'></div>欷岁晚而升堂，见虞主而泪堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198103_comment'></div>湛樽酒其傥尝，列群悲于楚些。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1198103_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214581' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214581' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214581?labeling=true' "poem_title_214581")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214581_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214581'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214581'>弃官清颍尾，买田落星湾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214581'>身在菰蒲中，名满天地间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214581'>谁能四十年，保此清静<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>退。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214581'>往来涧谷中，神光射牛背。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 文集、蒋刻本、山谷集作净</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214581_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_214358' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_214358_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214358'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214358'>儿时拜公床，眼碧眉紫烟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214358'>舍前架茅茨，炉香坐僧禅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214358'>女奴煮罂粟，石盆泻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_214358", 214358, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>机泉</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214358'>今来扫门巷，竹间翁蜕蝉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214358'>眼前不可意，壮日挂其冠。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214358'>解衣庐君峰，洗耳瀑布源。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214358'>雾豹藏文章，惊世时一斑。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214358'>众人初易之，久远乃见难。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214358'>忆昔子政在，为翁数解颜。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214358'>五兵森武库，河汉落舌端。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214358'>王阳已富贵，尘冠不肯弹。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214358'>呻吟刊十史，凡例墨新乾。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214358'>宰木忽拱把，相望风隧寒。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214358'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_214358", 214358, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>百楹</span>书万卷，少子似翁贤。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214358'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_214358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214358'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_214358_0'>⑴ 山谷集校：一作高</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214358_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径南康军，游庐山，有诗。作品：知郡太夫改筑射亭与五老峰晤对极为胜赏辄以长句咏叹。和刘太博携家游庐山见寄。驻舆遣人寻访后山陈德方家。南康席上赠刘李二君。<div id='poem_213742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和答刘太博携家游庐山见寄<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰三年赴太和道中作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_213742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213742'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213742'>缓辔松阴不起尘，岚光经雨一番新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213742'>遥知数夜寻山宿，便是全家避世人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213742'>落日已迷烟际路，飞花还报洞中春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213742'>可怜不更寻源入，若见刘郎想问秦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213273'>江雨濛濛作小寒，雪飘五老发毛斑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213273'>城中咫尺云横栈，独立前山望后山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214561'>伯伦酒德无人敌，太白诗名有古风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214561'>浪许薄才酬大雅，长愁<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_2_214561'>月明如昼九江水，天静无云五老峰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214561'>此赏不疏真共喜，登临归兴尚谁同。<div
