0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径南康军，作跋欧阳修庐山高诗。作品：跋欧阳文忠公庐山高诗。<div id='poem_1197195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋欧阳文忠公庐山高诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197195")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197195'>刘公中刚而外和，忍穷如铁石，其所不顾，万夫不能回其首也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197195_comment'></div>家居四十年，不谈时事，宾客造门，必置酒终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197195_comment'></div>其言亹亹，似教似谏，依于庄周、净名之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197195_comment'></div>年八十而耳目聪明，行不扶持，盖不得于彼而得于此也，若庐山之美，既备于欧阳文忠公之诗中，朝士大夫读之慨然，欲税尘驾，少揖其清旷而无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197195_comment'></div>而公独安乐四十年，起居饮食于庐山之下，没而名配此山，以不磨灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197195_comment'></div>录录而得志愿者，视公何如哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197195_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

江西（丰城）

-----title
泰和（太和）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='587104deba4b4a74b3b48098d8d85fe3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("587104deba4b4a74b3b48098d8d85fe3");'><span id='587104deba4b4a74b3b48098d8d85fe3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>，37岁</div><div id='587104deba4b4a74b3b48098d8d85fe3' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>到达太和，有谢表。作品：太和到任谢监司守倅启。<div id='poem_1197036' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197036' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太和到任谢监司守倅启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197036")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197036_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197036'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197036'>伏以百里之政，古人所难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197036_comment'></div>千载之间，作者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197036_comment'></div>诚令有道于此，不独使民宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197036_comment'></div>至于虎为渡河，蝗亦去境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197036_comment'></div>虽然，病在肓者，良医未易起；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197036_comment'></div>旁掣肘者，善书不能工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197036_comment'></div>庭坚何人，缪当岩邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197036_comment'></div>贯木索者方填牢户，争锥刀者猥造讼庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197036_comment'></div>急之则追胥匿以避程，缓之则吏史殚于惟货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197036_comment'></div>放纷熟烂，曾所未闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197036_comment'></div>自非假之以岁时，几于无所措手足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197036_comment'></div>恭惟某官，惟几以成物之务，惟深以尽物之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197036_comment'></div>草木知有威名，风雨不愆期度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197036_comment'></div>河润九里，获承君子之源；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197036_comment'></div>管窥一斑，或得愚者之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197036_comment'></div>犹希善贷，以汔有成。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1197036_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在太和，有述情诗。作品：到官归志浩然二绝。<div id='poem_213196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213196' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_213561_0'>① 原注：山谷有此诗草本真迹云：万重云里孤飞雁，只听归声不见身。却把黄花同怅望，寄传诗句更清新。末句奉亲归制白纶巾，傍注：改。今本南北作南渡，兄弟作摹写，老作改晚作，次篇田邻作邻田。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213561'><div id='poem_sentence_0_213561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213561'>九日黄花倾寿酒，几回青眼望归尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214389'>把卷著床头，我知其人贤。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214389'>昨日河间令，横胥不顾钱。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214389'>如臂使十指，从我伸与拳。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214389'>淹留落闲处，坐研考二篇。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214389'>更使有閒日，歌嘲拾兰荃。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214389'>何时造化手，端为铸龙泉。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214389'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_214389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　在太和，与孔平仲有诗唱和。作品：次韵和答孔毅甫。再用旧韵寄孔毅甫。<div id='poem_214244' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214244' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214244?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和答孔毅甫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214244")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214244_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214244'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214244'>鹏飞鲲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>化未即逍遥游，龙章凤姿终作广陵散。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214244'>湓浦炉边督数钱，故人陆沉心可见。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214244'>气与神兵上斗牛，诗如晴雪濯江汉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214244'>把咏公诗阖且开，旁无知音面墙叹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214244'>我今废书迷簿领，鱼蠹笔锋蛛网砚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214244'>六年国子无寸功，犹得江南万家县。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214244'>客来欲语谁与同，令人熟寐触屏风。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214244'>窃食仰愧冥冥鸿，少年所期如梦中。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214244_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_214088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再用旧韵寄孔毅甫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214088")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214088'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214088'>鉴中之发蒲柳望秋衰，眼中之人风雨俱星散。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214088'>往者托体同青山，健者漂零不相见。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214088'>庾公楼上有诗人，平生落笔泻河汉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214088'>置驿勤来索我诗，自说中郎识元叹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214088'>我方冻坐酒官曹，为公然薪炙冰砚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214088'>不解穷愁著一书，岂有文章名九县。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214088'>奴星结柳送文穷，退倚北窗睡松风。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214088'>太阿耿耿截归鸿，夜思龙泉号匣中。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214088'>斗柄垂天霜雨空，独雁叫群云万重。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214088'>何时握手香炉峰，下看寒泉濯卧龙。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214088'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_214088_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　在太和，有诗寄李冲元。作品：招隐寄李元中。龙眠操三章赠李元中。<div id='poem_214505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214505?labeling=true' target='_blank'>招隐寄李元中<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰四年太和作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214505")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214505'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214505'>吾闻李元中，学为古人青出蓝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214505'>眉目之閒如太华，一段翠气连终南。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214505'>我欲从之路阻长，朱颜日夜惊波往。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214505'>苍梧玉琯生蛛网，老翁忘味倾心赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214505'>眼前记一不识十，谷中白驹閟音响。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214505'>灊山南閒卧青牛，万壑松声不得游。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214505'>愿君为阿阁之紫凤，莫作江湖之白鸥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214505'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_214505_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214075' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214075' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214075?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙眠操三章赠李元中<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214075")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214075_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214075'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214075'>吾其行乎，道渺渺兮骖弱，石岩岩兮川横。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214075'>日月兮在上，风吹雨兮昼冥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214075'>吾其止乎，曲者如几，直者如矢。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214075'>我为直兮棘余趾，我为曲兮不如其已。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214075'>吾耕石田兮为芝，乃三岁兮报我饥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214075_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214075'>嗣兹穑兮则以稼，从子于耜兮龙眠之下。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_214075_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214077' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214077' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214077?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214077_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214077'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214077'>螳臂美兮当车，蟹螯强兮斗虎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214077'>我观兮上下四方，或锡予兮以大武。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214077'>金石兮水波，松柏兮雨霜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214077'>有时女兮不春，我欲筮兮同床。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214077'>筮告予以不好，予与居兮甚妩。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214077'>秦人同炙兮徒欺予，予和羹兮众吐之。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214077'>南山雾兮楚氛，其在兹兮斗日月。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214077'>扬汤兮救暍，从子休兮龙眠之樾。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214077_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214077'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_214077_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214076' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214076' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214076?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214076_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214076'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214076'>朝百牢兮九饭，藜羹不糁兮共槃而笑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214076'>狐白裘兮豹袪，缊袍无里兮亦见春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214076'>予何喜兮安乐此，曰有嘉人兮遗予履。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214076'>发十袭兮示予，与予武兮合度。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214076'>使羿兮隅立，使离朱兮诏之。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214076'>若人兮无鹄，离朱茫然兮羿韔弓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214076'>牧牛兮于鼻，牧羊兮不歧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214076'>有若人兮可与归，因子问涂兮龙眠之蹊。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214076'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_214076_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　在太和，有赋。作品：休亭赋。<div id='poem_1195791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>休亭赋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195791")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195791_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1195791_0'>① 并序　元丰三年公赴太和由清江道作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195791'>吾友萧公饷济父，往有声场屋间，数不利于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195791_comment'></div>归教子弟，以宦学而老于清江之上，开田以为岁，凿池灌园以为笾豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195791_comment'></div>儿时艺木，今憩其阴，独立无邻，自行其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195791_comment'></div>筑亭高原，以望玉笥诸山，用其所以斋心服形者，名之曰「休亭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195791_comment'></div>乞余言铭之，将游居寝饭其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195791_comment'></div>豫章黄庭坚为作《休亭赋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195791_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1195791'>槃礴一轨，万物并驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195791_comment'></div>西风木叶，无有静时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195791_comment'></div>怀蠹在心，必披其枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195791_comment'></div>事时与黄间同机，世智与太行同巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195791_comment'></div>饮羽于市门之下，血刃于风波之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195791_comment'></div>至于行尽而不休，夫如是奚其不丧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195791_comment'></div>故曰：众人休乎得所欲，士休乎成名，君子休乎命，圣人休乎物，莫之婴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195791_comment'></div>吾友济父，居今而好古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195791_comment'></div>不与不取，亦莫子敢侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195791_comment'></div>将强学以见圣人，而休乎万物之祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195791_comment'></div>曩游于世也，献<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1195791", 1195791, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>璞玉</span>而取刖，图封侯而得黥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195791_comment'></div>骄色未锄而物骇，机心先见而鸥惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195791_comment'></div>抚四方者倦矣，乃归休于此亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195791_comment'></div>濯缨于峡水之上游，晞发于舞雩之乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195791_comment'></div>彼玉笥之隐君子，惠我以生刍一束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195791_comment'></div>是谓不蓍而筮从，无龟而吉卜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1195791_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　在太和，吉州知事姚公卒，有墓志铭。作品：朝请大夫知吉州姚公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198006?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫知吉州姚公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198006")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198006_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198006'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198006'>元丰辛酉八月己未，朝请大夫、知吉州事姚公，以疾没于州之正寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198006_comment'></div>属吏豫章黄庭坚，既哭公于堂，吊问诸孤，退则论撰公之世出官次、躬行吏考，遗诸孤，使求立言之君子铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198006_comment'></div>其孤洸、沆曰：「实以某年月某甲子，奉窀穸于钱塘之某原，举先夫人祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198006_comment'></div>维先人之治行，他人所不能言，铭先人宜莫如子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198006_comment'></div>不得辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198006_comment'></div>遂铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198006_comment'></div>恭惟姚氏，其自出甚远，其后乃占吴兴武康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198006_comment'></div>察及思廉父子以史显，璹、元崇皆武后时宰相，而元崇汔相泰陵，名重天下，姚氏遂为中州姓族，与唐俱盛衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198006_comment'></div>有仕江南李氏，以军伐补东布洲镇遏使者，讳瓒，李氏纳图籍，遂归田焉，是为公之高大父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198006_comment'></div>东布洲，今通州之净海也，故公为净海人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198006_comment'></div>曾大父讳某，大父讳某，皆有潜德，在田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198006_comment'></div>及公起家，仕至中郎，累赠先府君刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198006_comment'></div>公登庆历初进士第，由县尉至作州，所至各有吏能，官九迁为职方郎中，会新格以阶寄禄，故今为列大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198006_comment'></div>尝以博士勾当广西经略使公事，广东西新去兵火，所向疮痍者未起，公招慰拊纳，人就耕食，使者视成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198006_comment'></div>以书最知郁林州，三岁未尝论决大辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198006_comment'></div>今天子即位，遣子弟修土贡，例当推恩，公六子皆未仕，遂不遣子而遣其弟，旁郡不能者多愧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198006_comment'></div>通判杭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198006_comment'></div>州东挟漕河皆民田，白龙泽岸善决，毁民成功，公至则为捍水堤，于今以有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198006_comment'></div>其为吉州，盖以揉熟世故，左右文法，又其资长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198006_comment'></div>始至，承前守留事，讼诉盈庭，逮报受书，数吏不胜举，舞文吏亦以尝公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198006_comment'></div>公色夷气平，徐徐区别，皆尽人情，而后境中日以无事，出报谒宾客，一府皆惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198006_comment'></div>公忠信孝友，好学不倦，下士如不及，任职直前，不为后日计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198006_comment'></div>禄仕垂及四十年，奉身菲薄，而弃诸孤之日，衣才可以敛，帑才可以具丧，而诸孤无以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198006_comment'></div>其砥砺廉节，不减古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198006_comment'></div>公讳某，字某，年六十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198006_comment'></div>夫人某氏，有封邑于金华，先公七月卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198006_comment'></div>六男子：长则洸，虔州司理参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198006_comment'></div>滂，蕲州蕲春县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198006_comment'></div>汲、涤、沆、浒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198006_comment'></div>五女子，适某官应昭若，某官阮之武，某官刘敏修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198006_comment'></div>敏修之配既没，许以继室归之，而未行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198006_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1198006'>诸姚有声，望自吴兴，唐迁江南，乃籍金陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1198006_comment'></div>有以武功，执戈海浦，逮其曾孙，耕食不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1198006_comment'></div>公举进士，兴于亩桑，勤官下邑，荐者交章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1198006_comment'></div>从军桂岭，别驾海碣，奉公恤民，如我饥渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1198006_comment'></div>初不赫赫，去思则多，及为庐陵，下车以歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1198006_comment'></div>宜寿富贵，而不克享，勒于铭诗，封恨黄壤。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1198006'></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1198006_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　在太和城外，有词述怀。作品：撼庭竹（呜咽南楼吹落梅）<div id='poem_215231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>撼庭竹 宰太和日吉州城外作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215231")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215231'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215231'>呜咽南楼吹落梅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215231'>闻鸦树惊栖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215231'>梦中相见不多时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215231'>隔城今夜也应知。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215231'>坐久水空碧，山月影沈西。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215231_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215231'>买个宅儿住著伊。<div id='poem_sentence_5_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_215231'>刚不肯相随。<div id='poem_sentence_6_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215231'>如今果被天嗔作，永落鸡群受鸡欺。<div id='poem_sentence_7_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_215231'>空恁可怜伊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_215231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_215231'>风日损花枝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_215231_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年2月2日</a>　在太和，晓梦会作诗寄庐陵知县陈汝器。作品：二月二日晓梦会于庐陵西斋作诗寄陈适用。<div id='poem_213901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213901' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213901?labeling=true' target='_blank'>二月二日晓梦会于庐陵西斋作寄陈适用</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年2月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213901")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213901_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213901'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213901'>燕寝著炉香，愔愔閒窗闼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213901'>梦到郡城东，笑谈西斋月。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213901'>行乐未渠央，苦遭晴鸠聒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213901'>江郡梅李白，士女嬉城阙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213901'>闻道潘河阳，满城花秀发。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_213901'>颇留载酒车，共醉生尘袜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_213901'>想见舞馀姿，风枝斜虿发。<div id='poem_sentence_6_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_213901'>鄙夫不举酒，春事亦可悦。<div id='poem_sentence_7_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_213901'>雨足肥菌芝，沙暄饶笋蕨。<div id='poem_sentence_8_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_213901'>海牛压风帘，野饭薰僧钵。<div id='poem_sentence_9_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_213901'>饱食愧公家，曾无助毫末。<div id='poem_sentence_10_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_213901'>劝盐推<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>新令，王欲茕独活。<div id='poem_sentence_11_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_213901'>此邦淡食伧，俭陋深次骨。<div id='poem_sentence_12_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_213901'>公囷积丘山，贾竖但圭撮。<div id='poem_sentence_13_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_213901'>县官恩乳哺，下吏用鞭挞。<div id='poem_sentence_14_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_213901'>正恐利一源，未塞兔三窟。<div id='poem_sentence_15_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_213901'>寄声贤令尹，何道补黥刖。<div id='poem_sentence_16_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_213901'>从来无研桑，顾影愧簪笏。<div id='poem_sentence_17_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_213901'>何颜课殿上，解绶行采葛。<div id='poem_sentence_18_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_213901'></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_213901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213901'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_213901_0'>⑴ 影元本、陈刻本作惟</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213901_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在太和，书《戒石铭》，摘出孟昶文内“尔俸尔禄，民脂民膏；下民易虐，上天难欺”，镌石以自警。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年12月22日</a>　吉州郡守毕氏卒，山谷作墓志铭。作品：朝请郎知吉州毕公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198007?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请郎知吉州毕公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年12月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198007")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198007'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198007'>吉州太守毕公，以元丰五年冬十一月己丑殁于理所，属县皆来吊哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198007_comment'></div>越厥月己亥，咸集，乃稽度初终，图建不朽，谓豫章黄庭坚曰：「我公好学力行，能仕立节，安可无述」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198007_comment'></div>其孤平仲伏哭且言，实将以某年月某甲子葬于浮光先光禄之兆，先夫人赵氏、继室夫人滕氏皆祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198007_comment'></div>则会有僚，询事考德，勒之金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198007_comment'></div>公讳某，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198007_comment'></div>铭诗曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1198007'>嗟惟毕公，弼周胙国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198007_comment'></div>厥兴来仍，有万吉卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198007_comment'></div>暨卓至诚，文献方毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198007_comment'></div>中原之季，托植南邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198007_comment'></div>高王父玙，始籍浮光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198007_comment'></div>有息济美，执经躬耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198007_comment'></div>王父中正，赠官中都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198007_comment'></div>先人讳京，实光禄卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198007_comment'></div>公举进士，以亲受福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198007_comment'></div>初载州县，荐书一束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198007_comment'></div>丞佐秘书，主簿国子，牧民咸平，以奉常士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198007_comment'></div>佐调兵食，五十七州，输钱转粟，使者借筹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198007_comment'></div>考牧至远，𧥄𧥄羊牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198007_comment'></div>惠深与磁，维二千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198007_comment'></div>熙宁甲寅，河食我壁，联桴委粟，调护老弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198007_comment'></div>降丘筑室，不请邻籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198007_comment'></div>流者归野，止有麰麦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198007_comment'></div>公贮告病，贷之私籯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198007_comment'></div>殆其去归，折券不征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198007_comment'></div>持节关陇，百城竦竦，湔祓廉秀，劾遣赃冗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198007_comment'></div>都尉轻车，尚书中郎，肃肃雍雍，象服左鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198007_comment'></div>朝奉朝请，实维新书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198007_comment'></div>吉在江西，素号难附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198007_comment'></div>公父母之，苦语教诃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198007_comment'></div>曾是健讼，化为舞歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198007_comment'></div>公生戊戌，岁复元首，我民无禄，公疾卧牖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198007_comment'></div>上章请老，王命休之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1198007_comment'></div>拖绅拜赐，屏药治归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1198007_comment'></div>哭者陨涕，孰能使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1198007_comment'></div>其配赵女，椒不盈升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1198007_comment'></div>来继妇职，汝阴之滕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1198007_comment'></div>其宜家人，厥年不登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1198007_comment'></div>有婉淑女，采自葑菲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1198007_comment'></div>壸仪柔嘉，维妾李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1198007_comment'></div>能力大故，哀恤应礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1198007_comment'></div>公子三男，惠连有萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1198007_comment'></div>平仲、和仲，季未胜衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1198007_comment'></div>盖七女子，伯嫁而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1198007_comment'></div>四归以时，三处未字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1198007_comment'></div>长倩孙鼛，淮海维扬，大梁开封，罗遹魏相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1198007_comment'></div>济阴曹南，任氏元常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1198007_comment'></div>蔼蔼诸婿，官学誉处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1198007_comment'></div>人亦多公，择士归女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1198007_comment'></div>公姿忠纯，言可信期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1198007_comment'></div>秋阳皦皦，表襮不施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1198007_comment'></div>力学好问，胸次积藏，有来咨求，倾写河江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1198007_comment'></div>稗官所收，齐谐所记，炙毂流膏，坐客亹亹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1198007_comment'></div>奉己纯约，与人务惇，锦衣被絅，不有其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1198007_comment'></div>世家多财，而不安富，推避分资，以殖季父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1198007_comment'></div>孩养羸露，爰及昏娶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1198007_comment'></div>吏事儒雅，孔惠且明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1198007_comment'></div>不张声势，隐哀索情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1198007_comment'></div>高明显融，万钟应有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1198007_comment'></div>慈祥弟友，讫不中寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1198007_comment'></div>非此其身，或昌厥后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1198007_comment'></div>浮光之麓，楸柏既林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1198007_comment'></div>镵诗立宅，亶古来今<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1198007_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1198007'>诚：丛刊本作「諴」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1198007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1198007'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_61_1198007_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·正集》卷三○。又见《永乐大典》卷二○二○四。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1198007_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在太和，有诗赠陈汝器。作品：长句谢适用惠送吴南雄所赠纸。寄陈适用。<div id='poem_214004' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214004' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214004'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214004'>庐陵政事无全牛，恐是汉时陈太丘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214004'>书记姓名不肯学，得纸无异夏得裘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214004'>琢诗包纸送赠我，自状明月非暗投。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214004'>诗句纵横剪宫锦，惜无阿买书银钩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214004'>一涔之水容<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>牛蹄，识字有数我自知。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214004'>小时双钩学楷法，至令<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>儿子憎家鸡。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214004'>虽然嘉惠敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_214004", 214004, class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214725'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214725'>日月如惊鸿，归燕不及社。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/214613?labeling=true' target='_blank'>药名诗奉送杨十三子问省亲清江<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：元丰五年太和作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_214613_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214613'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214613'>杨侯济北<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>使君子，幕府从容理文史。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214613'>府中无事吏早休，陟釐秋兔写银钩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214613'>驼峰桂蠹樽酒绿，樗蒲黄昏唤烧烛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214613'>天南星移醉不归，爱君清如寒水玉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214613'>葳蕤韭荠煮饼香，别筵君当归故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214613'>诸公为子空青眼，天门东边虚荐章。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214613'>为言同列当推毂，岂有妒妇反专房。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214613'>射工含沙幸人过，水章独摇能腐肠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214613'>山风轰轰虎须怒，千金之子戒垂堂。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214613'>寿亲颊如木丹色，胡麻炊饭玉为浆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214613'>婆娑石上舞林影，付与一世专雌黄。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214613'>寂寥吾意立奴会，可忍冬花不尽觞。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214613'>春阴满地肤生粟，琵琶催醉喧啄木。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214613'>艳歌惊落梁上尘，桃叶桃根断肠曲。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214613'>高帆驾天冲水花，湾头东风转柁牙。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年3月24日</a>　在太和，赋盐万岁乡，有诗。作品：三月乙巳来赋盐万岁乡且搜狝匿赋之家晏饭此舍遂留宿是日大风自采菊苗荐汤饼二首。<div id='poem_213919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213919' id='poem_214596' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214596' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214596?labeling=true' target='_blank'>癸丑宿早禾渡僧舍</a><span id='poem_sentence_4_214596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214596'>厌嚣谢近市，斩绝得僧区。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214596'>形骸束簪笏，可意一事无。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 原注：山谷真迹稿本：“地方百里古诸侯，嚬笑阴晴民具瞻。”寒霜改冰霜，又改冷霜。皆廉改争廉。第五句樽前桃李亲朋友注云：改此。次篇瑞世改下瑞，同生改同兄。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213787'><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在太和，有诗送李次翁。作品：别友赋送李次翁。<div id='poem_1195796' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195796' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195796?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别友赋送李次翁<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰五年太和作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195796")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195796_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195796'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195796'>曩闻义于孙李，指尊选以见招。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195796_comment'></div>惜予行之舒舒，曰其夜以为朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195796_comment'></div>予望道于垝垣，见万物之富有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195796_comment'></div>恨逸驾之绝尘，又骖予以四牡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195796_comment'></div>喟车后之无策，其四方乎索友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195796_comment'></div>仰云飞而注弋，俯渊靓之沈钩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195796_comment'></div>或一能之胜予，忘日月之不予谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195796_comment'></div>或登吞舟之鳞，或下垂天之翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195796_comment'></div>手予弓而不释，恐斯道之或息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195796_comment'></div>为庐江之四季，三隐约于龙眠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195796_comment'></div>维若人之仕蚤，怀明月而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1195796", 1195796, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>丽川</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195796_comment'></div>岁庚午而会梁，语闻道之大用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195796_comment'></div>吸江汉以为深，累丘岳以自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195796_comment'></div>尾击之而首应，西犯之而东抗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195796_comment'></div>弃旗鼓而不逐，俨其陈之堂堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195796_comment'></div>伟道学之崇崛，增懦夫之激昂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195796_comment'></div>观出日于东方，虽食焉而不吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195796_comment'></div>无肯綮以自试，居自喜于馀刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195796_comment'></div>彼覆却于万方，期斯言之犹信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195796_comment'></div>水浑浑而进舟，风剡剡而侵裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195796_comment'></div>恐事亲之不劝，则惟是之同忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195796_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1195796_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在太和，有题南塔寺诗。作品：题太和南塔寺壁。<div id='poem_213436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213436' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_213436'>万事尽还杯酒里，百年俱在大槐中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213436'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_214312_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214312'>装怀酒澹淡<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：菼琰。）</span>，塞意雾空濛。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214312_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214312'>诸公尚无恙，不见陈元龙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214312_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214312'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_214312_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在太和，为胡宗元诗集作序。作品：胡宗元诗集序。<div id='poem_1197066' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197066' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197066?labeling=true' target='_blank'>胡宗元诗集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197066")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197066_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197066'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197066'>士有抱青云之器，而陆沈林皋之下，与麋鹿同群，与草木共尽，独托于无用之空言，以为千岁不朽之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197066_comment'></div>谓其怨邪，则其言仁义之泽也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197066_comment'></div>谓其不怨邪，则又伤己不见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197066_comment'></div>然则其言，不怨之怨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197066_comment'></div>夫寒暑相推，草木与荣衰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197066_comment'></div>庆荣而吊衰，其鸣皆若有谓，候虫是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197066_comment'></div>不得其平，则声若雷霆，涧水是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197066_comment'></div>寂寞无声，以宫商考之则动而中律，金石丝竹是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197066_comment'></div>维金石丝竹之声，《国风》《雅》《颂》之言似之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197066_comment'></div>涧水之声，楚人之言似之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197066_comment'></div>至于候虫之声，则末世诗人之言似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197066_comment'></div>今夫诗人之玩于词，以文物为工，终日不休，若怨世之不知者，以待世之知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197066_comment'></div>然而其喜也，无所于逢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197066_comment'></div>其怨也，无所于伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197066_comment'></div>能春能秋，能雨能旸，发于心之工伎而好其音，造物者不能加焉，故余无以命之，而寄于候虫焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197066_comment'></div>清江胡宗元，自结发迄于白首，未尝废书，其胸次所藏，未肯下一世之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197066_comment'></div>前莫挽，后莫推，是以穷于丘壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197066_comment'></div>然以其耆老于翰墨，故后生晚出，无不读书而好文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197066_comment'></div>其卒也，子弟门人次其诗为若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197066_comment'></div>宗元之子遵道尝与予为僚，故持其诗来求序于篇首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197066_comment'></div>观宗元之诗，好贤而乐善，安土而俟时，寡怨之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197066_comment'></div>可以追次其平生，见其少长不倦，忠信之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197066_comment'></div>至于遇变而出奇，因难而见巧，则又似予所论诗人之态也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197066_comment'></div>其兴托高远，则附于《国风》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197066_comment'></div>其忿世疾邪，则附于《楚辞》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197066_comment'></div>后之观宗元诗者，亦以是求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1197066_comment'></div>故书而归之胡氏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1197066_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在太和，有哀辞。作品：张翔父哀词。<div id='poem_1198091' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198091' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198091?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张翔父哀词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198091")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198091_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198091'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198091'>张庖民翔父，往在皖溪口，开泉长安岭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198091_comment'></div>元丰庚申十月，余舟次泉下，𣂏泉瀹茗，嘉若人之同臭味，盖已夙期与之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198091_comment'></div>于是槃礴泉上，斲土出石，奰屃如龟伏而吐泉，乃名曰灵龟泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198091_comment'></div>勒铭泉石，属裴士章宪之莳梅百本，斩恶木而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198091_comment'></div>壬戌六月，翔父之息耕护翔父之丧过泉下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198091_comment'></div>翔父才德初不在人后，俯仰庸人，不甚出奇见异，其于林泉，心安性服之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198091_comment'></div>作诗清壮，能为不经人道语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198091_comment'></div>迍回岁晚，掩棺曹溪，为作哀词遗耕，且诿翔父之甥胡僧孺唐臣镵之灵龟泉上，以图不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198091_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1198091'>我观翔父兮白璧黄金，蓺兰九畹兮寂寞中林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198091_comment'></div>号钟清角兮蛛以为室，子野骨朽兮谁明此心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198091_comment'></div>骥思天衢兮款段参驾，西子扫除兮嫫母荐衾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198091_comment'></div>万世一轨兮蝼蚁同域，志则日月兮与天照临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198091_comment'></div>走官穷海兮赍恨下泉，归舟载旌兮行路沾襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198091_comment'></div>灵龟伏坎兮古木风雨，款崖铭诗兮金玉同音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198091_comment'></div>九原松声兮吾得诗友，遗稿怨绝兮络纬霜砧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198091_comment'></div>写哀寒水兮琢词坚石，君有嘉息兮，安知来者之不如今。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1198091_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　在太和，为南康军都昌县清隐禅院作记。作品：南康军都昌县清隐禅院记。<div id='poem_1197807' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197807' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197807?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南康军都昌县清隐禅院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197807")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197807_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197807'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197807'>发豫章下流，略鄱阳之封，据彭蠡上游，距落星湾舆行一舍，舟行百里，有大聚落，是为古之鄡阳，今为都昌县治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197807_comment'></div>山悠而水远，能阴而善晴，升南山而望之，如李成、范宽得意图画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197807_comment'></div>盖南山之于都昌，如娟秀人，直其眉目清明处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197807_comment'></div>其东则谢康乐翻经台，其西则石壁精舍，见于康乐之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197807_comment'></div>石壁之湾洄，古木怪石，又陶桓公之钓台也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197807_comment'></div>野老岩之下，盘折为隈隩，其土泉甘而繁松竹，曰「清隐寺」者，唐泰陵皇帝所赐名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197807_comment'></div>其后县令陈杲用咸通赦书，改筑于南山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197807_comment'></div>自尔馀百年，阅废兴多矣，守者非其人，至无用庇风雨以食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197807_comment'></div>熙宁甲寅，令王师孟初得庐山僧建隆主之，遂为南山清隐禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197807_comment'></div>乙卯丙辰而隆卒，长老惟湜自庐山来，百事权舆，愿力成就，而僧太奇实为之股肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197807_comment'></div>于今八年，宫殿崇成，凡所以安众作佛事者，靡不斩新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197807_comment'></div>松竹欣欣，安乐雨露，而无斧斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197807_comment'></div>引高泉以致日用，器械奇巧，如人血脉周流于百体也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197807_comment'></div>阴房藓壁，户牖通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197807_comment'></div>昔者虫蛇之寝庙，虎豹之燕居，无不畚筑丹垩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197807_comment'></div>粪其宽衍以为园蔬，老者有所休，壮者有所游，少欲而常足，无聚禄而望人之腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197807_comment'></div>余得意于山川以来，随食南北二十年矣，未尝不爱乐此山之美，故嘉叹清隐之心，赏风月而同归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197807_comment'></div>清隐曰：「吾与子同与不同，付与五湖云水，惟是艰难以至燕乐，强为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197807_comment'></div>清隐出于福清林氏，饱诸方学，最后入浮山圆鉴法远之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197807_comment'></div>浮山，临济七世孙，如雷如霆，观父可以知子矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1197807_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年8月</a>　在太和，与王巩相遇黄为其文集作序。作品：王定国文集序。<div id='poem_1197068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王定国文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197068")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197068'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197068'>元城王定国，洒落有远韵，才器度越等夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197068_comment'></div>自其少时所与游，尽丈人行，或其大父时客也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197068_comment'></div>生长富贵，其嗜好皆老书生事而不寒乞，诸公多下之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197068_comment'></div>其为文章，初不自贵珍，如落涕唾，时出奇壮语惊天下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197068_comment'></div>坐大臣子不慎交游，夺官流落岭南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197068_comment'></div>更折节，自刻苦，读诸经，颇立训传，以示得意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197068_comment'></div>其作诗及它文章，不守近世师儒绳尺，规摹远大，必有为而后作，欲以长雄一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197068_comment'></div>虽未尽如意，要不随人后，至其合处，便不减古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197068_comment'></div>定国富于春秋，崎岖岭海，去国万里，脱身生还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197068_comment'></div>邂逅江滨，斗酒相劳苦，但以「罪大责轻，未有以报君」为言，郁然发于文藻，未尝私自怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197068_comment'></div>此其志未易为俗人道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197068_comment'></div>王良秣骥子而问途，气已无万里矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197068_comment'></div>恐观者以为定国之所以垂世传后者，如是而已，故为序见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197068_comment'></div>定国名巩，文正公之孙，懿敏公之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197068_comment'></div>癸亥八月壬辰序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1197068_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　在太和，作《食笋》诗寄苏轼。作品：食笋十韵。<div id='poem_214663' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214663' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214663?labeling=true' target='_blank'>食笋十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214663")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214663_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214663'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214663'>洛下斑竹笋，花时压<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_214663", 214663, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>鲑菜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214663'>一束酬千金，掉头不肯卖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214663'>我来白下聚，此族富庖宰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214663'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_214663", 214663, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>茧栗</span>戴地翻，觳觫触墙坏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214663'>𧥄𧥄入中厨，如偿食竹债。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214663'>甘菹和菌耳，辛膳胹姜芥。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214663'>烹鹅杂股掌，炮鳖乱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_214663", 214663, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>裙介</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214663'>小儿哇不美，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_214663", 214663, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>鼠壤</span>有馀嘬。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214663'>可贵生于少，古来食共噫。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214663'>尚想高将军，五溪无人采。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214663'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_214663_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　在太和，作《食笋》诗寄苏轼，并附书札一首。作品：上苏子瞻书。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='2ef0fc68695a44fda5f024dbc3fe850f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2ef0fc68695a44fda5f024dbc3fe850f");'><span id='2ef0fc68695a44fda5f024dbc3fe850f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>，39岁</div><div id='2ef0fc68695a44fda5f024dbc3fe850f' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在太和，有食笋诗唱和。作品：萧巽葛敏修二学子和予食笋诗次韵答之。胡朝请见和食笋诗辄复次韵。<div id='poem_214769' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214769' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214769?labeling=true' target='_blank'>萧巽葛敏修二学子和予食笋诗次韵答之二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214769")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214769_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214769'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214769'>北馔厌羊酪，南庖丰笋菜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214769'>自北初落南，几为儿所卖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214769'>习知价廉平，百态事烹宰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214769_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214769'>盐晞枯腊瘦，蜜渍真味坏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214113'>万物生光辉，夕阳<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作阴）</span>暧平陆。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214113'>人生非金石，亲友多零落。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214113'>漆园有傲吏，君平独寂寞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214113'>所愿从之游，逝者如可作。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214240'>醉眼槩九州，何尝识忧悲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214240'>看云飞翰墨，秀句咏蛛丝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214240'>乐如同队鱼，游泳清水湄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214240'>波涛倏相失，岁月秣马驰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214240'>客事走京洛，乡贡趋礼闱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214240'>艰难思一臂，讲学抱群疑。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214240'>邂逅无因得，君居天南陲。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214240'>谁言井里<sup class='reference id='poem_sentence_13_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214240'>吉守乡丈人，政成犬生氂。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214240'>为公置乐饮，才可慰路岐。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214240_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214240'>矧公妙顾曲，调笑才不羁。<div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_214930_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_214930_0'>① 原注：山谷有《招清公诗》跋云：草堂郑交处士隐处，小塘芙蕖盛开。使鸡伏鸳鸯卵，与人驯狎不惊畏。老禅延恩长老法安师，怀道遁世，清公少时，盖依之数年。今观跋意即此诗，但题不同尔。郑交字子通，见于山谷书尺及题跋。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214930'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214930'>开径老禅来煮茗，还寻<span class='inlineComment2'>（蒋刻本作穿）</span>密竹径中归。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214930_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214930'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214930_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在太和，经石潭寺，和旧诗。作品：元丰癸亥经行石潭寺见旧和栖蟾诗甚可笑因削柎灭稿别和一章。<div id='poem_213985' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213985' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213985?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元丰癸亥经行石潭寺见旧和栖蟾诗甚可笑因削柎灭藁别和一章<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213985")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213985_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213985_0'>① 原校：纂异，一本云千里追奔两蜗角，百年得意大槐宫。梦回身卧竹窗日，院静鸦啼柿叶风。世路侵人头欲白，山僧笑我颊犹红。壁间佳句多丘垄，问讯髑髅聊攓蓬。题云癸卯岁过石潭寺，得前朝诗僧栖蟾长句和之。岁行二十一重来，读旧诗，复用其韵</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213985'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213985'>千里追奔两蜗角，百年得意大槐宫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213985'>空馀祗夜数行墨，不见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_213985", 213985, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>伽梨</span>一臂风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213985'>俗眼只如当日白，我颜非复向来红。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213985'>浮生不作游丝上，即在尘沙逐转蓬<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《山谷外集诗注》卷一三）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213985'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213985_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a3a179f51678423298c2cd5937299429_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a3a179f51678423298c2cd5937299429");'><span id='a3a179f51678423298c2cd5937299429_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>，39岁</div><div id='a3a179f51678423298c2cd5937299429' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在太和，为吉州隆庆禅院转轮藏作记。作品：吉州隆庆禅院转轮藏记。<div id='poem_1197808' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197808' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197808?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吉州隆庆禅院转轮藏记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197808")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197808_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197808'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197808'>维物外禅师冲日有道行，以江南杨氏顺义中筑室于庐陵郡之仁山，其言传，故院不废，至于今为隆庆禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197808_comment'></div>熙宁乙卯，禅师利俨自黄龙慧南道人所来，乐仁山而驻锡焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197808_comment'></div>俨器宇重深，才智能任事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197808_comment'></div>其初举事缘，占邦人心，告以刻《华严》经论板书，经费钜万，人劝其功，期月而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197808_comment'></div>俨曰：「黄龙知见之香，可以普薰斯人矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197808_comment'></div>于是安意庄严此山，即以其书告众人曰：「吾师云：五十六亿万岁，当有大丈夫来自善足天，于龙华菩提木下三转法轮，度诸有缘人，称所有施法佛及僧，是为将来听法种子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197808_comment'></div>其会盟以二月十九日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197808_comment'></div>至元丰三年其日，远近皆会，有异僧来吃饭，忽不知所如，道俗振动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197808_comment'></div>四年六月，会者倾江西、湖南，而僧迦浮图出光明相照此会，人无不归心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197808_comment'></div>故俨因此会供施，转化多人，为转轮经藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197808_comment'></div>木石、金碧妙天下之材，百工妙天下之手，阅二岁而崇成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197808_comment'></div>机发于踵，大车左旋，人天圣凡，东出西没，鬼工神械，耀人心目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197808_comment'></div>其费无虑二千万，皆人自劝，非机巧智力所能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197808_comment'></div>俨之言盖如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197808_comment'></div>豫章黄庭坚曰：「夫一瓶一钵，行若飞鸟，而宴坐十年，荆棘草莱，化为金碧，岁无丰凶，施者常满门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197808_comment'></div>彼非有大才智鼓舞斯人，安能若是」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197808_comment'></div>因其落成为之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1197808_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在太和，为吉州西峰院三秀亭作文。作品：吉州西峰院三秀亭记。<div id='poem_1197811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吉州西峰院三秀亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197811")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197811'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197811'>庐陵比缺守，辄以它吏摄承，托宿传舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197811_comment'></div>吏胥视民为俎豆，执鞭者众，羊失其牧，岁岁仍饥馑，夜有枹鼓，不治声闻京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197811_comment'></div>元丰六年春，诏用寿春魏侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197811_comment'></div>魏侯有家法，以吏能名一世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197811_comment'></div>至则引见官吏，问救敝所先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197811_comment'></div>下书教民，谕以苦语；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197811_comment'></div>奖拔才能，昭劝不勉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197811_comment'></div>戒敕宿负，听以功除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197811_comment'></div>按行州左右曹三狱，累械至三百馀，决其得情引慝，释其点染攀牵，唯上请须报、远逮證左与系轻而捕重者，乃付有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197811_comment'></div>其所裁遣，盖去三分之二，人气以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197811_comment'></div>下车之十二日，芝草二本产于州院狱门之东，其后得一本于郡斋便坐之室，而最盛于西峰僧舍之秀野亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197811_comment'></div>一月之间，凡产芝二十馀，磊落权奇，人物象成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197811_comment'></div>最后寺僧来献黄芝，异本同颖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197811_comment'></div>黄者庆色，异本同颖者不争之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197811_comment'></div>今郡侯乐士爱民，天泽优渥，五谷顺成，钞盗其将衰息，健讼之民且化为慈祥弟友；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197811_comment'></div>魏侯亦将鸿渐于台省，以受福民之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197811_comment'></div>则灵芝之生，不独为吉瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197811_comment'></div>魏侯因改秀野亭以为三秀，属豫章黄庭坚记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197811_comment'></div>魏侯名纶，字君俞，其岁之六月甲戌记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1197811_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
赣州
-----detail

原注：山谷有题名云王诚之、柳诚甫、周道甫、魏伯殊、余洪范、徐适道、徐致虚、马固道、东禅惠老。及诗一首云：惠老有才气，往来三十年。松风沉永日，诗句即深禅。万水千山里，长安大道边。相逢欲留语，此月别时圆。因附注此。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214034'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214428'>前日筑短垣，昨日始封植。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214428'>平生岁寒心，乐见岁寒色。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214428'>翩翩佳公子，为致一窗碧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214428'>忆公来相居，筮吉龟墨食。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214428'>人言陋如何，我自适其适。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214428'>白眼对俗徒，醉帽坐敧侧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214428'>人知爱酒耳，不解心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_214428", 214428, id='poem_sentence_8_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214428'>清风吹月来，欢甚齿折屐。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214428'>有节似见圣，无言谅知默。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214428'>数回长者车，犹恨地未僻。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214428'>阴雨打叶时，曲肱自宴息。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214428'>心游万物初，何处寻辙迹。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214428'>从来修竹林，乃是逸民国。<div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214046'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214046'>公家常匆务，退食用寝讹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214046'>相思虽劳勤，书问不能多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214046'>时雨光万物，开云见羲和。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214046'>乾坤有美意，畎浍未盈科。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214046'>凯风吹南荣，官槐绿婆娑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214046'>鷾鸸将其匹，来巢自成家。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214046'>于物无讥嫌，人亦不谁何。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214046'>眷言生理拙，无地牧鸡鹅。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214046'>丈人春秋高，雏鷇勤摩挲。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214046'>在公每怀归，安得借明驼。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214046'>畏涂失无乡，酌海持一蠡。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214046'>平生朱丝绳，寂寞长生<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>窠。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214046'>故人累累去，宰木上女萝。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214046'>生存半白首，会面阻山河。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214046'>赵侯秉金玉，不与世同波。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214046'>从容觉差晚，鄙心寄琢磨。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214046'>外物良难必，岁寒不改柯<span -----title
建昌
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='02acf95ee07f47af8b599b73da4afe42_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("02acf95ee07f47af8b599b73da4afe42");'><span id='02acf95ee07f47af8b599b73da4afe42_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>，47岁</div><div id='02acf95ee07f47af8b599b73da4afe42' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年12月20日</a>　在建昌，至李常墓哭祭，并题墓柱。作品：题舅氏李公择墓柱。<div id='poem_1197208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题舅氏李公择墓柱</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年12月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197208")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197208'>元祐六年十二月壬申，甥黄大临来祭墓下，厥甲戌，庭坚、叔达乃克来哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197208_comment'></div>呜呼，清明岂弟，友安乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197208_comment'></div>正色立朝，诚笃不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197208_comment'></div>而陆沉如此，呜呼，谁其似之！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197208_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
永修（海昏）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6a164d357f364489b078afe18cb08754_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6a164d357f364489b078afe18cb08754");'><span id='6a164d357f364489b078afe18cb08754_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>，49岁</div><div id='6a164d357f364489b078afe18cb08754' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>　居丧分宁期间，与元聿、李安行等会于海昏。作品：海昏题名。<div id='poem_1197823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197823?labeling=true' target='_blank'>海昏题名记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197823")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197823'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197823'>元祐八年春正月甲辰，韩城元聿、建安胡绩、浚仪李安行、豫章黄某，会于海昏县斋，观智显寺竹林中所得颜家垄断碑，清劲秀发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197823_comment'></div>李君出古编钟，其铭类殳书，不能尽识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197823_comment'></div>座客谈：仓前樟木乃是数百年物，材木也，而能若是之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197823_comment'></div>叹李公择冢上之松已拱，无不慨然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197823_comment'></div>元君云，玉真观道士王从政治石欲刻余书，因书予之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197823_comment'></div>黄某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197823_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，51岁</div><div id='58e2d40321fe40bb8210b1f583f7e067' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年2月</a>　至江陵府，寓承天寺，作塔记。作品：江陵府承天禅院塔记。<div id='poem_1197815' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197815' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197815?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江陵府承天禅院塔记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197815")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197815_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197815'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197815'>绍圣二年，余以史事得罪窜黔中，道出江陵，寓承天，以补纫春服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197815_comment'></div>时住持僧智珠，方撤旧僧伽浮图于地，瓦木如山，而嘱余曰：「成功之后，愿乞文记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197815_comment'></div>余笑曰：「作记不难，顾成功为难耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197815_comment'></div>后六年，余蒙恩东归，则七级浮图岿然立于云霄之上矣，因问其缘，珠曰：「此虽出于众力，费以万缗，鸠工于丁丑，而落成于壬午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197815_comment'></div>其难者既成功矣，其不难者敢乞之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197815_comment'></div>余曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197815_comment'></div>谨按，承天禅院僧伽浮图，作于高氏在荆州时，既坏，而主者非其人，枝撑以度岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197815_comment'></div>有知进者，住持十八年，守旧而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197815_comment'></div>智珠初问心法于清源奇道者，而自闽中来，则佐知进主院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197815_comment'></div>道俗欣欣，皆曰：「起废扶倾，惟此道人能之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197815_comment'></div>于是六年，作而新之者过半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197815_comment'></div>知进殁，众归珠，而不释此浮图，遂崇成耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197815_comment'></div>僧伽本起于盱眙，于今宝祠遍天下，其道化乃溢于异域，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197815_comment'></div>岂释氏所谓愿力普及者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197815_comment'></div>儒者常论一佛寺之费，盖中民万家之产，实生民谷帛之蠹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197815_comment'></div>虽余亦谓之然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197815_comment'></div>然自余省事以来，观天下财力屈竭之端，国家无大军旅勤民丁赋之政，则蝗旱水溢，或疾疫连数十州，此盖生人之共业，盈虚有数，非人力所能胜者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197815_comment'></div>然天下之善人少，不善人常多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197815_comment'></div>王者之刑赏以治其外，佛者之祸福以治其内，则于世教，岂小补哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197815_comment'></div>而儒者尝欲合而轧之，是真何理哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197815_comment'></div>因珠乞文，记其化缘，故并论其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197815_comment'></div>智珠，古田人，有智略而无心，与人无崖岸，又不为翕翕然，故久而人益信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197815_comment'></div>买石者邹永年，篆额者黄乘，作记者黄某，立石者马珹。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1197815_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
宜昌
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='99c6494bb26b4dc79fb866aa11b138e7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("99c6494bb26b4dc79fb866aa11b138e7");'><span id='99c6494bb26b4dc79fb866aa11b138e7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，51岁</div><div id='99c6494bb26b4dc79fb866aa11b138e7' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>十六日，次下牢关；十七日夕，宿黄牛峡；十八日观欧阳修及苏轼记丁元珍梦中事，当晚，宿鹿角摊下。作品：黔南道中行记。<div id='poem_1197801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黔南道中行记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197801")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197801'>绍圣二年三月辛亥，次下牢关，同伯氏元明、三山尉辛纮尧夫，傍崖寻三游洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197801_comment'></div>绕山行竹间二百许步，得僧舍号大悲院，才有小屋五六间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197801_comment'></div>僧贫甚，不能为客煎茶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197801_comment'></div>过大悲，遵微行高下二里许，至三游间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197801_comment'></div>一径栈阁绕山腹，下视深溪悚人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197801_comment'></div>一径穿山腹，黮闇，出洞乃明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197801_comment'></div>洞中略可容百人，有石乳，久乃一滴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197801_comment'></div>中有至处，深二丈馀，可立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197801_comment'></div>尝有道人宴居，不耐久而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197801_comment'></div>厥壬子，尧夫舟先发不相待，日中乃至虾蟆碚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197801_comment'></div>从舟中望之，颐颔口吻，甚类虾蟆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197801_comment'></div>予从元明寻泉源入洞中，石气清寒，流泉激激，泉中出石，腰骨若虬龙纠结之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197801_comment'></div>洞中有崩石，平阔可容数人宴坐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197801_comment'></div>水流寻虾蟆背、垂鼻口间，乃入江耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197801_comment'></div>泉味亦不极甘，但冷熨人齿，亦其源深来远故邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197801_comment'></div>壬子之夕，宿黄牛峡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197801_comment'></div>明日癸丑，舟人以豚酒享黄牛神，两舟人饮福皆醉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197801_comment'></div>长年三老请少驻，乃得同元明、尧夫曳杖清樾间，观欧阳文忠公诗及苏子瞻记丁元珍梦中事，观只耳石马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197801_comment'></div>道出神祠背，得石泉，甚壮急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197801_comment'></div>命仆夫运石去沙，泉且清而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197801_comment'></div>陆羽《茶经》纪黄牛峡茶可饮，因令舟人求之，有媪卖新茶一笼，与草叶无异，山中无好事者故耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197801_comment'></div>癸丑夕，宿鹿角滩下，乱石如囷廪，无复寸土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197801_comment'></div>步乱石间，见尧夫坐石据琴，儿大方侍侧，萧然在事物之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197801_comment'></div>元明呼酒酌，尧夫随磐石为几案床座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197801_comment'></div>夜阑，乃见北斗在天中，尧夫为《履霜》《烈女》之曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197801_comment'></div>已而风激涛波，滩声汹汹，大方抱琴而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1197801_comment'></div>初，余在峡州，问士大夫夷陵茶，皆云觕涩不可饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1197801_comment'></div>试问小吏，云：「唯僧茶味善」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1197801_comment'></div>试令求之，得十饼，价甚平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1197801_comment'></div>携至黄牛峡，置风炉清樾间，身候汤，手㧫得味，既以享黄牛神，且酌元明、尧夫，云不减江南茶味也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1197801_comment'></div>乃知夷陵士大夫但以貌取之耳，可因人告傅子正也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1197801_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途中翻山越岭，备尝艰辛，作词抒发郁闷之情。作品：竹枝词二首并跋。元明题歌罗驿竹枝词。竹枝词二首。<div id='poem_214325' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214325' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214325?labeling=true' target='_blank'>竹枝词二首并跋<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214325")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214325_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214325'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214325'>撑崖拄谷蝮蛇愁，入箐攀天猿掉头。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214325_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214325'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_214325", 214325, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>鬼门关</span>外莫言远，五十三驿是皇州。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214325_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214325'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_214325_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214322?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214322'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214322'>浮云一百八盘萦，落日四十八<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>渡明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214322'>鬼门关外莫言远，四海一家皆弟兄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214322'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_214322_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214322'><span class='label'>按：</span>途中翻山越岭，备尝艰辛，作词抒发郁闷之情<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_214322_0'>⑴ 文集、山谷集作九</div></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　途径施州，夜宿歌罗驿，梦李白，作词三首。作品：予既作竹枝词夜宿歌罗驿梦李白相见于山间曰予往谪夜郎于此闻杜鹃作竹枝词三叠世传之否予细忆集中无有请三诵乃得之。<br /></div><div class='label1' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年3月</a>　到达峡州，得知改复奉议郎权知舒州之任命。<br /></div>

巫山

<div class='label1' id='59861af6e86a4dc497b39927a0ae2be6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("59861af6e86a4dc497b39927a0ae2be6");'><span id='59861af6e86a4dc497b39927a0ae2be6_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　途径巫峡，作词抒发其羁旅之情。作品：减字木兰花(襄王梦里）<div id='poem_215163' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215163' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215163?labeling=true' target='_blank'>减字木兰花<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>登巫山县楼作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215163")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_0_215163_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215163'>宋玉台头。暮雨朝云几许愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215163_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence'
