href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，57岁</div><div id='02a8cb23543f4564bf432fc91eb209fc' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径巫山县，回首蜀中八年，感慨万千，作诗。作品：戏题巫山县用杜子美韵。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>抵达巫峡，访神女祠。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>途径巫峡鬼门关，追昔日贬谪西行，兄长大临愀然之状，不禁莞尔。<br /></div>

-----title
恩施
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b9bf63af7eca492dac5ed02ef6e4c73f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b9bf63af7eca492dac5ed02ef6e4c73f");'><span id='b9bf63af7eca492dac5ed02ef6e4c73f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，51岁</div><div id='b9bf63af7eca492dac5ed02ef6e4c73f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　途径施州，故友张询为施州守，遣使相迎，山谷作词纪之。作品：减字木兰花(使君那里)<div id='poem_215181' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>减字木兰花<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span id='poem_preface_215181_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215181'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215181'>先往使君那里。千骑尘中依约是。<div -----title
彭水
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9af372b401df4e9cbb17f94bf30d8bca_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9af372b401df4e9cbb17f94bf30d8bca");'><span id='9af372b401df4e9cbb17f94bf30d8bca_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年4月23日</a>　到达黔州。作品：谢黔州安置表。<div id='poem_1195817' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195817' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195817?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢黔州安置表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年4月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195817")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195817_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195817'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195817'>臣庭坚言：昨蒙恩谪授涪州别驾，黔州安置，已于四月二十三日到黔州公参讫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195817_comment'></div>圣恩宽大，善贷曲成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195817_comment'></div>刳心陨元，未足称报<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195817_comment'></div>伏念臣草茅下士，诗礼小儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195817_comment'></div>渐阶清涂，厕列文馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195817_comment'></div>误蒙器使，孤奉国恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195817_comment'></div>罪在至愚，刑兹无赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195817_comment'></div>有司议狱，期从鈇钺之诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195817_comment'></div>明主原心，终全蝼蚁之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195817_comment'></div>虽投裔土，犹得为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195817_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下有天地好生之心，有尧汤不蔽之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195817_comment'></div>旁开用命之网，或漏吞舟之鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195817_comment'></div>顾兹未死之年，皆是再生之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195817_comment'></div>罪深责薄，感极涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195817_comment'></div>重念臣万里戴天，一身吊影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195817_comment'></div>兄弟滨于寒饿，儿女未知存亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195817_comment'></div>不敢每怀，惟深自咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195817_comment'></div>穷乡多怪，苦雾常阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195817_comment'></div>木石为亲，柳或几于生肘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195817_comment'></div>日月在上，葵敢忘于倾心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195817_comment'></div>报德无阶，惟忠与孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195817_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1195817_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，寓居开元寺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，苏轼闻山谷贬黔南，作诗《桄榔杖寄张文潜时初闻黄鲁直迁黔南范淳父九疑也》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年6月12日</a>　兄长黄大临离开黔州，山谷有诗送别。作品：和答元明黔南赠别。<div id='poem_213740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_213740'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213740'>万里相看忘逆旅，三声清泪落离觞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213740_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，与苏轼有书信往来。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，通判张诜待之甚厚，有诗。作品：与黔悴张茂宗。<div id='poem_213510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213510")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_content_213510'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213510'>静居门巷似乌衣，文采风流众所归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213510'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213510'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_213510_0'>⑴ 原作来同，据山谷集乙</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213510_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，为金氏作墓志铭。作品：永安县君金氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永安县君金氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198061")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198061_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198061'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198061'>夫人永安县君金氏，家番阳，故广东转运使、尚书度支郎中讳君卿之第二女，供备库副使、夔州兵马都监梁君在和之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198061_comment'></div>夫人事继母以孝闻，事其姑如事其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198061_comment'></div>居家富贵，归梁君而安其贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198061_comment'></div>笃信释氏，诵其书，奉其戒律，年四十则扫除一室，谢梁君而斋居，杜多比丘尼以为难能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198061_comment'></div>平居笑语雍容，虽其所不怿，未尝见声气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198061_comment'></div>对梁君如宾客，处姬妾如娣姒，抚诸子如己出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198061_comment'></div>喜读书，善笔札，诸子皆授经于夫人，未尝从师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198061_comment'></div>其子千之有学行，士大夫称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198061_comment'></div>岁在乙亥、月仲冬、日某甲子，没于夔州官室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198061_comment'></div>儿女姬妾，刲肉为祭，炼臂然顶，刺血书佛经者数人，其慈爱出于忠信可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198061_comment'></div>六男子：长定之，三班借职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198061_comment'></div>次千之、升之、亚之、精之、百之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198061_comment'></div>四女皆在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198061_comment'></div>千之以汝南程旨味道状夫人内行来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198061_comment'></div>味道立义不侵，少许可，非其实不传，故叙而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198061_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1198061'>猗欤夫人，在家怡怡，来归祁祁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198061_comment'></div>女宗妇师，内外具宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198061_comment'></div>宾礼夫子，慈爱妾媵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198061_comment'></div>退考于室，渊默清静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198061_comment'></div>鸤鸠在桑，在梅在榛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198061_comment'></div>怒之喜之，乳哺补纫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198061_comment'></div>宴居不惰，文史翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198061_comment'></div>诸子执经，其音秩秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198061_comment'></div>衰门之女，夫人有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198061_comment'></div>兴门之男，千之似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198061_comment'></div>永安锡封，以夫介宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198061_comment'></div>千之方兴，尚贲其垄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1198061_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，题古乐府后。<div id='poem_1197129' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197129' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197129?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题古乐府后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197129")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197129_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197129'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197129'>古乐府有「巴东三峡巫峡长，猿鸣三声泪沾裳」，但以抑怨之音，和为数叠，惜其声今不传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197129_comment'></div>余自荆州上峡入黔中，备尝山川险阻，因作前二叠传与巴娘，令以《竹枝》歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197129_comment'></div>前一叠可和云：「鬼门关外莫言远，五十三驿是皇州」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197129_comment'></div>后一叠可和云：「鬼门关外莫惆怅，四海一家皆弟兄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197129_comment'></div>或各用四句，入《阳关》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《小秦王》）</span>，亦可歌也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197129_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，为张询诗集作跋语。作品：书张仲谋诗集后。<div id='poem_1197404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197404?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书张仲谋诗集后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197404")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197404'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197404'>仲谋与余同在叶县，皆年少，然仲谋当官清慎，已有老成之风，相乐如弟兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197404_comment'></div>此时仲谋刻意学作诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197404_comment'></div>去叶县后，三十年间，随禄东西，或不相见数岁，然每相见，仲谋诗句必进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197404_comment'></div>今窜逐蛮夷中，而仲谋来守施州，所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1197404", 1197404, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>鼪鼯</span>同游蓬藋柱宇，而兄弟亲戚謦欬其侧者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197404_comment'></div>又寄平生诗，使余评之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197404_comment'></div>余观仲谋之诗，用意刻苦，故语清壮，持身岂弟，故声和平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197404_comment'></div>作语多而知不雕为工，事久而知世间无巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197404_comment'></div>以此自成一家，可传也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197404_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　在黔州，作词一首。作品：醉蓬莱(对朝云叆叇)画堂春(摩围小隐枕蛮江)<div id='poem_215230' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215230' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215230?labeling=true' target='_blank'>醉蓬莱</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215230")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215230'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215230'>对朝云叆叇，暮雨霏微，乱峰相倚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215230'>巫峡高唐，锁楚宫朱翠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215230'>画戟移春，靓妆迎马，向一川都会。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215230'>万里投荒，一身吊影，成何欢意。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215230_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215230'>尽道黔南，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_215230", 215230, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>去天尺五</span>，望极神州，万里烟水。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215230'>尊酒公堂，有中朝佳士。<div id='poem_sentence_5_215230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_215230'>荔颊红深，麝脐香满，醉舞裀歌袂。<div id='poem_sentence_6_215230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215230'>杜宇声声，催人到晓，不如归是。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_215230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_215230'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(215230)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_215121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215121' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215121?labeling=true' target='_blank'>画堂春<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215121")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215121'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215121'>摩围小隐枕蛮江。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215121'>蛛丝闲锁晴窗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215121'>水风山影上修廊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215121'>不到晚来凉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215121_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215121'>相伴蝶穿花径，独飞鸥舞溪光。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215121'>不因送客下绳床。<div id='poem_sentence_5_215121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_215121'>添火炷炉香。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_215121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年5月6日</a>　其弟黄叔达携自己和山谷的家眷抵达黔州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年5月6日</a>　在黔州，书李白《秋浦歌》十五篇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年6月</a>　在黔州，始用“涪翁”之名。作品：忠州复古记。<div id='poem_1197793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忠州复古记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197793")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197793'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197793'>忠州，汉巴郡之临江、垫江县也，其治所在临江，故梁以为临州，后周以为南宾郡，唐贞观八年始为忠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197793_comment'></div>其地荒远瘴疠，近臣得罪，多出为刺史、司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197793_comment'></div>故刘尚书以刺史贬一年死，陆宣公以别驾贬十年死，李忠懿公以刺史居六年，白文公以刺史居二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197793_comment'></div>其后喜事者，以四公俱贤，图象为四贤阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197793_comment'></div>故相、赠司徒、郑州刺史、南华刘晏士安，故相、赠兵部尚书、嘉兴陆贽敬舆，中书侍郎、平章事、赠司徒、安邑李吉甫宏宪，刑部尚书致仕、赠右仆射、下邽白居易乐天，由开元以来，讫于会昌，四君子相望，凛然犹有生气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197793_comment'></div>忠民尝以此自负，而郡守至者必矜式焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197793_comment'></div>绍圣三年正月，知州事营丘王君辟之圣涂，下车问民疾苦，曰吏骜而民困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197793_comment'></div>故圣涂为州，拊养柔良，知其饱饥，锄治奸猾，几于伤手，治声翕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197793_comment'></div>邑中豪吏故时受赇舞文法者，相与谋曰：「属且无类」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197793_comment'></div>即以智笼小騃吏，群诉于部使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197793_comment'></div>圣涂不为变，且叹曰：「白头老翁，安能碌碌畏吏苛民邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197793_comment'></div>亦会部使者审吏为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197793_comment'></div>而圣涂治郡政成，时休车骑野次，咨问故老，访四贤之逸事，而三君之政，寂寥无闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197793_comment'></div>盖士安既赐死，而敬舆别驾不治民，宏宪虽在州六年，亦默耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197793_comment'></div>乐天由江州司马除刺史，为稍迁，故为郡最豫暇，有声迹，又其在州时诗见传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197793_comment'></div>东楼以宴宾佐，西楼以瞰鸣玉溪，登龙昌上寺以望江南诸山，张乐巴子台以会竹枝歌女，东坡种花，东涧种柳，皆相传识其处所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197793_comment'></div>于是一花一竹，皆考于诗，复其旧贯，种荔支数百株，移木莲且十本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197793_comment'></div>忠于一时遂为三峡名郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197793_comment'></div>圣涂乃以书誇涪翁曰：「为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197793_comment'></div>涪翁曰：「圣涂急鳏寡之病，使远方民沐浴县官之泽，可谓知务矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197793_comment'></div>扫除四贤之室，思欲追配古人，可谓乐善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197793_comment'></div>乐天去忠州，于今为二百七十有九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197793_comment'></div>在官者鳃鳃然，常忧瘴疠之病己，数日求去，故乐天之遗事芜没欲尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197793_comment'></div>圣涂齐人也，盖不能巴峡之风土，又其击强拨烦，材有馀地，而晚暮为远郡守，乃能慨然不倦，兴旧起废，使郡中池观花竹郁然，如元和己亥时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197793_comment'></div>追乐天而与之友，圣涂于是贤于人远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197793_comment'></div>圣涂为州之明年六月，而涪翁为之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1197793_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年8月15日</a>　在黔州，与黔守曹谱等人饮宴赏月，作词数阕。作品：减字木兰花(中秋多雨)减字木兰花(中秋无雨)减字木兰花(浓云骤雨)减字木兰花(举头无语)减字木兰花(月中笑语）减字木兰花（当年夜雨）<div id='poem_215180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>减字木兰花<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215180")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215180_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_215180'>丙子仲秋，奉陪黔阳曹使君伯达玩月，作减字木兰花，兼简施州张使君仲谋</div><div id='poem_preface_215180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215180'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215180'>中秋多雨。常是樽罍狼藉去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215180'>今夜云开。须道姮娥得得来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215180_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215180'>不知云外。还有清光同此会。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215180'>笛在层楼。声彻摩围顶上头。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215180_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215180'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_215180_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215165?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215165'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215165'>中秋无雨。醉送月衔西岭去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215165'>笑口须开。几度中秋见月来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215165_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215165'>前年江外。儿女传杯兄弟会。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215165'>此夜登楼。小谢清吟慰白头。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215165_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215165'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_215165_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215174?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215174'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215174'>浓云骤雨。巫峡有情来又去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215174'>今夜天开。不与姮娥作伴来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215174_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215174'>清光无外。白发老人心自会。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215174'>何处歌楼。贪看冰轮不转头。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215174'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_215174_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215177?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215177_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_215177'>丙子仲秋黔守席上，客有举岑嘉州中秋诗曰：“今夜鄜州月，闺中只独看。遥怜小儿女，未解忆长安。”因戏作</div><div id='poem_preface_215177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215177'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215177'>举头无语。家在月明生处住。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215177'>拟上摩围。最上峰头试望之。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215177_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215177'>偏怜络秀。苦淡同甘谁更有。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215177_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215173?labeling=true' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年9月16日</a>　在黔州，书《戏答陈元舆》诗。作品：跋所书戏答陈元舆诗。<div id='poem_1197536' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197536' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　在黔州，题织锦图。作品：题苏若兰回文织锦图。<div id='poem_213462' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213462' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213462")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213462_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　在黔州，送黔守曹谱口号。作品：送曹黔南口号。<div id='poem_213796' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213796' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_213796'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213796'>摩围山色醉今朝，试问归程指斗杓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213796'>荔子阴成棠棣爱，竹枝歌是去思谣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213796'>阳关一曲悲红袖，巫峡千波怨画桡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213796'>归去天心承雨露，双鱼来报旧宾僚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213796'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213796_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　在黔州，作王圣涂二亭歌。<div id='poem_213998' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213998' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213998?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王圣涂二亭歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213998")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213998_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_213998'>忠州太守王圣涂罢忠州，春秋六十有六，将告老于朝而休于营丘，以书抵黔州，告其同年生黄鲁直曰：营丘有叟，将自此归矣。舍傍作二亭以休馀日，子为我名，且归以夸父老。鲁直名其一曰休休，上言事，下言德也。其一曰冥鸿，言公自此去矰缴远矣。圣涂喜曰：子盍为我歌。</div><div id='poem_preface_213998_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213998'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213998'>营丘之下，有宅有田。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213998'>梨枣兮觞豆，耘耔兮为年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213998'>鸡栖埘兮羊豕在牧，课儿子兮蓺松菊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213998'>炙背兮墙东，梦覆舟兮涛且风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213998'>洋之回兮可以驾，孙甥<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作男）</span>扶舆兮父老同社。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_213998'>洋之水兮可以舟入，鸥鸟兮与之游。<div id='poem_sentence_5_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_213998'>一世兮蜉蚁，桑榆兮憖可收。<div id='poem_sentence_6_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_213998'>从此休兮，公谁黄发之休。<div id='poem_sentence_7_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_213998'>伟长松兮卧龙蛇，阅千岁兮不改其柯。<div id='poem_sentence_8_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_213998'>震雷不惊兮，谁欲休之以蜩蛭。<div id='poem_sentence_9_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_213998'>下有锦石兮可用杯勺，云月供帐兮万籁奏乐。<div id='poem_sentence_10_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_213998'>石子磊磊兮涧谷纵横，春月桃李兮士女倾城。<div id='poem_sentence_11_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_213998'>时雨霖兮忽若海潦收，无事兮我以观万物之情。<div id='poem_sentence_12_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_213998'>儿时所蓺兮桃李纤纤，随世风波兮吹而北南。<div id='poem_sentence_13_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_213998'>昔去兮拱把，今归兮与天参。<div id='poem_sentence_14_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_213998'>与古人兮合契，树如此兮我何以堪。<div id='poem_sentence_15_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_213998'>鸿雁嗷兮或在洲渚，有心于粒兮弋者所取。<div id='poem_sentence_16_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_213998'>飞冥冥兮渺万里而绝，去薮泽之罗者兮官<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作观）</span>予落羽。<div id='poem_sentence_17_213998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_213998'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_213998_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　在黔州，作洪州分宁县云岩禅院经藏记。<div id='poem_1197804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州分宁县云岩禅院经藏记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197804")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197804'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197804'>江西多古尊宿道场，居洪州境内者以百数，而洪州境内禅席居分宁县者以十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197804_comment'></div>二十年来，住持者非其人，十室而八也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197804_comment'></div>其有户籍而单丁住持上官租者，十室而五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197804_comment'></div>分宁县中，惟云岩院供十方僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197804_comment'></div>山谷道人自为童儿时数之，未尝得人，其号十方，名存而实亡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197804_comment'></div>元祐末，山谷以忧居里中，有玉山僧法清尸此禅席，而十方僧往来，不得展钵托宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197804_comment'></div>清闻山谷尝道云岩初无藏经，慨然欲办此缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197804_comment'></div>其人才智足以兴事，而道行不能感人，论者纷纷而中废，清亦得罪去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197804_comment'></div>韶阳老人得道于黄龙祖心禅师，被褐怀玉，隐约山间，二十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197804_comment'></div>自言山野不解世事，无出山为人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197804_comment'></div>邑中贤士大夫及其耆宿商度曰：「欲兴云岩法席，必得本色道人，若是则莫宜韶阳公」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197804_comment'></div>于是逼致之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197804_comment'></div>韶阳公幡然受请，入居方丈之东死心寮中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197804_comment'></div>居数月，粥鱼斋鼓，隐隐谹谹，闻者动心，升堂入室，肃肃雍雍，观者拱手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197804_comment'></div>韶阳公曰：「与十方人作粥饭，缘则可矣，非老人为道而来之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197804_comment'></div>古人云：我若一向举扬宗乘，法堂前草深一丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197804_comment'></div>吾恐云岩门外荆棘生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197804_comment'></div>不得已，众竭力为我置藏经，且于末法中作佛事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197804_comment'></div>众亦不解老人语，而谋为转轮《莲华经》藏，庇以华屋，大为经堂，严以金碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197804_comment'></div>有山者献木，有田者献谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197804_comment'></div>如此且阅三岁，檀化为魔，种种沮坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197804_comment'></div>韶阳壁立，不战不怖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197804_comment'></div>诸魔所摄，去魔即佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197804_comment'></div>作大庄严，远近倾倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197804_comment'></div>魔复为檀，自谢负堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197804_comment'></div>鸣蠡伐鼓，相我成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1197804_comment'></div>于是四方来观者乃曰：「江东西经藏凡十数，未有盛于云岩者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1197804_comment'></div>而此经藏者，发端于山谷，不得不为之记」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1197804_comment'></div>山谷曰：「物之成坏，盖自有数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1197804_comment'></div>要以有道者为所依，然后崇成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1197804_comment'></div>韶阳所以不得已而置藏经，是中有正法眼句，禅子自当于死心寮中求之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1197804_comment'></div>凡此藏经，主工者僧悟机，如京师印经者僧希文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1197804_comment'></div>韶阳老人者，大长老悟新；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1197804_comment'></div>山谷道人者，谪授涪州别驾戎州安置黄庭坚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1197804_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　在黔州，作词供备黔守曹谱生日。作品：水龙吟（早秋明月新圆）品令（败叶霜天晓）<div id='poem_215221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鼓笛慢/水龙吟 黔守曹伯达供备生日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215221")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215221'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215221'>早秋明月新圆，汉家戚里生飞将。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215221'>青骢宝勒，绿沉金锁，曾瞻天仗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215221'>种德江南，宣威西夏，合宫陪享。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215221'>况当年定计，昭陵与子，勋劳在、诸公上。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215221_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215221'>千骑风流年少，暂淹留、莫辜清赏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215221'>平坡驻马，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_215221", 215221, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>虚弦</span>落雁，思临虏帐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_215221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_215221'>遍舞摩围，递歌彭水，拂云惊浪。<div id='poem_sentence_6_215221_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215221'>看朱颜绿鬓，封侯万里，写<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_215221", 215221, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>凌烟像</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_215221_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215143' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215143' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215143?labeling=true' target='_blank'>品令 送黔守曹伯达供备</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215143")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215143_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215143'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215143'>败叶霜天晓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215143'>渐鼓吹、催行棹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215143'>栽成桃李未开，便解银章归报。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215143'>去取麒麟图画，要及年少。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215143'>劝公醉倒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215143'>别语怎、醒时道。<div id='poem_sentence_5_215143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_215143'>楚山千里暮云，正锁离人情抱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_215143_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215143'>记取江州司马，坐中最老。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_215143_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>　在黔州，作词评论苏轼之和陶。作品：南歌子（诗有渊明语）<div id='poem_215141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南歌子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215141")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215141'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215141'>诗有渊明语，歌无子夜声。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215141'>论文思见老弥明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215141'>坐想罗浮山下、羽衣轻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215141_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215141'>何处黔中郡，遥知隔晚晴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215141'>雨馀风急断虹横。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215141'>应梦池塘春草、若为情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_215141_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年春</a>　在黔州，泸州太守王献可以书来求山谷为其作书，山谷有答书。作品：答王补之书。<div id='poem_1195847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195847?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答王补之书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195847")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195847_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195847'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195847'>庭坚再拜，补之使君阁下：治平中在场屋间，尝与李师载兄弟游，因熟知阁下才德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195847_comment'></div>此时方以见闻寡浅，日夜刻意读书，未尝接人事，故不得望颜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195847_comment'></div>其后从仕东西，忧患潦倒，每见师载，犹能道补之出处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195847_comment'></div>今者不肖得罪简牍，弃绝明时，万死投荒，一身吊影，不复齿于士大夫矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195847_comment'></div>所以虽闻阁下近在泸南，而不敢通书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195847_comment'></div>忽蒙赐教，礼盛而使勤，词恭而意笃，所以奉王公大人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195847_comment'></div>投之御魑魅，苟活人之前，始惧而不敢当，读之赧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195847_comment'></div>惟是先公全州之政，名实相权，重以李诚之所论撰，可信不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195847_comment'></div>顾流人罪垢不可洗湔，虽强颜称述，但污辱先公耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195847_comment'></div>惟阁下文武不疚，治边郡有声，是将震耀功伐自昭于青云之上，以笃前人之烈，宜当属之王公大人得意之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195847_comment'></div>而自贬损，托名于不肖，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195847_comment'></div>在中朝时，挟文章、有名誉、居庭坚之右者甚众，阁下不取诸彼而取诸此，何好恶酸咸，与时异哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195847_comment'></div>平居其言不见信于人，况于罪戾有言不信之时，阁下何取焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195847_comment'></div>加以忧患之馀，神明去干，旧所记书，昏忘略尽，穷乡又无书史可备寻绎，提笔临纸，茫然不知所云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195847_comment'></div>而辱诿托丁宁，期于必得，勉辄成命，书其大略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195847_comment'></div>言语昧陋，安能增光辉万一，以慰孝子之思，以满全人之意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195847_comment'></div>遽授来使，病于夏畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195847_comment'></div>庭坚再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1195847_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　，极少作诗。在黔州，贬谪以来，极少作诗。且俸禄微博，生计艰难，不得已躬自建房、种地、买菜等，自称黔中老农。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年8月26日</a>　在黔州，读韦昭《博弈论》，感慨不已，自誓日后不复弈棋。作品：书博弈论后。<div id='poem_1197436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书博弈论后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年8月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197436")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197436'>涪翁放逐黔中，既无所用心，颇喜弈棋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197436_comment'></div>绍圣四年八月丁未，偶开韦昭《博弈论》，读之喟然，以为真无益于事，诚陶桓公所谓牧猪奴戏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197436_comment'></div>因自誓不复弈棋，自今日以来，不信斯言，有如黔江云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197436_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年12月23日</a>　在黔州，表兄张向提举夔州路常平，因黔州属夔州路管辖，张向请朝廷移迁山谷以避嫌；于是诏移戎州安置。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年冬</a>　在黔州，答李材书，述其黔中冬日生活。<div id='poem_1195949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李材书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195949")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195949'>某顿首启：顷辱惠书勤恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195949_comment'></div>闲居多病，人事废绝，遇风日晴暖，从门生、儿侄，扶杖逍遥林麓水泉之间，忽不知日月之成岁，以是久不报书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195949_comment'></div>专人来，又蒙笺记累纸，存问益勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195949_comment'></div>伏承偃息田里，侍奉吉庆，乡邻父兄，鸡酒日至，何慰如之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195949_comment'></div>今岁黔中霜雪早寒，数日来，雪欲及摩围之麓，不肖到黔中三年，所未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195949_comment'></div>不审南充冬候何如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195949_comment'></div>此方旧同僚，惟吕东玉在，亦逼代矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195949_comment'></div>守倅见不数，然意乃郑重，皆清慎不扰，不易得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195949_comment'></div>某杜门终岁，益觉清净，时苦门生抱经来咨问，尚俗气未除耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195949_comment'></div>范公去已十月，不得音问，比闻为凌云疏请，或被逼，往往复来此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195949_comment'></div>窜逐之馀，枯木寒灰，未委沟壑，无阶会集，惟有驰情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195949_comment'></div>千万进学畜德，以须升用，使二亲身见之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1195949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，与秦观同处贬谪逆境，仍有书信通问。作品：与太虚公书。<div id='poem_1195938' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195938' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195938?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与太虚公</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195938")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195938_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195938'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195938'>屏弃不毛之乡以御魑魅，耳目昏塞，旧学废忘，直是黔中一老农耳，足下何所取重，而赐之书？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195938_comment'></div>陈义甚高，犹河汉而无极，皆非不肖之所敢承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195938_comment'></div>古之人不得躬行于高明之势，则心亨于寂寞之宅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195938_comment'></div>功名之涂不能使万夫举首，则言行之实必能与日月争光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195938_comment'></div>卧云轩中主人，盖以此傲睨一世耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195938_comment'></div>先达有言「老去自怜心尚在」者，若庭坚则枯木寒灰，心亦不在矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195938_comment'></div>足下富于春秋，才有馀地，使有力者能挽而致之通津，恐不当但托之空言而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195938_comment'></div>无缘承教，以开固陋，因来有所述作，幸能寄惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195938_comment'></div>灌园之馀，尚须呻吟，以慰衰疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195938_comment'></div>谨勒手状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1195938_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，洪刍派人送书信来，有答书，提出“东坡文章妙天下，其短处在好骂，甚勿袭其轨也”作品：答洪驹父书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，为洪刍作州学斋铭。作品：晋州州学斋堂铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，乡人聚白金十余斤与山谷，却为一士子隐去。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，杨皓从其学，山谷期许甚重。作品：杨明叔惠诗格律词意皆熏沐去其旧习予为之喜而不寐文章者道之器也言者行之枝叶也故次韵作四诗报之耕礼义之田而深其耒 明叔言行有法当官又敏于事而恤民故予期之远者大者。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，杨皓从其学，山谷有托付斯文之意。作品：庭坚老懒衰堕多年不作诗已忘其体律因明叔有意于斯文试举一纲而张万目盖以俗为雅以故为新百战百胜如孙吴之兵棘端可以破簇如甘蝇飞卫之射此诗人之奇也明叔当自得之公眉人乡先生之妙语震耀一世我昔从公得之为多故今以此事相付。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，杨皓受学有得，山谷激励有加。作品：明叔惠示二颂云见七佛偈似有惊觉乃是见道之端发于此以二颂为报。<div id='poem_213758' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213758' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213758?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明叔惠示二颂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>云见七佛偈似有警觉乃是向道之端发于此故以二颂为报<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213758")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213758_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213758_0'>① 原注：《年谱》绍圣丁丑谪黔南作。　按：此二诗为《次韵杨明叔》七诗中的两首。另五首已见《山谷内集诗注》卷一二。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213758'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213758'>山川围宴坐，日月转庭隅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213758'>般若寻常事，如来卧起俱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213758'>多闻成外道，只是守凡夫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213758'>欲听虚空教，须弥作鼓桴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213758_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213758'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213758_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214520?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_214520_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214520'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214520'>平生讨经论，苦行峻廉隅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214520'>伪契已无分，买山云自如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214520'>身为廊庙宰，梦作种田夫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214520'>欲辨身兼梦，还如鼓与桴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，作谪居诗十首。作品：谪居黔南十首。<div id='poem_213421' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213421' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_2_513249_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，作蚁蝶图诗。<div id='poem_215021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215021?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蚁蝶图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215021")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_215021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215021'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215021'>胡蝶双飞得意，偶然毕命网罗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215021'>群蚁争收坠翼，策勋归去南柯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215021'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_215021_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，临兰亭帖，有跋文。作品：书临写兰亭后。<div id='poem_1197460' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197460' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197460?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书临写兰亭后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197460")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197460_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197460'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197460'>刘退夫作研屏，求乞小字，试为临写《兰亭》，真成丑女捧心，但使人捧腹耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197460_comment'></div>绍圣四年十一月乙卯，摩围阁中书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1197460_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，作墓志铭。作品：朝奉郎通判泾州韩君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198015?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎通判泾州韩君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍圣四年冬）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198015")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198015'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198015'>君讳复，字辨翁，其先邓之南阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198015_comment'></div>其上世有为龙游令者，不能归，而家于陵井，遂为陵之井研人，至辨翁阅五世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198015_comment'></div>曾大父归惠为州吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198015_comment'></div>当李顺乱时，诸郡皆尚威断，凡贼所诖误，以尽杀为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198015_comment'></div>归惠条其重轻过故为等差，抱法律争于廷，所活且百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198015_comment'></div>谓其子庆之曰：「吾后当有兴者，及尔子孙，皆使为诗书」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198015_comment'></div>庆之生君考颖，仕至太子中允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198015_comment'></div>世父崇，尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198015_comment'></div>兄震，朝请大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198015_comment'></div>韩氏遂为陵州衣冠族姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198015_comment'></div>辨翁既仕中州，有田于叶，故今为叶人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198015_comment'></div>初，辨翁尚小，自知求师，去从世父读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198015_comment'></div>登进士第，调泸川尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198015_comment'></div>盗杀人，而执舍旁子，掠服之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198015_comment'></div>令谢病不敢予夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198015_comment'></div>君释之，而趣捕盗，出将刑者非真盗，已而果然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198015_comment'></div>改秘书省著作佐郎、知五台山寺务司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198015_comment'></div>五台供施倾天下，恶少年多窜僧籍中，上下囊橐为奸，号为不可措手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198015_comment'></div>君摘其魁宿置于法，按簿书皆得名物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198015_comment'></div>代州将防御使冯行己请为其府判官，会军兴，辟河东转运司勾当公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198015_comment'></div>方是时，部使者惧乏兴，皆须一调十，君请峻期会法而调以实，民用不扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198015_comment'></div>再迁太常博士，通判凤州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198015_comment'></div>州久不治，君兴滞补败，宽而不弛，府事簿领，一二以名召之，郡以最闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198015_comment'></div>是时民冒茶禁，日或千人，至有贴妻卖子、入偿不足而系有司，君上其状，皆得释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198015_comment'></div>然使者以为是沮吾法，迁通判凤翔府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198015_comment'></div>君治民用法宽，治吏用法急，奸吏不能堪，乃以网目疏漏事讼君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198015_comment'></div>会使者衔前沮法事，即恶奏，君坐停见任官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198015_comment'></div>君方具本末求对狱，泾帅奏君前所坐非罪，乞以为佐，徙之泾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198015_comment'></div>未几，卒于官，享年五十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198015_comment'></div>初室冯氏，蓝田进士行敏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198015_comment'></div>继室张氏，寿光县君，冀国勤惠公女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198015_comment'></div>三男子：孟峣夫，季易夫，皆有学行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1198015_comment'></div>仲浚夫，举进士，雄州防御推官、知秦州清水县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1198015_comment'></div>三女：嫁利州司法参军赵丕、西头供奉官冯维方、广济军司户参军王望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1198015_comment'></div>君幼少重迟不戏，长而端方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1198015_comment'></div>论事取友，是是非非，不恤嫌怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1198015_comment'></div>授《易》、《春秋》于蜀人龙昌期，常称慕李栖筠之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1198015_comment'></div>人以为君庄重寡言，作文词务体要，断狱深原其情，抶治奸欺，豪吏夺气，言人之所不敢言，盖有赞皇之风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1198015_comment'></div>君殁后十有六年，当绍圣四年冬某月某甲子，峣夫等乃克葬君于郏城之原，使来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1198015_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1198015'>韩迁井研，寖微以湮，厥有阴德，里中称仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1198015_comment'></div>瓜绵于瓞，既硕其实，有斐辨翁，其音秩秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1198015_comment'></div>自少为吏，慈哀于职，匪求生之，求得其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1198015_comment'></div>论事计可，不随风波，有挫其锋，君益淬磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1198015_comment'></div>以小观大，以近知远，不振不年，心亨事蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1198015_comment'></div>不羹之西，颍川之郏，卜宅固安，昌而后叶。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1198015'></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1198015_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，为金崖研作文。作品：金崖研作覆斗说。<div id='poem_1197837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金崖研作覆斗说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197837")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197837'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197837'>绍圣四年正月雨水，故人盖明仲守万州，为予斸金崖石作此研，坚润宜笔墨，而魁梧难为室，乃作覆斗，使之不尘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1197837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，作书与七兄。作品：与七兄司理书。<div id='poem_1196214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1196214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1196214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与七兄司理书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1196214")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1196214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1196214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1196214'>元正令节阻远，无阶献寿，不能胜情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1196214_comment'></div>伏惟治狱多有阴德，百福所会，坦道为履，无所忧惧，随顺世缘，哀乐以节，以保康宁之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1196214_comment'></div>丁成等来，继得卧龙山绝顶书，两信所报曲折，开慰无量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1196214_comment'></div>见侄槚书，如在目前，亦慰人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1196214_comment'></div>秀女几时生，初未得报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1196214_comment'></div>顷终不作诸人书，乃如兄所虑，大郎尚未能深念耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1196214_comment'></div>知命挈携在涪陵，凡十月乃归，才归又往涪见张从道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1196214_comment'></div>此公多禁忌，初亦患其猎猎喜往，幸相见倾尽，亦馆待十七夫妇甚勤，殊不易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1196214_comment'></div>即日相、㭒、小牛、王奶、庆儿安宜，小牛奶、妆奴皆无恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1196214_comment'></div>相虽醇良，终未好书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1196214_comment'></div>此司理谭存之，忠州人，两儿皆勤读书，一已十七岁，一与相同岁，延在斋中令共学，差成伦绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1196214_comment'></div>日为之讲一大经、一小经，夜与说老杜诗，冀年岁稍见功耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1196214_comment'></div>范公为其师死去，三月遽归，今闻凌云嘉州大佛院名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1196214_comment'></div>有请疏，或被迫往往复来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1196214_comment'></div>纯及王行者皆久不在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1196214_comment'></div>某处摩围之下，安固寂静，无时不湛然，愿勿以递中书沈浮动念也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1196214_comment'></div>相望万里，兄弟之心，何异对面，伏祈宽怀自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1196214_comment'></div>不备。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1196214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，作跋文。作品：书阴真君诗后。<div id='poem_1197496' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197496' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197496?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书阴真君诗后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197496")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197496_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197496'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197496'>忠州丰都山仙都观朝金殿西壁，有天成四年人书阴真君诗三章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197496_comment'></div>余同年许少张以为真汉人文章也，以余考之，信然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197496_comment'></div>因试生笔，偶得佳纸，为钞此诗，以与王泸州补之之季子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197496_comment'></div>观阴君所学，守尸法耳，犹须择师勤苦如是，乃能得之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197496_comment'></div>何况千载之后，尚友古人，求知道德之主宰者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197496_comment'></div>绍圣四年四月丙午，黔中禅月楼中书<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197496_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1197496'>君：原脱，据《豫章先生遗文》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1197496_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197496'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197496_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·别集》卷六。又见《豫章先生遗文》卷九，《铁网珊瑚》卷四，《珊瑚网·书录》卷五。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1197496_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，答书宋子茂。作品：答宋子茂。<div id='poem_1196464' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1196464' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1196464?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答宋子茂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1196464")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1196464_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1196464'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1196464'>顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1196464_comment'></div>去北都，于今垂二十年，不复知行李所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1196464_comment'></div>忽得所惠书，乃知官守在泸南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1196464_comment'></div>仕宦间关，远去乡里，度亦以吾主人高明可依也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1196464_comment'></div>观书词叙述，知不废名教，甚善甚善！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1196464_comment'></div>知命前往涪陵视嗣直舍弟，近方略到家，犹能道碑楼下相从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1196464_comment'></div>非熊不幸早世，嗣续不立，此心不可言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1196464_comment'></div>因来书语及，怆然久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1196464_comment'></div>某老矣，虚中馈已十八年，小子相今十四，并其所生母在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1196464_comment'></div>知命亦将一妾一子相同来，今夏又得一男子曰小牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1196464_comment'></div>相及小牛颇丰厚，粗慰眼前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1196464_comment'></div>略治生，亦粗过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1196464_comment'></div>买地畦菜，开轩蓺竹，水滨林下，万事忘矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1196464_comment'></div>无缘会面，千万进学勉官业。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1196464_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，与朱和叔书。作品：与宜春朱和叔书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　在黔州，与唐彦道书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>　黔州张通判生日，作词一首。作品：忆帝京（鸣鸿乳燕春闲暇）<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_1195802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>放目亭赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（有序　元符元年黔州作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195802")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195802_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195802'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195802'>走马承受丁君作亭于其廨东北，吾友宋楙宗以为尽表里江山之胜，名其亭曰「放目」，而黔江居士为之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195802_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1195802'>放心者逐指而丧背，放口者招尤而速累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195802_comment'></div>自作訾訾，自增愦愦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195802_comment'></div>登高临远，唯放目可以无悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195802_comment'></div>防心以守国之械，防口以挈瓶之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195802_comment'></div>以此放目焉，方丈寻常而见万里之外。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1195802_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年3月</a>　离开黔州，以避表兄张向之嫌移戎州。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
涪陵
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6fc379b7f10944498f851210fcf50374_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6fc379b7f10944498f851210fcf50374");'><span id='6fc379b7f10944498f851210fcf50374_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>，54岁</div><div id='6fc379b7f10944498f851210fcf50374' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年3月15日</a>　在涪陵，游北岩寺，程颐尝谪居于此，山谷名其居为“钩深堂”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　在涪陵，作记一篇。作品：朋乐堂记。<div id='poem_1197817' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197817' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197817?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朋乐堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197817")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197817_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197817'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197817'>涪陵蔺大节持正，喜延士大夫宾礼之，甚有意，盖欲琢磨其子弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197817_comment'></div>有潼川于说习之来过予，求就学之地而不能也，而以慁持正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197817_comment'></div>持正欣然受命，筑堂于黔江之东，曰鲁基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197817_comment'></div>他日与习之俱来请堂名，余为名曰朋乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197817_comment'></div>孔子曰：「有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197817_comment'></div>夫独学而无朋，此穷乡之士所以罕见寡闻，终身守其固陋，不可适于通达之邦者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197817_comment'></div>今持正乐得士，习之乐得共学，既知之矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197817_comment'></div>惟思慕古人爱惜日力，相开以多闻，相尽以改过，扩其闾巷之知，蔚蔚然为达人之观，然后不孤吾言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197817_comment'></div>绍圣五年四月乙未，涪翁记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1197817_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
泸州

<div class='label1' id='7f74dd5c949343469fa33e842ede4e0e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7f74dd5c949343469fa33e842ede4e0e");'><span id='7f74dd5c949343469fa33e842ede4e0e_link' href='/Writing/215211?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蓦山溪<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215211")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215211_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_215211_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215211'>清樽一笑，欢甚却成愁，别时襟，馀点点，疑是高唐雨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215211_comment'></div></div><br /><div id='poem_sentence_5_215208_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年1月24日</a>　在泸州，书王周彦所藏苏轼帖。作品：书王周彦东坡帖。<div id='poem_1197584' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197584' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197584?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书王周彦东坡帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年1月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197584")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197584_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197584'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197584'>东坡云：「大字难于结密而无间，小字难于宽绰而有馀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197584_comment'></div>此确论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197584_comment'></div>余尝申之曰：结密而无间，《瘗鹤铭》近之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197584_comment'></div>宽绰而有馀，《兰亭》近之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197584_comment'></div>若以篆文说之，大字如李斯《绎山碑》，小字如先秦古器科斗文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197584_comment'></div>东坡先生道义文章名满天下，所谓青天白日，奴隶亦知其清明者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197584_comment'></div>心说而诚服者，岂但中分鲁国哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197584_comment'></div>士之不游苏氏之门，与尝升其堂而畔之者，非愚则傲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197584_comment'></div>当先生之弃海濒，其平生交游多讳之矣，而周彦万里致医药，以文字乞品目，此岂流俗人炙手求热、救溺取名者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197584_comment'></div>盖见其内而忘其外，得其精而忘其粗者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197584_comment'></div>周彦敦厚好学，行其所闻，求其所愿，得意于寂寞之乡，邀乐于无臭味之处，他日吾将友之而不可得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197584_comment'></div>建中靖国元年正月乙酉书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1197584_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年1月29日</a>　系舟泸州王市，作砥柱铭赠杨皓。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年1月30日</a>　到达合江，与令尹白宗愈泛江安乐溪，上刘真人山。作品：游沪州合江县安乐山行记。<div id='poem_1197830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197830' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197830?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游泸州合江县安乐山行记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年1月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197830")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197830_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197830'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197830'>建中靖国元年正月晦，合江令尹白宗愈原道，率江西黄某鲁直，拿舟泛安乐溪，上刘真人山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197830_comment'></div>同来者：临颍索继万希一，黔安文煇德夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197830_comment'></div>主簿郭中子和以疾初起，不能来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197830_comment'></div>尉周世范表民以支军廪不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197830_comment'></div>安乐山，真人飞升之宅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197830_comment'></div>真人讳珍，字善庆，初卜居此山，曰：「僰道平山气歇而不清，江安方山气浊而不秀，求山而清秀，唯安乐山耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197830_comment'></div>既定居，泉源发甘，虎豹服役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197830_comment'></div>晦日之游，云雾晦冥，将出山，晚晴，诸峰皆出。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197830_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
宜宾
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1611c009cfa044f6a8498e96a59ce284_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1611c009cfa044f6a8498e96a59ce284");'><span id='1611c009cfa044f6a8498e96a59ce284_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年8月17日</a>　在戎州，自永安楼入张宽夫园待月，作词一首。作品：念奴娇（断虹雾雨）<div id='poem_215118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>念奴娇</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年8月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a id='poem_content_215118'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215118'>断虹霁雨，净秋空，山染修眉新绿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_215118'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(215118)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年8月30日</a>　于戎州寓舍退听堂题王知载《朐山杂咏》，此文乃山谷注明诗论。作品：书王知载朐山杂咏后。<div id='poem_1197132' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197132' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197132?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书王知载朐山杂咏后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年8月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197132")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197132_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197132'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197132'>诗者人之情性也，非强谏争于廷，怨忿诟于道，怒邻骂坐之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197132_comment'></div>其人忠信笃敬，抱道而居，与时乖逢，遇物悲喜，同床而不察，并世而不闻，情之所不能堪，因发于呻吟调笑之声，胸次释然，而闻者亦有所劝勉，比律吕而可歌，列干羽而可舞，是诗之美也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197132_comment'></div>其发为讪谤侵陵，引颈以承戈，披襟而受矢，以快一朝之忿者，人皆以为诗之祸，是失诗之旨，非诗之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197132_comment'></div>故世相后或千岁，地相去或万里，诵其诗而想见其人所居所养，如旦莫与之期，邻里与之游也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197132_comment'></div>营丘王知载，仕宦在予前，予在江湖浮沈，而知载已没于河外，不及相识也，而得其人于其诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197132_comment'></div>仕不遇而不怒，人不知而独乐，博物多闻之君子，有文正公家风者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197132_comment'></div>惜乎不幸短命，不得发于事业，使予言信于流俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197132_comment'></div>虽然，不期于流俗，此所以为君子者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197132_comment'></div>元符元年八月乙巳，戎州寓舍退听堂书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197132_comment'></div>江西黄庭坚谪授涪州别驾、戎州安置，年五十四。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1197132_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年9月9日</a>　在戎州，重九日自无等院游永安门。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　在戎州，送章上人南游，作文一篇。作品：送章上人南游序。<div id='poem_1197064' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197064' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197064?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送章上人南游序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197064")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197064_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197064'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197064'>有恭禅师，玉山人，年七十馀，昨闻在鼎州万寿过夏，有辰州明助教者奉事极有终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197064_comment'></div>计恭公迄今只在鼎、澧间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197064_comment'></div>往作南禅师侍者二十一年，能谈先达风范气味，且往依栖，决定不虚过日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197064_comment'></div>绍慈禅师亦广西人，今住分宁之玉溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197064_comment'></div>此人法中龙象，虽法嗣东林总公，其实有周金刚、陈老师钳椎炉󲍈，但人天福报差薄，又狷急不耐事耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197064_comment'></div>若为道而往，虽遇逆境，亦未知断臂舍眼睛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197064_comment'></div>黄龙巷头心禅师、住黄龙肃禅师、泐潭文禅师、云岩悟新长老、黄龙惟清首座，此不可取老夫口定，自须急著眼筋看取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197064_comment'></div>元符元年八月癸卯，退听堂送峨眉章上座南游。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197064_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，通判黄斌老为文同之内侄，善画墨竹，山谷常与之唱和。作品：次韵黄斌老所画横竹。从斌老乞苦笋。次韵谢斌老送墨竹十二韵。次韵黄斌老晚游池亭二首。次韵答斌老病起独游东园二首。又和二首。又答斌老病愈遣闷二首。次韵斌老冬至书怀示子舟篇末见及之作因以赠子舟归。戏题斌老所作两竹梢。奉次斌老送瘿木棋局八韵。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214153'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214153'>老竹帖妥不作奇，嫩篁翘翘动风枝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214153_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214469' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214469' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214469?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_2_214469_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214469'>正当合战地，仍有曳尾龟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214469_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214469_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，又曾为黄斌老草杜甫诗。作品：书草老杜诗后与黄斌老。<div id='poem_1197396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书草老杜诗后与黄斌老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197396")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197396'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197396'>予学草书三十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197396_comment'></div>初以周越为师，故二十年抖薮，俗气不脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197396_comment'></div>晚得苏才翁、子美书观之，乃得古人笔意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197396_comment'></div>其后又得张长史、僧怀素、高闲墨迹，乃窥笔法之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197396_comment'></div>今来年老懒，作此书，如老病人扶杖，随意倾倒，不复能工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197396_comment'></div>顾异于今人书者，不纽提容止、强作态度耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197396_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，与苏轼侄婿王庠交往甚密，有书信往来。作品：与王周彦长书。<div id='poem_1195849' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195849' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195849?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王庠周彦书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195849")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195849_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195849'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195849'>东坡先生遂捐馆舍，岂独贤士大夫悲痛不能已，「人之云亡，邦国殄瘁」者也，可惜可惜！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195849_comment'></div>立朝堂堂，危言谠论，切于事理，岂复有之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195849_comment'></div>然有自常州来，云东坡病亟时，索沐浴，改朝衣，谈笑而化，其胸中固无憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195849_comment'></div>所惜子由不得一见，又未得一还乡社，使后生瞻望此堂堂尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195849_comment'></div>欲作诗文道其意，亦未能成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195849_comment'></div>秦少游没于藤州，传得自作祭文并诗，可为霣涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195849_comment'></div>如此奇才，今世不复有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195849_comment'></div>所寄诗文，反覆读之，如对谈笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195849_comment'></div>意所主张，甚近古人，但其波澜枝叶不若古人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195849_comment'></div>意亦是读建安作者之诗，与渊明、子美所作，未入神尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195849_comment'></div>见东坡《书黄子思诗卷后》，论陶谢诗、钟王书，极有理，尝见之否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195849_comment'></div>孙伯远善论文章之美恶，严君可长在笔下，公能致此二士馆之，当有得耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1195849_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，为王庠书江西道院赋。作品：书江西道院赋后。<div id='poem_1197625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197625?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书江西道院赋后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1197625'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197625'>往在江南所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197625_comment'></div>来黔戎之间已五年，不复记忆。<div class='inline'
