ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，答李任道谢分豆粥，有诗。<div id='poem_213373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213373?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李任道谢分豆粥</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213373")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213373'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213373'>豆粥能驱晚瘴寒，与公同味更同餐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213373_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213373'>安知天上养贤鼎，且作山中煮菜看。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213373_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213373'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213373_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，作赋。作品：对青竹赋。煎茶赋。苦笋赋。<div id='poem_1195797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对青竹赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（有序　元符二年戎州作。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195797")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195797'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195797'>余楚产也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195797_comment'></div>阅东南之竹多矣，未尝闻对青竹者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195797_comment'></div>嘉州僧从之包封见贻，蓺之而成，乃初识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195797_comment'></div>惟范围之内，有知之物一无穷，无知之物一无穷，一耳一目，不能遍览也，况六合之外者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195797_comment'></div>感而赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195797_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1195797'>竹之美于东南，以节不以文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195797_comment'></div>其在楚之西，郁郁葱葱，连山缭云也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195797_comment'></div>会稽之奇，材任矢石；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195797_comment'></div>蕲春之泽，夏簟箫笛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195797_comment'></div>沅湘泪血，邛崃高节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195797_comment'></div>慈竹相守，孝竹冬茁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195797_comment'></div>慈姥嶰谷，笙竽笆篁，长石之山，一节可航，犹未极其瑰怪不常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195797_comment'></div>故吴楚无竹工，非无竹工，妇能织缉之器，儿能鸡鹜之笼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195797_comment'></div>今夫筥筐籯笲，榱棂翰藩，巴船百丈，下汉为笪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195797_comment'></div>贵之则律吕汗简，贱之则箕帚蒸薪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195797_comment'></div>唯所逢遭，尽于斧斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195797_comment'></div>美哉斯竹，黄质墨章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195797_comment'></div>如出杼轴，织文自当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195797_comment'></div>解甲税枯，金碧其相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195797_comment'></div>岁寒在躬，又免斮烹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195797_comment'></div>彼其文章之种性，不可致诘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195797_comment'></div>刳心而求之不可得，斸根而求之不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1195797_comment'></div>匪人匪天，有物有则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1195797_comment'></div>惟其与蓬蒿共尽而无憾，余亦不知白驹之过隙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1195797_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1195798' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195798' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195798?labeling=true' target='_blank'>煎茶赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195798")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195798_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195798'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195798'>汹汹乎如涧松之发清吹，皓皓乎如春空之行白云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195798_comment'></div>宾主欲眠而同味，水茗相投而不浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195798_comment'></div>苦口利病，解胶涤昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195798_comment'></div>未尝一日不放箸，而策茗碗之勋者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195798_comment'></div>余尝为嗣直瀹茗，因录其涤烦破睡之功，为之甲乙：建溪如割，双井如󱌟，日铸如绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195798_comment'></div>其馀苦则辛螫，甘则底滞，呕酸寒胃，令人失睡，亦未足与议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195798_comment'></div>或曰：「无甚高论，敢问其次」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195798_comment'></div>涪翁曰：「味江之罗山，严道之蒙顶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195798_comment'></div>黔阳之都濡高株，泸川之纳溪梅岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195798_comment'></div>夷陵之压砖，临邛之火井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195798_comment'></div>不得已而去于三，则六者亦可以酌兔褐之瓯，瀹鱼眼之鼎者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195798_comment'></div>或者又曰：「寒中瘠气，莫甚于茶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195798_comment'></div>或济之盐，勾贼破家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195798_comment'></div>滑窍走水，又况鸡苏之与胡麻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195798_comment'></div>涪翁于是酌岐雷之醪醴，参伊圣之汤液，斮附子如博投，以熬葛仙之垩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195798_comment'></div>去藙而用盐，去橘而用姜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195798_comment'></div>不夺茗味，而佐以草石之良，所以固太仓而坚作强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195798_comment'></div>于是有胡桃、松实，庵摩、鸭脚，勃贺、蘼芜，水苏、甘菊，既加臭味，亦厚宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1195798_comment'></div>前四后四，各用其一，少则美，多则恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1195798_comment'></div>发挥其精神，又益于咀嚼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1195798_comment'></div>盖大匠无可弃之材，太平非一士之略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1195798_comment'></div>阙初贪味隽永，速化汤饼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1195798_comment'></div>乃至终夜，不眠耿耿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1195798_comment'></div>既作温齐，殊可屡歃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1195798_comment'></div>如以六经，济三尺法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1195798_comment'></div>虽有除治，与人安乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1195798_comment'></div>宾至则煎，去则就榻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1195798_comment'></div>不游轩后之华胥，则化庄周之蝴蝶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1195798_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1195799' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195799' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195799?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苦笋赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195799")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195799_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195799'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195799'>余酷嗜苦笋，谏者至十人，戏作《苦笋赋》，其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195799'>僰道苦笋，冠冕两川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195799_comment'></div>甘脆惬当，小苦而反成味；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195799_comment'></div>温润缜密，多啖而不疾人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195799_comment'></div>盖苦而有味，如忠谏之可活国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195799_comment'></div>多而不害，如举士而皆得贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195799_comment'></div>是其钟江山之秀气，故能深雨露而避风烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195799_comment'></div>食肴以之开道，酒客为之流涎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195799_comment'></div>彼桂玫之与梦汞，又安得与之同年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195799_comment'></div>蜀人曰：「苦笋不可食，食之动痼疾，令人萎而瘠」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195799_comment'></div>予亦未尝与之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195799_comment'></div>盖上士不谈而喻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195799_comment'></div>中士进则若信，退则眩焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195799_comment'></div>下士信耳而不信目，其顽不可镌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195799_comment'></div>李太白曰：「但得醉中趣，勿为醒者传」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1195799_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，书高彪作《督军御史箴》后。<div id='poem_1197437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书高彪作督军御史箴后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197437")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197437'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197437'>晋成陈端夫由武成学入仕，其意常欲一自洗于俎豆之间，虽在军垒，未尝辍诗书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197437_comment'></div>会新书复试换法，方领部曲警备江门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197437_comment'></div>穷僻无他可乐，但得日力读书，必将更文武任，赫赫于世，故书此箴以赠行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197437_comment'></div>元符二年正月庚戌，山谷老农书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，论黔州时字。<div id='poem_1197160' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197160' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197160?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论黔州时字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197160")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197160_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197160'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197160'>元符二年三月十三日，步自张园看酴醾回，烛下试宣城诸葛方散卓，觉笔意与黔州时书李太白《白头吟》笔力，同中有异，异中有同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197160_comment'></div>后百年如有别书者，乃解余语耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197160_comment'></div>张长史折钗股，颜太师屋漏法，王右军锥画沙、印印泥，怀素飞鸟出林、惊蛇入草，索靖银钩虿尾，同是一笔，心不知手，手不知心法耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197160_comment'></div>若有心与能者争衡，后世不朽，则与书艺工史辈同功矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197160_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，书简公画像赞。作品：书简公画像赞后。<div id='poem_1197398' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197398?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书简公画像赞后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197398")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197398_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197398'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197398'>简公僧腊六十五，以佛法度为一姓者，若子、若孙、若曾孙，亡虑二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197398_comment'></div>万里走惠州，求东坡铭简之塔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197398_comment'></div>归而走戎州，求山谷赞简之画像者，法舟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197398_comment'></div>其走惠州也，冒蛟鼍虎豹虫蛇之险而不悔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197398_comment'></div>其走戎州也，于余无一日之雅，又不求左右为先容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197398_comment'></div>舟之于简，可谓能曾孙矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197398_comment'></div>简虽贤，由曾孙而赫赫，简与舟俱不朽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197398_comment'></div>元符二年壬戌，僰道城南僦舍中书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197398_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　题苏轼诗。作品：题所和东坡与王庆源红带诗。<div id='poem_1197468' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197468' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197468?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题所和东坡与王庆源红带诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197468")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197468_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197468'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197468'>后十二年，观此诗于戎州城南僦舍，所谓「吾犹昔人非昔人」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197468_comment'></div>或题鬼门关柱云：「自此以往，更不理为在生月日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197468_comment'></div>真不虚语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197468_comment'></div>元祐三年黄鲁直，元符二年涪翁题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197468_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，作任运堂铭文。<div id='poem_1197961' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197961' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197961?labeling=true' target='_blank'>任运堂铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197961")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197961_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197961'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197961'>或见僦居之小堂名任运，恐好事者或以藉口，余曰：腾腾和尚歌云：「今日任运腾腾，明日腾腾任运」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197961_comment'></div>堂盖取诸此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197961_comment'></div>余已身如槁木，心如死灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197961_comment'></div>但作不除须发一无能老比丘，尚不可邪？</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197961_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，作文论杨春。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，为人起名。作品：名春老说。<div id='poem_1197776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>名春老说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197776")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197776'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197776'>元符改元之明年，岁在单阏，十二月二十二日，实立春后五日，温江杨仲颖夜得男，乞名于涪翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197776_comment'></div>涪翁名之曰春老，盖其生直执徐之正月，东风解冻矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197776_comment'></div>又仲颖太夫人在堂，康彊而抱孙，故并二义而名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197776_comment'></div>春之为气，万物皆动而成文，祝此儿怀文抱质，俾尔大母眉寿，而见其颀然在士君子之林也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197776_comment'></div>生后七日，涪翁书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，为人作墓志铭。作品：凤州团练推官乔君墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198017' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198017' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198017?labeling=true' target='_blank'>凤州团练推官乔君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198017")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198017_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198017'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198017'>高密乔君彦柔，将葬其父母，乞铭于豫章黄庭坚曰：「吾家世籍在昌邑，而迁高密，居高密盖五世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198017_comment'></div>王曾大父以善治生，以财雄长里中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198017_comment'></div>吾大父喜为侠，振人急难，以故破家产而贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198017_comment'></div>先人乃读书，年十八，举《毛诗》学究，授咸阳县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198017_comment'></div>吏以年少易之，先人发其奸赃，即罪，邑中皆惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198017_comment'></div>令贪政疵，赖先人得善去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198017_comment'></div>邻邑有田讼，十年不决，先人行田所，视文书，一语决之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198017_comment'></div>历海陵、稿城县尉，为石州录事参军，掌和籴仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198017_comment'></div>郡将以和籴羡钱数十万资公帑，谕先人更印历；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198017_comment'></div>先人执法不听，至诃怒，终不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198017_comment'></div>罢石州，调中牟主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198017_comment'></div>陕西转运司闻其材，辟赈济司勾当公事，以忧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198017_comment'></div>为延长令，又以忧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198017_comment'></div>先人事父母笃孝，居丧毁瘠，再丁内艰，遂以衰白，欲不出仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198017_comment'></div>乡人强之，乃调河州军事推官，对移兰州，又调凤州团练推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198017_comment'></div>提刑司檄先人决阶、成州滞讼，不幸暴疾，殁于成州之栗亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198017_comment'></div>吾母王氏，继母吕氏，高密士大夫之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198017_comment'></div>先人以元祐五年十月捐馆舍，明年先夫人又弃养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198017_comment'></div>彦柔以贫，从仕四方，不得以时葬，将以元符二年某月日葬郑公乡大父墓次」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198017_comment'></div>庭坚曰：僰道为令，奉公敬，决讼平，持身廉，清净寡言，君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198017_comment'></div>其言不妄，视其子而知其父，可铭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198017_comment'></div>推官讳敞，字广叔，享年五十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198017_comment'></div>三男：长则彦柔，前进士、僰道令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198017_comment'></div>次彦中，举进士，有声；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198017_comment'></div>次彦直，尚小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198017_comment'></div>女子嫁进士刘拯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198017_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1198017'>才于为吏，小试牛刀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198017_comment'></div>廉于临民，不犯秋毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198017_comment'></div>直于事上，怒不目逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198017_comment'></div>不极其能，又不耆耋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1198017_comment'></div>系逢不逢，不在巧拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1198017_comment'></div>我铭其丘，告后勿伐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1198017_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，作《醉落魄》词四首。作品：醉落魄(陶陶兀兀)四首。<div id='poem_215229' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215229' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215229?labeling=true' target='_blank'>醉落魄<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215229")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215229_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_215229'>旧有醉醒醒醉一曲云：“醉醒醒醉。凭君会取皆滋味。浓斟琥珀香浮蚁。一入愁肠，便有阳春意。须将席幕为天地。歌前起舞花前睡。从他兀兀陶陶里。犹胜醒醒、惹得闲憔悴。”此曲亦有佳句，而多斧凿痕，又语高下不甚入律。或传是东坡语，非也。与“蜗角虚名”、“解下痴绦”之曲相似，疑是王仲父作。因戏作四篇呈吴元祥、黄中行，似能厌道二公意中事。</div><div id='poem_preface_215229_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215229'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215229'>陶陶兀兀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215229_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215229'>尊前是我华胥国。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215229_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215229'>争名争利休休莫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215229_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215229'>雪月风花，不醉怎生得。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215229_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215229'>邯郸一枕谁忧乐。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215229_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215229'>新诗新事因闲适。<div id='poem_sentence_5_215229_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_215229'>东山小妓携丝竹。<div id='poem_sentence_6_215229_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215229'>家里乐天，村里谢安石。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_215229_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215228?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215228_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215228'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215228'>陶陶兀兀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215228'>人生无累何由得。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215228'>杯中三万六千日。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215228'>闷损旁观，自我解落魄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215228_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215228'>扶头不起还颓玉。<div id='poem_sentence_7_215228_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_215226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215226?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215226_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_215226'>老夫止酒十五年矣。到戎州，恐为瘴疠所侵，故晨举一杯。不相察者乃强见酌，遂能作病。因复止酒，用前韵作二篇，呈吴元祥。</div><div id='poem_preface_215226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_sentence_1_215226'>人生梦里槐安国。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215226'>教公休醉公但莫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215226'>盏倒垂莲，一笑是赢得。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215226_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　在戎州，作词一阕。作品：醉落魄(陶陶兀兀)四首。西江月（断送一生唯有）望远行（自见来虚过却好时好日）采桑子（荔枝滩上留千骑）采桑子（投荒万里无归路）采桑子（马湖来舞钗初赐）采桑子（宗盟有妓能歌舞）鹧鸽天（塞雁初来秋影寒）鹧鸽天（黄菊枝头生晓寒）鹧鸪天（万事令人心骨寒）鹧鸪天(紫菊黄花风露寒)鹧鸪天（节去蜂愁蝶不知）清平乐（乍晴秋好）谒金门（山又水）南乡子（未报贾船回）南乡子（卧稻雨余收）诉衷情（一波才动万波随）转调丑奴儿（得意许多时）<div id='poem_sentence_0_1197438_comment'></div>适余有心腹之疾，是日小间，试笔书此文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197438_comment'></div>大同有意于古文，故以此遗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197438_comment'></div>时涪翁自黔南迁于僰道三年矣，寓舍在城南屠儿村侧，蓬藋柱宇，鼪鼯同径，然颇为诸少年以文章翰墨见强，尚有中州时举子习气未除耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197438_comment'></div>至于风日晴暖，策杖扶蹇蹶，雍容林丘之下，清江白石之间，老子于诸公亦有一日之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197438_comment'></div>时涪翁之年五十六，病足不能拜，心腹中芥蒂如怀瓦石，未知后日复能作如此字否。</div><div href='/Writing/1195833?labeling=true' target='_blank'>供析状</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符三年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1195833'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195833'>责授涪州别驾、戎州安置黄庭坚，准戎州公文：「准提刑司牒节文：『勘会正月十三日登极大赦，州县散官编管人等并仰逐处分析闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195833_comment'></div>请详此勘会责授安置始末事因，开坐回示，以凭照会，依赦文分析开奏』者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195833_comment'></div>牒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195833_comment'></div>检会昨于绍圣元年十一月内，准朝旨，在开封府陈留县听候指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195833_comment'></div>至绍圣二年正月初八日，授诰一道：「左朝奉郎、充集贤校理、管句亳州明道宫、云骑尉、赐绯鱼袋黄庭坚：朕以眇末，绍承圣绪，又惧不能发扬先帝成功盛德，曩诏儒学之臣论次大典，于以章示至公，传信万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195833_comment'></div>明明在上，其可厚诬？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195833_comment'></div>尔庭坚擢于诸生，使预著作，罔念朝廷之属任，专怀朋党之私恩，依凭国书，疵诋先烈，变乱故实，轻徇爱憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195833_comment'></div>奏编累年，公罔朕听，逮究厥实，语多无踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195833_comment'></div>览之瞿然，靡自宁处，得罪宗庙，朕何敢容？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195833_comment'></div>古有常刑，宜即诛殛，尚兹屈法，聊示窜投。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195833_comment'></div>服我宽恩，无忘自讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195833_comment'></div>可特责授涪州别驾、黔州安置，勋赐如故」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195833_comment'></div>到绍圣五年二月十八日，准尚书刑部符：「准敕：『中书省、尚书省备到提举夔州路常平等事张向状：勘会黔州安置黄庭坚系向亡母之妹子，切虑合该回避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195833_comment'></div>奉圣旨：黄庭坚移戎州安置』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195833_comment'></div>所有责授安置始末事因，开坐诣实，即无漏落，谨具状申戎州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195833_comment'></div>谨状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195833_comment'></div>元符三年三月日，责授涪州别驾、戎州安置黄庭坚状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1195833_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年5月</a>　在戎州，复宣德郎，监鄂州酒税。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　在戎州，何静翁求教于山谷，山谷有书答之。作品：答何静翁书。<div id='poem_1195845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195845?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答何静翁书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195845")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195845'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195845'>庭坚再拜，何君足下：去年辱惠书，过有称述，意足下随世毁誉，未必自得之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195845_comment'></div>又多病之馀，懒慢成性，鲜自源归时不能即奉答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195845_comment'></div>亦以今世民之师师不知行道以先觉觉民，学校之教不知明道以启迪后进，故学者不知重道而尊师，士亦不复论学而取友，因以卜足下诚有意于兹事否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195845_comment'></div>专使来，继辱书问，勤恳不倦，爱一世之所弃，敬众人之所慢，足下真自得之者邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195845_comment'></div>所寄诗醇淡而有句法，所论史事不随世许可，取明于已者而论古人，语约而意深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195845_comment'></div>文章之法度，盖当如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195845_comment'></div>如足下之所已得者，而能充其所未至，生乎千载之下，可以见千载之人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195845_comment'></div>然江出汶山，水力才能泛觞，沟渠所并，大川三百，小川三千，然后往而与洞庭、彭蠡同波，下而与南溟、北海同味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195845_comment'></div>今足下之学，诚汶山有源之水也，大川三百，足下其求之师，小川三千，足下其求之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195845_comment'></div>方将观足下之水波，能遍与诸生为德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195845_comment'></div>不肖去戎州，或在秋冬之间，大概已具王观复书中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195845_comment'></div>无阶从容，望风怀仰，千万强学自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195845_comment'></div>他日拭目观足下颉颃于青云之上也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1195845_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　在戎州，太守刘广之率宾寮宴饮于锁江亭，并品尝荔枝，山谷躬逢盛事，即席赋诗。作品：次韵李任道晚饮锁江亭。再次韵兼简履中南玉三首。次韵任道食荔枝有感三首。<div id='poem_214224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵李任道晚饮锁江亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年5月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214224")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214224'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214224'>西来雪浪如炰烹，两涯一苇乃可横。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214224'>忽思钟陵江十里，白蘋风起縠纹生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214224'>酒杯未觉浮蚁滑，茶鼎已作苍蝇鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214224'>归时共须落日尽，亦嫌持盖仆屡更。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214224'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214224_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_214095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214095?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再次韵兼简履中南玉三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span id='poem_sentence_3_214095'>锁江主人能致酒，愿渠久住莫终更。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214095'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214094'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214094'>江津道人心源清，不系虚舟尽日横。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214094_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 文集、山谷集校：一作喜</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_214094_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_213551' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213551' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　回归戎州，闻黄叔达殁于荆州，有文祭之。作品：祭知命弟文。<div id='poem_1198112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭知命弟文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198112")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198112'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198112'>君殁荆州，我在万里，殁后四月，始闻讣音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198112_comment'></div>既无孤茕，恃有兄弟，天既丧我，君不能年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198112_comment'></div>自我哭君，头发尽白，英风豪气，窘此一棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198112_comment'></div>拊棺长号，殆无生意，公私之计，身有所縻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198112_comment'></div>既难以归，舟车可虑，乃得吉卜，旅殡僧坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198112_comment'></div>虽远至亲，理则安宴，无惊无恐，扶将上舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198112_comment'></div>绝恸一觞，君其尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1198112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年12月</a>　离开戎州，学生杨皓作诗送别，山谷作诗以报。作品：杨明叔从予学问甚有成当路无知音求为沪州从事而不能得予蒙恩东归用“蛟龙得云雨雕鹗在秋天”作十诗见饯因用其韵以别。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年12月11日</a>　离开戎州，顺江东下，临别时，天气寒冷，仍有二十余人到江边送行。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='36217595fb9c4098b1b373875c115ea3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("36217595fb9c4098b1b373875c115ea3");'><span id='36217595fb9c4098b1b373875c115ea3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，56岁</div><div id='36217595fb9c4098b1b373875c115ea3' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，有诗赠文抗临。作品：次韵奉答少激纪赠二首。<div id='poem_213633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵奉答文少激推官纪赠二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213633")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213633'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213633'>诗来清吹拂衣巾，句法词锋觉有神。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213633'>今日相看青眼旧，他年肯作白头新。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213633'>文如雾豹容窥管，气似灵犀可辟尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213633'>惭愧相期在台省，无心枯木岂能春。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_213632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213632'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213632'>文章藻鉴随时去，人物权衡逐势低。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213632'>扬子墨池春草遍，武侯祠庙晓莺啼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213632'>书帷寂寞知音少，幕府留连要路迷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213632'>顾我何人敢推挽，看君桃李合成蹊。<div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213590_0'>① 原注：少激名抗，临邛人，时在戎州。诸本或作少微，误。予尝见其家藏此诗真本，有序云窃闻太守斋洁奉祠，当获嘉应。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213590'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213590'>穷儒忧乐与民<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>同，何况朱轮职劝农。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213590_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213590'>终日齑盐供一饭，几时肤寸冒千峰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213590_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213590'>未须丘垤占鸣鹳，只要朝廷<sup class='reference class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_213590_0'>⑶ 原校：文氏真本上句作从此滂沱三十六，后改此字。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213590_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197475'>此本以定州《兰亭》土中所得石摹入棠梨板者，字虽肥，骨肉相称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197475_comment'></div>观其笔意，右军清真风流，气韵冠映一世，可想见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197475_comment'></div>今时论书者，憎肥而喜瘦，党同而妒异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197475_comment'></div>曾未梦见右军脚汗气，岂可言用笔法耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197475_comment'></div>元符三年四月甲辰涪翁题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197475_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，为绿阴堂作记。作品：张仲吉绿阴堂记。<div id='poem_1197821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197821?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张仲吉绿阴堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197821")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197821'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197821'>嘉阳张仲吉，寓舍于僰道，以酒垆为家产，若朝夕汲汲于嚣中之赢惟不足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197821_comment'></div>及能种花养竹，闲闲于林下之乐尝有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197821_comment'></div>其子宽夫又从予学，故予数将诸生过其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197821_comment'></div>近市而有山林趣，花竹成阴，啼鸟鸣蛙，常与人意相值。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197821_comment'></div>或时把酒至夜，漏下二十刻，云阴雷风，与诸生冲雨踏泥而归，诸生从予，未尝有厌倦焉，则仲吉父子好士喜宾客可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197821_comment'></div>今蒙恩放还，去此有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197821_comment'></div>故书游息之乐，使工李焘刻之绿阴堂上，使后之不及与予同时者得观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197821_comment'></div>元符三年六月丙子，涪翁记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197821_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，书程夫人墓铭。作品：书程夫人墓铭后。<div id='poem_1197617' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197617' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197617?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书程夫人墓志后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197617")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197617_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197617'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197617'>予观长安君梱内之法，知其外家渊源必有积累，或钟其美于女子耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197617_comment'></div>余尝病今世士大夫家，既去父母而从人矣，及其夫得官于瘴疠之乡，妻辄不随，世俗亦以为当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197617_comment'></div>夫人不纳族人之议，从夫于南平，此足以厚薄俗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197617_comment'></div>至于救人急难，决事可否，皆男子之事，而长安君躬行之，可谓健妇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197617_comment'></div>所闻不出房闼，乃能启手足而不乱，又何其难也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197617_comment'></div>元符三年五月乙未，故太史氏黄某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197617_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，书李潮《八分歌》作品：书自草李潮八分歌后。<div id='poem_1197506' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197506' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197506?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书自草李潮八分歌后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197506")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197506_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197506'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197506'>元符三年七月二十三日，余将至青衣，吾宗子舟求予作草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197506_comment'></div>拨忙作此，殊不工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197506_comment'></div>古人云「匆匆不暇草」，端不虚语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197506_comment'></div>时涪翁年五十六矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197506_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，述祝林宗取字来由。作品：江南祝林宗字序。<div id='poem_1197757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江南祝林宗字说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197757")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197757'>黟川祝林宗，因知命问字于涪翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197757_comment'></div>涪翁字之曰有道，而告之曰：汉东国士，惟郭有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197757_comment'></div>尚友千载，虽远可到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197757_comment'></div>廓尔胸次，以观群躁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197757_comment'></div>元符三年七月。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，题江南祝翁画像。作品：江南祝翁真赞。<div id='poem_1197630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题江南祝翁画像</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197630")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197630'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197630'>祝翁初为儒生，不能令人轻轻，弃而治生，遂为陶朱、猗顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197630_comment'></div>以其资资子弟，使为儒生，有知名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197630_comment'></div>以其馀作佛事，为子弟种德，其费不赀，不吝不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197630_comment'></div>人材各当用其长，何必读书，然后为学？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197630_comment'></div>翁之子曰林宗，与余弟知命游，相欢也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197630_comment'></div>又为余道友成都之六祖范禅之檀越，奔走先后，不避寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197630_comment'></div>观子知父，真可人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197630_comment'></div>元符三年八月甲寅，山谷老人书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197630_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，祭圆明大师文。<div id='poem_1198124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭圜明大师文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198124")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198124_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198124'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198124'>维元符三年，岁次庚辰，九月甲子朔，初四日丁卯，山谷老人黄某，敬以龙茗水沈、时果斋蔬，致祭于故圜明大师无演公之灵曰：呜呼圜明，万人之杰，千人之英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198124_comment'></div>向使为儒，师友琢磨，庸讵不为子云、长卿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198124_comment'></div>向使为吏，为师为长，庸讵不为翁归、张敞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198124_comment'></div>蚤被佛缚，于师有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198124_comment'></div>笔端舌本，什公支郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198124_comment'></div>以檀严佛，能轩能轾，不作则已，作必駴世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198124_comment'></div>文章记问，图画书诗，人一为多，能独兼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198124_comment'></div>一朝弃家，天脱其羁，浮江下汉，访道求师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198124_comment'></div>譬如苍龙，蜕其大身，留体一发，卷藏自珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198124_comment'></div>往虽出家，日用世法，作无义语，覆不净业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198124_comment'></div>行求正眼，还我光明，作为雷霆，以雨四溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198124_comment'></div>方行万里，出门折轴，清明粹温，今见朽骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198124_comment'></div>归船雨泣，天容涔涔，我羞清供，如公初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198124_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1198124_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，作文述杜敬取字安雅之缘由。作品：杜敬字安雅序。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，为杨子建《通神论》作序。作品：杨子建通神论序。<div id='poem_1197079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨子建通神论序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197079")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197079'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197079'>天下之学，要之有所宗师然后可臻微入妙，虽不尽明先王之意，惟其有本源，故去经不远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197079_comment'></div>今夫六经之旨深矣，而有孟轲、荀况、两汉诸儒，及近世刘敞、王安石之书，读之亦思过半矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197079_comment'></div>至于文章之工，难矣，而有左氏、庄周、董仲舒、司马迁、相如、刘向、扬雄、韩愈、柳宗元，及今世欧阳修、曾巩、苏轼、秦观之作，篇籍具在，法度粲然，可讲而学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197079_comment'></div>惟神农、黄帝、岐伯、雷公之书，秦越人、淳于意、皇甫谧、张机之论，儒者罕学，学之亦不能到其渊源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197079_comment'></div>近世黎阳高若讷，号称邃于医方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197079_comment'></div>若讷既没，亦不得其传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197079_comment'></div>余有方外之友曰杨介，尝谓余言《本草》、《素问》之意，且曰：五运六气，视其岁而为药石，虽仲景犹病之也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197079_comment'></div>至于《本草》，则仲景深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197079_comment'></div>余涉世故多，未能从介学之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197079_comment'></div>衰老窜逐戎僰，瘴疠侵陵，生意无几，恨不早从杨君之学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197079_comment'></div>今年以事至青神，有杨康侯子建者，以其所论著医惠然见投。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197079_comment'></div>悉读之，而其说汪洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197079_comment'></div>蜀地僻远，无从问所不知，子建闭户读书，贯穿黄帝、岐伯，无师之学，至能如此，岂易得哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197079_comment'></div>然其汤液皆以意调置，则不能无旨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197079_comment'></div>方皆圣智妙于万物之性者然后能作，而巧者述之，而世传之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197079_comment'></div>今子建发明五运六气，叙病裁药，错综以针艾之方，与众共之，是亦仁人之用心云尔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197079_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1197079'>所：原无，据《豫章先生遗文》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1197079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197079'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_1197079_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·别集》卷二。又见《豫章先生遗文》卷二。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1197079_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，为清闲处士作颂文。作品：清闲处士颂。<div id='poem_214762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清闲处士颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214762")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214762'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214762'>至乐山中，嘉木之樾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214762'>有人天游，风云为马，鸥鹭为舟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214762'>有诗客李发，字之曰清閒处士。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214762'>而蜀有豪士王当，以为盖谢敷之流。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214762'>其清也不登市井之陇，其閒也不嗅王公之钩。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214762'>傲睨万物，逍遥一丘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214762'>身与长松共老，名与北斗俱休。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214762'>涪翁曰名之不称实也久矣，吾子何以是为哉。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214762'>书潞则失涿，谓鹰则化鸠。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214762'>故一以我为马，一以我为牛。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214762'>盖有有其实而不受，亦有无其实而固求者也。<div id='poem_sentence_10_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_214762'>常试为吾子道清閒之致乎。<div id='poem_sentence_11_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_214762'>水之为物，甚寒而极清。<div id='poem_sentence_12_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_214762'>郁为坚冰，得温而释，遍利诸生。<div id='poem_sentence_13_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_214762'>云之为物，无心而出岫穴。<div id='poem_sentence_14_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_214762'>风休雨息，反一无迹。<div id='poem_sentence_15_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_214762'>我观古人，以是为则。<div id='poem_sentence_16_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_214762'>若夫污泥浊水，与蛙同生，不溷其清。<div id='poem_sentence_17_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_214762'>自操井臼，日耕荒徼，未尝不閒。<div id='poem_sentence_18_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_214762'>惟有道者能藏于天，吾子何处焉。<div id='poem_sentence_19_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_214762'>清閒曰我无所用于世，而从所好。<div id='poem_sentence_20_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_214762'>惟水云与之忘老，何敢以为有道。<div id='poem_sentence_21_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_214762'>涪翁曰舐痔十乘，曹商自优，非君清流。<div id='poem_sentence_22_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_214762'>商财计得白圭，拟国以閒为慝。<div id='poem_sentence_23_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_214762'>虽然同一大梦，达者先觉。<div id='poem_sentence_24_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_214762'>方在蚁垤，忧乐计校也。<div id='poem_sentence_25_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_214762'>世无公孙侨孔仲尼，谁辨梦觉。<div id='poem_sentence_26_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_214762'>亦曰举世溷浊，惟我独清。<div id='poem_sentence_27_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_214762'>万法本閒，而人自扰扰尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_214762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_214762'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·正集》卷二三。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_214762_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，作颂文二首。作品：王厚颂二首。<div id='poem_212948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_212948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/212948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王厚颂二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_212948")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_212948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_212948'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_212948'>八风动摇人不闲，五羖自鬻鬓毛斑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_212948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_212948'>文章书画当富贵，惟有如今至乐山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_212948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_212948'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_212948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_212948'><span class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·正集》卷二三。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_212948_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_212947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_212947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/212947?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_212947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_212947'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_212947'>夕阳尽处望清闲，想见千岩细菊斑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_212947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_212947'>人得交游是风月，天开图画即江山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_212947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_212947'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_212947_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，跋宋仁宗御书。作品：跋宋仁宗皇帝赐王太尉手书。<div id='poem_1197081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197081' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197081?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋仁宗皇帝赐王太尉手书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197081")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197081_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197081'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197081'>大同王侍中力战陷没，为虏所生得，遂富贵于虏庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197081_comment'></div>而能不忘藩邸旧恩，掌兵宠，数以忠信回豺狼之心，受金帛之惠，休兵息民，功赏不浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197081_comment'></div>不惟虏人称道沙间王乃能尽忠于两主，当时士大夫亦有微管之叹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197081_comment'></div>臣恭惟章圣皇帝以天下为度，责臣子之节，不一而足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197081_comment'></div>录其修睦之义，恩给其孙云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197081_comment'></div>而仁宗皇帝以诸子幼小，不问存没，不绝其禄赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197081_comment'></div>所以能使君子尽心，小人竭力者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197081_comment'></div>惟二圣好生之心，不杀之武，至于今天下归心，宗庙之灵，当福万代，不但卜年八百，又过其历而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197081_comment'></div>元符三年十一月丁亥，故史官臣黄庭坚谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1197081_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，写书，赠外甥张大同。作品：书赠外甥张大同。<div id='poem_1197632' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197632' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197632?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书赠张大同</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197632")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197632'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197632'>外甥张大同以此纸来乞小楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197632_comment'></div>此高纸，不宜小字，老夫又臂痛眼花，聊作墨戏以塞白，且免永沈苦海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197632_comment'></div>元符三年十二月己亥，怀古亭中书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197632_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，与王观复书信。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，为道臻所画墨竹作序。作品：道臻师画墨竹序。<div id='poem_1197072' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197072' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197072?labeling=true' target='_blank'>道臻师画墨竹序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197072")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197072_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197072'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197072'>墨竹出于近世，不知其所师承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197072_comment'></div>初，吴道子作画，超其师杨惠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197072_comment'></div>于山川崖谷，远近形势，虎豹蛇龙，至于虫蛾草木之四时，日月列星风雨水火雷霆之神物，军陈战斗斩馘奔北之象，运笔作弮，不加丹青，已极形似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197072_comment'></div>故世之精识博物之士，多藏吴生墨本，至俗子乃衒丹青耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197072_comment'></div>意墨竹之师，近出于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197072_comment'></div>往时天章阁待制燕肃，始作生竹，超然免于流俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197072_comment'></div>近世集贤校理文同，遂能极其变态，其笔墨之运，疑鬼神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197072_comment'></div>韩退之论张长史喜草书，不治它技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197072_comment'></div>所遇于世，存亡得丧，亡聊不平，有动于心，必发于书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197072_comment'></div>所观于物，千变万化，可喜可愕，必寓于书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197072_comment'></div>故张之书，不可端倪，以此终其身而名后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197072_comment'></div>与可之于竹，殆犹张之于书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197072_comment'></div>嘉州石洞讲师道臻，刻意尚行，欲自振于溷浊之波，故以墨竹自名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197072_comment'></div>然臻过与可之门而不入其室，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197072_comment'></div>夫吴生之超其师，得之于心也，故无不妙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197072_comment'></div>张长史之不治它技，用智不分也，故能入于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197072_comment'></div>夫心能不牵于外物，则其天守全，万物森然出于一镜，岂待含墨吮笔槃礴而后为之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197072_comment'></div>故余谓臻：欲得妙于笔，当得妙于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197072_comment'></div>臻问心之妙，而余不能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197072_comment'></div>有师范道人出于成都六祖，臻可持此往问之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1197072_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，题道臻所画墨竹。作品：书遗道臻墨竹后与斌老。<div id='poem_1197542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书遗道臻墨竹后与斌老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197542")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197542_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197542'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197542'>元符三年三月，戎州无等院涪翁借地所筑槁木庵中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197542_comment'></div>此篇之成，罕书与人，吾宗斌老授竹法于文与可，故书此以助经营之万一<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197542_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1197542'>「之成」原作「为戒」，据《豫章先生遗文》改。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197542'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_1197542_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·别集》卷七。又见《豫章先生遗文》卷一一。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1197542_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，为庞安常《伤寒论》作序。作品：庞安常伤寒论后序。<div id='poem_1197071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庞安常伤寒论后序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197071")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197071'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197071'>庞安常自少时善医方，为人治病，处其生死，多验，名倾江淮诸医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197071_comment'></div>然为气任侠，斗鸡走狗，蹴鞠击毬，少年豪纵事，无所不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197071_comment'></div>博弈音技，一工所难，而兼能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197071_comment'></div>家富多后房，不出户而所欲得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197071_comment'></div>人之以医聘之也，皆多陈其所好，以顺适其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197071_comment'></div>其来也，病家如市；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197071_comment'></div>其疾已也，君脱然不受谢而去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197071_comment'></div>中年乃屏绝戏弄，闭户读书，自神农、黄帝经方，扁鹊《八十一难》，《灵枢》、《甲乙》，葛洪所综缉百家之言，无不贯穿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197071_comment'></div>其简策纷错，黄素朽蠹，先师或失其读，学术浅陋，私智穿凿，曲士或窜其文，安常悉能辨论发挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197071_comment'></div>每用以视病，如是而生，如是而不治，几乎十全矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197071_comment'></div>然人以病造，不择贵贱贫富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197071_comment'></div>便斋曲房，调护以寒暑之宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197071_comment'></div>珍膳美饘，时节其饥饱之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197071_comment'></div>爱其老而慈其幼，如痛在己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197071_comment'></div>未尝轻用人之疾，尝试其所不知之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197071_comment'></div>盖其轻财如粪土而乐义，耐事如慈母而有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197071_comment'></div>似秦汉间游侠而不害人，似战国四公子而不争利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197071_comment'></div>所以能动而得意，起人之疾，不可缕数，它日过之，未尝有德色也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197071_comment'></div>其所论著《伤寒论》，多得古人不言之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197071_comment'></div>其所师用而得意于病家之阴阳虚实，今世所谓良医，十不得其五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197071_comment'></div>余始欲掇其大要，论其精微，使士大夫稍知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197071_comment'></div>适有心腹之疾，未能卒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197071_comment'></div>然未尝游其庭者，虽得吾说而不解，诚加意读其书则过半矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197071_comment'></div>故特著其行事，以为后序云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197071_comment'></div>其前序，海上道人诺为之，故虚右以待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197071_comment'></div>元符三年三月豫章黄某序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1197071_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，书杜甫《丹青引》作品：书丹青引后。<div id='poem_1197439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197439' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197439?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书丹青引后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197439")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197439_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197439'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197439'>僰道有袁药院者，家藏书一轴，自珍之，不深别其玉石也，出以示余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197439_comment'></div>余告之曰：「此秘阁棠木板刻法帖，李廷圭墨所作墨本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197439_comment'></div>写书一卷易之可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197439_comment'></div>袁欣然见听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197439_comment'></div>会夏热，余又多病，久之不能书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197439_comment'></div>元符三年十二月癸卯，余将解舟发僰道，长年三老辈汤猪馈武侯庙，久之不还，意其已纵横醉卧庙中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197439_comment'></div>舟中无他事，遂书此卷遗袁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197439_comment'></div>观书者：史庆崇、杨中玉、何裕道、杨咸孺、孙仲安、廖宣叔、张大同、蔡次律、道人李潮音。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197439_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，为郭熙山水画作跋文。作品：跋郭熙画山水。<div id='poem_1197537' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197537' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197537?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋郭熙画山水</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197537")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197537_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197537'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197537'>郭熙元丰末为显圣寺悟道者作十二幅大屏，高二丈馀，山重水复，不以云物映带，笔意不乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197537_comment'></div>余尝招子瞻兄弟共观之，子由叹息终日，以为郭熙因为苏才翁家摹六幅李成骤雨，从此笔墨大进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197537_comment'></div>观此图，乃是老年所作，可贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197537_comment'></div>元符三年九月丁亥，观于青神苏汉侯所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197537_comment'></div>山谷题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197537_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，题柏学士山居诗。作品：书柏学士山居诗题其后。<div id='poem_1197532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197532' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197532?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书柏学士山居诗题其后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197532")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197532_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197532'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197532'>史绍封之子会与予外甥张协，于苏氏为友婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197532_comment'></div>予来青衣谒家姑，因识绍封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197532_comment'></div>绍封来乞书，曰：「使会他日以为相见之资」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197532_comment'></div>今日鲁直即他日鲁直，又安用书为质耶！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197532_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，弟黄知命百日祭，有文悼之。作品：知命百日斋疏。<div id='poem_1198150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知命百日斋疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198150")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198150'>脊令在原，汝有急难之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198150_comment'></div>虎兕出柙，我无保惠之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198150_comment'></div>书墨未乾，讣音来即。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198150_comment'></div>水火不免，将何面以见先亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198150_comment'></div>股肱或亏，念谁依而终晚岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198150_comment'></div>逮兹卒哭，几欲无生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198150_comment'></div>躬扫秘园，亲供缁侣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198150_comment'></div>冀凭大觉之力，少慰九冥之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198150_comment'></div>稽首慈尊，惟垂悲救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198150_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1198150_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，题东坡大字。<div id='poem_1197501' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197501' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197501?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题东坡大字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197501")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197501_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197501'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197501'>东坡尝自评作大字不若小字，以余观之，诚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197501_comment'></div>然大字多得颜鲁公《东方先生画赞》笔意，虽时有遣笔不工处，要是无秋毫流俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197501_comment'></div>元符三年十二月甲辰夕，天不雪而大寒，呼酒解指弮乃能书此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197501_comment'></div>山谷老人题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197501_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在戎州，作《定风波》一阕。作品：定风波（晚岁监州闻荔枝）定风波（准拟阶前摘荔枝）<div id='poem_215109' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_1_215109_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215109'>万里来逢芳意歇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215109_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_215109'>春过。<div id='poem_sentence_6_215109_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215109'>等闲桃李又累累。<div id='poem_215224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>踏莎行<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span -----title
青神
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d0ca04aa51bf4200830fd4272f1e1217_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d0ca04aa51bf4200830fd4272f1e1217");'><span id='d0ca04aa51bf4200830fd4272f1e1217_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，56岁</div><div id='d0ca04aa51bf4200830fd4272f1e1217' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年7月</a>　至眉州，泛舟青神，探望姑母张氏，张氏二子为官青神，清廉爱民，深孚众望，受到山谷赞誉。作品：与张介卿书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年8月24日</a>　在青神，与祝林宗等游上岩寺。作品：游中岩行记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年8月24日</a>　作诗纪青神县尉厅附近景致。作品：青神县尉厅茸城头旧屋作借景亭下瞰史家园水竹终日寂然了无人迹又当大木绿阴之间戏作长句奉呈信孺明府介卿少府。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月1日</a>　在青神，与外弟张祉介卿赴蒲志同中岩之约。作品：游中岩行记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月3日</a>　在青神，介卿等摇煮茗于玉泉。作品：游中岩行记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月4日</a>　在青神，书杜牧之《冬至日寄阿宜》诗与史彦柏之子。作品：跋杜牧之冬至日寄阿宜诗。<div id='poem_1197409' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197409' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197409?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋杜牧之冬盈日寄阿宜诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年9月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197409")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197409_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197409'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197409'>眉人史彦柏饱经史而能文，然有秦汉间侠气，平居矫矫，常欲立于万夫之表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197409_comment'></div>求余书杜牧之诗，以教其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197409_comment'></div>牧之语虽径庭，要为有益于小学诸生，至其论崔、李积钱百屋，无补于子孙，此救世之药石也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197409_comment'></div>故欣然为之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197409_comment'></div>元符三年九月丁卯，涪翁书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197409_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月6日</a>　在青神，与张祉、玉箴、杨琳、杨岩等酌于慈老之东堂，有诗。作品：次韵杨君全送酒长句。次韵君全送春花。谢景山承事送惠酒器。<div id='poem_213620' class='_poem'><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197523_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197523'><div class='articleSentence'
