id='poem_sentence_1_1197523_comment'></div>一日告余以归，颇不忍舍其去，故手书座右一铭以赠之，俾归以遗其子椿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197523_comment'></div>椿虽少，闻骨格不凡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197523_comment'></div>元符三年九月己卯，某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197523_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月19日</a>　在青神，于青神县尉厅书古乐府赠杨岩。作品：与杨景山书古乐府因跋其后。<div id='poem_1197519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与杨景山书古乐府因跋其后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年9月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197519")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197519'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197519'>元符三年庚辰九月壬午，青神县尉厅东之退密堂，夜漏下三刻所，偶案上有墨沈一升许，几傍或置此卷，云是邑中老儒杨景山乞书，因取严永旧无心枣核笔，宛转可人意，遂书欲尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197519_comment'></div>予闻景山之子逵才武自将，今为泾原部将，故书此猛士冒锋镝报国之诗遗之，可令人日诵于军中以饮酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197519_comment'></div>山谷老人题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月</a>　在青神，书杜甫巴蜀诗并作《大雅堂记》，嘱丹棱人杨素翁刻之于石。作品：刻杜子美巴蜀诗序。<div id='poem_1197080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刻杜子美巴蜀诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197080")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197080'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197080'>自予谪居黔州，欲属一奇士而有力者，尽刻杜子美东西川及夔州诗，使大雅之音久湮没而复盈三巴之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197080_comment'></div>而目前所见，录录不能辨事，以故未尝发于口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197080_comment'></div>丹棱杨素翁拿扁舟，蹴犍为，略陵云，下郁鄢，访余于戎州，闻之欣然，请攻坚石，摹善工，约以丹棱之麦三食新而毕，作堂以宇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197080_comment'></div>予因名其堂曰大雅，而悉书遗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197080_comment'></div>此西州之盛事，亦使来世知素翁真磊落人也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197080_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年9月</a>　在青神，作大雅堂记。<div id='poem_1197799' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197799' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197799?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大雅堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197799")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197799_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197799'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197799'>丹棱杨素翁，英伟人也，其在州闾乡党有侠气，不少假借人，然以礼义，不以财力称长雄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197799_comment'></div>闻余欲尽书杜子美两川夔峡诸诗，刻石藏蜀中好文喜事之家，素翁粲然，向余请从事焉，又欲作高屋广楹庥此石，因请名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197799_comment'></div>余名之曰「大雅堂」，而告之曰：由杜子美以来四百馀年，斯文委地，文章之士随世所能，杰出时辈，未有升子美之堂者，况室家之好邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197799_comment'></div>余尝欲随欣然会意处，笺以数语，终日汩没世俗，初不暇给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197799_comment'></div>虽然，子美诗妙处，乃在无意于文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197799_comment'></div>夫无意而意已至，非广之以《国风》《雅》《颂》，深之以《离骚》《九歌》，安能咀嚼其意味，闯然入其门邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197799_comment'></div>故使后生辈自求之，则得之深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197799_comment'></div>使后之登大雅堂者，能以余说而求之，则思过半矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197799_comment'></div>彼喜穿凿者，弃其大旨，取其发兴，于所遇林泉人物、草木鱼虫，以为物物皆有所托，如世间商度隐语者，则子美之诗委地矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197799_comment'></div>素翁可并刻此于大雅堂中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197799_comment'></div>后生可畏，安知无涣然冰释于斯文者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197799_comment'></div>元符三年九月涪翁书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1197799_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年10月</a>　在青神，被委任为奉议郎、签书宁国军节度判官。作品：戎州辞免恩命奏状。<div id='poem_1195825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戎州辞免恩命奏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195825")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195825'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195825'>臣昨于元符三年五月，蒙恩自谪授涪州别驾，戎州安置，复宣义郎、监鄂州在城盐税，并还所夺勋赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195825_comment'></div>以江水汎涨，不可下峡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195825_comment'></div>至十月，又准告复臣奉议郎、签书定国军节度判官厅公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195825_comment'></div>臣以久客瘴地，抱疾累岁，年衰病侵，加以去年弟妹凋丧，几至无生，十二月方得发戎州贬所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195825_comment'></div>建中靖国元年三月至峡，又准告复臣朝奉郎、权知舒州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195825_comment'></div>至四月至荆南，又准尚书省劄子，已降告命，除臣吏部员外郎，乘递马发来赴阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195825_comment'></div>而臣到荆南，即苦痈疽发于背胁，痛毒二十馀日，今方少溃，气力虚劣，重以累年脚气，拜起艰难，全不堪事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195825_comment'></div>方陛下始初清明，万国归往，荡涤瑕垢，登用贤俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195825_comment'></div>如臣材轻智短，罪弃之馀，误蒙哀怜，洗涤驱策，实深遭逢徼幸、望云就日之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195825_comment'></div>而臣天赋孤寒，百疾所攻，冒昧宠光，清议可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195825_comment'></div>辄倾蝼蚁之诚，上渎天听，欲乞免前件恩命，除臣江淮一合入差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195825_comment'></div>假之数年，傥渐完复，尚堪黾勉，自誓糜捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195825_comment'></div>伏望圣慈特赐悯察，臣出于诚恳，别无希望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195825_comment'></div>臣只在荆南听候朝旨，谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195825_comment'></div>谨奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195825_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1195825'>臣所乞差遣，如太平州、无为军一处，实于私计为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195825_comment'></div>自荆南至臣所居分宁县不远，臣已一面前去展省坟墓，即回荆南，听候朝旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1195825_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　在青神，至眉山拜谒苏洵墓。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
乐山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3aa0574b04df4d75b37acf3e4e94bc86_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3aa0574b04df4d75b37acf3e4e94bc86");'><span id='3aa0574b04df4d75b37acf3e4e94bc86_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，56岁</div><div id='3aa0574b04df4d75b37acf3e4e94bc86' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>自青神返回戎州，过嘉州，与王朴游。作品：走笔谢王朴居士拄杖。<div id='poem_213184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>走笔谢王朴居士拄杖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213184")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213184'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213184'>投我木瓜霜雪枝，六年流落放归时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213184'>千岩万壑须重到，脚底危时幸见持。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213184'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>路经嘉州，至峨眉一游。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
江安
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='50180689e36b4ee6896cde2ba78f8961_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("50180689e36b4ee6896cde2ba78f8961");'><span id='50180689e36b4ee6896cde2ba78f8961_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，56岁</div><div id='50180689e36b4ee6896cde2ba78f8961' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　过江安，为江安守石谅挽留过年，并与之结为秦晋，时山谷之子黄相十七岁。作品：定石氏书。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='775ee4c10e5142d18e0b8c46dfc5161f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("775ee4c10e5142d18e0b8c46dfc5161f");'><span id='775ee4c10e5142d18e0b8c46dfc5161f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，57岁</div><div id='775ee4c10e5142d18e0b8c46dfc5161f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年1月</a>　在江安，为石谅诸子作字序。作品：石信道诸子字训序。<div id='poem_1197762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石信道诸子字训</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197762")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197762'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197762'>石信道诸子求余更其名字，余且因且革，名之曰翼、毕、奎、参、亢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197762_comment'></div>又作字训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197762_comment'></div>其名曰翼之字曰气游，毕之字曰尽仁，奎之字曰秉文，参之字曰孝立，亢之字曰善长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197762_comment'></div>翼者，南维朱鸟之翼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197762_comment'></div>夫存心养性，以与天地参也，则能御六气以游无穷，此人而有天翼者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197762_comment'></div>毕者，其形象鼎之实，故谓之毕，与「天下之能事毕矣」之「毕」同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197762_comment'></div>夫仁者人也，能尽仁则位乎天地之中者，毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197762_comment'></div>奎者，钩状似籀文，故以为天之文宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197762_comment'></div>天垂象以示人，非秉文之德，孰能配之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197762_comment'></div>参星象旗之垂参，象之著者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197762_comment'></div>《诗》云「三星在户」，又曰「三星在罶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197762_comment'></div>盖言其著焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197762_comment'></div>子曰：「立则见其参于前也，在舆则见其倚于衡也，夫然后行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197762_comment'></div>故曾子名参，字子舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197762_comment'></div>夫名者实之宾也，有是名，人将责实焉，非事亲之行立，则将为万物之宾乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197762_comment'></div>亢者，东维之长，天之寿星也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197762_comment'></div>惟仁者能寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197762_comment'></div>《易传》曰：「元者，善之长也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197762_comment'></div>君子体仁，足以长人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197762_comment'></div>仁者之寿，所谓没而不朽者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197762_comment'></div>夫耆年而言行不著焉，则吾不谓之寿，谓之陈人而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197762_comment'></div>建中靖国元年正月，山谷老人说<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197762_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1197762'>「天」，原校：「一作夫」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1197762_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197762'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_1197762_0'>⑴ 《山谷全书·别集》卷四。又见《豫章先生遗文》卷二。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1197762_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年1月10日</a>　离开江安，僧祖元自荣州追来饯行，山谷感其意，作诗赠之。作品：元师自荣州来追送余于沪之江安绵水驿因复用旧所赋此君轩诗韵赠之并简元师从弟周彦公。<div id='poem_213986' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213986' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213986?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元师自荣州来追送余于泸之江安绵水驿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>因复用旧所赋此君轩诗韵赠之并简元师法<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作从）</span>弟周彦公<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>②</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年1月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213986")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213986_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213986_0'>① 原缺，据山谷集补</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_213986_2'>② 原注：黄㽦《年谱》云此诗山谷跋云：余旧得东坡所作《醉翁操》善本，尝对元道之，元欣然曰：往岁从成都通判陈君颀得其谱。遂促琴弹之，词与声相得也。蜀人由是有《醉翁操》。然词中之微旨，弦外之馀韵，俗指尘耳岂易得之？建中靖国元年正月辛未，江安水次偶住亭书。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213986'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213986'>岁行辛巳建中年，诸公起废自林泉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213986'>王师侧闻陛下圣，抱琴欲奏南风弦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213986'>孤臣蒙恩已三命，望尧如日开金镜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213986'>但忧衰疾不敢前，眼前<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作见）</span>黑花耳闻磬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213986'>岂如道人山绕门，开轩友此岁寒君。<div id='poem_sentence_4_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_213986'>能来作诗赏劲节，家有晓事扬子云。<div id='poem_sentence_5_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_213986'>箨龙森森新间旧，父翁老苍孙子秀。<div id='poem_sentence_6_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_213986'>但知战胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_213986", 213986, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>得道肥</span>，莫问无肉令人瘦。<div id='poem_sentence_7_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_213986'>是师胸中抱明月，醉翁不死起自说。<div id='poem_sentence_8_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_213986'>竹影生凉到屋椽，此声可听不可传。<div id='poem_sentence_9_213986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_213986'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_213986_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
随县
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='38a4a4512b494f58a717a163192b8a45_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("38a4a4512b494f58a717a163192b8a45");'><span id='38a4a4512b494f58a717a163192b8a45_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，57岁</div><div id='38a4a4512b494f58a717a163192b8a45' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年2月3日</a>　到达汉东，观唐人所作《北齐校书图》，题书其上。作品：题校书图后。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此条据《题校书图后》之题识，而汉东在湖北，而本月黄庭坚尚在万州（四川境内），存疑。）</span><div id='poem_1197255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题校书图后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年2月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197255")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197255'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197255'>唐右相阎君粉本《北齐校书图》，士大夫十二员，执事者十三人，坐榻胡床四，书卷笔研二十二，投壶一，琴二，懒几三，支颐一，酒榼果櫑十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197255_comment'></div>一人坐胡床脱帽，方落笔，左右侍者六人，似书省中官长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197255_comment'></div>四人共一榻，陈饮具：其一下笔疾书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197255_comment'></div>其一把笔，若有所营构；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197255_comment'></div>其一欲逃酒，为一同舍挽留之，且使侍者著靴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197255_comment'></div>两榻对设，坐者七人：其一开卷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197255_comment'></div>其一捉笔顾视，若有所访问；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197255_comment'></div>其一以手拄颊，顾侍者行酒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197255_comment'></div>其一抱膝坐酒旁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197255_comment'></div>其一右手执卷，左手据支颐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197255_comment'></div>其一右手捉笔拄颊，左手开半卷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197255_comment'></div>其一仰负懒几，左右手开书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197255_comment'></div>笔法简者不缺，烦者不乱，天下奇笔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197255_comment'></div>右，故奉议郎、知富顺监京兆宋元寿所藏，初得之荥阳盛孟适，盖文肃公家旧物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197255_comment'></div>建中靖国元年二月甲午，江西黄庭坚自戎州来，将下荆州，泊舟汉东市，始识富顺君之子兆吉长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197255_comment'></div>观此画，叹赏弥日，吉长举以见惠，余不忍取，为书其大概，使并藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197255_comment'></div>此笔墨之妙，必待精鉴，乃出示之，廉者必不取，贪者必不与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197255_comment'></div>赵润甫家烛下书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1197255_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

万州

id='poem_sentence_1_1197826_comment'></div>西山者，盖郡西渡大壑，稍陟山半，竹柏荟蔚之间，水泉潴为大湖，亭榭环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197826_comment'></div>有僧舍五区，其都名名曰勒封院。<div class='inline' class='label'>按：</span>《山谷全书·别集》卷二。又见《豫章先生遗文》卷一二，《舆地纪胜》卷一七七，《八琼室金石补正》卷一○八，《金石苑》，《万邑西南山石刻记》卷上，国家图书馆拓片·章专二七一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1197826_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1197852' -----title
江陵
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='722ea35000e04a62a27bfed89b4ecd3c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("722ea35000e04a62a27bfed89b4ecd3c");'><span id='722ea35000e04a62a27bfed89b4ecd3c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1102')">1101-1102年</a>，57-58岁</div><div id='722ea35000e04a62a27bfed89b4ecd3c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年4月</a>　到达江陵（又称荆州），安家沙市。此时又接到尚书省劄子除吏部员外郎，要求乘递马速赴阙。因病辞免，请求为官太平州或无为军，在荆州等候命令。作品：辞免恩命状。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年4月</a>　到达江陵，戎州旧吏李珍一路悉心照顾，山谷写蔡明远帖送之。作品：写蔡明远帖与李珍跋尾。<div id='poem_1197206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197206?labeling=true' target='_blank'>写蔡明远帖与李珍跋尾</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197206")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197206'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197206'>戎州旧吏李珍，小心而办事，家有水竹亭馆，亦能婆娑风月，不甚出圭角于群吏间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197206_comment'></div>余之窜戎州，使君彭道微，故人也，又与之有连，每遣珍来调护余逆旅之事，无不可人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197206_comment'></div>及余蒙恩东归，珍亦用年绩当赴吏部，复调护余行橐下荆州，不漏毛甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197206_comment'></div>余以疾留荆渚，珍告余而西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197206_comment'></div>珍之勤恪，似不愧蔡明远也，故戏书鲁公《明远帖》与之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197206_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年4月</a>　在江陵，为苏轼和陶诗作跋。作品：跋子瞻和陶诗。<div id='poem_214832' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214832' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214832?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋子瞻和陶诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214832")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214832_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214832'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214832'>子瞻谪岭南，时宰欲杀之。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214832_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214832'>饱吃惠州饭，细和渊明诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_214832_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_214832'>彭泽千载人，东坡百世士。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214832_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214832'>出处虽不同，风味乃相似。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214832_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214832'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214832_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年4月</a>　在江陵，为承天寺作塔记。作品：江陵府承天禅院塔记。<div id='poem_1197815' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197815' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197815?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江陵府承天禅院塔记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197815")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197815_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197815'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197815'>绍圣二年，余以史事得罪窜黔中，道出江陵，寓承天，以补纫春服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197815_comment'></div>时住持僧智珠，方撤旧僧伽浮图于地，瓦木如山，而嘱余曰：「成功之后，愿乞文记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197815_comment'></div>余笑曰：「作记不难，顾成功为难耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197815_comment'></div>后六年，余蒙恩东归，则七级浮图岿然立于云霄之上矣，因问其缘，珠曰：「此虽出于众力，费以万缗，鸠工于丁丑，而落成于壬午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197815_comment'></div>其难者既成功矣，其不难者敢乞之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197815_comment'></div>余曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197815_comment'></div>谨按，承天禅院僧伽浮图，作于高氏在荆州时，既坏，而主者非其人，枝撑以度岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197815_comment'></div>有知进者，住持十八年，守旧而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197815_comment'></div>智珠初问心法于清源奇道者，而自闽中来，则佐知进主院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197815_comment'></div>道俗欣欣，皆曰：「起废扶倾，惟此道人能之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197815_comment'></div>于是六年，作而新之者过半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197815_comment'></div>知进殁，众归珠，而不释此浮图，遂崇成耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197815_comment'></div>僧伽本起于盱眙，于今宝祠遍天下，其道化乃溢于异域，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197815_comment'></div>岂释氏所谓愿力普及者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197815_comment'></div>儒者常论一佛寺之费，盖中民万家之产，实生民谷帛之蠹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197815_comment'></div>虽余亦谓之然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197815_comment'></div>然自余省事以来，观天下财力屈竭之端，国家无大军旅勤民丁赋之政，则蝗旱水溢，或疾疫连数十州，此盖生人之共业，盈虚有数，非人力所能胜者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197815_comment'></div>然天下之善人少，不善人常多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197815_comment'></div>王者之刑赏以治其外，佛者之祸福以治其内，则于世教，岂小补哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197815_comment'></div>而儒者尝欲合而轧之，是真何理哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197815_comment'></div>因珠乞文，记其化缘，故并论其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197815_comment'></div>智珠，古田人，有智略而无心，与人无崖岸，又不为翕翕然，故久而人益信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197815_comment'></div>买石者邹永年，篆额者黄乘，作记者黄某，立石者马珹。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1197815_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年4月16日</a>　在江陵，于承天寺试金崖石研、诸葛元笔，观者如堵。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年5月15日</a>　在江陵，书《伏波帖》<br /><a href="javascript: "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>鸳鸯机</span>综，能令侬巧，也待乘槎仙去。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215215_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215215'>若逢海上白头翁，共一访、痴牛騃女。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_215215_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年7月</a>　在江陵，书白居易《三游洞序》，刻之夷陵。作品：跋自书乐天三游洞序。<div id='poem_1197597' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197597' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197597?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋自书乐天三游洞序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197597")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197597_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197597'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197597'>元和初，盗杀武丞相于通衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197597_comment'></div>乐天以赞善大夫，是日上疏论天下根本，所言忤君相按剑之意，谪江州司马数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197597_comment'></div>平淮西之明年，乃迁忠州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197597_comment'></div>观其言行，蔼然君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197597_comment'></div>余往来三游洞下，未尝不想见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197597_comment'></div>门人唐履因请书乐天序，刻之夷陵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197597_comment'></div>向宾闻之，欣然买石，具其费，遂与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197597_comment'></div>建中靖国元年七月，涪翁题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197597_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年冬</a>　在江陵沙市舟中题王云所编诗文，提出将自作诗文分成内、外篇之意。作品：题王子飞所编文后。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1197254_comment'></div>他日合平生杂草，蒐狝去半，而别为二篇，乃能终此意云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197254_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年冬</a>　在江陵，作书答王子飞，对陈师道推崇备至。作品：答王子飞书。<div id='poem_1195848' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195848' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195848?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答王子飞书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195848_comment'></div>其作诗渊源，得老杜句法，今之诗人不能当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195848_comment'></div>至于作文，深知古人之关键。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195848_comment'></div>其论事救首救尾，如常山之蛇，时辈未见其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195848_comment'></div>公有意于学者，不可不往扫斯人之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195848_comment'></div>古人云：「读书十年，不如一诣习主簿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195848_comment'></div>端有此理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195848_comment'></div>若见，为问讯，千万。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1195848_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，与侍御史黄昭认宗，并与黄昭之子黄友闻、黄友益、黄友谅。作品：答荆州族人颜徒帖。<div id='poem_1196218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1196218' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_1196218_comment'></div>旧尝闻先君绪言，长沙一族，初亦零替，闻有晦甫者，儒学里行，人所推宗，恨未相识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1196218_comment'></div>及不肖游学在淮南，则闻闽漕以侍御史召，名动京师矣。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，与王庠书，教导王氏读建安、陶潜、杜甫等人诗作；并对苏轼、秦观等人逝世痛惜不已。作品：与王庠周彦书。<div id='poem_1195849' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195849' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195849?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王庠周彦书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195849")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195849_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195849'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195849'>东坡先生遂捐馆舍，岂独贤士大夫悲痛不能已，「人之云亡，邦国殄瘁」者也，可惜可惜！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195849_comment'></div>立朝堂堂，危言谠论，切于事理，岂复有之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195849_comment'></div>然有自常州来，云东坡病亟时，索沐浴，改朝衣，谈笑而化，其胸中固无憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195849_comment'></div>所惜子由不得一见，又未得一还乡社，使后生瞻望此堂堂尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195849_comment'></div>欲作诗文道其意，亦未能成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195849_comment'></div>秦少游没于藤州，传得自作祭文并诗，可为霣涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195849_comment'></div>如此奇才，今世不复有矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195849_comment'></div>所寄诗文，反覆读之，如对谈笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195849_comment'></div>意所主张，甚近古人，但其波澜枝叶不若古人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195849_comment'></div>意亦是读建安作者之诗，与渊明、子美所作，未入神尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195849_comment'></div>见东坡《书黄子思诗卷后》，论陶谢诗、钟王书，极有理，尝见之否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195849_comment'></div>孙伯远善论文章之美恶，严君可长在笔下，公能致此二士馆之，当有得耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1195849_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年12月</a>　在江陵，接到苏辙书信并有答书，对苏轼逝世深表痛惜。作品：寄苏子由书。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_1197128_comment'></div>清公少时盖依之数年，尝教诲道俗云：「万事随缘，是安乐法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197128_comment'></div>清公云：「如安禅师，心无简择，可爱可钦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197604_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，为刘仲更墨迹题跋语。作品：跋王子予外祖刘仲更墨迹。<div id='poem_1197591' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197591' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197591?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋王子予外祖刘仲更墨迹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197591")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197591_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197591'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197591'>某十五六时，游学淮南间，晋城刘仲更以多闻强识，得近世不传之学，为大儒欧阳文忠公、宋景文公所称赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197591_comment'></div>《唐书》《天文》、《地理》、《律历》、《五行志》，皆仲更所定，诸公但仰成而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197591_comment'></div>仲更位卑年不寿，不及翱翔于中朝，贱生不及承颜接辞，尝以为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197591_comment'></div>顷岁蒙恩入秘书省，秘书省官皆天下选求，如仲更之学术深密者盖鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197591_comment'></div>今观遗草，为之霣涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197591_comment'></div>建中靖国元年五月癸未，故太史氏黄某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197591_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_215041_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215041'>此路若逢醉客，应在万仞峰前。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215041_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215041'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_215041_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，为东坡诗作跋。作品：跋东坡诗。<div id='poem_1197196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197196' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1197196'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197196'>东坡在颍州时，因欧阳叔弼读《元载传》，叹渊明之智，遂作此诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197196_comment'></div>渊明隐约栗里柴桑之间，或饭不足也，颜延年送钱二十万，即日尽送酒家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197196_comment'></div>与蓄积不知纪极，至藏胡椒八百斛者，相去远近，岂直睢阳苏合弹与蜣螂粪丸比哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197196_comment'></div>建中靖国元年六月庚戌伏，追凉于护国院，与余洪范同来，修公出此卷，戏题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197196_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1197435_comment'></div>细观其内行，冰清玉洁，视金珠如粪土，未始凝滞于一物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197435_comment'></div>《诗》云：「岂弟君子，胡不万年」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197435_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，作书与刘邦直。作品：跋自草与刘邦直。<div id='poem_1197613' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197613' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197613?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋自草与刘邦直</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_1_1197613_comment'></div>「后生可畏，安知来者不如今」者，特戏言耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197613_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_1197605'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197605'>欧阳文忠公书不极工，然喜论古今书，故晚年亦少进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197605_comment'></div>其文章议论，一世所宗，书又不恶，自足传百世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197605_comment'></div>建中靖国元年冬至，观于荆州沙市舟中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197605_comment'></div>雪晴大寒，捉笔不能字。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，书苏轼帖。作品：书王周彦东坡帖。<div id='poem_1197584' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197584' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197584?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书王周彦东坡帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年1月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197584")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197584_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197584'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197584'>东坡云：「大字难于结密而无间，小字难于宽绰而有馀」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197584_comment'></div>此确论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197584_comment'></div>余尝申之曰：结密而无间，《瘗鹤铭》近之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197584_comment'></div>宽绰而有馀，《兰亭》近之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197584_comment'></div>若以篆文说之，大字如李斯《绎山碑》，小字如先秦古器科斗文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197584_comment'></div>东坡先生道义文章名满天下，所谓青天白日，奴隶亦知其清明者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197584_comment'></div>心说而诚服者，岂但中分鲁国哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197584_comment'></div>士之不游苏氏之门，与尝升其堂而畔之者，非愚则傲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197584_comment'></div>当先生之弃海濒，其平生交游多讳之矣，而周彦万里致医药，以文字乞品目，此岂流俗人炙手求热、救溺取名者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197584_comment'></div>盖见其内而忘其外，得其精而忘其粗者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197584_comment'></div>周彦敦厚好学，行其所闻，求其所愿，得意于寂寞之乡，邀乐于无臭味之处，他日吾将友之而不可得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197584_comment'></div>建中靖国元年正月乙酉书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1197584_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，题砥柱铭。作品：题魏郑公砥柱铭后。<div id='poem_1197503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197503?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题魏郑公砥柱铭后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197503")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197503'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197503'>余平生喜观《贞观政要》，见魏郑公之事太宗，有爱君之仁，有责难之义，其智足以经世，其德足以服物，平生欣慕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197503_comment'></div>故观《砥柱铭》，时为好学者书之，忘其文之工拙，所谓「我但见其妩媚」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197503_comment'></div>吾友杨明叔知经术，能诗，喜属文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197503_comment'></div>为吏干公家如己事，持身洁清，不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1197503", 1197503, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>夏畦</span>之面事上官，不以得上官之面陵其下，可告以魏郑公之事业者也，故书此铭遗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197503_comment'></div>置《砥柱》于座旁，亦自有味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197503_comment'></div>刘禹锡云：「世道剧颓波，我心如砥柱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197503_comment'></div>夫随波上下，若水中之凫，既不可以为人师表，又不可以为人臣作则，《砥柱》之文在旁，并得两师焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197503_comment'></div>虽然，持砥柱之节以事人，上官之所不悦，下官之所不附，明叔亦安能病此而改其节哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197503_comment'></div>建中靖国元年正月庚寅，系船王市，山谷老人烛下书，泸州史子山请镵诸石。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1197503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　在江陵，跋匹纸。<div id='poem_1197200' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197200' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_1197200_comment'></div>适有田氏嘉酝，问子飞、子均，皆不能酒，而子予自赞曰能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197200_comment'></div>因濯余古铜瓢，满酌饮之，曰：「饮此，则为子书匹纸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197200_comment'></div>子予请尽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197200_comment'></div>既而一举，覆瓢示余，因为落笔不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197200_comment'></div>是日子予虽醉，而狂语皆无流俗之谈，亦可以观其不凡也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197200_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: 通城
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2985e49b588d49aea03c33885f5d24e5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2985e49b588d49aea03c33885f5d24e5");'><span id='2985e49b588d49aea03c33885f5d24e5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，58岁</div><div id='2985e49b588d49aea03c33885f5d24e5' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至通城，途中有诗。作品：自巴陵略平江临湘入通城无日不雨至黄龙奉谒清禅师继而晚晴邂逅禅客戴道纯款语作长句呈道纯。<div id='poem_213688' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213688?labeling=true' target='_blank'>自巴陵略平江临湘入通城无日不雨至黄龙奉谒清禅师继而晚晴邂逅禅客戴道纯款语作长句呈道纯</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年2月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213688")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213688_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213688'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213688'>山行十日雨沾衣，幕阜峰前对落晖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213688'>野水自添田水满，晴鸠却唤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_213688", 213688, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>雨鸠</span>归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213688'>灵源大士人天眼，双塔老师诸佛机。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213688'>白发苍颜重到此，问君还是昔人非。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213688'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213688_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至通城，为惟清删改自己早期的作品《南昌集》<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
万载
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7c3a18a499f64e568a6fb3373e2fb61c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7c3a18a499f64e568a6fb3373e2fb61c");'><span id='7c3a18a499f64e568a6fb3373e2fb61c_link' style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>自分宁至萍乡省其兄黄大临，寓万载广慧道场，有诗。作品：冲雨向万载道中得逍遥观遂托宿戏题。题竹尊者轩。<div id='poem_214107' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214107' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/214107?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冲雨向万载道中得逍遥观托宿遂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>戏题</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_214107")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div -----title
萍乡
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7fad646219214510a15ec53c331f2403_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7fad646219214510a15ec53c331f2403");'><span id='7fad646219214510a15ec53c331f2403_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，58岁</div><div id='7fad646219214510a15ec53c331f2403' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年4月1日</a>　至萍乡，兄弟二人相聚半月，题壁于萍乡县厅壁。作品：书萍乡县厅壁。<div id='poem_1197845' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197845' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197845?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书萍乡县厅壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年4月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197845")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197845_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197845'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197845'>庭坚杭荆江，略洞庭，涉修水，经七十二渡，出万载、宜春，来省伯氏元明于萍乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197845_comment'></div>初，元明自陈留出尉氏、许昌，渡汉、江陵，上夔峡，过一百八盘，涉四十八渡，送余安置于摩围山之下，淹留数月不忍别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197845_comment'></div>士大夫共慰勉之，乃肯行，掩泪握手，为万里无相见期之别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197845_comment'></div>蛮中九年，白头来归，而相见于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197845_comment'></div>访旧抚新，悲喜兼怀，其情有不胜言者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197845_comment'></div>余之入宜春之境，闻士大夫之论，以谓元明尽心尽政，视民有父母之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197845_comment'></div>然其民嚚讼异于他邦，病在慈仁太过，不用威猛耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197845_comment'></div>至则以问元明，元明叹曰：「天子使宰百里，固欲安乐之，岂使操三尺法而与子弟仇敌哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197845_comment'></div>昔汉宣帝患北海多盗贼，起龚遂为太守，及入见，见其老而悔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197845_comment'></div>遂进而问曰：『北海之盗，陛下将胜之邪，将安之邪』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197845_comment'></div>然后宣帝喜见于色，曰：『张官置吏，固欲安之也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197845_comment'></div>余尝许遂，以为天下长者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197845_comment'></div>夫猛则玉石俱焚，宽则公私皆废，吾不猛不宽，唯其是而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197845_comment'></div>故榜吾所居轩曰『唯是』而自警」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197845_comment'></div>庭坚曰：「夫猛而不害善良，宽而不长奸宄，虽两汉循良，不过如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197845_comment'></div>萍乡邑里之间，鸱枭且为凤凰，稂莠皆化为嘉谷矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197845_comment'></div>因书之屏间，以慰别后怀思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197845_comment'></div>庭坚之来以崇宁元年四月乙酉，而去以是月之己亥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1197845_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年4月5日</a>　饭于萍乡护法院。作品：书船子和尚歌后。<div id='poem_1197620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书船子和尚歌后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年4月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197620")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197620'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197620'>《船子和尚歌》，渔父语意清新，道人家风，处处出现，所以接得夹山，水洒不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197620_comment'></div>崇宁元年四月己丑，饭于萍乡之护法院僧堂中，斋起受温浴，浴罢书此卷以解倦。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1197620_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年4月15日</a>　离开萍乡，赴江州与其家相会。<br /></div>
-----end

分宜
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3ffc8c95725648a38f2da068710d8bac_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3ffc8c95725648a38f2da068710d8bac");'><span id='3ffc8c95725648a38f2da068710d8bac_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，58岁</div><div id='3ffc8c95725648a38f2da068710d8bac' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年4月21日</a>　行经袁州，书苏轼《松醪赋》作品：书子瞻松醪赋后。<div id='poem_1197634' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197634' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197634?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书子瞻松醪赋后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年4月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197634")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197634_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197634'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197634'>文章云起风生，笔力山崩海立，非东坡先生，其孰能之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197634_comment'></div>崇宁元年四月乙巳，萧明之追余于太平山，书此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197634_comment'></div>某甥洪炎同观。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1197634_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
新余（新喻）

<div class='label1' id='507adac71b7c4f8181d231a804fd114a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("507adac71b7c4f8181d231a804fd114a");'><span id='507adac71b7c4f8181d231a804fd114a_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年4月</a>　过新余，作书与兄长黄大临。作品：新喻道中寄元明用觞字韵。<div id='poem_213849' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213849' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_213849'>唤客煎茶山店远，看人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_213849", 213849, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>秧<sup class='reference onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_213849", 213849, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>家里</span>俱无恙，不用书来细作行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213849_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 高安
-----detail

-----title
湖口
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='0f01b8f845064bc4bc6ef94511fe924d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0f01b8f845064bc4bc6ef94511fe924d");'><span id='0f01b8f845064bc4bc6ef94511fe924d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，58岁</div><div id='0f01b8f845064bc4bc6ef94511fe924d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年5月20日</a>　过湖口，李正臣持苏轼《壶中九华诗》来见，山谷和之。作品：湖口人李正臣畜异石九峰东坡先生名日壶中九华并为作诗后八年自海归过湖口石已为好事者所取乃和前篇以为笑实建中靖国元年四月十六日明年当崇宁之元五月二十日庭坚系舟湖口李正臣持此诗来石既不可复见东坡亦下世矣感叹不足因次前韵。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
安庆

id='poem_content_1197767'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197767'>许而字邦任，不甚中理，辄奉字曰深道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197767_comment'></div>古人有大功于世者，深于道者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197767_comment'></div>不深于道而能追配古人，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197767_comment'></div>自许以深于道，古人之学也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197767_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　在当涂，有韦许从之游，作品：书韦许扇。<div id='poem_1197300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书韦许扇</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197300")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197300'>自重者能下人以求道，处静者不攘臂而胜躁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197300_comment'></div>深道者当晚成，远施者当厚报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197300_comment'></div>以能问于不能，人之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197300_comment'></div>损有馀以补不足，天之道。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　在当涂，为芜湖县吉祥禅院作记。作品：太平州芜湖县吉祥禅院记。<div id='poem_1197806' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197806' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197806?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太平州芜湖县吉祥禅院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197806")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197806_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197806'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197806'>太平州芜湖县吉祥院者，考之载籍，不知其所本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197806_comment'></div>父老言，曩犹有石刻云，院基于晋承和二年，而忘其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197806_comment'></div>又言，江南李昪初为徐温乞子，时徐知训不能容昪，置酒伏剑士，欲杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197806_comment'></div>行酒吏刁彦能知其故，以手爪语昪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197806_comment'></div>昪悟，起走，伏于此院北山间古松下以免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197806_comment'></div>及昪有国，名院曰「永寿」云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197806_comment'></div>其后僧绍熙焚巢毁像，扫地几尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197806_comment'></div>天圣初，知县事太常博士董黄中逐绍熙，以授僧自元，而院中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197806_comment'></div>景祐大飨帝于明堂，赐院名曰「吉祥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197806_comment'></div>元之徒继主事者曰可旻，亦有道行俗缘，以故其佛事崇成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197806_comment'></div>上北山，斩竹开屋，凡数十楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197806_comment'></div>旻死，其弟可云、可暹，败隳寺居，略如绍熙时，钟鱼不鸣，像设风雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197806_comment'></div>云等不能有，乃求以十方人主事，阅知县事晋陵胡宗质、开封李士高，始以邑中士大夫耆老之愿，起宣州广教禅院僧庆馀传法住持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197806_comment'></div>芜湖未尝有十方院，院又芜废，不可措手，人以为兴之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197806_comment'></div>而馀以元丰八年五月二十八日来就法席，是日竹笋弥山，人以为瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197806_comment'></div>有屠者故凶忍，于是方欲解牛，三夕不能奏刀，已而牛见梦：「送我吉祥院」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197806_comment'></div>屠以语市中人，市中人则共买牛与吉祥，至今以供麦硙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197806_comment'></div>方念作经藏，而法鼓自鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197806_comment'></div>馀亦不知寒暑，日乞于市上，风饕雪虐，道无行人，而夫须袯襫出作佛事，故邑人动心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197806_comment'></div>其耆老亦有修禅奉律、信有是道者，以是坐贾行商、与田间著姓，破悭舍有，日月至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197806_comment'></div>然馀自贫士一钱而乞之，而人有施四十万者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197806_comment'></div>故岁行八周，兴旧起废，于今可以安方来、礼勤旧，下逮冗从，皆有舍区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197806_comment'></div>又为大转轮藏经，其费钜万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197806_comment'></div>方岁之不易，居民荐菑于水火，若不可为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197806_comment'></div>而馀之立志如山，不可回夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1197806_comment'></div>馀之言曰：「芜湖古大县，尝为丹阳郡治所，直中江之会，舳舻相属，千里连樯，辅我者众，则吾事当有济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1197806_comment'></div>百足之虫，至死不仆，吾以是没，吾世为之，以成难成，遂济登兹」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1197806_comment'></div>庭坚曰：此山盖为永寿院者几百年，为吉祥院者又五十年矣，今乃蔚为禅居，再阅废兴，可为累叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1197806_comment'></div>物之成坏相寻，冯虚而责实，盖难为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1197806_comment'></div>今馀之功绪且终，是必将斋心服形，退藏于密，延四方之有道者为之法供养，岂使法鼓虚鸣，反为硙下牛所笑哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1197806_comment'></div>故为之记其所从来，使后有考焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1197806_comment'></div>馀盖授法于太平州兴国修睦，而其同学弟仲圭实左右之。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1197806'></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1197806_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　在当涂，跋洪刍书。作品：跋洪驹父诸家书。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_1197631_comment'></div>或题关头曰：「自此以往，更不理为在生月日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197631_comment'></div>某顾伯氏元明而笑，元明盖愀如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197631_comment'></div>建中靖国元年三月，下鬼门关，因戏题云：「人言生入鬼门关，更不理为在生日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197631_comment'></div>虽从乙酉到庚辰，老夫明年五十七」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197631_comment'></div>今观此字，似是十年前书，当时用笔皆不会予今日手中意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197631_comment'></div>古人所论，《庄子》「藏山于泽，有力者负之而趋」，盖言前山非后山；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197631_comment'></div>孔子「逝者如斯夫，不舍昼夜」，盖言前水非后水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197631_comment'></div>审解此意，则此书定非予书也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1197631_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　在鄂州，书船子和尚歌。作品：书船子和尚歌后。<div id='poem_1197620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书船子和尚歌后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年4月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197620")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197620'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197620'>《船子和尚歌》，渔父语意清新，道人家风，处处出现，所以接得夹山，水洒不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197620_comment'></div>崇宁元年四月己丑，饭于萍乡之护法院僧堂中，斋起受温浴，浴罢书此卷以解倦。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1197620_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　在鄂州，与徐俯书。作品：与徐师川书二首。<div id='poem_1195865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与徐师川书<span class='inlineComment2'>（二　崇宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195865")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195865'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195865'>庭坚顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195865_comment'></div>每见贤士大夫及林下得意人，言师川言行之美，未尝不叹息也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195865_comment'></div>所寄诗，正忙时读数过，辞皆尔雅，意皆有所属，规模远大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195865_comment'></div>自东坡、秦少游、陈履常之死，常恐斯文之将坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195865_comment'></div>不意复得吾甥，真颓波之砥柱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195865_comment'></div>续当写魏郑公《砥柱铭》奉寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195865_comment'></div>甥能忍夏蚊之噆肤而从莹中游，真旷世之奇事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195865_comment'></div>蒙谕当涂不可作久计，诚然，似闻已别有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195865_comment'></div>须近诗，漫往数篇，老拙岂能如所云，观一节可以知其侏儒也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1195865_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1195866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与徐师川书<span class='inlineComment2'>（三）</span></a><span id='poem_sentence_1_1195866_comment'></div>承莹中便向吴中，失此渊对，何能不怅然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195866_comment'></div>老舅六月九日领太平事，十七日奉朝旨送吏部，即日解船至江口，以嗣文同行，遂为远别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195866_comment'></div>亦大风，不可行，留连方欲诀去，会驹父奉其大母来，又为之留七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195866_comment'></div>闰月十一日分手，亦冲东风至芜湖矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195866_comment'></div>吏部告示作初任通判人升一季名次，指射优便差遣，三两日间亦漫投一状也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195866_comment'></div>将家到荆南谋居，居定，或从容玉泉、鬼谷之间，以须阙耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_1197440' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197440' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197440?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书姚诚老所书遗教经后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197440")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197440_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197440'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197440'>姚诚老书《佛垂般涅盘略说教戒经》，用笔有意态，惜乎不能耆老毕其能事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197440_comment'></div>世有贞观中敕书班行经生书小楷一本，最端谨娴丽，世因谓之王右军书，盖不知弘始四年译出此经，右军没已数十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197440_comment'></div>又有参军畅整书大字一本，笔法亦劲润，宋宣献书法度多出于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197440_comment'></div>诚老令桂之兴安，秦少游播迁岭海，诚老有先后奔走之义，可谓不以险易易其操，不愧此波罗提木叉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197440_comment'></div>观其遗书，三叹不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197440_comment'></div>崇宁二年四月十四日，修水黄某书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1197440_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　在鄂州，作墓志铭。作品：宋故通直郎河东转运司勾当公事萧君子长墓志铭。<div id='poem_1198067' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198067' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198067?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通直郎河东转运司勾当公事萧君子长墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁二年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198067")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198067_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198067'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198067'>治平四年，庭坚初仕得叶县尉，与同年生湖口主簿何君表、郊社斋郎萧子长同归江南，登高临远，把酒赋诗，忘道涂之劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198067_comment'></div>此时子长年尚少，器宇堪事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198067_comment'></div>后十年，见于清江，则老成重慎，无少年气矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198067_comment'></div>又十年，见于京师，宦游虽不偶，而气不挫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198067_comment'></div>又十年，庭坚谪在僰道，会新天子即位，恩许东归，而闻子长没于河东矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198067_comment'></div>子长，新淦萧氏也，讳景修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1198067_comment'></div>曾大父汉卿、大父中师、父访，皆隐于田间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1198067_comment'></div>子长举进士有声，而用妻父提点江西刑狱何若谷奏补官，调临贺尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1198067_comment'></div>以母忧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1198067_comment'></div>再调吉州司户参军，以父忧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1198067_comment'></div>调平南令，改宣义郎、知符离县，从辟为河东转运司勾当公事，泛恩迁通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1198067_comment'></div>元符三年七月卒于官次，享年五十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1198067_comment'></div>子长居丧毁瘠，丧祭尽力，既免丧，弟兄欲析生，而悉推与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1198067_comment'></div>为吏不苟简，必令中法律，得民情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1198067_comment'></div>以算捕盗，或踰年，盗不发，狱屡空；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1198067_comment'></div>淮泗多蝗，而独不害其稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1198067_comment'></div>决狱求生之，盖尝再活死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1198067_comment'></div>其遇不便民事，虽触忌讳不苟止，必直乃已，不惮大吏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1198067_comment'></div>故其进官陵迟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1198067_comment'></div>如子长者，才未试，志不伸，屈在下位，死于中年，是可哀也已，故论撰而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1198067_comment'></div>夫人何氏，先子长五年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1198067_comment'></div>子之彦、之方，皆举进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1198067_comment'></div>之纯、之邵，蚤卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1198067_comment'></div>其二尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1198067_comment'></div>三女，既嫁陈峤、徐哲，其一在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1198067_comment'></div>之彦奉君及何夫人之丧，合葬于其县之鸡冠山祖茔之次，实崇宁之癸未，其仲冬之丙寅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1198067_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1198067'>平居秩秩，晬乎其不忤物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1198067_comment'></div>遇事愤发，矫乎其不可屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1198067_comment'></div>视其能也将有上，观其文也将有述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1198067_comment'></div>忽乎其颠作土室，后千万年见白日，吾以斯文吐其郁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1198067_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　在鄂州，为洪州分宁县青龙山兴化禅院作记。作品：洪州分宁县青龙山兴化禅院记。<div id='poem_1197805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州分宁县青龙山兴化禅院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197805")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197805'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197805'>幕阜山之东，黄龙山之下曰青龙山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197805_comment'></div>背山而向溪，有道场曰兴化禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197805_comment'></div>相传以为隋初有头陀卜筑此山，得名曰灵台院，至会昌而籍没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197805_comment'></div>大中再许度人，有利相禅师，实化草莱，皆为金碧，号澄心院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197805_comment'></div>嗣兴者曰伏虎禅师，岁远失其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197805_comment'></div>盖常以道行伏虎，乡民生敬其经行，死奉其塔庙，至今遗基岿然，水旱犹请祷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197805_comment'></div>此后子孙食其田宅而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197805_comment'></div>至庆历中，赐名兴化禅院，于今七世，无赫赫可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197805_comment'></div>绍圣丙子岁，众请漳州僧以弼住持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197805_comment'></div>弼尝入黄龙心、泐潭文之丈室，自以为闻得力句于东林常总禅师，不能补坏支倾，偷过岁月，锐意兴作，必欲自我一新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197805_comment'></div>尚有东林之规摹，又得长沙僧志秀为之佐，故七年而大厦弥山，凡所以尊崇经像，安养圣贤，包容作务，馆谷宾客，无不称事，高明显融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197805_comment'></div>又栽杉十万，以关盛衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197805_comment'></div>盖方事之初，民慎展者，家有古坟槠林，相其材可大用，而人以为不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197805_comment'></div>已而槠林之中，夜闻钟梵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197805_comment'></div>或以告弼，试往喻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197805_comment'></div>慎氏四十馀院，欣然同施，人歆其祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197805_comment'></div>于是倾财献力，遂崇成耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197805_comment'></div>惟积敝难振，大缘难成，非其时不兴，非其人不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197805_comment'></div>夫更六世，而补破支坏，粗合苟完，可谓积敝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197805_comment'></div>空山之间，四旁去州县远，彻故作新，费以钜万，可谓大缘矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197805_comment'></div>槠林钟梵，非所应有而惊动，此其兴之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197805_comment'></div>弼以净行而主此缘，秀又为之竭力，凡一切作务，病者不悔，死者不怨，皆曰，今我尽心尽力，必将惠我三昧，其人又能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1197805_comment'></div>夫东林千岁之功，发地除之，不遗一像一室，为屋千楹，成坏无不如意，然未及以道接十方也而化去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1197805_comment'></div>今弼尚未老，讫臻厥成，尚行总公之道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1197805_comment'></div>故为之记，记其兴废而劝请之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1197805_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年11月1日</a>　在鄂州，为萍乡县宝积禅寺作记。作品：萍乡县宝积禅寺记。<div id='poem_1197818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>萍乡县宝积禅寺记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年11月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197818")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197818'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197818'>宝积禅寺，本周广顺中以民李氏施宅地梵林寺，寺有僧伽象，显德中见光怪累日，因改宝积寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197818_comment'></div>星居六室，以元符二年十二月敕破律为禅，以僧绍槩主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197818_comment'></div>而槩于萍乡无法缘，居十月而里人不施一钱，于是弃而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197818_comment'></div>三年十月，余伯氏元明为令也，择请延庆院山主宗禅来尸法席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197818_comment'></div>禅倦游诸方，号称得安乐法，其居延庆也，变饮酒食肉处为菩提坊，开草莱荆棘为金碧聚，故元明以为是必能兴我宝积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197818_comment'></div>三招而后肯来，至则破六律院为一丛林，谤者杜口，檀者倾施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197818_comment'></div>六阅岁，尽彻蜂房之屋，郁为鹫峰之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197818_comment'></div>建中靖国之元，方丈、三门、世尊之庙崇成矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197818_comment'></div>粤明年，乐静室、德味厨、法堂皆毕工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197818_comment'></div>凡率有钱之家为五百万，而所以庇覆安乐道众冗徒之屋无不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197818_comment'></div>使嚚讼者口谈般若，鄙吝者心悦檀施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197818_comment'></div>若禅者可谓有功于此县，而其道行之化，或溢于邻邦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197818_comment'></div>伯氏来属为禅记之，故叙载如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197818_comment'></div>崇宁二年十一月丁丑，朝奉郎、管句洪州玉隆观、云骑尉、赐绯鱼袋黄庭坚鲁直记并书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197818_comment'></div>萍乡县令黄大临元明立石。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1197818_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年11月</a>　在鄂州，有宜州谪命。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年12月1日</a>　在鄂州，作《封植兰蕙手约》<div id='poem_1198177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1198177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1198177?labeling=true' target='_blank'>封植兰蕙手约</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年12月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1198177")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1198177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1198177'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1198177'>山谷老人寓笔研于保安僧舍，东西窗外封植兰蕙，西蕙而东兰，名之曰清深轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1198177_comment'></div>涉冬既寒，封塞窗户，久而自隙间视之，郁郁青青矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1198177_comment'></div>乃知清洁邃深，自得于无人之境，有幽人之操也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1198177_comment'></div>余既获谴走宜州，则以兰二本、蕙八本付寺僧文质守之，幸为卒调护之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1198177_comment'></div>有士大夫欲迁而去者，可以此券示之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1198177_comment'></div>崇宁二年十二月丙午，山谷老人手约。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1198177_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　在鄂州，将往宜州贬所，黄大临作《青玉案》词送之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年12月19日</a>　连夜从鄂州出发，清晨到达汉阳，众多亲友赶到汉阳为其饯行。作品：十二月十九日夜中发鄂渚晓泊汉阳亲旧携酒追送聊为短句。<div id='poem_213507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213507?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十二月十九日夜中发鄂渚晓泊汉阳亲旧携酒追送聊为短句</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年12月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213507")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_213507_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213507'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213507'>接淅报官府，敢违王事程。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213507'>宵征江夏县，睡起汉阳城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213507'>邻里烦追送，杯盘泻浊清。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213507'>秪应瘴乡老，难答故人情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213507'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213507_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
黄冈

id='poem_sentence_3_214524'>风鸣娲皇五十弦，洗耳不须菩萨泉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214524_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214524'>嘉二三子甚好贤，力贫买酒醉此筵。<div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_214188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_214188'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_214188'>武昌<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_2_214188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214188'>年来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_214188", 214188, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>鬼祟</span>覆三豪，词林根柢颇摇荡。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214188'>天生大材竟何用，只与千古拜图<sup class='reference id='poem_sentence_5_214188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214188'>汀洲鸿雁未安集，风雪牖户当塞向。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214188'>有人出手办兹事，正可隐几穷诸妄。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214188'>经行东坡眠食地，拂拭宝墨生楚怆。<div -----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='30a438786d0e4999a059978eed56a5c5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("30a438786d0e4999a059978eed56a5c5");'><span id='30a438786d0e4999a059978eed56a5c5_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年12月</a>　年底到达长沙,；在长沙，与秦观之子秦湛、婿范温相遇，时二人正护送秦观之丧北归，作诗慰之。作品：跋苦寒行。<div id='poem_1197621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197621?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋苦寒吟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197621")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197621_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197621'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197621'>开封张德渊，号为有急难之义，予晚识之于长沙，名不虚得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197621_comment'></div>泊船驿步门，与德渊官廨相近，时时相过，奔走予所阙，如有人挽其前、推其后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197621_comment'></div>他日持此卷来乞书，会舟子作岁除，未能行，舟中无他缘，偶得意书尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197621_comment'></div>崇宁二年十二月晦，山谷老人书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1197621_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年12月</a>　年底到达长沙；在长沙，与秦观之子秦湛、婿范温相遇，时二人正护送秦观之丧北归，作诗慰之。作品：晚泊长沙示秦处度范元实用寄明略和父韵五首。次韵元实病目。<div id='poem_214755' class='_poem'><div 衡山

id='poem_sentence_2_513255_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　在衡州，与花光山僧人仲仁相善，有诗歌交游。作品：天保松铭。题花光画。题花光画山水。<div id='poem_1197968' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197968' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197968?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天保松铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197968")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197968_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197968'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197968'>衡州花光山，实衡岳之南麓，有松杰出，盘礴云表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197968_comment'></div>晋陵邹浩尝以问长老仲仁曰：「方法堂佛殿鼎新之时，他山之木尚入绳墨，乃不以为材耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197968_comment'></div>仲仁曰：「自其合抱以来，睥睨于其旁者踵相寻而至，岂特吾寺之人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197968_comment'></div>但以适当天子寿山之前，故不敢运斤耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197968_comment'></div>因告之曰：「若闻天保之名乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197968_comment'></div>其比物以见意，止言如南山之寿，而以松柏之茂继焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197968_comment'></div>今山前之松，可谓茂矣，宜以天保名之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197968_comment'></div>仁请著以示后，于是乎铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1197968'>山有乔松，在南山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197968_comment'></div>巧匠观傍，莫之能伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197968_comment'></div>非此以为材，可以全生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197968_comment'></div>得极其高大，惟时太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197968_comment'></div>薄海内外，罔不稽首，归美以报，如松之茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197968_comment'></div>惟此独也，正能长且久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197968_comment'></div>勿伐勿败，祝圣人寿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1197968_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_213459' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213459' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213459?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题花光画</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213459")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213459_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213459'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213459'>湖北山无地，湖南水彻天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213459'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_213459", 213459, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>云沙</span>真富贵，翰墨小神仙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213459'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213459_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_213459'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_213459_0'>⑴ 自注：平沙（二字山谷集作此平沙起）远水笔意，超凡入圣法也，每率此意而（文集、山谷集无意而二字）为之，当冠四海而名后世。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_213459_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_213460' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213460' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213460?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题花光画山水</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213460")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213460_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213460'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213460'>花光寺下对云沙，欲把轻舟小钓车。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213460'>更看道人烟雨笔，乱峰深处是吾家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213460'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_213460_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　在衡州，有《所住堂》诗。<div id='poem_213259' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　在衡州，与花光山僧人仲仁相善，有诗歌交游。作品：赠花光老。题花光为曾公卷作水边梅。<div id='poem_214926' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_214926' class='poemTitle class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戏咏高节亭边山矾花二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213019")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_213019_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_213019'>江南野中有一种小白花，本高数尺，春开极香，野人谓之郑花，王荆公尝欲作诗而陋其名，予请名曰山矾，野人采郑花叶以染黄，必借矾而成色，故名山矾，海岸孤绝处，补陀山译者谓小白花山，予疑即此花尔，不然，何以观音老人端坐不去耶。</div><div id='poem_preface_213019_comment'></div><div -----title
衡阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b0ace0d026944d5ca27ca72640495885_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b0ace0d026944d5ca27ca72640495885");'><span id='b0ace0d026944d5ca27ca72640495885_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>，60岁</div><div id='b0ace0d026944d5ca27ca72640495885' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　在衡州，与惠洪相遇，有赠词。作品：西江月（月侧金盆堕水）<div id='poem_215087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西江月<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_215087")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215087_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_215087'>崇宁甲申，遇惠洪上人于湘中。洪作长短句见赠云：“大厦吞风吐月，小舟坐水眠空。雾窗春色翠如葱。睡起云涛正拥。往事回头笑处，此生弹指声中。玉笺佳句敏惊鸿。闻道衡阳价重。”次韵酬之。时余方谪宜阳，而洪归分宁龙安</div><div id='poem_preface_215087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215087'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215087'>月侧金盆堕水，雁回醉墨书空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215087'>君诗秀色雨园葱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215087'>想见衲衣寒拥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215087_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215087'>蚁穴梦魂人世，杨花踪迹风中。<div id='poem_sentence_3_215087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_215087'>莫将社燕等秋鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_215087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_215087'>处处春山翠重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_215087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_215087'><a href='javascript: 祁阳

id='poem_sentence_3_214677'>更作老夫船，樯竿插苍石。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214677'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_214677_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1197839' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197839' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197839?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中兴颂诗引并行记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197839")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197839'>崇宁三年三月己卯，风雨中来泊浯溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197839_comment'></div>进士陶豫、李格、僧伯新、道遵同至《中兴颂》崖下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197839_comment'></div>明日，居士蒋大年、石君豫、太医成权及其侄逸、僧守能、志观、德清、义明、崇广俱来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197839_comment'></div>又明日，萧褒及其弟裒来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197839_comment'></div>三日徘徊崖次，请予赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197839_comment'></div>老矣，岂复能文，强作数语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197839_comment'></div>惜秦少游已下世，不得此妙墨劖之崖石耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197839_comment'></div>修水黄某字鲁直，诸子从行相、棁、㭒、楛，舂陵尼悟超。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1197839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1197839'><span class='label'>按：</span>《豫章先生遗文》卷一二。又见明嘉靖刊本《豫章黄先生别集》卷一一，《山谷年谱》卷三○，道光《永州府志》卷一八中。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1197839_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1197827' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197827' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197827?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浯溪崖壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197827")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197827_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197827'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197827'>余与陶介石绕浯溪，寻元次山遗迹，如《中兴颂》、《峿台铭》、《右堂铭》，皆众所共知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197827_comment'></div>与介石裴回其下，想见其人，实深千载尚友之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197827_comment'></div>最后于𢈪亭东崖披剪榛秽，得次山铭刻数百字，皆江华令、瞿令间玉箸篆，笔画深稳，优于《峿台铭》也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197827_comment'></div>故书遗长老新公，俾刻之崖壁，以遗后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197827_comment'></div>山谷老人书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1197827_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年</a>　至祁阳，草书陶渊明诗，并刻石于嘉会亭。<br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_0_214138'>欧阳子，出阳山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_214138'>山奇水怪有异气，生此突兀<span class='link'
