id='poem_sentence_2_214138'>饮如江入洞庭野，诗成十手不供写。<div id='poem_sentence_2_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_214138'>老来抱璞向涪翁，东坡原是知音者。<div id='poem_sentence_3_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_214138'>苍龙璧，官焙香。<div id='poem_sentence_4_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_214138'>涪翁投赠非世味，自许诗情合得尝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_214138'>却思翰林来馈光禄酒，两家水鉴共寒光。<div id='poem_sentence_6_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_214138'>予乃安敢比东坡，有如玉盘金叵罗。<div id='poem_sentence_7_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_214138'>直相千万不<span class='inlineComment2'>（山谷集作奚）</span>啻过，爱公好诗又能多。<div id='poem_sentence_8_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_214138'>老夫何有更横戈，奈此于思百战何。<div id='poem_sentence_9_214138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_214138'></div><div -----end

宜州

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197091'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197091'>崇宁三年十一月，余谪处宜州半岁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197091_comment'></div>官司谓余不当居关城中，乃以是月甲戌，抱被入宿子城南予所僦舍喧寂斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197091_comment'></div>虽上雨傍风，无有盖障，市声喧愦，人以为不堪其忧，余以为家本农耕，使不从进士，则田中庐舍如是，又可不堪其忧耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197091_comment'></div>既设卧榻，焚香而坐，与西邻屠牛之机相直，为资深书此卷，实用三钱买鸡毛笔书。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1197091'></div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1104')">1104年10月13日</a>　在宜州，书李白《白头吟》作品：题李太白《白头吟》后。<div id='poem_1197495' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197495' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197495'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197495'>此篇皆太白作，而不同如此，编诗者不能决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197495_comment'></div>予以为二篇皆太白作无疑，盖醉时落笔成篇，人辄持去，他日士大夫求其稿，不能尽忆前篇，则又随手书成后篇耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197495_comment'></div>杜子美「巢父掉头不肯住」，一篇内数句参错不齐，亦此类，盖可俱列，不当去取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197495_comment'></div>高德修好文而多能，故书遗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197495_comment'></div>甲申十月癸丑，龙水市居喧寂斋书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_215210_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_215210'>江上一帆愁，梦犹寻、歌梁舞地。<div id='poem_sentence_7_215210_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　在宜州，黄大临告别起行，作诗送之。作品：宜阳别元明用觞字韵。元明留别。<div id='poem_213757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年2月11日</a>　在宜州，自作草书赠曾纡。作品：书自作草后赠曾公卷。<div id='poem_1197441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游龙水城南帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年6月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197822")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197822'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197822'>龙水城南，大雷雨后，十里至广化寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197822_comment'></div>溪壑相注，沟塍为一，草木茂密，稻花发香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197822_comment'></div>邵彦明置酒招予及华阳范信中、龙城欧阳佃夫，约清旦会于龙隐洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197822_comment'></div>余三人借马自南楼来，至则彦明及其弟彦升在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197822_comment'></div>初至，震雷欲雨，既而晴朗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197822_comment'></div>烧烛入洞中，石壁皆沾湿，道崖险路绝，相扶将上下，及乃出洞之南，东还卧洞口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197822_comment'></div>佃夫抱琴作贺，若有清风发于土囊，音韵激越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1197822_comment'></div>余与彦明棋赌大白，彦明似藏行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1197822_comment'></div>是日信中从佃夫授琴，久之得数句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1197822_comment'></div>洞南有乔木，似栟榈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1197822_comment'></div>熟视，叶间有实穟生，似橄榄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1197822_comment'></div>问从者，盖木威也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1197822_comment'></div>木威，《本草经》无有，宜州诸城砦多有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1197822_comment'></div>风俗取豚脍合之为䱹，盘中珍膳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1197822_comment'></div>顷有馈余，余不能啖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1197822_comment'></div>佃夫曰：「广东盖号为乌榄，犹邕贵间谓波斯橄榄云」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1197822_comment'></div>木威之叶，广东西人用作雨衣，柔勒密致，胜青莎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1197822_comment'></div>彦明者，临淮邵华，彦升兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1197822_comment'></div>信中名寥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1197822_comment'></div>佃夫名襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1197822_comment'></div>余者，江西之修水黄某鲁直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1197822_comment'></div>时崇宁四年六月辛巳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1197822_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　在宜州，与李几仲交游，有答书。作品：答李几仲书。<div id='poem_1195846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1195846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1195846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李几仲书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1195846")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1195846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1195846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1195846'>庭坚顿首，几仲司户足下：昨从东来，道出清湘八桂之间，每见壁间题字，以其枝叶占其本根，以为是必磊落人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1195846_comment'></div>问姓名于士大夫与足下一游旧者，皆曰是少年而老气有馀者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1195846_comment'></div>如是已逾年，恨未识足下面耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1195846_comment'></div>今者乃蒙赐教，称述古今，而归重于不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1195846_comment'></div>又以平生得意之文章，倾囷倒廪，见畀而不吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1195846_comment'></div>秋日楼台，万事不到胸次，吹以木末之风，照以海滨之月，而咏歌呻吟足下之句，实有以激衰愞而增高明也，幸甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1195846_comment'></div>庭坚少孤，窘于衣食，又有弟妹婚嫁之责，虽早知从先生长者学问，而偏亲白发，不得已而从仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1195846_comment'></div>故少之日得学之功十五，而从仕之日得学之功十三，所以衰愞不进，至今落诸公之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1195846_comment'></div>窃观足下天资超迈，上有亲以为之依归，旁有兄弟以为之佽助，春秋未三十，耳目聪明，若刻意于德义经术，所至当不止此耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1195846_comment'></div>非敢谓足下今日所有不足以豪于众贤之间，但为未及古人，故为足下惜此日力耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1195846_comment'></div>天难于生才，而才者须学问琢磨，以就晚成之器，其不能者则不得归怨于天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1195846_comment'></div>世实须才，而才者未必用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1195846_comment'></div>君子未尝以世不用而废学问，其自废惰欤，则不得归怨于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1195846_comment'></div>凡为足下道者，皆在中朝时闻天下长者之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1195846_comment'></div>足下以为然，当继此有进于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1195846_comment'></div>秋热虽未艾，伏惟侍奉之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1195846_comment'></div>龙水风土比湖南更热，老人多病眩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1195846_comment'></div>奉书草草，唯为亲为己自重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1195846_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年</a>　在宜州，乞钟乳于曾纡。作品：乞钟乳于曾公卷。<div id='poem_213932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_213932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/213932?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞钟乳于曾公衮<span class='inlineComment2'>（文集题下注：纡。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_213932")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_213932_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_213932'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_213932'>寄语曾公子，金丹几时熟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_213932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_213932'>愿持钟乳粉，实此罄悬腹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_213932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_213932'>遥怜蟹眼汤，已化<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_213932", 213932, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>鹅管玉</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_213932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_213932'>刀圭勿妄传，此物非碌碌<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《山谷内集诗注》卷二○）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_213932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_213932'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_213932_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年9月6日</a>　在宜州，作黎远字说文。作品：黎远字子思说。<div id='poem_1197769' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1197769' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1197769?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黎远字说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年9月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34455, "北宋", "黄庭坚", "poem_title_1197769")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1197769_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1197769'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1197769'>龙水黎充字子美，余同年进士黎与几之族子也，以名触其远从祖之讳，乞余更其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1197769_comment'></div>余名之曰远，而字之曰子思，而告之曰：远，儒家子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1197769_comment'></div>废书不读，此志不远也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1197769_comment'></div>出门从所乐而忘归，此虑不远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1197769_comment'></div>耳目聪明而陆沈于此，唯不思故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1197769_comment'></div>子思自今以始，一事而三思可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1197769_comment'></div>崇宁四年九月初六日，山谷老人叙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1197769_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1105&endYear=1105')">1105年9月9日</a>　在宜州，重阳日宜州城楼宴集，即席赋《南乡子》词。作品：南乡子（诸将说封侯）<div id='poem_215134' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_215134' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/215134?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南乡子 重阳日宜州城楼宴集即席作</a><span "poem_title_215134")'>黄庭坚</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_215134_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_215134'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_215134'>诸将说封侯，短笛长歌独<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_215134", 215134, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>倚楼</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_215134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_215134'>万事尽随风雨去，休休，戏马台南金络头。<div id='poem_sentence_1_215134_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_215134'>催酒莫迟留，酒味今秋似去秋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_215134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_215134'>花向老人头上笑，羞羞，白发簪花不解愁。</div><div
